Summary: We got married here! 70 family members flew from all over for our wedding. It was ABSOLUTELY perfect! Brad is the absolute best to work with! They bend over backwards to make sure your stay/guests is perfect Alana is a complete sweetheart and helped organize our wedding to perfection! We were/are truly blessed! We will be back!  üíù

Just a quick background‚Ä¶I‚Äôm a former F&B Director at La Valencia Hotel in La Jolla, Rancho Valencia Resort in Rancho Santa Fe, Stratosphere and Harrah‚Äôs Hotel & Casinos in Las Vegas. During my 30+ years in Food and Beverage, I‚Äôve come across some of the finest individuals who offer a ‚Äúdifferent level‚Äù of customer service. And I wanted to mention a few of the names and hoping you might share this email with them.       I need to start with MIKE MCDANIELS.  As a Front Desk Agent, he has a complete understanding of guest retention. An absolute gentleman who will do anything to ensure customer satisfaction. If I was still working in La Jolla, I would have
Manager Response: Hello Douglas:  We certainly cannot thank you enough for your glowing review of Surf & Sand and our associates. Summary: Our balcony was essentially on the ocean. The room was large and the bed comfortable.  But otherwise everything was standard and well worn. This hotel needs to be updated to justify the price. Unless you have money to burn, pick someplace else in Laguna.

Summary Heading: It‚Äôs so bad save your money for Montage
Summary: I think I am still in shocked. We got married here 10 years ago and it was such a beautiful hotel. Hubby took me back for staycation and I could not believe how RUN DOWN the place is. It‚Äôs not just one or two little issues. Even for someone who is in love with the location, SAVE your money and stay at the Montage for cheaper!!!   We paid over 1500 per night to stay here and end up with NO HOT shower and had to rise in the bath tub that does not drain. Front desk can‚Äôt explain why they could not fix it and give us 100 dollars off our stay‚Ä¶ is this a joke?   The room was gross and it‚Äôs so not worth it compared to all the other places we could have stayed! If you read the reviews, it‚Äôs not an isolated incident. This place has been poorly maintained and managed for years to get to

Summary Heading: Average, at best, and NO A/C
Summary: First and foremost, $1,100 a night SHOULD INCLUDE AN AIR CONDITIONED ROOM. Please be aware, IT DOES NOT. Almost every room on this property DOES NOT HAVE AIR CONDITIONING, and they are incredibly misleading about that online. I reached out to their staff while staying here to address this, and no one even bothered to respond. The service was below average at best. My girlfriend was 8 months pregnant and the "bell hops" didn't even attempt to help her with her bags. The sauna was broken at the spa during our spa day, and again, no help was offered to remedy this either. Beautiful view from the room is about the only plus you'll find here, so I would not stay here again.

One of the best hotel experiences. Great for business, and family. Cannot recommend highly enough. The highlight. How clean it all is, how wonderful the staff are. How immaculate the experience. Well done guys  üôè you out together an experience of luxury and comfort

Excellent property location.  Be aware, property does not have AC in any rooms.  Not a problem if not traveling during hot summer months.  Outside rear of property needs to be totally renovated - appears to have major damage from last storm.  In all our travels, the employees were the most helpful and friendliest of all - this is a major accomplishment for the hotel.  the rooms are spacious and the views are awesome.  Stayed on 8th floor of the high rise.

We recently stayed at this hotel for 5 nights.  We had a wonderful corner room with a balcony that had amazing views of the whole coast line.  The sound of the waves was mesmerizing.   Our room was large and very comfortable.  There was a slight lack of outlets which is unusual in good hotels these days.    The bathroom, however,  was suboptimal.  While we were happy to have double sinks, the shower was tiny and the water temperature was very hard to control.     The staff at this hotel - lobby, valet, housekeeping - are extremely pleasant and really want to make your visit as nice as possible.  However, the housekeeping services were very spotty.  There were several days where items around the coffee machine were not replaced, as well as bathroom items.    We liked the location
Room tip: Balcony or corner balcony room recommended.

Summary: The Surf & Sand in Laguna Beach is a relative diamond in the rough.  There are other hotels in Laguna on the beach with good offerings and I've stayed at many of them.  However, S&S offers the best quality and location for a high-end resort.

Easily my favorite resort in Laguna Beach. We had some difficulty and miscommunication scheduling through a 3rd party, but Lisa in Reservations cleared everything up and made it the best vacation and experience for me and my wife. On short notice too, I can‚Äôt thanks Lisa and her team enough. The service and amenities are top notch. Highly recommend.

We would return to this hotel for many reasons, the location on the water and close to town is a plus but the staff is so friendly we would return just for that.  The front Desk, Concierge, restaurant waiters all made us feel appreciated and special.  Nice work Surf and Sand

We went to Surf and Sand for a two-night getaway over New Years.  We had a great time.  I believe it is the most upscale beachfront hotels, outside of the large luxury hotels like Pelican, Montage, Monarch, and Ritz.  Definitely not a place for kids IMO.  Would we go again, yes.    Below are our observations:  LIKES -  Location.  Right in the middle of Laguna Beach (town).  And it is literally located on              the beach.   -  View.  Because it‚Äôs right on the beach, looking thru the window, the beach was right          there.  It felt like we were literally on top of the waves. -  Room.  The room was very specious with the bead facing the window/ocean.  Loved it. -  Room service.  With other hotels, we would call room service for extra towels and it  \            would

I wanted to share my wonderful experience at the surf and sand hotel. The whole staff was very welcoming and accommodating. The rooms were very nice with cool features too, under bed lights, heat lamps in the bathroom, silk pillowcases, and the balcony furniture was great. The pool and spa was beautiful with a staircase leading right to the ocean. Waking up and eating breakfast on the sunny balcony with the very nice sound of waves was my favorite part. I definitely would recommend this hotel, I can‚Äôt wait to go back.

my stay at the surf in sand was so accommodating and wonderful. our stay in our room was kept comfortable and beautiful. from the shower, to the bed, to the balcony. everything was above and beyond. i felt so welcomed by the front desk, security was amazing plus sight seeing of dolphins!!!!!

Summary Heading: Another wonderful stay at Surf & Sand
Summary: I just love everything about this Resort.  If you're going to stay in Laguna Beach, there is no better hotel.  The views are amazing, the amenities very classy, but what makes this resort 5 star is the staff.  In these times where service is virtually non-existent, every person we encountered was friendly, helpful, service oriented, professional and took extra steps to make us feel welcome and have our needs met for a great family vacation.  The rooms are dated and I understand the hotel will undergo a renovation soon, but other than some broken room items (which would have been addressed had we asked, but we didn't bother), the rooms were ideally located with ocean views and more spacious than most hotel rooms.  Hopefully, the renovations won't make this reasonably priced gem

Summary Heading: Good location, poor value for cost
Summary: We stayed in a deluxe surfside king room in September 2021. The room was clean but a bit dated, especially in the bathroom and the hallway. There is no air conditioning but staff brought a large fan for us. If you have accessibility issues be sure to check which rooms will work for you as there were a number of stairs to access this part of the building. Surfside is a literal description; we were on the bottom level and waves were crashing against the side of the hotel below our balcony and it is very loud - not the relaxing ocean sounds of a white noise machine. The hotel provides earplugs and we did need them.  The ocean was high during our stay so the beachfront was basically under water most of the time. The bed was comfortable and the staff were nice, the location is good.

Summary Heading: Run down hotel... but at least it has a good view
Summary: Whole stay was a disaster. Room 235, balcony door post was off, allowing a 4-5 inch breeze to come in, making our room extremely cold. We had our room heater on full blast all night but still were cold. Further, there was no hot water in the evenings when we would wash our hands or shower, and would at best get only lukewarm. Lastly, the jacuzzi at the hotel was colder than the pool. It was really upsetting that one of the amenities that we were looking forward to using was not even working. I wish the hotel would have contacted us and let us know prior to arrival at least. I was not expecting this at all

I don‚Äôt know where to start. This hotel is absolutely amazing on every level. The rooms, the facilities, the views are absolutely gorgeous! The food is amazing. Best room service ever! As if all of that wasn‚Äôt enough, the employees and service are top notch, first class and A-list. Every employee I‚Äôve encountered has been so gracious, and so polite. Everyone here goes above and beyond to accommodate. We had some issues with our flight getting delayed and canceled, and they went out of their way to make us comfortable during this inconvenience. I will always stay here. I highly highly recommend the surf and sand!
Manager Response: Hello Modeljedi!  We are so incredibly pleased to learn how much you enjoyed Surf & Sand. Thank you for your wonderful review.  We are also pleased that we made you feel comfortable after your difficult traveling experience, and look very forward to your return.  HAPPY NEW YEAR!!

Summary: Exceptional resort and staff is very friendly in all areas. Experience at the spa was extremely relaxing and just what we needed during a stressful time of the year. We can't wait to come back again next year!
Manager Response: Hello Devon:  Thank you for taking the time to let us and other travelers know what to expect when staying at Surf & Sand.  We look very forward to accommodating you next year.  Please reach out directly for any needed assistance in booking.  HAPPY NEW YEAR!

Summary: We booked our stay at the Surf & Sand for 4 nights and were very impressed with the location and facilities.  The hotel staff was exceptionally friendly and went out of their way to accommodate us.  Our room had an exceptional view and even the mild annoyance of noisy guests above our room was handle with great professionalism and the gift of additional amenities.  We would definitely stay at the hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Hello Summer!  We certainly look forward to the opportunity of accommodating your future stay, and are very pleased to know you enjoyed all that we have to offer. Thank you for your glowing review and compliments of the resort.  HAPPY NEW YEAR!

Summary Heading: Great Stay, great location, friendly staff, wonderful restaurant, comfortable room
Summary: Great stay in a wonderful location with friendly staff and a wonderful dining experience ending with an amazingly comfortable room. Highly recommended when I'm in Laguna Beach. Good old fashioned service with a laid back feel.
Manager Response: Hello Greggggg!  Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your recent stay and the great service of our wonderful associates dining experience.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  HAPPY NEW YEAR!

Summary: We had an incredible stay at Surf and Sand this past weekend. Celebrating our anniversary, we had a warm welcome at front Desk by Ken, incredible dinner at Splashes bar with our waiter Rich taking great care of us, and the overall experience was outstanding. We will definitely be back. The entire staff was friendly and the service was the best we have ever experienced at a hotel.
Manager Response: Hello REM Sleeper!  We are so very pleased that you enjoyed every aspect of your recent stay at  Surf & Sand!  Thank you for the compliments of our great Ken and Rich, which are appreciated and shared with them.  We look very forward to serving you again in the  near future.  HAPPY HOLIDAYS!

Summary Heading: Fantastic staff, pool , food and really comfy beds
Summary: So comfortable, very nice staff, delicious food. It is very expensive but it has an amazing pool and hot tub, very pretty views and a tremendous team of staff who cant do enough to make your stay enjoyable. It was a superb experience.
Manager Response: Hello Betty:  Wow - thank you for your glowing review of your recent stay.  We are always happy to hear our guests enjoy our location and the service our wonderful staff provides.  Please call  upon us when you are able to return.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: The Surf and Sand resort is a beautiful resort right on the ocean in Laguna Beach.  The suite we had was very good.  The staff is outstanding.  We did have a problem in our room but the staff was very responsive and took care of us immediately.  The bar is very small and it would be nice if they had some more places to gather for cocktails.  On our final night with our grandchildren, we asked if we could make s'mores at one of the fire pits and they were great and even gave us long sticks to cook the marshmallows which was such a nice touch and our grandkids loved it.  Great place to stay in Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Hello Louise Nobel:  We are so, so pleased to learn that you and your family, especially those grandchildren enjoyed our great service  and the amenities we offer. Thank you for the compliments of our location and our staff.  We hope to have you back in the near future.  Happy HoIidays!

Summary: We love the locale and that every room is on the ocean. Being able to see and hear the ocean is a big plus for us. The service is always great. Lots of great restaurants and shops in town, within comfortable walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello Ry:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your "soothing" stay at Surf & Sand.   We look very forward to having you as our guests once again. Please reach out directly for any needed assistance in booking your 2023 stay.  HAPPY NEW YEAR!

Summary Heading: Great hotel - right ON the beach
Summary: Love the sound of the waves. Book ocean front rooms. Rooms are spacious, comfortable  and clean. Great front desk staff - they take care of you. Breakfast choices are plentiful. Splashes bar ambiance is convivial, gorgeous views,  but service and food can improve.
Manager Response: Hello Recent Guest:  Thank you for the compliments of our property and great staff.  We regret we did not meet your dining service in Splashes bar, which are shared with our Director of  Food & Beverage to address.  Hopefully you will be able to return in the near future so we are able to meet all of your needs.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: As expected, we had a wonderful time.  Our view from the room was sensational.  The staff is top notch.  Very accommodating and willing to assist when asked.  We have come here for my wife's birthday many times in the past,and will continue to do so.
Manager Response: Hello - we are so pleased you and your wife enjoyed another birthday stay at Surf & Sand.  Please call upon us when you are able to return again.  Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Always the best getaway in Laguna Beach
Summary: The Surf & Sand is a "must stay" resort.  There is no resort closer to the ocean and within walking distance to everything.  Don't spend more to stay elsewhere - check-in and relax in the incredible resort.  Great service and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Hello our Denver Friend!  We are so pleased to know you enjoyed yet another stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for letting other travelers know how much they will enjoy a stay also!  We'll see you back soon! Happy Holidays!

Summary: I have stayed at the Surf and Sand several times and have always had a wonderful experience there. This visit was no different. The staff is top notch; Misty in reservations was amazing in helping to ensure that I was able to get the room type and location that I desired. Mike at the front desk was so nice and also ensured that I would be able to stay in the room I was hoping for, and I was even able to check in early. Last but not least, Laurie in Concierge went out of her way to locate a night light for the bathroom which I requested. All of their efforts were truly appreciated and made me feel like a valued guest. I look forward to my next stay there!
Manager Response: Hello our very loyal guest!  Thank you so much for letting us know you enjoyed another stay at Surf!  And thank you also for the compliments of our great Misty, Mike, and Laurie who are true assets of the resort. We look very  forward to your return! Happy Holidays

Summary: We have stayed here many times, but like many other places as of late the service level has dropped to an unacceptable level.  We arrived about an hour before "official" checkin of 4:00 PM and left our bags with the bellman.  At 3:59 they called us to tell us our room was ready (along with every other person that was waiting).  We waited for 45 minutes for our bags to be delivered and had called 3 times.  Finally, my wife went to grab the bags since they were sitting on a cart 50 feet from our room.  The bellman stopped her and said "if you are going to use the cart, you must have a bellman".  She said I would LOVE to have a bellman.  That's how we finally got our bags.  We had dinner reservations for my my birthday the first night (which was one of the reasons that we stayed
Manager Response: Hello Loyal Guests:  We deeply regret that we did not meet your needs during your recent stay. We strive to provide the best guest services; however, failed to do so in this instance.  Splashes restaurant was, indeed, closed due to a broken pipe which flooded the restaurant and was quite unexpected and very unfortunate.  We hope to have you return in the future so that we are able to provide  an enjoyable stay.

Summary: My wife and I were visiting from Sonoma County for our 5-year anniversary. We were finally able to make time to come down here and‚Ä¶ Wow! The views were simply beautiful and the staff members were very friendly.   The food was also incredible, but I wanted to point out that the best part of our night was our bartender, RICKY! Who was just absolutely amazing!! Ricky was extremely accommodating (even though the bar was a bit overcrowded) and his liquor knowledge combined with his humor was the perfect way to end our night. He was thoughtful enough to bring us a complimentary dessert and champagne as well! We will be celebrating our anniversary at Splashes from here on out, with Ricky.
Manager Response: Hello Sonoma Guests!  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your anniversary stay and the special attention of Ricky, which is shared with him and appreciated.  Let us know when you are able to return.  We look forward to having you!

Summary Heading: Dated, Disappointing, and too Durn Hot!!!
Summary: After reading, and taking to heart,  the positive reviews perhaps my expectations were too high but then again, for $800, maybe not...    After a long drive I was so looking so forward to relaxing, enjoying the room and the ocean view with a nice glass of red before heading downstairs to dine at Splashes . Instead I spent the first three hours just trying to get the temperature down to where I could sit comfortably in the room.  I had to leave the front door open for cross ventilation.  I was never so happy to see the sun set in my life, lol.    There is no air conditioning and the glass was cheap single pane with no insulation from  the heat (can  you say greenhouse?), and little from the sound.     Yes, the sound of waves are supposed to be enjoyable but only when you are not
Manager Response: Hello - thank you for sharing details of your recent stay.  Please know that a complete renovation of the entire resort is in the planning stages, to include air conditioning, to which we are looking very forward. We regret we did no meet your expectations and would like to have you return in the future.  Regards,

Summary: Only a few rooms have hvac, so if the weather is warm, the ocean facing rooms become stifling.  Restaurant is very good but pricey.  Decor is tired.  Some rooms accessible by stairs only, making it difficult if your carrying your own baggage
Manager Response: Hello recent guest!  Thank you for sharing regarding your recent stay. Please know that major improvements  to the entire resort are in the planning stages including air conditioning.  We hope to have you back with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Just Don‚Äôt- save yourself the money
Summary: Fire alarm went off late night and nothing was communicated even when I stopped by Front desk to talk to manager twice. Hotel needs a major remodel. It feels like it‚Äôs falling in the ocean - and looks like it too. Looks like a holiday inn repainted 15 times. Lots of maintenance needed. Need to walk thru restaurant to get to pool (what?!). Overall layout bad. Best service was by far the valet. Only reason for the three rating below.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Cubs:  Our deep regret for the very unusual and intrusive malfunctioning fire alarm during your stay. Please be aware that a major renovation to the entire resort is in the planning stages at this time. We hope to have you return in the future.  Thank you for the compliments of our great Valet team, which are appreciated and shared with them. Warm regards,

Summary: I'm going to keep it simple. Grounds beautiful. Rooms beautiful. HOWEVER,  no A/C.  I like being cold at night, so  when I'm sweating in a room I paid $400 plus for I'm pissed. I  would stay again if the rooms had A/C , otherwise no way in hell
Manager Response: Hello Wanderer:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay.  Please know that improvements to the resort are in the planning stages to include air conditioning.  We would enjoy your return in the future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.

Summary: Romantic weekend in beautiful Southern California. The resort is a short walk to shops.  The facility is beautiful.  The staff friendly and helpful.  Endless ocean views from the room, pool and restaurant.
Manager Response: Hello Recent Guest:  It is always gratifying to learn our guests enjoyed their time at Surf & Sand and all that we have to offer. Thank you for sharing your experience.  We hope to have you back with us in the not-too-distant future.  Happy Fall Season!

Summary: Surf and Sand must go out of their way to hire friendly staff as everyone from the the check-in desk, to the maids, to the valets were down-to-earth and amazing at making us feel welcome and making a human connection.  Our room was perfect.  The bed was the best I've stayed on.
Manager Response: We SO appreciate your recognition of our wonderful associates and the service they provided.  Thank you so much  we are very proud of each and every staff member. We hope to have you back in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: My wife and I stayed at Surf & Sand to celebrate our anniversary and it was a perfect choice to enjoy the ocean and the town of Laguna.  The location and the views were awesome, and the location worked really well for us because we enjoy walking through town so the 10-15 minute walk to most restaurants was totally fine.  The pool area was great and was never over crowded.  We stayed in late September, early October, so it may be more crowded in the warmer summer months, but it was great for us.  The rooms are out dated, but my wife and I didn't really have a problem with that...you can't beat the views!  The only concern for me is the lack of AC.  It was only in the 70s while we stayed so it wasn't too bad and we enjoyed keeping the sliding door open to hear the waves all night,
Manager Response: Hello Bryan:  Thank you for your very informative review of your recent stay.  We are always happy to learn when our very loyal guests have enjoyed another stay at Surf & Sand.  We are planning improvements to the resort to include air conditioning for which we look very forward.  Thank you for the compliments of the service of our great associates!

Summary: Hotel is run down and bar and restaurant are closed! Ocean view was pretty but not fir high price $800 I feel that hotel shoukd be up front about state of hotel before booking rooms.  They seem to be struggling with staff as well
Manager Response: Hello - thank you for your feedback.  Please know that major improvements to the entire resort are in the planning stages at this time.  We regret the closure of the restaurant during your stay which was very unexpected due to a maintenance issue. We are pleased that the closure was quickly remedied. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.

Summary Heading: You can do better for the money
Summary: This was an incredibly disappointing experience.   We have friends that recently moved to Laguna Beach and were hoping to make Surf and Sand our monthly weekend getaway when visiting them from LA.     While the staff was very polite, there were several issues.    1.  I requested a crib for my toddler 3 times‚Äî at the time I made the reservation, when we checked in, and when the bellman brought our luggage.   All times we were told ‚Äúof course, we will bring it‚Äù  When we got back around 8pm with a daughter that had fallen asleep in the car, there was still no crib.  At this point, bringing in a crib would have been disruptive and loud.     Our 15 mo old daughter had to sleep between us in a queen bed  2.  We were aware we were booking a room at a ‚Äúdiscounted rate‚Äù (still $600)
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Grisales:  We sincerely apologize that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay. The issues you experienced are quite unusual and are shared with our entire management team to review for improvements.  We have experienced unusually high tides due to the recent hurricane which affected our beach negatively.  We look forward to  your return so that we are able to accommodate an enjoyable stay.  Please contact us directly.

Summary: The rooms are like hot convection ovens, no AC and not enough fans in the world to cool it down.  The bar was closed (Monday) as was the restaurant so they had a make shift bar upstairs by the coffee bar.  We had to leave our hot box room just to escape the heat to have a terrible margarita in a plastic glass for $17.00.  This is the worst hotel room experience I could ever think of and yet here we are staying 3 nights in a heatwave in the worst place on earth.
Manager Response: Hello Passenger:  We sincerely regret your discomfort during your stay. The heat was unexpected, as was the closure of Splashes due to unforeseen maintenance issues. We are looking forward to  cooler weather and the restaurant was reopened for usual guest needs.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future

Summary: You cannot find a hotel along the pacific coast with a better room atmosphere or view. Literally on top of the beach and water with a gorgeous 90 degree view of the water. Outstanding staff. Always courteous, polite and very helpful. Perfect Laguna Beach location with walking distance to many shops and restaurant and close to downtown.  The room decor is looking a bit worn and tired - but the rest makes up for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Hello Eys:  We are so pleased knowing you enjoyed all that we have to offer our guests. Please know that major improvements to the entire resort are in the planning stages.  We look forward to having you back in the future.

Summary: Most excellent retreat that overlooks the beautiful Laguna Beach coast line,with unparrelled ocean sounds, breazes and smells. A modern campus with the feel of nostalgic elite travel.  A must stay for anyone seeking the best California experience.
Manager Response: Hello Carolyn:  Thank you for letting us and other travelers know how much you enjoyed your stay. We look very forward to your return - please call upon us for any  needed assistance.

Summary: Attended a wedding at the resort. Everything was beautiful, the rooms were big over looking the ocean. Comfortable beds, night service was amazing, the staff everything was great. Thank you for a great weekend.
Manager Response: Hello Wedding Guests:  We love knowing we met your needs and you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for the compliments of our great service.  Please call upon us when you are able to return.

Summary: Mike at the front desk truly helped make our experience memorable by going above and beyond to make us feel comfortable during our stay.  Also, special thanks to Brandon, Kevin, and Marcus in valet who got to know our schedules and always had our cars ready at a moment's notice.  Special thanks as well to Wes, Rich, and Martin at Splashes Bar.  The staff was amazing and are the main reason we will continue to come back to our favorite hotel, The Surf and Sand!
Manager Response: Hello Daydream:  As our loyal guests, we appreciate your feedback regarding your September stay. Thank you so very much for the compliments of our wonderful associates and their great service. Please reach out directly when you are able to return to your favorite hotel!

Summary: We stayed for our babymoon over labor day weekend. Unfortunately there was a heatwave and high tide which created some issues for us but due to the excellent service didn‚Äôt ruin the trip for us! I was shocked by the number of kids at the pool as I expected a very adult Hotel. Just a heads up for anyone visiting for the first time. Food and view at splashes were amazing. Suggest making a reservation ahead of time. The service from check in, splashes, pool etc was excellent. There is no AC but we requested an extra fan and did ok despite the temps. We will definitely return but will avoid holiday weekends entirely or possibly weekends all together. May suggest checking the tide schedule and visit during a cooler month.
Manager Response: Hello Shaelener:  Thank you so very much for your very informative review of your stay at Surf & Sand. We are so pleased to know you enjoyed your babymoon and appreciate your understanding of the very high unexpected heat which was unusual.  Yes, please visit us at a less busy time of year so we are able to provide an enjoyable stay.  Warm wished

Summary Heading: Would never return -- room quality and front desk service are both awful
Summary: Stayed for one night (business trip). I booked through Hotel Tonight and paid $532 for my room.  Was checked in by a gentleman named Mike, who was very friendly. I asked if my room had any view, to which he replied "it's not a great view but for the price you're paying, it's really great!" As if somehow $532 shouldn't buy much. He also forgot to have my bags sent up to my room (I waited for 45 minutes). When I approached the front desk, he apologized and said he would have wine sent up to the room to make up for it. No wine was ever sent. The worst part, however, was that the walls are paper thin. And when I say paper thin, I mean PAPER thin. The room next to me had a family with a very small child who screamed throughout the night. It was as if the screaming child was in my

Wish I could have a better report after wanting to stay for years . Property is a little run down; which is particularly troubling when you‚Äôre paying a good amount for a room. Amazing location, great dinner, but no AC, upgrades needed and storage in front of room entrances :-(
Manager Response: Hello Patricia:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay.  We regret we did not meet your expectations.  Major improvements to the resort are in the planning stages at  this time.  Please reach out directly in the future for any needed assistance.

Summary Heading: Loved the views, but don‚Äôt think I‚Äôd return
Summary: Pros:  gorgeous location right on the beach with beautiful views and crystal clear water.  The resort staff goes out of their way to be helpful.  Service was very good except at the coffee bar, Pacific Perk, where they‚Äôre understaffed with only one person working the bar. Definitely not the barista‚Äôs fault.  Cons:  overly loud music blaring all day long at the fairly small pool area.  Not everyone likes the same music, and I don‚Äôt know why some corporate head decided that listening to terrible, trite K-pop music all day is a fun thing.  I tried to cover it up by listening to my own music with my ear buds, but one day the wi-fi at the pool was nonexistent.  We also had a problem getting wi-fi in our room, and the hotel staff had to send someone to our room to assist us with being
Manager Response: Hello Happy Wanderer:  We deeply regret we did not meet all of your expectations.  Your concerns have been shared with our General Manager and Executive Management team to review for future improvements. We hope to have you back at some point in the future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.

Summary: Outstanding location, service, staff, food and then... ...the ocean setting. Rooms are implectable, service by all of the staff from the minute you arrive with the valet service immediately there to assist, directed to your room, bell service, check-in, concierge and then the OCEAN view to be in your view.
Manager Response: Hello Paul W:  It is so gratifying to receive such great compliments of your recent stay.  We are so pleased you enjoyed all of our amenities and services. Let us know when you are able to return!

Summary: The hotel is wonderfully located, great staff and very nice amenities. The food in Splash was great and room service was very good.  We highly recommend the spa, the treatments were fantastic.  We highly recommend Surf and Sand
Manager Response: Hello Whale!  Wow!  We are so pleased to know how much you enjoyed your recent stay, our staff, spa, room service and our great location  Hopefully, we'll be able to accommodate you in the near future once again!

Summary: Hotel that has a lot of potential falls flat. Not having air conditioning does not seem to be a big deal in Laguna but during our stay temperatures were above 77 degrees so we had to keep our patio door open at all times. Forget taking a shower and being able to use the mirror or even be in the bathroom as the fans and bathroom are completely outdated.
Manager Response: Hello!  Our sincere apologies that you were inconvenienced and uncomfortable during your recent stay. Please know that major improvements are in the planning stages at this time to include air conditioning. We hope to have you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Very nice place but no AC
Summary: Stayed for two nights at the Surf and Sand August 2022. You cannot beat the views at this place - stunning, dramatic ocean views. The staff is also terrific, especially at the pool and beach. The rooms are well appointed with fabulous balconies EXCEPT they do not have air  conditioning. I think I might have been the last person to book this place not to realize this, but I was shocked to pay $800/night for a hotel in the summer without air conditioning. It was not stifling, but it wasn't comfortable, either. The hotel did provide us with box fans which helped a little. Anyway, a nice stay, but beware of hot nights.
Manager Response: Hello David - we are pleased to  know you enjoyed your recent stay.  Major improvements to the entire resort are underway, which will include air conditioning.  We hope to have you back\ in the future and in the interim, at a cooler time of year!

Summary: Yet another amazing experience at Surf and Sand Resort! The hotel itself and the staff are great! If you're looking to creat memories, this is the place to be. The balcony room views are amazing and the sound of the waves are enjoyably relaxing. Even at Splashes Bar you have a perfect view for sunsets and the ocean breeze coming in through the open windows is to die for. The waves come crashing in literally right up to the side of the restaurant! This is our second stay this year and I'm sure it probably won't be the last staycation. We love driving up from Long Beach to visit Laguna for the weekend.
Manager Response: Hello our Long Beach Neighbor!  Thank you for letting us and other traveler's know that "this is the place to be."  We appreciate your compliments of our location, amenities and staff.  Please let us know when you are able to return  hopefully, sooner than later!

Summary: If I could give more stars I would.  The staff was so amazing.  Mike at the front desk made us feel so welcomed and Ryan the bellman made sure we were well taken care of.  Our room was very clean and has a great view of the ocean.  It was amazing hearing the ocean waves all day and especially at night.  The food at the restaurant Splashes is more then delicious.     Will definitely being visiting again!
Manager Response: Hello Happy Guest:  Thank you for the glowing review of your recent stay.  We always enjoy knowing you enjoyed our wonderful associates - especially Mike and Ryan, who are great assets of the resort.  Please let us know when you are able to return - call upon us directly.

Summary: We had a wonderful time! Amazing and super friendly staff! Location and room view were great! We will most definitely be back here again soon! We had a wedding to get ready for, and after we checked out, they allowed us access to a private bathroom with a shower! They were so friendly!
Manager Response: Hello Mendy!  Thank you for the compliments of your recent stay and the service of our great associates. We look forward to your return in the future. Please call upon us directly so that we are able to meet all of your needs!

Summary: We loved the view, the layout of the room, the spa, the staff and the food!  A little more detail needs to be looked after like one of our shutters was broken.  Other that that, it was an awesome getaway!
Manager Response: Hello Beautiful Views!  We are so pleased you appreciate our location, guestroom, Aquaterra Spa and our food & beverage. Thank you for the compliments and letting us know you enjoyed an "awesome getaway!"

Summary Heading: Not the Surf and Sand it used to be ...
Summary: Obvious differed maintenance everywhere.  Palm tress and overall landscaping was not kept up, dried up dead plants everywhere.  Salt corrosion everywhere.  Chipped and peeling plaster.  Broken floor tiles.  etc etc etc
Manager Response: Hello recent guest.  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. It has, indeed, been a difficult two years. Major improvements to the resort are in the planning stages at this time and we are looking very forward to resuming our full services and full staffing.

Summary Heading: LOVED IT, BUT TRANSPARENCY ON PRICING NEEDED
Summary: The place and location is absolutely stunning, and I didnt regret one minute spent there. Laguna beach is fantastic.  My only concern going there was the lack of air conditioning in the rooms, but that's absolutely not a problem once there.   The only negative thing to flag is the additional price that you dont see on their website while booking (or at least I didnt see...) that made an expensive experience definitely a bit overpriced.  I booked well in advance a double room at ca 600 USD per night. Beautiful room, with a breath-taking views on the ocean.   On top of this 600 dollar per night I had to pay (per day!)  - Occupancy tax (14% of the day rate) equivalent to 83 USD per day - Resort fee of additional 25 USD per day on top of the occupancy tax (what is a resort fee?!) -
Manager Response: Hello Recent Guest:  Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed your stay.  Please know that your feedback and concerns are shared with our entire Executive Management team to review for improvements. We regret we did not meet all of your expectations and appreciate your honest feedback. We will continually strive to improve our services and hope you give us another opportunity to serve you in the near future.   Regards,

Summary: I came for the ocean which was the ONLY great thing about this property. I came on vacation with 2 family members, one of whom has never been to California. I'm writing this review after 2 days of my 5 night stay...God help me for the rest of this stay. The staff were kind and the people in Laguna (stores and shops visited) were welcoming and friendly. HOWEVER, this property is HORRIBLE, OVERPRICED for what you get and not worth the over $4,000 for 5 nights for a king tower corner room. The pictures on the resort website are DECEIVING. They should have worked out their "legal renovation issues," shut down the property and reopen after renovations. The property and the rooms are outdated; in some areas, just nasty; musty hot rooms with NO AC (if you do not ask in ADVANCE, they

Needs work, super pricy, absolutely beautiful views small pool great staff. For the money they charge everything should have worked. There is no AC that was a problem.  Parking is very expensive. No security teenagers running rampant. Great shopping, Great   walking to all restaurants very good location
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We are pleased to know you enjoyed our great view and service of  our associates.   Renovation of the entire resort is in the planning staging at this time, which will include air conditioning. We hope to have you back with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Great staff, old buildings and bad neighbors
Summary: Booked a King Tower Ocean view.  Got there and room was ROASTING.  Couldn't find the air conditioner controls.  Turns out THERE IS NO A/C in that entire building.  The front desk staff traded us for a different room in a different building that does have A/C.  The room amenities there were fantastic.  Comfy bed, great view, though not as nice as the tower room we had reserved.  The discount for the new room was still higher than what they normally charge for that room, but whatever, I needed A/C, I was willing to pay.  Again, staff were great, totally understanding and made our situation work.  The next issue that came up was with the neighbors around us.  The one on the left was up smoking pot till 3am which made our room smell like pot all night.  And the other neighbor on the
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for sharing you recent experience at Surf & Sand. We are pleased to have been able to accommodate your needs.  Our sincere apologies for the unfortunate circumstances with your nearby guests. We do impose hefty fines and finally eviction for offenders who smoke and for pet owners who do not control their pets. We are sorry you experienced these issues.  Thank you for the compliments of our service, massages and room service dining!

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights, room did got get cleaned the entire stay. Requested verbally to the cleaning ladies and front desk for a total of 3 times. Also, requested clean towel and didn‚Äôt receive until the valet guy was kind enough to assist. Also, air conditioner did not work. Seems I was placed in a room that was invisible or no one ever visited!
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Saunders:  Our sincere apologies for the lack of service during your recent stay, which is quite unusual. Please know that your feedback is shared with our management team to research and review. We regret that you felt slighted in any way and look forward to your return. Please call upon us directly so that we are able to better accommodate all of your needs.

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel in Laguna Beach!
Summary: Returned to the Surf & Sands to find the experience was absolutely fabulous. The staff was very accomidating and we truly enjoyed all of the amenities. The location to the ocean is unparalleled. This is a MUST STAY iin Southern CA.
Manager Response: Hello D Andrews:  As our loyal return guest, than you for letting us know you enjoyed another stay at Surf & Sand. We look forward to you returning in the near future.    Regards,

Summary: This was my fourth trip to this hotel. My favorite thing about this hotel is I can walk out of my room and I am steps to the beach. It is never over crowded and I enjoy walking the beach in the morning and evening here. The Hotel has great food, I highly recommend the cheese board in Splashes. Great location to visit Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Hello Recent Guest:  We are so pleased to have had you as our guest once again and to learn how much you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the compliments of the resort and our amenities. We look very forward to your fifth stay!

Summary Heading: Still the Best on the Beach in Laguna Beach
Summary: The third time staying at Surf and Sand and it was once again wonderful. Staff is AMAZING, Big Mike, Tom, Collette and the entire staff were super!! Tips - 1) Pool can be noisy from kids when school is out 2) Get rooms on floors 7 - 8 or 9. The corner rooms are not bigger, you just get a regular window looking south or north. NORTH is the best if you want the corner. Frankly, the premium one pays for that is not all that beneficial. The regular rooms are just a nice. Food and Beverage is awesome and service is super!!! Not a cheap place but WORTH the $$ paid!!!
Manager Response: Hello Fly Guy!  As our loyal, return guest. We appreciate knowing how much you enjoyed another stay at Surf &Sand.  Thank you also for letting other guests know what they can expect when staying with us.  Hopefully, we'll see you back for a fourth visit soon. Thank you for the compliments of Big Mike, Tom, Collette and our great team!

Summary Heading: Best Oceanfront hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: We have been coming to the Surf & Sand resfort for over 10 years now. It never disappoints - the sound of the ocean from your room, to the excellent customer service offered from everyone to the ideal beach location make this resort something special. I can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Hello Jewel:  And we "can't wait" to have you back at Surf & Sand to once again enjoy all that we have to offer. Thank you for your compliments of your entire stay!!

Summary: I've been vacating in Laguna Beach for years but this is the first time I've stayed at the Surf and Sand Resort. The Resort is 1st class all the way. The staff were professional and attentive. The food was well prepared and served promptly. The rooms were spacious with great ocean views.
Manager Response: Hello First Time Guest:  Thank you for letting us and other travelers know how much you enjoyed the resort and all that we have to offer.  Thank you also for the compliments of our views, dining and staff. Please let us know when we may be of assistance in the future.

Summary: Just had another perfect stay at Surf & Sand. So welcoming and relaxing. Their amazing team and gorgeous property always elevate our time in Laguna Beach. Absolutely no better location better location in Southern California. Counting the days until next time.
Manager Response: Hello Kiki:  It is so gratifying to know you enjoyed yet another perfect stay at Surf!  We are so pleased to know you enjoy our wonderful staff, the service they provide and our "no better location  in So Cal".  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future!!

Summary: Beachfront paradise! Great Location. The staff is there for all of your needs. All the great amenities. Great place for families. Valet parking ease, just exit your car and enjoy! The view is spectacular! Downtown Laguna has wonderful art, dinning and shopping.
Manager Response: Hello Lisa!  Wow - thank you for your glowing review of Surf & Sand and all of our amenities. We are always pleased to know how much our guests enjoy their time with us. Please call upon us when you are able to return.

Summary Heading: Wow love it here stunning hotel
Summary: I am here now listening to waves from my bed it like being in heaven. I love my rooms my bed is facing the sea. Had dinner here last night and the food was brilliant. The staff are so nice all ourneeds are being met. It‚Äôs a charming hotel with a real boutique feel. I love that pool is open late.
Manager Response: Hello Traveler:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed our resort and great location next to the ocean. Thank you for letting us know that our staff, dining and room accommodations met your needs.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: We go every year to Pageant of the Masters, Sawdust festival. We look forward to Laguna Beach every summer. Lots of beautiful shops, restaurants, art. We enjoyed the beach. Our hotel provided us with beach chairs, umbrellas, and beach towels. My favorite place! Let me just say our hotel is insanely stunning!
Manager Response: Hello Sparkles:  We appreciate your loyalty every year. Thank you for the compliments of our resort  and the services we provide. We look forward to having you back next summer!

Summary: Beautiful place would have been absolutely perfect have they had Air conditioning or portable AC units in all rooms. Impossible to sleep or get cool in summer months. Unable to sleep with the sound of the crashing waves because doors cannot be closed and salt air back spray covered the inside of the room and on the floors through balcony. If they had AC or portable units I would give it a five star plus rating. But never again would I go back unless they have it
Manager Response: Hello - thank you for the compliments of Surf & Sand. Please know that  plans for air conditioning  will be included in our future renovation of the entire resort (which has been delayed with legalities for quite some time).  Please call upon us in the future for any needed assistance.

Summary: The positive feedback I will give is that yes the staff was very friendly.   Check In was awkward because there were so many people in the lobby but no organization.  There really wasn't a line or anything.   The fact that there is no AC is fine, but it needs to be advertised IN BIG AND BOLD lettering so the expectation is set.  The thermostat in the room goes down to 50 degrees so naturally I thought that was for the AC and it's for a heating unit.  A simple label on that would be fine.   The ceiling fan barely worked.  It was a joke. We had to use the loud ass portable fan that was in the closet.  The closet barely fit everything that was already in it.   I wasn't even told what the key was for to get into the refrigerator. That was weird.   Housekeeping came to clean when
Manager Response: Hello Mr. DeVorak:  Our sincere apologies that you were inconvenienced during your recent stay.  I replied to your survey also explaining our renovation plans for the future.  We deeply regret the  unfortunate issues you encountered.   Please reach out to us directly in the future so that we are able to better accommodate all of your needs.  for any needed assistance.

Summary: NO AIRCONDITIONING - How can a hotel anywhere in Southern California have no air-conditioning? Rooms are perpetually stuffy - even with the balcony door wide open. Poor shower water pressure. Pillows that make airline pillows look like the height of luxury. All of this for 1K/night. Not to mention the outdated and tired decor (bed linen that has seen better days).  We were seduced by the favorable reviews - not sure where those individuals actually stayed as the reviews bear little resemblance to this hotel. Only reason not giving it 1 star is that the staff are clearly trying inspite of the challenging work environment.
Manager Response: Hello Eric:  We regret that we did not meet your expectations.  A renovation for the entire resort has been in the planning stages for quite some time, being delayed by legalities. We are now looking forward to  continuing with those efforts, which will include air conditioning.  Please call upon us for any needed  assistance in the future.

Summary: I have been going to Surf & Sand for 20 years, and now it is a place my family and I go every summer. From top to bottom, the Surf & Sand hotel is great from it's location right on the beach, to the great food and the great staff. This is the only place to stay in Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Hello Our Loyal Guest:  We were so pleased to have you as our guest once again and to know you enjoyed another wonderful stay.  Thank  you for the compliments of our location, staff and dining.  We look very forward to your return!

Summary Heading: 1 star is too high of a rating
Summary: Place is old and outdated. Rooms not very clean and they stink. There were items on the floor from previous guest- nothing had been dusted or cleaned. Didn‚Äôt even like using in room phone it was so dirty.  Shower in our second room did not work- we‚Äôre moved to 2nd room because 1st room was nasty. Highly recommend you stay somewhere else
Manager Response: Hello Jsw:  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. We hope to have you return in the future to enjoy the updates that are planned for the entire resort. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.

Summary: Stayed for our anniversary.  Staff recognized the occasion at both check in and at dinner with special amenity. Service was top notch even at the pool bar which was crowded.  The beach service was excellent too. We stayed in the one room that is a possible prototype for future hotel upgrade and it was stunning. It was on par with any 5 star hotel room.  Food was excellent both at dinner and breakfast.  Our service throughout our stay was exceptional. Everyone was hard working and eager to please.
Manager Response: Hello Texmama:  Thank you for your glowing review of your recent stay. We are pleased to learn you enjoyed our model room and the great beach service and dining experience.  We look forward to your return. Thank you for the compliments of our great associates!

Summary: We‚Äôve stayed many times over the years and always look forward to our next visit. Amazing service as always. They truly make every effort to accommodate every request. Sunsets and waves for days - thank you!
Manager Response: Hello Matt K;  We are so pleased you enjoyed another stay at Surf & Sand and, especially, the great service our associate provide for every stay.  Please let us know when you plan to return!

Summary: After staying in many hotels every year that we attended the pageant, this was the best(and most expensive).  It has the best location and the dining was superior.  The deck was delightful for coffee or whatever?  The staff could not have been nicer.  The pool area was clean and well cared for, and the beach with ocean roaring was such a treat!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Scottsdale Guest:  Thank you for your glowing review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand!  It is always great to hear our guests appreciate our location, dining and the great service of our associates.  We look forward to your return. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Happy Summer

Summary: I stayed at Surf and Sand on 7.25. Mike at the front desk made my night and trip. He was so kind and accommodating and it meant so much! Everyone on staff was very helpful. The boys at the pool were great and very sweet.
Manager Response: Hello Melissa:  We are so pleased to know we met your needs during your recent stay and you enjoyed the service of Mike and all of our associates. We look forward to your return so that we are able to accommodate  another special stay for you.  Thank you.

Summary: OMGOSH, if you want to spend a few days with a group of people whose goal is to make your stay comfortable, trouble free....this is the location for you....do NOT hesitate to stay here...they were magnificent
Manager Response: Hello Jay;  Thank you for the compliments of your recent stay and the "magnificent" service we provided. Thank you also for the recommendation to other travels to come and enjoy a stay at Surf & Sand!

Summary Heading: Oceanfront hotel and dining, not cheap, maybe worth the hefty bill
Summary: Among the best spots along the coast for a direct ocean view rooms and meal but make a reservation early as rooms and restaurant tables are limited.  Important to remember to bring a wad of cash for the bill.
Manager Response: Hello Dana:  We are very pleased to know you enjoyed one of the "best spots along he coast."  Thank you for the compliments of our location, rooms and dining.  Contact us directly in the future when you are able to return!

Summary: Service and staff was excellent! Made us feel like we were VIP the whole time! Can't wait to go back! The room was overlooking the pool and ocean. Great view. The restaurant help and food was fantastic!
Manager Response: Hello T Curry:  It is so gratifying to know you enjoyed your recent stay and your VIP treatment. We hope to have you back sooner than later. Please call upon us when you are able to return!!

Summary: This place does not disappoint! Beautiful views, attentive staff.  We even received a text when one of our rooms were left ajar. It‚Äôs definitely a gem! We will definitely be back soon! I highly recommend for anyone wanting a great getaway!
Manager Response: Hello Daydreams!  Thank you for letting us and other travelers know how much you enjoyed our "gem" at the beach. Thank you also for acknowledging the great service our outstanding associates provided.  We look forward to your next getaway!!

Summary: In my humble opnion, this is the best hotel in all of California.    It's right on the ocean!    It's an amazing place for romance, rest and relaxation and rewinding in luxury, at still a decent value.    But I warn you, it's addicting and you won't want to leave.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Briggs:  Thank you for the compliments of your recent stay at Surf & Sand!  It is very gratifying to know how much you enjoyed all that we have to offer.  We are pleased you didn't want to leave and welcome you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Checked out after the first night, horrible visit!
Summary: The worst hotel experience ever! This hotel has good reviews on Trip Advisor and friends had visited before so we booked a 5 night stay and couldn‚Äôt get out fast enough! The room was literally the room from hell! Down an off beaten path, away from the main area of the hotel, first we experienced a worker trying to access the maintenance room that had several vulgar words to say; we went down to where our room was and it was dirty and there was no a/c.  We were told they were sold out and had no other rooms available so we could not move rooms. We went out for dinner and came back, I went to shower and while showering a roach crawled on the bathroom glass door. My husband showered after me and went to open the small window in the bathroom, it was covered in dust and would not
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you once again for providing feedback regarding your recent stay. Our Director of Front Desk and Director of Rooms have been in touch with your regarding the unusual circumstances surrounding your stay, for which we deeply apologize and regret. Please be assured that the issues are currently being addressed.  Please call upon us for any  further assistance.

Summary Heading: Great beach gateway! Hotel cleanliness and food selection is opportunity
Summary: This was a family vacation for 9 days. Location and ocean view amazing. Overall hotel rooms upkeep and food selection is average. I would rate view and location 5 stars but Room upkeep and cleanliness 3 , Pool cleanliness and Upkeep is 2 dirty and water is musty. Not enough chairs for busy holiday time.
Manager Response: Hello recent guest:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay and for the compliments of  our great location and views.  Please know that we are planning a total renovation at this time to address your observations.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.

Summary Heading: Great staff, amazing property, and friendly service.
Summary: No AC in the waterfront building so you have to sleep with the door open. If you don‚Äôt mind the loud noice of the waves all through the night it‚Äôs ok. Personally at about 2 am my wife and I had enough but could not shut the slider because it was way too hot in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your high rating.  Renovation is in the planning stages at this time to include air conditioning.  Our apologies you were inconvenienced during your stay. We hope to have you back in the cooler months.

Summary: Everyone at Surf and Sand where all, polite friendly and very accommodating with requests!  The place is well worth the stay! Great beach great pool and can‚Äôt beat the ocean  views! The slashes restaurant has great views, great food and very friendly people working there. I have stayed here a few times and never a let down.
Manager Response: Hello our loyal, return guest.  We are very pleased to learn you enjoyed another stay at Surf & Sand and the service of our great associates and our amenities.  We look very forward to your return

Summary: Everything is wonderful being right on the water Great staff amazing food. You will be treated like a VIP  .  Don't think twice They think if everything you need or want. I have been going there for years and never go any where else.
Manager Response: Hello Penny:  As our long time, loyal guest, we appreciate your compliments of Surf & Sand, our location, staff and the service they provided. Thank you for the compliments of your stay. We look very forward to having you back with us!

Summary: From the moment you arrive you feel taken care of. We were traveling with two small dogs and a baby, which is a bit overwhelming but they made us feel welcome in every way, even at their restaurant. The service and hospitality were wonderful, the room was spotless with a breathtaking view and the restaurant was yummy with a beautiful view as well.  We are excited to come back again soon.
Manager Response: Hello McKenzi:  We are so pleased to learn how much you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand.  We hope you make it an annual trip as your baby grows and can enjoy it more.  Thank you for letting us know! Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.

Summary: If you want a phenomenal experience and enjoy the beauty of the Pacific Ocean this is where you come. The service and food is delicious. I just wish they had air conditioning.Looking forward to our next trip there.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for the compliments of Surf & Sand and your "phenomenal experience" staying with us. Plans are in the works presently for a total renovation which will include air conditioning. We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Surf and Sand never disappoints - Romantic, Excellent Location and Close to Everything
Summary: I was greeted by Brandan at my car who was extremely pleasant. He helped me with restaurant recommendations; and my girlfriend was arriving later and I asked that he would take care of her and accommodate her luggage etc. Not only did he help her immediately upon arriving; but told her I was at Splashes waiting for her and he would see that her bags were brought to our suite.  Mike greeted me at the front desk and was also very helpful and not only made sure all was to my liking but also sent down a bottle of wine.  We used room service twice and each time - staff was very pleasant.  The room was amazing; unfortunately - one night - there was a wedding and the entire party entered the suites above us and were on their patio at 1am. Hey, they were celebrating and all was good - I
Manager Response: Hello Charles!  Wow!  What lovely, glowing compliments of your Surf & Sand stay.  Thank you for the compliments of Brandon and Mike's service - they are true assets of the resort.  We do apologize for the noise of the wedding party and also thank you for your understanding.  Hopefully, you will return SOON! Have a great summer!

Summary: Best hotel for beach getaway. Right on the water. Great service. Food was excellent. Live music really made the outside bar the perfect night out. Dog friendly. Everything is conveniently located so you never need to leave during your stay.
Manager Response: Hello Karen:  Thank you so very much for letting other travelers know that Surf & Sand is the "best hotel in Laguna" and how much you enjoyed your stay and the services we provided. Give us a shout out when you are able o return. Have a great summer!

Summary Heading: Management practices and policies may make your intended stay otherwise different than what you wanted. Beautiful hotel
Summary: This boutique hotel is a gem in Orange County but management policies and practice are not in keeping with the caliber of expectations for a hotel of this quality. When booking directly confirm ALL details and you may still not get what you booked!
Manager Response: Hello Momager:  We appreciate your compliments of the resort - thank you.  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet all of your expectations and look forward to having you back in the future so that we are able to accommodate all of your needs.  Have a great summer season!

Summary: True to the name with top notch hospitality and service. Amazing views (dependent on hotel room you choose) however if you opt for a non-ocean view you can visit Splashes and take in the portrait window views of the waves crashing on the beach. This resort is deceitfully bigger than it looks from the streetside. If you're looking to unwind, make this your destination. The trolly is conveniently free should you decide to venture off property.
Manager Response: Hello Bente:  Thank you for taking the time to share your compliments of Surf & Sand and the services we provide.  We look very forward to having you back in the future.  Please call upon us directly for any needed assistance!  Have a great summer season!

Summary: Mike especially and the entire front desk staff is exceptional.  This is why I do my staycations at Surf & Sand instead of Pelican.   Just filling up the rest of the review because it requires 200 characters.
Manager Response: Hello Traveler:  We appreciate the "shout out" to Mike and our Front Desk associates, of whom we are very proud. Thank you for making Surf your "staycation" destination and for your compliments.

Summary: For the longest time this has been my favorite resort and place to stay every year for me and my wife, so much so we bring all of our friends and family to see this place and sometimes when we don't stay we like to go to the bar have a few drinks and occasionally walk next door for dessert at selanes. Today was no exception to the rule. We made reservations for the the splashes bar at 6pm we were so eager to take our friends to see this little gem we used to like to call a second home for our vacations. We showed them the nice view of the bar ordered drinks and food and walked next door for desserts at our other place we like selanes. To our surprise as we go to the concierge to pick up our vehicle the really rude valet guy that was working at night around 10 pm when we left
Manager Response: Hello!  Our sincere apologies for the miscommunication regarding your recent parking experience and that you felt slighted.  We do permit valet parking for Splashes patrons for up to 2 hours.  There is a $20 fee for any time exceeding the two hours. Again, we regret that you were treated rudely which is being addressed by our Executive Management team.  Please reach out to us directly in the future for any needed assistance.

Summary: There is no air conditioning in this hotel. This would likely not have been a major issue because there is a patio door overlooking the ocean. HOWEVER, the residents below me were smoking pot during our 4 night stay 24/7 on their balcony so both of our adjoining rooms smelled like pot whenever we opened our door. We had to keep the door closed which made our room over 90 degrees. DO NOT STAY HERE>
Manager Response: Hello!    Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.  Please know that a major renovation of the entire resort is in the planning stages that will include air conditioning .  Even though our security team strives to deter smoking violators, imposing hefty fines and ultimately eviction they persist.  We were you were negatively affected by their actions during your stay.

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The Tower Corner room opened right onto the waves crashing and lulled us to sleep each night. Staff was helpful, dining options delicious, great bed. The location was great-we walked everywhere!
Manager Response: Hello Christine:  We are so pleased you enjoyed your recent stay and all that we have to offer. Thank you for letting us and other travelers know what to expect when our guests. Please let us know when you are able to be with us once again.

Summary: The Surf and Sand Resort was amazing!  We were treated so well by all of the staff.  The room was spacious and we had a direct ocean view.  The bed was comfortable and the amenities were great.  We will definitely return to this special place.
Manager Response: Hello John:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Thank you for the compliments of our views, spacious room and amenities. We look forward to your return to our "special place."

Summary: Awesome location but what put it over the top was the staff.  Great food, amenities and location.  Amazing beach and staff to make your experience unforgettable.  Located near restaurants, live music & shops.
Manager Response: Hello Joanne - thank you for your glowing review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand. We are so pleased you enjoyed all that we have to offer.  We look forward to your return. Please reach out directly for any needed assistance.

Summary: I'm shocked at all the positive reviews. This is a "fancy motel." And that is putting it in a nice way. Rooms are gross and outdated, not even a water in the room. Service is honestly terrible, they don't make you feel welcomed. I am honestly shocked that this place costs upward of $700-$900 a night. The suites may be nicer but where I stayed it was not. I have also heard that some of the rooms don't have AC - yikes! I've stayed in "nicer" Times Square hotels, and that's saying a lot. I understand the views and the location are fantastic but if you're going on vacation, your stay should be fantastic as well and this place just doesn't cut it.
Manager Response: Hello Mi:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay. Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations and felt slighted, which is very unusual.  Please be assured that your comments are shared with our entire executive management team to address for improvements.  A renovation of the entire resort has been in the planning stages for quite some time, to which we are looking very forward. Please contact us directly for any needed assistance.

Summary Heading: Terrible view, not what was promised
Summary: Had booked a room with a view of the pool and ocean. Our view was of the roof of the bar below and could not leave the doors open to enjoy the ocean air without pigeons invading. Hotel is amazing and usually top notch. Never let them put you in room 318 unless you want to be disappointed.
Manager Response: Hello Brad:  Our sincere apologies that you did not enjoy your recent stay. Please call upon us directly when you are able to return so that you are assured you are located in the room type you desire.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: We recently stayed for a convention and the service was impeccable.  i cannot say enough positive things about the staff, service and venue.  I would highly recommend this hotel for a personal or professional visit.  The venue was great!  I will definitely be back!  Thank you for a wonderful stay in a 5 star hotel at an absolutely gorgeous location!
Manager Response: Hello T Ballentine:  We are so pleased that your group enjoyed their stay and the "impeccable services" we provided. We also look forward to providing these services when you are able to return.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel and accommodations. Staff is over the top!
Summary: Amazing location! Beautiful hotel and accommodations. Staff is over the top! If you want to pamper yourself this is the place. Enjoyed a fabulous massage in the spa. We would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Hello Wanderer:  We are so pleased you  found our staff "over the top." We are very proud of them and the services they provide. Thank  you for your compliments of the resort, your massage and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Great location super friendly staff and a pretty beach and pool.  The trolly makes it easy to get to downtown and a lot of good Resturants within walking distance.  The little coffee shop on property makes amazing coffee.  We believe that all of the room are ocean view, which is a plus. It was a good relaxing getaway.  The only negative was the noise. Some great parents left their kids in a room next to us unattended. We get it. We were young once too. Thankfully they put ear plugs j your room üòÇno lie.
Manager Response: Hello.  Thank you for letting us and other travelers know what to expect when staying in Laguna Beach.  We are pleased to know you enjoyed the resort and had  relaxing stay.  We do regret the noisy neighbors - our security team strives to stay diligent on these occasions.  Please call upon us when you are able to return.

Summary: Had a very memorable weekend stay.  Very courteous staff also very helpful and prompt.    We had a great experience checking in (room was ready early), enjoyed the ocean front  views and the crashing ocean waves were very calming.
Manager Response: Hello Random:  Thank you for letting us know you experienced a "memorable weekend stay."  We enjoy  your compliments of our associates and the service they provided.  Hopefully, we will have you back with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: Room not ready, poor dinner at Splashes
Summary: Was to check-in at 4P, room wasn't ready until 5P. We hoped to have a special dining experience for our 65th Wedding Anniversary at Splashes. We ordered salads that looked nice but were just blah. My order of Pheasant was so overcooked that I finally gave up. Staff offered to replace it. By this time I had lost interest. I also felt my wife's Salmon was under cooked. No problem with the staff, just the Chef.
Manager Response: Hello Flyer:  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.  Your poor experience has already been addressed with our culinary team, which we have previously relayed to you.  Please call upon us for any further assistance.

Summary: Mike at check in was exceptional. He found me a room for the same night after I was a ‚Äúwalk in‚Äù customer & sent champagne and chocolates to my room. The beach views and service were impressive all around!
Manager Response: Hello Emily:  We are so pleased to have been able to accommodate your stay at short notice. Thank you for the compliments of Mike's service.  He is a great asset of the resort. Let us know when you are able to return.

Summary Heading: Short wonderful stay at Laguna Beach!
Summary: We were here less than 24 hours but wanted to determine if we want to come back for a family trip. The hotel is nice and staff is so accommodating and friendly. Hotel has incredible views from rooms, pool, and restaurant - all right on the beach just steps from the water. Exterior of hotel is beginning to show some age, understandable with salt water and wind constantly beating at it. Rooms were amazing with balcony overlooking beach just feet from the water. Tubs are jetted - really need replacing. Overall just an amazing place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello Dana - thank you for your compliments of Surf & Sand during your short stay. Please know that renovations to the resort are in the planning stages at this time. Please call upon us when you are able to return.

Summary: The security woke us up after 11pm insisting us to get dressed and opened the door without giving a call or text before appearing at the door. He also asked if he can check out the bath tub at 6am the next morning.  We booked through booking.com which we were told all room rates are covered but apparently that was a scam. We paid booking.com 700 and have to pay another 1100 at the hotel upon check out.  When checking out it appears to have additional charges that we do not recognize on our bill which includes 190 dinner at the splashes etc. Unclear whether someone used our room number by mistake or it was the hotel staff who pulled the incorrect invoice. The beach/pool staffs are great. they help us set up the chairs and umbrella at the beach.
Manager Response: Hello  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations during your stay and for the intrusion and inconvenience with the early morning plumbing issue, which is highly unusual; however, needed to be addressed immediately.  We also regret the billing error and hopefully the issue was resolved.  Thank you for the compliments of our great pool staff!

Summary Heading: Celebrated our 10th Anniversary at the Surf & Sand
Summary: My wife and I celebrated our 10th anniversary at the property. We were given a complementary room upgrade, as well as, a complementary bottle of wine and chocolates to help us celebrate. We definitely felt the staff wanted us to have a magical stay. The property is absolutely beautiful. We had a corner room on the 9th floor. Sitting in our bed as we looked out our window all we could see was beautiful ocean blue, it kind of felt as though our room was actually in the middle of ocean. It was a great space to relax. The hotel was well staffed and we never had to wait for service. There was always a friendly staff member available to help us check in, valet our car, grab us towels, or set up beach chairs and umbrellas on the beach. We loved the beach access, as well as, the pool
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Bacon:  Happy belated anniversary!  We are so pleased that we were able to meet all of your needs and provide excellent service for your special occasion and making it magical. Thank you for the compliments of our great associates, our location and your accommodations. Please call upon us when you are able to return.

Summary Heading: Family group trip to Surf n Sand
Summary: Have been visiting for over 20 years.  They have always taken good care of our very large group to make us feel special.  We love this Resort the staff has worked for quite some time and remember us from previous trips.   I tell all my family why travel far or leave our beautiful country we have Surf & Sand Resort.  My Kids look forward to this trip every memorial weekend.
