Manager Response: Hello our loyal, return family. We are so pleased that you were able to keep your memorial weekend at Surf & Sand a family tradition.  Thank you for your kind words of our great staff and the service they provided.  We will see you next Memorial weekend!

Summary Heading: A Visit to Surf & Sand Resort what just what our family needed after a very long school year!
Summary: Everything about this resort is wonderful, from the breathtaking proximity to the ocean to the incredible staff.  Every single person we encountered at Surf & Sand was helpful and delightful.  I attended a work function/meeting on the property previously (which I highly recommend), but this was my first visit with my family. They had THE BEST time and actually chilled out and relaxed.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for letting us know how much you and your family enjoyed your stay.  We appreciate the compliments of our wonderful associates, the service they provided and our wonderful views.  Let us know when you are able to relax and chill out again.

Summary: Surf & Sand Resort is the perfect place for quick staycation to reset, or a long vacation if you‚Äôre lucky enough.  The views don‚Äôt get any better, and the sound of the waves could not be more relaxing. From arrival to departure and everywhere in between the people there provide a warm, friendly, and professional environment. Their service is outstanding and my husband and I cannot wait to return!
Manager Response: Hello Karen:  We are pleased to know that you  and your husband enjoyed the resort and cannot wait to return. Thank you for your kind words which are always appreciated.  We hope to see you soon!

Summary: This is a wonderful hotel with very friendly staff. The location and views are amazing! The beach is easily accessible and a really beautiful place. The result is a very calm and relaxing place to stay!
Manager Response: Hello Chestnut:  Thank you for the compliments of Surf & Sand, our friendly staff and wonderful views. We look forward to having you back to enjoy it once again.

Summary Heading: Let the sound of the surf put you to sleep
Summary: My first time in Laguna Beach, what a treat to have the sound of surf all the time, day and night.  The constant motion of the Ocean! I loved it! High tide hits the base of the hotel, On The Beach!!  Barefoot walks in the sand, great food, friendly, conscientious service, I felt well tended to. All questions, needs and concerns tended to promptly.
Manager Response: Hello - we are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your stay and the services we provided. We are especially pleased that you felt "well tended to" and we met all of your needs. Call upon us directly for any needed assistance in the future.

Summary: Beautiful hotel with an amazing staff, overall. The location is ideal (the best ocean view). I strongly suggest to check out the beach front restaurant for dinner or at least to have cocktails. Everyone that works on the grounds is extremely friendly and takes great initiative to making you feel welcomed. This is my fourth time staying at The Surf and Sand Resort and I sure to return very soon!
Manager Response: Hello!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand and plan to return in the near future. Thank you for the compliments of our location, our associates and the service they provided.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Mermaid üßúüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è dream. Room so close to the sea I feel like I can dive in!! The room is spacious and comfortable. Love the summery feel. The staff is just so kind and friendly. Our meeting space was mysteriously fresh each time we returned. The food for our group was fresh and well prepared and presented. I hope to return soon.
Manager Response: Hello Meghan:  Thank you for letting us and other travelers know how much you enjoyed your stay and look forward to returning.  Thank you also for the compliments of our staff which is always appreciated.  Please reach out for any needed assistance in the future.

Summary Heading: An Oceanside Gem in Downtown Laguna Beach
Summary: What a special resort.  My wife and I travelled to Laguna Beach for her 50th birthday celebration.  I found Surf & Sand through TripAdvisors.  This place exceeded expectations.  The property has a unique elegance to it, yet is comfortable, welcoming and not pretentious.  The service across the board was outstanding.  The views from our oceanfront balcony were picturesque.  Going to sleep and waking up to the sounds of the crashing waves was such a treat.  We will definitely come back to Surf & Sand.
Manager Response: Hello !  Thank you for your compliments of Surf & Sand and the services we provided. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and all that we have to offer.  We look forward to  your return!

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for one night as a girls getaway while I was visiting her in Southern CA. The service, accommodations and food were perfect. Could have stayed for days and not left the resort.   Niko, server at dinner, was very conscious of spacing our meal and not making us feel rushed, even though we were late for our reservation.   I could have sat on the balcony forever, the views were amazing!
Manager Response: Hello Christine:  Thank you for your complimentary review of Surf & Sand and your recent stay.  We are pleased to know you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your return. Thank you also for the compliments of Niko's service, which is always appreciated.

Summary Heading: Laguna Beach Great Place to Stay and Relax
Summary: Couldn't of had a better time.  Location was terrific easy walk to many shops and restaurants.  Just hanging out on our deck in our room was wonderful time spent.  I would come back and stay again if I have the chance.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Brodbeck:  Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand. We hope that you are able to return in the near future.  Please contact us directly for any needed assistance.

Summary: With staying, I was hesitant after reading some reviews, it was so great, especially the views,  I came back a second time with my husband!! The view,  quality of service, and food were the best! We will be back fir a third time!
Manager Response: Hello Back Packer:  Thank your for your pleasant review of Surf & Sand and returning for another visit.   We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your time with us.  Please contact us when you are able to return once again!

Summary: I was at the Surf & Sand for a two night stay for a professional conference there.  It was a thoroughly enjoyable experience.  The room I had was beautiful, directly facing the Pacific, a stone's throw away.  All of the staff was friendly and engaging.  I was involved in the organization of the conference there and could not be more pleased with the hotel's events capabilities.  The food and staging of all the conference events were exceptionally well done.  I would highly recommend the hotel for its fantastic setting and service.  Though I found I had no problems sleeping, the hotel conveniently offers ear plugs in case the crashing surf literally outside your room is distracting.  There is a beautiful sliver of beach separating the hotel from the ocean.
Manager Response: Hello Paul:  Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey with a high rating. As our loyal guest, please be assured that your input is valued, appreciated and shared with our Executive Management team to review. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed your conference at the resort. Thank you for the compliments of the service you received. We look very forward to your return. Please call upon us directly for any needed assistance in the future.

Summary Heading: One of my top hotel pics
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel four different times and have always enjoyed my stay. The rooms are comfortable and spacious. The food is excellent. The staff are friendly and helpful. The conference rooms are comfortable. The location is central to restaurants and shops. The ocean views from the rooms in the back are wonderful.
Manager Response: Hello!  As our loyal, return guest, we value and appreciate your compliments of the resort and the services we provided. We look forward to having you back in the near future.

Summary: Great location and excellent spa experience! Staff is very friendly, room was clean and had beautiful ocean view! Conveniently located near downtown! Variety of food in the restaurant. Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hello - Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey with a high rating. As our loyal guest, please be assured that your input is valued, appreciated and shared with our Executive Management team to review. We are very pleased to know that you enjoyed the resort and the service of our great team! Thank you for the compliments of them. We look very forward to your return. Please call upon us directly for any needed assistance in the future.

Summary: Simply the finest hotel in Laguna.  We love the customer service and the high quality of the rooms. Staff is friendly and they go out of their way to help you. If you want the best, book a room ‚Ä¶ you won‚Äôt regret it. The ocean view is amazing and will re-energize you.  We love this place and We‚Äôll be back!!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel directly on the beach and over the ocean
Summary: My wife and I go to the Surf & Sand every year for our anniversary and we our never disappointed.  Amazing view directly over the beach and the ocean.  Beautiful 180+ view of the Laguna coast from our room.  If you like the sound of the surf (we do), this is the place to be.  We booked during an online sale so it was a terrific value too.

Staying here is a such a treat.  From the moment Lisa checked us in we knew we were staying somewhere special.  Albert @ Splash went out of his way to fit us in last minute, Carson was an excellent waiter and Laurie @ concierge provided us with perfect restaurant, shopping and hiking recommendations.  The entire staff made us feel very special and pampered.
Manager Response: Hello Veninda:  Wow - thank you for letting us and other travelers know how much you enjoyed your recent stay.  Thank you also for the compliments of Lisa, Albert, Carson and Laurie, which are very welcomed and appreciated. We are happy to know you felt pampered during your stay Please all upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Happy Spring and Summer Season!

Summary: We had a fantastic stay at the Surf & Sand, from the minute we arrived we felt truly welcomes and treated. The lady checking us in was lovely (I didn't catch her name sorry) and then Diane and Celeste on the concierge desk took things to another level. What assets they are - they chatted to the kids, found out all about us, gave advice, sorted games, moved bookings, made suggestions and then later sent treats for all of us to our room. Wonderful! All the staff were very good actually and are a credit to the hotel. We used pretty much all the facilities during our 3 nights stay (except the spa I am sorry to say - no time!), and all were great. The quality and quantity of food across the areas/outlets was great. We loved the pool and hottub and easy access to the beach and all the
Manager Response: Hello London Sue:  Thank  you so very much for your glowing review of Surf  & Sand and the wonderful compliments of our great associates - Diane, Celeste . . . you are correct in that we do go out of our way to make each guest feel welcome.  Please call upon us in the future for any needed assistance. We look very forward to your return!  Warm regards!

Summary: We just spent a wonderful holiday vacation at Surf & Sand.  Every employee goes above and beyond to make sure we enjoyed our stay.  The only downside was the food at dinner, it was not as good as the breakfast, and a bit overpriced.  However, the views, staff and ambiance makes it still a wonderful evening.
Manager Response: Hello!  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your holiday vacation at Surf & Sand. We do regret the dining "downside" and have let our Director of Food & Beverage know. Thank you for letting us know.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future and thank you also for the compliments of our great staff and ambiance!  Happy Spring & Summer

Summary: We go to the beach every year for our Anniversary for a few days and I wanted a room with a full ocean view which is what they advertise.  Room had full view and walk out patio. Was a studio with mini frig and Coffee maker but no microwave. Great room but bed was very hard so we didn't sleep well.
Manager Response: Hello - thank you for letting us know that you enjoyed your anniversary stay along the waterfront.  We are pleased you enjoyed most of your stay and have alerted our Housekeeping team regarding your uncomfortable bedding.  Our sincere apologies your sleep was interrupted.  Please call upon us in the future for any needed assistance.  Happy Spring & Summer!

Summary: Like others reviewing this place, my room was a complete disappointment‚Ä¶at $600  a night. I asked to change rooms immediately upon seeing the layout but the front desk claimed no other rooms available. It is very common for the beach front hotels in Laguna to have a small amount of space for the pool. Our room like others was at pool level no more than 15 feet from the  pool. The noise was unbelievable. As I write  this review, theres a movie showing at the pool practically blasting me out of the room. This on top of noisy families there all day. The difference with Surf and Sand is they provide no information when you book that you are booking a pool deck room. Other hotels like Inn at the Beach disclose this and discount these rooms‚Ä¶.as they should. Shame on you Sand and Surf!
Manager Response: Hello Rebecca:  We regret your disappointment in your recent stay and room location.  We apologize that we did not meet your expectations. When your travels bring you back to lovely Laguna Beach, please reach out to us directly so that we are able to provide the room location you desire. We look forward to accommodating you in the future  Warm regards

Summary: The quality of the Surf and Sand is great! Rooms have awesome view and are very comfortable.The staff is 1st class and amenities are very nice. Food and drink a little on the pricey side so be prepared. Location is great as you can walk to all the stores,shops, restaurants in Laguna Beach
Manager Response: Hello Scott:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay and are very appreciative of your kind words regarding out "1st Class Staff", our views and rooms.  Hopefully, you will be able to return sooner than later.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Happy Spring!

Summary: Their rooms are tiny and need updating. They charge 5 star rates for 3 star experience. Our room lacked operating heat. Hotel requires lots of stair climbing. Front desk staff can be very unpleasant. Great location.
Manager Response: Hello BG:  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay. Your input has been shared with our entire Executive Management team to address  improvements.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Sincerely,

Summary: We went for dinner it was amazing. Food was excellent flavor presentation, everything except the salad. We ordered a arugula salad and that was not arugula more like endive and way over dressed.  They also need to get up to speed with all the other restaurants on wine. They are 300+ pesos more per bottle for same thing then a place down street. Selection is all over priced.  But the red snapper and chicken were awesome. The mussels amazing.  Salad is a negative.
Manager Response: Hello Curiosity:  Our sincere regret and apologies that your dining experience was not 100%! Please be assured that your feedback is shared with our Executive Chef and Director of Food & Beverage to address improvements. It is our hope you will be able to return in the near future so that we are better able to accommodate your dining needs. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.   Happy Spring!

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel but came highly recommended from a close friend who goes there often.  The experience was amazing and the staff were all very friendly and helpful.  If you are looking for an awesome place to stay in Laguna Beach, the Surf and Sand Resort is your place to stay!!
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Willliams:  Thank you so much for your compliments of Surf & Sand and your recommendation to future travelers to also enjoy all that we have to offer.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future. Please contact us directly.  Warm regards,

Summary: We spent our 39th Anniversary at Surf and Sand and it was simply put, awesome. This will be our 3rd Anniversary that we celebrated at this hotel. Our Room faced the ocean, and the views were spectacular. Relaxing, Romantic and breath taking all at once.
Manager Response: Hello loyal guests:  We are so pleased to have accommodated your third stay for your anniversary.   Thank you for your kind words of our "spectacular" views! Hopefully,  you will be back for your 40th!  Please call upon us!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Not worth the money...not as advertised.
Summary: I was extremely dissatisfied with my stay at the Surf and Sand because of the room I was given, there was no privacy and the balcony did not have an ocean view as pictured. I had booked this hotel because OF THE VIEW, it said that all rooms have gorgeous ocean views and balconies. I had envisioned sitting on the balcony enjoying my morning coffee while looking at the ocean, but the view from my room was a cement wall and the top of the pool cabanas. The balcony was not at all what was pictured on the website or on the booking website. I could only see the ocean if I stood up the entire time in my room. If I sat on the balcony all I was looking at was a cement wall and the top of the pool cabanas (you can‚Äôt see the ocean at all).  There is also no air conditioning, which is fine,
Manager Response: Hello Joys:  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay. We would have enjoyed the opportunity to speak with you directly when booking your stay so that you were assured of the room type and location you desired.  Please call upon us directly in the future so that we are able to accommodate all of your needs.   Warm regards,

Summary Heading: A pleasant stay and wonderful service.
Summary: I returned for the Public Affairs Institute. The Sand & Surf is a magical place. Many beautiful vistas of the ocean and palm trees, which transport you to a place of peace and relaxation. The food is amazing here. The staff are true professionals.
Manager Response: Hello Chris:  We are always pleased to have you and the Public Affairs Institute at Surf &n Sand. Thank you for letting other travelers know how "magical" Surf & Sand is and for the compliments of our views, dining and amazing staff! We look forward to your return.  Happy Spring

Summary Heading: I wanted to love this hotel but did not. No view, dirty bed, unaccommodating staff.
Summary: Super excited to stay at this hotel after speaking with their reservation team. I ended up requesting a room with a pool/beach view and the specialist said no problem.  When I checked in, I reiterated our excitement about the room and double checked we had a view room.  When we got to our room it was the bottom floor overlooking a building.  If I leaned over the balcony we could see pool chairs and a hot tub.   I ended up calling and asking to switch to the room promised and they said they could if I paid $900 a night (do we call this bait and switch?).  Then we requested a roll away bed and extra pillows. (the girls I was with had both just recovered from shoulder surgery and needed more space)  Bed came, no pillows.  A couple of hours later we requested pillows again.  This
Manager Response: Hello:  We regret that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay. We have reached out to you in another format as a gesture of good will. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.

Summary: We've stayed at a few other places in Laguna, but now that we've stayed at the Surf and Sand we won't stay anywhere else. The view can not be beat and the beach was gorgeous, chill, and relaxing. The Laguna Beach sunsets were unbelievable from our huge oceanfront balcony. The property is beautiful with so many thoughtful touches in the landscaping, flowers and succulents everywhere, fireplaces lit at night, etc. We didn't use the pool but it also looked beautiful. The employees are genuinely sweet, kind, and caring, and went out of their way to make our trip special. The coffee shop makes an excellent vanilla latte and the restaurant is great too. Our only regret is that we couldn't stay longer. We can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Hello Kiki:  And we cannot wait to have you return to your new favorite place.  Thank you for taking the time to compliment everything about Surf & Sand and your recent stay. Please return sooner than later so that we are able to "spoil"  you once again.  Fondly,

Summary Heading: A Must for those who enjoy it all!
Summary: Most are looking for something bigger, better, planning and hoping to find the hidden gem.  It is right here in So Cal - Laguna and at the Surf and Sand Resort.  You can't find a better location, pool and beach surrounding by first class top shelf staff who understand your dollar and your reason to choose to be at Surf and Sand. Too bad the team at Surf and Sand don't run California, then it too could be something for all to enjoy.  Support the local shopping in the area, be sure to visit and support every little boutique place around there so that we have this experience for many years to come.  Can't say enough good things about Surf and Sand Resort!
Manager Response: Hello Cruiser:  We are so very pleased to learn how much you enjoyed our "hidden gem" here in Laguna Beach.  You certainly painted a great picture of Surf & Sand and all that we have to offer. We are very proud of our wonderful associates, our location and views and look very forward to your return.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Happy Spring!

Summary: The staff is great. The balcony views are  great!  We just had breakfast room service and it was great!  Walked our dog to dog friendly shops, there were many  Here is Hope enjoying the view. ..........................
Manager Response: Hello Shirley:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you and your four-legged friend enjoyed Surf & Sand.  Please don't hesitate to call upon us in the future when you are able to return.  Happy Spring!

Summary: We love staying at the Surf and Sand. The location can't be beat and staff are fabulous. Going to sleep to the sound of the waves crashing outside our room is a highlight, as is watching the sunset from our balcony. Also has a good swimming beach and nice pool. Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Hello Alexis:  Please be assured that we value and appreciate your feedback and kind words regarding your recent stay.  We look very forward to having you back at Surf & Sand in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: This was my husband‚Äôs birthday celebration that‚Äôs why we stay there. Building were on the sand and it was so beautiful to see and hear the waves. but room was pretty sad. Pillows and blankets were so old I got bad allergy from it, and constant noise below our rooms. The noise was like a boiler or some kind of machine noise.  We believed the favorable reputation from local people . Hopefully next time will be different!!
Manager Response: Hello Sean M:  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay at Surf & Sand for your husband's birthday.  We regret the noise issue you experienced, which is quite unusual.  Please contact us directly in the future so that we are able to provide the amenities,  service and room location you prefer.  Warm regards,

Summary: A few weeks ago my husband and I decided to do a staycation at Surf and Sand. When we arrived the entire staff was very welcoming. Lisa checked us in and we told her the purpose of our vacation. She  really went out of her way to make sure our stay was memorable.  She went above and beyond to accommodate us and get us the best room (which was a beautiful upgraded room). If that wasn‚Äôt enough they also sent over a bottle of wine and chocolate as they knew how important this time was for us. Summary: We always enjoy our trips to Surf and Sand. The view is amazing and the sound of the waves is with you throughout your stay. There is plenty to do in town, which is a pleasant walk (about 1 mile) on the beach or the street. It is our ‚Äúgo to‚Äù relaxation destination.

Manager Response: Hello !  We appreciate knowing how much you enjoyed your recent stay. Thank you for the compliments of our location,  views and dining experience. Families were playing in the ocean, and surfing, or paddle surfing
Manager Response: Hello Toni:  Wow!  Thank you for your glowing review and compliments of your recent stay at  Surf & Sand! Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your glowing review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand. We are always pleased to know our guests enjoyed their stay and the service our great team provided. Major improvements to the resort are in the planning stages to which we are looking very forward.  Hopefully you will be able to return in the future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Happy Holiday Season!

Summary Heading: Rooms Are Hot In The Summer
Summary: I went to this place for a couple of days after I got married (August 2019 - I know my review says 2021, but they don't give an option to go back 2 years). The rooms facing the water didn't have air conditioning (which is weird for a place you are paying $500+ a night)... unsure if they have been updated, but every room on our floor had the door open trying to get some air into the room and cool it down. They gave us a box fan, but that didn't do very much to cool the room down. We needed to switch our room after the first night to a room without the ocean view, so we could get AC. Also, the crashing from the ocean is very very loud, so hopefully you are a deep sleeper! It is a beautiful place, but what is the point if it is too hot/loud to sleep!
Manager Response: Hello Elliot:  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your  August stay at Surf & Sand.  Please be assured that improvements to the entire resort are currently in the planning stages. We hope to have you back with us at possibly a cooler time of year.  Happy Holiday Season!

Summary Heading: Beautiful place. Magnificent views. Wonderful staff.
Summary: Beautiful place. Beautiful views. Wonderful staff.  Easy check in and check out.  Excellent stay.  The ocean is ‚Äòright there‚Äô below your room.  We were on a high floor and the views are spectacular.  The food is excellent.    Within walking distance are great places to shop and eat.    The massage at the hotel spa was one of the best ever.  This excellent hotel has only two drawbacks ‚Äî no air conditioning and the noise of the waves crashing while trying to sleep in a room with no a/c ‚Äî if these are not a problem for you, then this a magnificent place!
Manager Response: Hello Minnesota Traveler!  Thank you for letting us and future travelers know what to expect when staying at Surf & Sand. We appreciate your compliments of our views,  location, and "one of the best" massages ever! Please be assured your kind words are shared with our entire team.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future!  Happy Holiday Season!

Summary: We always enjoy our time at Surf and Sand.  The rooms are nice and the views cannot be beat. We love that you can hear the waves all night. The staff is attentive and friendly.  We enjoy breakfast at Splashes. In the summner you can get food and drinks on the beach, as well as chairs, umbrellas and towels.
Manager Response: Hello R Y!  As our loyal, return guests, thank you for the compliments of your recent stay at Surf & Sand! We are pleased to know that our "attentive and friendly" staff met your needs.  We look very forward to having you as our guests once again.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: We chose to come here to celebrate our 20th anniversary along with some friend‚Äôs birthdays. The entire staff made sure EVERYONE knew so that everywhere we went we were wished we‚Äôll. The food was great, the staff was excellent and the room phenomenal. If you can, ask for room 290. It‚Äôs on the top floor corner with absolutely gorgeous views of the ocean, sunset, and moon sparkling over the water. I‚Äôve never been here before but plan to return soon!
Manager Response: Hello Dr. Lois:  Thank you for letting us know your special recent stay was "top notch".  We are so pleased to know that you enjoyed your anniversary and your friend's birthdays here at Surf & Sand.  Thank you for your recommendation of room 290.  Top of the Surf!  We look very forward to your return;  Happy Holidays!

Summary: I have a customer service crush on Zach! He has helped me many times with this trip. So from sending me a 3 page list of his favorite things to do in Cannon Beach to mailing a shirt back that I left in the room. Thanks Zach üòä
Manager Response: Hello Sallimac:  We are so pleased to learn that we met all of your needs during your recent stay. You comments are shared with our entire team to review.  Hopefully you will be able to return in the near future.  Happy Holidays

Summary Heading: The best stay and the best workers!!
Summary: I have nothing bad to say about this hotel! First of all, as soon as I got there Dalante was the BEST at the front desk! Kind, quick, and friendly!! He deserves a promotion or raise he was the best!   Also, the room views are amazing, the comfiest bed, and the restaurant was 10/10!!! Service was incredible and the food was delicious!!!   At checkout, I didn‚Äôt get the kind gentleman‚Äôs name but he was helping us with luggage and was also so kind!! Offered water and was super friendly!!   Can‚Äôt recommend them more!!
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Harrelson:  Thank you for your glowing review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  We value your feedback and appreciate you letting other travelers know what to expect when our guests!  Thank you also for the compliments of Dalante, of who we are very proud. We are pleased to know he and our bellmen met your needs. Please reach out to us in the future when you are able to be with us once again.  Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: The Privilege of Oceanfront Living! Amazing.
Summary: Love, love, love the surf-front location of this lovely hotel. Decor colors are soothing and fresh, everyone is so nice‚Ä¶ and the ocean is just outside your door. We cannot wait to come back and stroll to shops and restaurants. This hotel is a pleasure.
Manager Response: Hello "A Little Spoiled"!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay and "cannot wait to come back!" Please let us know how we may assist you in booking a future stay.  Happy Holiday Season!

Summary: The key selling point to this resort is the amazing views offered from every room. It does have an upscale feel as the beds are comfortable with nice linens and bath amenities. The king rooms in the ocean front towers are rather small and the baseboards and other features are pretty dinged up. Over all I did not really feel like I was in a "luxury resort" but the proximity to the ocean is fantastic.
Manager Response: Hello Lerin:  We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. We are pleased to learn that you enjoyed our "beautiful views" of which we are most proud.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Nice property, top-notch service. Location a little removed from the Laguna Beach core, but still very walkable. The high tide comes right up against the building which makes for some magnificent views but I worry for the property in the future.   The only negative for us was the lack of AC, which made for a very stuffy room in the middle of the day in October. I should also mention that the room was paid for us, so I'm not as certain if I'd pay the $500/night room rate myself, which is what I saw when I first learned about the conference we were attending.
Manager Response: Hello Miami!  Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  We appreciate your compliments of our "amazing views."  Please be assured that we plan to rectify the air conditioning issue in the near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Loved this hotel...we will be retuning!
Summary: Very accommodating and comfortable...the sound of the ocean couldn‚Äôt be beat anywhere...not even at the Montage üòâ The staff was also extremely warm and welcoming and it felt as if we were old friends.
Manager Response: Hello Merily:  We are so pleased to learn that our Park City guests enjoyed their time with us.  Thank you for letting other  travelers know what to expect when our guests and, also, for your compliments of our property.  We hope to have you back in the near future.  Please let us know when you need our assistance!  Warm regards,

Summary: What you expect from a high end oceanfront resort. We're relatively easy going but they make it feel effortless and service is really worth it. We will definitely stay again at some point, happy we had our wedding here it was a gorgeous venue!
Manager Response: Hello Howard!  Our best wishes in the future!  Thank you for letting us know your wedding stay was enjoyable and you will be back with us in the future.  Hopefully, sooner than later. Let us know when you need our assistance!  Happy Fall Season

Summary: Great location with beautiful view, service. I was here to attend a 2 day corporate business meeting and the entire team had fun. I got a room facing the ocean. Food was good, and the staff was very friendly. Highly Recommend
Manager Response: Hello Bunny!  Thank you for letting us know you and your corporate group enjoyed your recent meeting. We look forward to your return. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Surf and Sand was amazing! We were greeted with a card when we arrived that treated us to a wonderful bottle of wine for our anniversary.  We enjoyed it on our balcony overlooking the beautiful ocean.  The ocean front room was incredible. We loved to hear the ocean waves day and night, it was very peaceful for us. And the room was beautiful with a very comfortable bed and pillows.  We enjoyed Splashes very much, the food was delicious. We had the Grass Fed Burger and Seared Sea Bass and we loved them both.  All of the staff were very kind and gracious.  We are looking forward to returning soon.  Thank you Surf and Sand!
Manager Response: Hello Danielle  We appreciate your complimentary review of Surf & Sand and are delighted that you enjoyed all that we have to offer.  Hopefully, you will make us your annual anniversary "spot"!  We look forward to your return.  Please let us know how we may be able to assist you in the future.  Happy Fall Season!

Summary: Right on the ocean with beautiful views many of the rooms have balconies that you can sit out and sip your refreshments while watching the sunset.  Definitely one of the best locations in California. Right in the heart of Laguna so you can walk to most anything.  Staff in the service are terrific. You can walk straight into the ocean or swim in the pool or warm back up in the Jacuzzi. It‚Äôs just the perfect place to hang out.
Manager Response: Hello!  We are so pleased to hear that Surf & Sand is your "perfect place to hang out" and how much you enjoyed your recent stay.  Please call upon us when you are able to return to lovely Laguna Beach -  hopefully, sooner than later!  Thank you!

Summary: Really enjoyed the hotel - although the location is great, you really dont even need to leave as there is lots to do on site.  Amazing pool area with a view out onto the ocean.  Lunch was great every day.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Vannelli:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay and appreciated all there is to see and do in lovely Laguna Beach.  We look forward to being able to spoil you again in the near future. Please call upon us directly when you are able to return.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Awful experience - last straw - never going back
Summary: There are numerous luxury properties that have the elegance and class to warrant this price level in south orange county.  Surf and Sand has turned into something unrecognizable - dirty, rude, loud, unrelaxing, inefficient.  Never again.

We had a wonderful experience at the S&S. It was clean, comfortable, and we felt special.  I highly recommend this hotel to everyone. From Valet, to checking out, it was great. Everyone is very kind and professional.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. White:  Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your recent stay and for the compliments of our associates and the great service they provide!  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please let us know how we may assist you!  Regards,

Summary: If you want the cares of the world to go away, go to Surf and Sand. Your every need is taken care of, even before you know you have one. The staff goes beyond just helping you, they confirm everything you may need and insure your trip is special. From the Check-in counter staff, Concierge staff, Valet/Bell to the Splashes team that is there before you need them.  Now the facility, the view, unmatched in CA, on the water rooms, restaurants on the water, beautiful beach 15 steps away, beautiful pool area that is photographed by every magazine in the industry.
Manager Response: Hello Paul!  Thank you for sharing the details of your recent stay and all that Surf & Sand has to offer! We are so pleased you enjoyed yet another stay with us and look very forward to your return.  Have a wonderful Fall season ahead!

Summary: Great stay‚Ä¶..needs a bit of refurbishment but it didn‚Äôt make a difference‚Ä¶.love ocean right outside our room.  Definitely wear and tear but besides water pressure in bathroom there was no impact to our stay
Manager Response: Hello Andrea:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your time  at Surf & Sand!!  We hope to address improvements to the entire resort in the near future and look forward to having you back with us.  Please let us know if we may be of assistance.  Happy Fall Season!

Summary: The hotel is getting old. It is in major need of renovation with its 90‚Äôs decor. The hotel is banking on its ‚Äúlocation‚Äù as a customer draw, but at prices over $600 a night, you can do better.   Service and amenities were average at best. I forgot my deodorant. I asked the front desk for one for 2 days. Finally at the end of day 2, they told me that they didn‚Äôt have any. Even the phone system is outdated and only 1 of 2 phones worked. The other one want even plugged in. It didn‚Äôt work even if you plugged it in. The bathroom seemed old and dingy. The shower controls were old, outdated, and took a little while to figure out.  On a positive note‚Ä¶ you can‚Äôt get much closer to the ocean:)
Manager Response: Hello recent guest:  Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your recent stay. We regret that we did not meet your expectations.  Please know that major improvements to the entire resort have been in the planning stages for quite some time being delayed by circumstances beyond our control. We hope to continue with our plans in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.

Summary: In addition to an amazing view from our room, (just feet from the beach), with beautiful sunsets everynight,this hotel had just as amazing service.. Concierge met all our dining and activity needs and then followed up! The Front Desk took care of all our requests. The Restaurant's  Food ,Service and View made my wife's birthday extra special. Beach Service was quick to accomodate our every need. and even the Valet,made sure we left with water bottles on our departure!  SERVICE SERVICE SERVICE
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your glowing review. We appreciate you letting other travelers know what to expect when staying at Surf & Sand and are very pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay.  Please reach out to us directly when you are able to return.  Regards,

Summary Heading: You are definitely on the ocean !
Summary: We had a corner king room in the Tower.   Great balcony view and really relaxing room.     Service by everyone was outstanding - very friendly !    Did not spent much time on property, but did use the pool.   Again, the service was excellent.  Within walking distance of shops, restaurant, galleries, you name it.   Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Jeff:  We are so pleased you enjoyed your king corner, Towers room.  And, yes, the views from your room are spectacular.  Thank you for your compliments of our location, service and amenities.  Please call upon us when you are able to return.  Regards,

Summary: I can't thank Sandra Bernard for the great service!  Great location, you walk out on the beach from the hotel. Great neighborhood with lots of restaurant options, all within walking distance. Lots of boutique shops and art galleries as well.
Manager Response: Hello Travel!  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your recent stay and the great service of Sandra, a true asset of the resort.  Thank you for letting other travelers know what to expect when our guests.  Hopefully, we'll have you back in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: We tried this property on a whim and boy I could not have been any more pleased!! The room was well appointed and very clean. Their deco is very relaxing and comfortable.  The pool was peaceful and refreshing.  The staff is over the top with assistance and friendliness. We can hardly wait to stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your glowing review!  We appreciate knowing we met your needs and we "can hardly wait" to have you back with us.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Great get-a-way for some California sun
Summary: Leaving the hot and humid Philadelphia August weather, for a stay at the Surf & Sand proved comfortable, relaxing, and great service from a friendly and professional staff. Everyone tried to get to know us upon our arrival and that made a huge difference.  Madison G was absolutely an amazing, kind and  helpful server, always seeing that we were taken care of. As was Reynaldo who always looked for us when we came to the pool and provided towels, and best location for sun.  JD made the outdoor lounge (15fiftyfive) a place you wanted to go with his  very friendly, prompt service.  Finally, the Concierges  were very, very helpful, and knowledgeable of the happenings around town.   Great food, great pool, great facility & rooms, and great service. Thank you
Manager Response: Hello N Cirilli:  Thank you so much for your glowing review of your recent stay.  We are always pleased to know we met our guests' needs and expectations.  We appreciate your compliments of all those you mention, which are shared with them.  We hope to have you back with us when the snow flies in the east!  Warm regards,

Summary: Just be aware that only 10 rooms have air conditioning, which is not at all transparent from the website.  There are ceiling fans and portable fans in the rooms, and you can keep the balcony doors open (unfortunately, we had smokers around us (even though Laguna is smoke-free and the property is smoke-free)).  The staff were all wonderful.
Manager Response: Hello AAJL:  Thank you for your review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Our sincere apologies that you were subjected to smoking guests even though, as you mention, the resort, as well as the city  of Laguna Beach as a whole, is  non smoking.  Our security team strives to address smokers, leveling hefty fines and finally eviction, however, they sometimes persist, unfortunately.  I hope you brought it to our security's attention.  Thank you also for the compliments of  our great team of which we are very proud.  We look forward to your return in the near future.  Regards,

Summary: The hotel is located beautifully on the beach and within walking distance of all shops and restaurants. The rooms definitely show signs of age and saltwater, but they are clean, comfortable and the view was gorgeous. Staff was incredibly friendly, welcoming and helpful. Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Albertson:  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your recent stay and the great service of our associates.  We are planning major improvements to the resort in the near future and look forward to your return.  Warm regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed at Surf and Sand celebrating our anniversary and had an amazing time there. The resort is beautiful, it‚Äôs picture perfect, the rooms are dreamy, you woke up to the most beautiful view every morning and every single guest gets royalty treatment. I would like to thank Joanna Bear ( loved her, she is an amazing human being who treats every guest like a family) , chef Ron, Joanna (server at Splashes), Ali, Ray (working at pool), bellmen, front desk employees and let but not lest amazing Barbara the operator.  Can‚Äôt wait to go back there with our kids.  Loved it there and highly recommend it to everyone.
Manager Response: Hello Tina:  We are thrilled to learn of your wonderful recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Thank you for letting us and other travelers know what to expect when staying with us.  Thank you for the compliments of Joanna, Chef Ron, Ali, Ray and Johanna - great assets of the resort.  We hope to see you back with us in the near future.  Have a wonderful remaining summer season!

Summary Heading: Surf and sand resort is exceptional!
Summary: My husband and I had the most amazing time at the Surf and Sand Resort. We brought our puppy and she was welcomed with a special treat. Everyone on the staff was so kind and helpful especially Diane at the concierge desk. They made our trip to Laguna so special. The room was amazing right on the beach with an incredible view. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Hello Audrina  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed all that Surf & Sand has to offer.  Thank you for the compliments of our great staff and especially, Diane, which is always appreciated. We look forward to your return. Please call upon us for assistance in the future.  Have a great remaining summer season!

Summary Heading: catastrophe at splashes by surf and sand
Summary: i come to your restaurant 1 time per week since i moved to california three years ago. also my husband does lot of business in your restaurant and comes 1-2 times per week. i was at your restaurant last time last week on thursday with friends - everything was solid, beautiful view, good service, good food. yesterday i came with my daughter - it was a nightmare. first we had a reservation at 5pm for bar - hostess said i can‚Äôt sit you yet but go to bar and stay by the bar and have a drink while you are standing. ok we went there, 3 tables empty plus fourth table was about to be empty. we come to the bar but bartender RICH (who is only the rudest person i have ever met living on two continents) said ‚ÄúGET OUT, if you wanna be in my bar come with a hostess‚Äù. we tried explaining that

Summary Heading: Manager need to be coached on how to handle customers issues
Summary: Up on our arrival just because my husband on oxygen and wheelchair the manager called the room to ask if we have COVID. My husband was in the hospital fighting for his life in Dec and didn‚Äôt get discharged until March . Yes ma‚Äôam he had COVID and yes we are celebrating his life ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ I can‚Äôt believe she had the courage to ask just because he‚Äôs on a wheelchair chair and oxygen. If you really care about your employees safety start with closing the gate at the pool and not allowing people from outside the hotel to use the pool ‚Ä¶. Follow the CDC guidelines with the capability to ensure your team and your gusts safe .

We had a fantastic stay at the Surf and Sand.  Very convenient to downtown Laguna Beach.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful.  They bring chairs and umbrellas to the beach for you which was super nice. Our room was very clean and so spacious.
Manager Response: Hello Meg:  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your recent stay and the service we provided.  Hopefully, we will see you back with us in the near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a great summer!

Summary: I‚Äôm writing this review for my parents and  myself. My parents, Allan and Janie Berman have brought our family here for over 40 years. The beauty of the hotel and it‚Äôs setting on the ocean keep us coming back, as well as the first class service. This trip by far was most memorable because of the staff we had the honor of engaging with. Our concierge, Diane is a bright shining light and welcomed us with open arms and always a beautiful smile. She made us feel so special .  Richard, from food and beverage was also a welcoming, helpful and friendly face, who went above and beyond to make us feel special. We are so sad to go home that we are coming back in December! The Surf and Sand is always our choice for a vacation close to home.
Manager Response: Hello our Loyal Guests:  We always enjoy hearing from our long time, loyal guests, and are so pleased we met your needs yet again.  Thank you so much for the compliments of the service of Diane and Richard who made you feel "special"!!  We look very forward to having the Bermans back in December.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Went to a wedding in May and spent 4 nights here. Loved the hotel, big enough but had a smaller hotel feel. Rooms were great - no air conditioning but the weather was perfect so we kept the slider open in our room. Pool area was really nice, wait staff super attentive. Only had breakfast in the main dining room and it was delicious each day, lunch by the pool was great as well.  Would go back in a heartbeat
Manager Response: Hello Ann!  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your recent stay and the services we provide. We look very forward to the opportunity of having you return in the near future. Please call upon us for assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel, perfect location, no AC
Summary: Everything about the hotel is great expect the rooms don't have any air conditioning! There is only a ceiling fan and they bring you a stand alone fan if you ask for it but it's still not enough. They recommend leaving the balcony door open to let the ocean breeze in but i have little kids and didn't feel safe leave the balcony door open all night. Even when we left it open in the morning, it still wasn't enough to cool down the room.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed our location and service we provide. Major improvements to the resort are in the planning stages, which we hope to resume in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance when you are able to return.  Have a great summer season!

Summary: Beautiful room in the tower on the 8th floor.  Room was super clean and bright. Nice balcony. Restaurant "Splashes" was fantastic for dinner.  We had room service in the morning for breakfast (ordered the night before) and it was wonderful. Staff was on time and friendly.  Brought everything we needed and set up the table beautifully. We are relatively local to the area and celebrating our anniversary.  It was a wonderful one-day getaway that seemed like 2!  Love that their check out is noon instead of 11am. Makes for a relaxing morning. We will def go back next year.
Manager Response: Hello recent guest:  We are so pleased to learn how much you enjoyed your stay, our location and your dining experiences.  We look very forward to your return next year.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a great summer season!

Summary: There is no A/C in the room! The ocean breeze and cheap/loud box fan are not enough to balance the heat of summer. Unbelievable that a "Luxury" hotel doesn‚Äôt have such a basic amenities. Its unfortunate
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Wheeler:  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.  You are correct in that a summer stay is sometimes extremely warm.  Major improvements to the resort have been in the planning stages for quite some time being delayed by legalities and then Covid. We hope to resume those efforts in the near future.  Please let us know if we may be of assistance when your travels bring you back to lovely Laguna Beach.  Regards,

Summary: We have stayed at the Regis and the Montage.  They are beautiful hotels in their own right.  However, hands down this is our favorite.  We have stayed many times.  Everyone is amazing and friendly.  This time we had a bellhop Troy who sang Happy Birthday to me as he helped us on our departure.  We left the hotel laughing.  Love the beautiful sunsets and the crashing of the waves.
Manager Response: Hello Extraordinary:  Thank you so very much for your glowing review  of Surf & Sand. We are always pleased to know we exceeded our guests' expectations.  Troy is a true gem of whom we are very proud.  Let us know when you are able to return.  Have a great summer!

Summary: My wife and I just spent part of our honeymoon here. We had the best time!   It started off with super friendly valets and front desk check in attendant! The service with everyone we came across was superb from bellhops to maintenance to room service staff!  This place is located in a magnificent location to enjoy all that Laguna has to offer, and you simply cannot beat the view from the oceanfront rooms. We will never forget our time there! Thank you Misty and everyone else who works at Surf and Sand for making us feel so special!!  Brad and Christina
Manager Response: Hello Brad:  Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your recent, special stay. We are very proud of our associates and the service they provide.  Hopefully, we'll see you back at Surf & Sand for your annual anniversary - OR BEFORE!  Have a great summer season!  Regards,

Summary Heading: Thank you Surf and Sand and Thank you, David!
Summary: We just spent our 45th wedding anniversary at the Surf and Sand. The view from our room was amazing and so was our Surfside Room.  We had dinner at Splashes and had the best waiter ever. David made our whole anniversary dinner special with his warmth snd professionalism. He was very  enthusiastic about the restaurant and the chef and knowledgeable about each dish. We loved everything that he recommended. David really made our anniversary a special evening and we thank Surf and Sand for sharing him with us. We shall return to this beautiful place!!
Manager Response: Hello Fearless:  We are THRILLED that David exceeded all your needs and made your special stay so  memorable.  He is quite a gem and we are very proud of him and the service he provides. Thank you for the compliments of him and of our location and views.  We look forward to having you back with us!  Have a wonderful summer!

Summary Heading: Amazing ocean view and that‚Äôs it
Summary: So overpriced. This is legit like a 2 star restaurant based on amenities. Beautiful views and that‚Äôs it. Fees for everything and fees because you have fees, then more fees. Not worth it. Will go back to San Diego next trip to CA. Felt like all they care about is taking your money and not overly helpful or friendly staff
Manager Response: Hello!  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay. Major improvements to the resort are in the planning stages which have been delayed for quite some time.  We are looking forward to providing all of our usual amenities in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Comfy bed, beautiful setting, lots of beige, terrible coffee.
Summary: The good:   -This hotel is in a perfect location. Right on the beach, you just walk out onto the sand.   -The rooms face the ocean, so you have a constant view of the waves, and that is incredible.   -The beds are extremely comfy.   -Bathroom nicely laid out, clean, decent products.   -Staff all attentive, kind, lovely to talk to.   -A lovely walk into Laguna, not too far, so nice to walk back to hotel after dinner.   The bad:   -I wrote this entire review to get to this point: The Pacific Perk coffee shop, conveniently located outside the lobby next to the parking lot, is quite literally the worst coffee I have ever had in my life. I am not exaggerating. It is truly terrible. A coffee atrocity. I rushed back to my room after throwing it out so that I could have the taste fresh
Manager Response: Hello Rebecca:  Thank you for your review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Please be assured that we appreciate your compliments of our location and views, and have shared your comments regarding the coffee in Pacific Perk.  We are saddened to hear you were disappointed and our Director of Food & Beverage has been made aware.  Please call upon us directly when you are able to return to lovely Laguna Beach and Surf & Sand so that we are able to provide a pleasant stay.    Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: The location was fantastic! The hotel was average at best. Having an air conditioning option would be great for the price and the rooms could use an update. Selena our server on the beach was great! Oh and 4pm check in could be earlier for those traveling from far away.
Manager Response: Hello NYC Mama:  We appreciate ;your review of your recent stay at Surf and Sand and are pleased that you enjoyed our location.  Thank you for the compliments of Selena which is greatly appreciated.  Major improvements to the entire resort are in the planning stages. We hope to have you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: We had a great vacation in Laguna Beach and the highlight was the ocean view from our room. There are beautiful views to be had all over the city and we saw several but the one from our room was the best by far. Guests enjoy a nice quiet clean private beach. Stellar staff and service.  It is not a new property and you can see the wear and tear that the exposure to the salt air has caused but they maintain it as well as anybody possibly could. No complaints. If you do not like the sound of the ocean, steer clear of this property. We loved every second of the rhythmic and mesmerizing sound of the ocean. Absolutely amazing.
Manager Response: Hello Diane:  Thank you for your compliments of our location, views, staff and service.  You are correct in that we strive to maintain the property and look forward to the planned improvements that were put on hold due to Covid.  Please plan to return and call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm summer wishes!

Summary: First Class establishment!  We flew into San Diego to visit several colleges and Laguna has always been a favorite for us.  We will definitely return to the Surf & Sand for our stay each summer.  We are a Colorado family that loves Laguna and the Surf and Sand!  Our paradise.  Thanks for making our stay so wonderful!  My 50th birthday was during our stay and every staff member wished me a happy birthday - well done all!!
Manager Response: Hello Kelly:  Again, we are so grateful for your glowing review (as in your survey) and are so happy your special birthday was recognized and enjoyed.  You will have to make it an annual event. Let us know when we may be of service again.  Another HAPPY BIRTHDAY!

Summary: Enjoyed a 4 course meal, every part of every dish was perfect! Ambiance was amazing, staff and guests were enjoyable. Special shout out to our server David and the chef, you can tell they take pride in what they do. Will be coming back as soon as possible!
Manager Response: Hello Paulm:  Thank you SO very much for letting us know how much you enjoyed dining in Splashes. You are correct in that Chef Ron and our great server David are genuinely proud of their work and service.  We look forward to your return.  Warm summer wishes!

Summary: Right on the beach at Laguna.  You're as close to the ocean as you can get.  Great facilities, friendly staff.  Splashes is a wonderful restaurant.  Stay in one of the upper floors in the Tower for the best views
Manager Response: Hello Steven:  Thank you for the recommendation to other travelers and for letting us know you enjoyed your stay. Please keep in mind that our rates do fluctuate during the year depending on the season.  Please call upon us when you are able to return and have a great summer!

Summary: This resort is amazing!  ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è for a sure.  The view out our room was heaven.  24/7 waves.  The view out the slashes restaurant was just as amazing as our room.  The staff is so friendly & helpful.  Alberto, Jordan & Maggie went out of their way to make our stay top notch.  Can‚Äôt wait to come back üåä
Manager Response: Hello Lisa!  And we can't wait to have you back with us.  Thank you for the compliments of our associates, the service they provide, our location and views.  We look forward to having you back with us!  Have a great summer season!

Summary: Well worth the money! No skimping at this resort full service including service of bringing chairs and umbrella right on the beach - you will not regret one dollar you spend, exceeded our expectations
Manager Response: Hello to our June guest!  We are always pleased to know we exceeded our guests' needs.  Thank you for the compliments of the resort and the services we provide.  We look forward to your return.

Summary: Surf and Sand is one of our new favorite getaways!  The location cannot be beat.  Close enought to walk to town and stores/restaurants, but everything is offered at the resort in case you don't want to leave.  We stayed in a room in the tower right over the sand.  The waves were crashing under our balcony!  Room was well appointed and super clean.  The feel of the whole resort is beachy but upscale.  Pool area is very nice- and with great services to bar and food.  Towels, chairs, and umbrellas are also available to set up camp at the beach.  Not a whole lot of beach area when we were there (large swell), but the tradeoff of a great view with waves crashing under our balcony was worth it.  Fell asleep to the noise of waves!  Splashes bar was the way to go for dinner- waves
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your very complimentary review and post of Surf & Sand. We are always very appreciative of positive feedback.  Thank you also for letting other travelers know what to expect during their stay and in the lovely city of Laguna Beach.  We are happy to hear we are your "new favorite getaway" and look very forward to serving you again.  Warm summer wishes!

Summary: Overall fantastic location, poolside atmosphere, walking distance to tons of things.Having to request housekeeping is simply unacceptable when all Covid restrictions are lifted. It was inconvenient to request it and time range was not convenient to my schedule. It is a way to cut labor costs and has no basis in keeping me safe when all other aspects of hotel including gym and spa are functioning. The pool was perfect- not too big, but plenty of lounges. Kids playing but not overcrowded. Staff at pool and restaurants and bell desk great. Front desk and coffee baristas at coffee shop great/ knew my order after one visit. I went with my adult children and all had a great stay. Tv broken and took a day to replace- why aren‚Äôt those things checked? Some dated furniture and no outlets
Manager Response: Hello Santasutt:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay which we appreciate and take very seriously.   Now that the mandated Covid restrictions are lifted, we are striving and looking forward to providing our full services, full staffing and amenities!  Thank you also for the compliments of our Front Desk agents and Pacific Perk attendants, of whom we are very proud.  We look forward to having you back at Surf & Sand!

Summary Heading: Looked way better in photos than it does in person.
Summary: We ended up having a lovely weekend in laguna, but the hotel was not what I had anticipated.  The price of the room would lead one to believe that the hotel is updated, but in fact it could use an update.  The rooms were clean and ours was larger than expected, but I would have preferred smaller for better quality.  The bathrooms are still travertine.....are we in the early 2000s? The comforters are satin which just ended up looking tacky. The chairs for the beach are in desperate need of an upgrade.  Other hotels on the same beach had more comfortable chairs available. There was no room at the pool so we sat on the beach both days.
Manager Response: Hello Nicole:  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay. We are concentrating on making improvements to the resort now that mandated restrictions have been lifted, and to offering our full services once again.  Please call upon us in the future for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Kinda of dirty, kind of run down
Summary: Unfortunately, Surf and Sand has lost it‚Äôs shine. The rooms need a deep cleaning and a refresh. When you wait and additional 30 minutes for your room to be clean at check in, you expect to minimally be dusted. So much dust in our room and the carpet was damp throughout. Someone is obviously not overseeing the cleaning process. There was debris on the ground outside our room, a used q-tip, an old piece of candy, a pen and other random trash. Also, the staff definitely needs training. When the front desk attendant says, I think your room is over there you know there‚Äôs a problem. Think?! I got my room keys and then had to go flag down a bellman to have my bags delivered, which none were in sight. No offer from front desk to arrange them to be sent down. It feels like it‚Äôs being run
Manager Response: Hello:  Thank you for sharing your recent experience of your stay at Surf & Sand, which we appreciate and take very seriously.  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations and that you encountered less-than-perfect service.  Now that mandated restrictions have been lifted, we are resuming our full services, room amenities and staffing, to which we look very forward.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: We have had a wonderful experience at this beautiful resort! The beach location is amazing. The restaurants are so good with a beautiful view. I highly recommend this hotel. The front desk crew, especially Jordan, made our visit really special, relaxing and invigorating. I‚Äôve been to very nice places across the world. This place stands out among all of them. I would pick this resort over the Ritz.
Manager Response: Hello Ashley:  Your glowing review of your recent stay is so much appreciated. We are pleased to know you enjoyed every aspect of your "relaxing and invigorating" visit.  Thank you for the compliments of our associates, especially Jordan - a true asset of the resort.  We hope to have you return in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: Our balcony surfside room was awesome.  We enjoyed the beautiful sunset by having room service.  Wonderful lobster bisque and we didn't have to worry about getting a good view or overstaying our welcome.  Another plus is we didn't have to feel awkward ordering one plate for the two of us! Only needed the one night for a very special birthday.  Bed was comfy but big note - there is no air conditioning so plan accordingly.  The staff is very gracious and overall recommend it highly.
Manager Response: Hello!  We appreciate your glowing review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand on your special birthday! Thank you for the compliments of our location, dining and our great staff. We hope to have you back with us in the near future.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Food and drinks grossly overpriced. Ocean view room was view of pool with screaming kids. Went into bar which was empty and was asked to leave because I did not have reservation!!! All bars closed at 5:00 Sunday. Will never come back.
Manager Response: Hello Mike:  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay.  Now that restrictions have been lifted, we are resuming our full services, amenities and staffing, to which we look very forward.  Regards,

Summary: With legal marijuana in California this is now a major issues at surf and sand.  Time at the pool and in our room ruined by pot smoke from multiple balconies.  It is a shame this great hotel and location has been ruined for us.   Hotel management seems concerned but unable to stop the issue.   Sorry we won‚Äôt be back.
Manager Response: Hello Jas:  We are extremely apologetic that you experienced smoking issues during your recent stay. Although our Security team strives to be diligent regarding violations,  impose hefty fines  and finally eviction, guests persist.  The resort is a non-smoking property as is the  city of Laguna Beach as a whole. Again, we regret the inconvenience as we hope to resume our full services and staffing.  Regards,

Summary: Everyone at Surf and Sand Resort were courteous, friendly and went out of their way to welcome us.  We celebrated a special occasion and the Surf and Sand Resort is the perfect place to do so. It's right on the beach with good amenities, wonderful views and good people. The Concierge led the charge to make sure our stay was perfect and something we won't forget for a long time. We will return soon.
Manager Response: Hello Mark!  Thank you so very much for the compliments of our great staff and the services they provide. We are very proud of their efforts and appreciate knowing they met your needs for your special occasion.  Be sure to contact us directly when you are able to return!  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: This hotel has an absolutely stunning location, view and amenities, such as pool, restaurant and coffee shop.  Maybe I am not realistic about current hotel prices, but $900 a night when you include parking, occupancy tax and resort fee - seemed very high to me - especially in a room with was not a premium oceanfront view.   The room itself was very dated and "beach weathered."  My daughter slept on the pull out couch which was the worst she's ever been on, you could feel every spring in the mattress.  No robes, slippers or any of the standard comforts of a room in this price range.  There were also several events during our stay the first of which was right below our room and was so loud at 10:30 at night my kids couldn't sleep.  If location and view are your highest and only
Manager Response: Hello Patti:  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay and regret that we did not meet your expectations during this very difficult past year.  Now that restrictions have been lifted, we hope to be able to resume our full services, room amenities and maintenance. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Warm regards,

Summary: We had a wheelchair user in our party so to avoid any miscommunication, I made our room reservation directly through the hotel, not a third party booking site. I was told we were getting an oceanfront Double Queen room with a roll-in shower. When we arrived the room assigned to us had a tall sided tub with glass doors. There were parallel grab bars located right above the top of the tub that made no sense at all. Of course the property was completely booked, so the solution offered by Management was to move us to a different room each day of our trip and use a rollaway bed as our second bed. We decided to stay put. As an experienced wheelchair traveler, I‚Äôve experienced many unexpected glitches in the past but this one took the cake. No shower for three days. It was my version
Manager Response: Hello Rebekah:  Our sincere apologies for the miscommunication and inconveniences you experienced during your recent stay.  We also regret not being able to accommodate moving your room to a more adaptable room. Please reach out to us directly in the future so that we are able to provide a complete ADA compliance room for you.  I have also sent you an email message to further outline our compensation offer.  Warmly,

Summary: We flew in to OC and stayed one night at my favorite hotel. I have never written a negative review but I am going to today! I received 6 bed bug bites and a bed bug came home on my sweatshirt that I left on the floor overnight. It is a horrible experience to have bed bug bites and I don‚Äôt wish this on anyone. The management denied they have a problem! I have included photos.
Manager Response: Dear Jill C,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience. We recently received the AAA Inspector‚Äôs Best of Housekeeping 2021 award, so we take the cleanliness of our hotel very seriously. As soon as this issue was brought to our attention, we hired a third party inspector to examine the room, and no evidence of bed bugs was found.  However, we do understand and apologize for the negative experience you had. We invite you to please give us a call to further discuss how we can make this right, and regain your confidence as your favorite hotel.      Warmly,  Joanna Bear General Manager

Summary: I used to go to this hotel a lot as a kid and it still is great. We got a room over the ocean and it‚Äôs literally towering over the water with epic views down the beach on both sides. My favorite part about this hotel is the pool. Get a chair early morning that faces the ocean so you can enjoy an ocean view with chill music all day. Beach access is right at the pool so you can also take a quick dip in the ocean and back to your lounge chair
Manager Response: Hello Baby Moon:  We are so pleased to hear from our long time, loyal guest.  Thank you for sharing your experience and letting other travelers know how much you enjoy Surf & Sand. We hope to see you back with us in the near future!

Summary: Having stayed at the Surf and Sand many times, it saddens me to have to give a disappointing review. We usually stay in the Towers but for this trip, I booked The upper Catalina suite for the first time. As I was visiting with my 2 daughters and we wanted to be together, we thought the suite would give us a more comfortable stay.  We were all astounded at the condition of the suite, the sleeper sofa, the pillows, the towels and the terrace floor.  We understand the COVID precautions but did not expect the basic amenities of slippers, robes and mini bar to have been removed.  In my opinion, it is no longer the five star hotel I have come to expect.  I hope in the future it will change, but for now, we will not be returning.
Manager Response: Hello World Travelers:  Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay! You are correct in that the state mandated Covid restrictions have limited our usual amenities, staffing and services.  We are looking very forward to being able to provide these services in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future when improvements are also made!

Summary: Our stay for two days and one night was one of the most memorable experience locally that I‚Äôve had in 44 years. I have visited this hotel previously but they have out done themselves now beyond anything that I‚Äôve ever experienced and expected. The staff, from soup to nuts, was exceptional and I tipped generously as a result. This resort caters to every need you have and makes you feel like the most special king or queen. I took my nephew who is visiting for the first time in California and he also fell in love with the area.  I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if he moved here from Utah! I highly recommend the restaurant, every facility they have within the resort,  and the area that they are located in. I believe it does not get any better than this. Bypass the Ritz Carlton in Dana point
Manager Response: Hello Pamela TJ:  Thank you so much for your glowing compliments of Surf & Sand. We are always so pleased to learn that our guests enjoyed their stay and we exceeded their expectations.  Hopefully, you and your family will be able to return in the near future.  We look very forward to having you with us once again.  Happy Summer!

Summary Heading: Brought our family from Vegas a few times.  Great to get out of the heat in Vegas in July.
Summary: Booked a tower room for this July.  How do you call the hotel directly?  I always get a service in San Diego to book. We are celebrating our 50th Anniversary and our son, daughter-in-law & their kids have booked rooms too.   Can we get a small white buttercream cake sent to our room?  Needs to serve 8.  Also, would like a room w/a handicap bathroom if there is one on the same floor as the rest of the family.  Forgot to mention that in our booking.  We love the Surf and Sand.  The location can't be beat!  The staff are all so pleasant & helpful.  My daughter-in-law is also bringing their little dog.  Really an  Awesome place for the entire family.  Had to cancel last year because of Covid.  So looking forward to our "happy place". Wonderful breakfast in the open air Splashes
Manager Response: Hello Judy:  We are so pleased that your family will be with us this summer.  I am going to reach out to you via email so that I may assist with your plans.  Warm regards,

Summary: If you're like me, you're reading reviews to see if this is the right choice hotel for you. Use this as your guide to look elsewhere. OVERPRICED: You're paying for the luxury of being steps to the beach and view, THAT'S IT! The room itself is masked by coats of paint and outdated finishes. I read the reviews, still stayed here and now I understand. NO A/C: Unless you're going during cool months where no A/C is needed, be mindful there's only a ceiling fan. Breeze from the ocean will only take you so far. Good luck in the summer months. While I'm sure housekeeping tries their hardest, it is not enough. The demand for rooms outpaces their ability to keep the rooms clean. PARKING: $40 valet parking is your only choice on the premises. Overall, it was nice to be so close to the
Manager Response: Hello Luisi:  We regret that we did not meet your expectations during your recent stay and while we continue to follow mandated Covid requirements.  We hope to be able to return to our  full services and full staffing in the near future to address housekeeping and maintenance issues.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Quite pricey for beachfront great location.
Summary: While across the board we experienced the most polite, professional, and friendly staff, from housekeeping to valet to concierge, Sun And Surf‚Äôs inside does not live up to its beautiful outdoor beachfront views.
