Rooms a bit dated, especially baths.  Stone floors in need of rugs. Minibars need updating.  Or charge a whole lot less.  Can‚Äôt do montage prices without montage rooms and amenities.
Manager Response: Greetings!  We appreciate your feedback and compliments of our great associates! Our sincere apologies that we did not quite meet your expectations during this stay.  We hope to be able to resume our full services following mandated Covid requirements.  Please call upon us directly in the future for any needed assistance.

Summary: Swaying palm trees, sun and sand and very happy people in the pool.  What more could you ask for.  Waves are crashing in and the sea is aqua marine.  Room is spotlessly clean as always when we visit the surf and sand.  It was busy at reception today and everyone was dealt with quickly and efficiently so holiday could begin as soon as you walked through the door .  We thoroughly enjoy staying here enjoying this pristine beach .  Thank you .
Manager Response: Hello Tracy:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf and shared your experience with future travelers.  You are correct in that you cannot beat our location, service and comfort.  We look forward to your return.  Let us know when you need our assistance in the future!  Happy Spring!

Summary: When coming from out of town and booking everything by picture only you never quite know what to expect. THIS PLACE WAS WORTH EVERYTHING THEY EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS. Valet was great and Sam I think the young lady at the front desk made the check in even smoother and quick. Just awesome experience
Manager Response: Hello Fin!  Wow!  Thank your for your great review of Surf & Sand and for letting first-time travelers know what to expect when staying with us!  Thank you also for the compliments of our Front Desk associate and our GREAT valet team!  True assets of the resort.  Please reach out to us in the future when you are able to  return.  Warm regards for a great summer season ahead!

Summary: The room was outdated and incredibly noisy. The guests above woke up at 4am to shower and the pipes squealed, we could hear every step as they walked across the room and the old, outdated shutters were super loud. Next door we could hear every word of the guests conversation starting at 6. Not a great sleep which is really disappointing on vacation. The bed was very comfortable though!  The view in 318 is also very disappointing... there should be full disclosure that it's more of a pool building view than anything else. Overall I was really underwhelmed,  especially since it's so expensive.
Manager Response: Hello Jen:  We appreciate your feedback regarding  your recent stay, which is shared with our entire management team. Our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations  and you were not able to fully enjoy your time with us.  Hopefully, you will be able to return  in the future when we would be able to accommodate a more desirable beachfront room location. Please call upon us directly for assistance, which is our pleasure to meet your needs!  Warm regards,

Summary: Surf and Sand is a amazing place to stay.  The rooms our beautiful, the service is amazing and to just go to sleep and hear the ocean all night.  We have been a customer for many years and will return again.  You will not be disappointed in making this your place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello Timothy:  Thank you for taking the time to provide your glowing review of Surf & Sand. As our long-time loyal guests, it is very pleasing to learn you enjoyed yet another great stay, especially in these very difficult and trying times.  We look very forward to your return.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: We booked a sea facing kind bedroom at pretty hefty rates to celebrate our 24th wedding anniversary. Two issues - hotel check in is not until 4pm and check out is by 11am which I find a little unfair. More importantly we did get a sea facing room but it was almost six feet directly above the swimming pool.  Which is OK except it is incredibly noisy and full of screaming kids. Not really ideal at all for a couples romantic getaway.  We did bring the issue to the notice of the front desk who offered to refund our money if we chose to leave! Really poor attitude reflecting no empathy. Several guests in line ahead of us were given options of rooms and another couple was offered an upgrade because they were celebrating their anniversary.  White privilege in action!
Manager Response: Dear Yoda005,   Thank you so much for providing us with your feedback. I sincerely apologize for the disappointment in your guest room. For any future stays, I suggest requesting a room on a higher floor when booking a Seaview room. These rooms do overlook our pool and then the ocean. Additionally, you may want to try an Oceanfront room in the future. These rooms are directly on the beach with fabulous views. It feels as if you are on a cruise ship when you‚Äôre on the balcony! You will hear the lovely noise of the crashing waves if you book these rooms.   Please know that all guests are welcome here. I assure you that the team did not discriminate against your race, although I deeply regret that you felt otherwise.     Again, I apologize profusely for the disappointment with your stay.  I do hope you will reconsider staying with us again in the future. Feel free to reach out to me directly if you have any future needs. It would be my pleasure to personally oversee your accommodations to ensure perfection.

Summary: Beautiful hotel and view, great dinner at Splashes and loved the live entertainment in the courtyard area on Friday and Saturday nights!!  Accommodated our every need very efficiently.  Was unable to use the fireplace in the room or the pool during our 4 day visit.
Manager Response: Hello Linda:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand.  We are so pleased to have met your needs; however, do regret the fireplace and pool issues (we have been at extremely high occupancy ever since the Covid restrictions have been somewhat lifted). We hope to have you back in the near future.  Happy Spring!

Summary Heading: Great amenities, choose room location carefully
Summary: When I checked in, I was told that my room had a partially obstructed view of the ocean, because the pool is in the way.  I was offered an upgrade to a room in a tower for an additional fee, but I declined because my original booking was already fairly expensive.  It turns out, my room was on the ground floor directly in front of the pool.  The partial obstruction of the ocean view isn't an issue for me, but the pool noise was an issue at times.  The kids playing Marco Polo was so loud and incessant inside my hotel room at one point that I thought I was going to lose my mind.  I had to go walk around somewhere else.  There was also an outdoor birthday party by the pool one night with music that got loud.  The valet is such a plus in this area, where parking at many neighboring
Manager Response: Hello Chelsea:  Thank you for your positive review of Surf & Sand and the amenities we offer. We apologize that your room type was not as you had expected.  Please contact the resort directly in the future to ensure you book your desired room type.  We hope to have you back in the near future!  Warm regards,

Summary: We found the resort met our needs.  We were in the tower with a corner room which was light and airy.  The view of the ocean and the listening to the waves was excellent. The staff were very nice and helpful.  After visiting on line to make reservations I called the reservation staff and was that a god send.  We dealt with Jason and was he a gem.  He understood what I wanted to do and made excellent choices of location of room and other services.  If/when I return I will go directly to him. The Bellman and valet were excellent.  We used Ali for dinner reservations and she is excellent. Troy was our vacating bellman and he was excellent.  This is not to take away from the other bellmen who were all excellent.
Manager Response: Hello USMC178!  Wow!  What a lovely review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand!  We appreciate your glowing compliments of Jason, Ali, Troy and all of our associates.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Stay Safe & Well,

Summary Heading: Stay at the Surf & Sand Resort
Summary: I recently stayed at the Surf & Sand Resort in beautiful Laguna Beach, California. It is such a  fabulous resort right on the oceanfront.   I wanted to pay a special compliment to Ana in the gift and coffee shop upstairs. We stopped in to shop several times during our stay and Ana was always so helpful and attentive and pointed out many great gift ideas and options for us to choose from.  Thank you for the excellent customer service, Ana! We will be back!
Manager Response: Hello Travel:  We are so pleased to know that you enjoyed your recent stay and, especially the service Ana provided. She is a true asset of the resort and your compliments are very welcomed and shared with her.  We hope to have you back soon to Surf & Sand!  Happy Spring,

Summary: We are frequent visitors of Surf and Sand as we're planning our wedding at this beautiful resort. The resort is absolutely stunning with mostly (if not all) ocean view rooms, you could not get better beach front real estate. You'll fall sleep to the sound of crashing waves, it's truly peaceful. The location is amazing as it's in walking distance to key attractions, shopping, and restaurants. The staff is so friendly and accommodating, they will go above and beyond to ensure your stay is perfect. They are following all Covid protocols. When you check in, you'll receive a sealed package containing masks and sanitizer for your stay. Social distancing is implemented in public areas. Food is great, you can dine at Splashes, poolside, or even in the comfort of your own private
Manager Response: Hello Des!  We truly appreciate your glowing review of Surf & Sand and all that we have to offer.  Thank you for sharing your experience and the compliments of our location, views, room and associates.  We look forward to your upcoming wedding so that we are able to, once again, provide excellent service  for you!  Warm regards,

Summary: We decided to get out of the cold and venture to Laguna Beach, the Surf & Sand was just what we needed.  It's the closet resort to the surf anywhere on the CA coast.  We left our door to the ocean open all week, the sound of the crashing waves is intoxicating.  Most of the resort has opened back up and our week flew by.  Check-in was a snap and they were attentive to anything we needed.  We received a text message from the concierge at check-in and we dialoged back a forth a few times, very quick response - a nice personal feature. The resort is such in a perfect location, walking distance to most of the key attractions, shopping & restaurants in LB.  There are many choices to stay in LB, but this is simply the best.  We will return.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Blomberg:  We are so pleased to learn how much you enjoyed your recent stay. Thank you for your glowing review and for letting other travelers know what to expect when they are our guests.  We always appreciate compliments of our location, the service of our associates, and lovely Laguna Beach as a whole. We look very forward to your return.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Warm Regards - HAPPY SPRING!

Summary: The location of the Surf & Sand Hotel and its vicinity to the beach, make this a standout amongst its peers in Laguna Beach.  You literally wake up to the sound of the ocean and the service is top notch with its promptness as well as professionalism.  We hosted 10 guests, which is no easy feat, but the hotel did everything right!
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for sharing your great experience regarding your recent stay and event at Surf & Sand. It is always gratifying to learn that we exceeded your needs and your guests enjoyed our location and the service we provided.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Overall quality of the hotel has gone down since my last visit dramatically. The room we stayed in was in dire need of a makeover. Paint was dirty in appearance especially on the baseboards and door casings. For what you are spending per night, you would think that you would have a nice clean room. The same can be said about the overall exterior of the hotel, just in overall deteriorating rough shape. Love the view though and the beach is amazing.
Manager Response: Hello recent guest:  Thank you for sharing your recent experience as our guest at Surf & Sand.  Please be assured that we value your feedback, which is shared with our entire management team to review.  A complete renovation of the resort has been in the planning stages for quite some time; however, is being held up by red tape and, now, the Covid pandemic. We hope to continue those efforts in the near future, and look forward to your return.   Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Birthday Weekend at the Surf and Sand
Summary: This is an absolutely fabulous hotel! Gorgeous views from our room of the ocean and sunset. Concierge staff worked with my husband to do a beautiful rose petals entry, petals heart on the bed, chocolate covered strawberries, flowers, wine and candles. It was so beautiful I cried! Staff was incredible and everyone was so courteous and helpful. I wasn't worried about cleanliness as there were people always cleaning public places. Can't wait to head back to the beautiful hotel!
Manager Response: Hello Maryanne:  We were so pleased to have you with us for your very special occasion.  Thank you for letting us (and other travelers) know how much you enjoyed our hospitality, location and service.  We look very forward to having you back at Surf & Sand!  Warm regards,

Summary: The view alone makes this resort worthy of a good rating. When you add in the exceptional service we received from beginning to end, both times we have visited, rating them as Excellent is a no-brainer.
Manager Response: Hello John:  We appreciate you taking the time to let us and other travelers know  how much you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand.  It is always gratifying to know we exceeded your expectations. We look forward to your return!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Surf & Sand is my happy place.
Summary: Lovely resort just a few hours from Vegas. Went with my sis to decompress for a few days. Room overlooking the ocean and amazing room service. Was not afraid to stay during COVID; we knew their already clean standards would be next level. Perfect get away!
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your recent stay and for the compliments of the resort and the service we provide.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance. ]]  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Wonderful Trip Back to Surf and Sand after being away for a year!
Summary: After a year being away from the Surf and Sand, a place we have loved since 1984 we made a trip back for a week this month!  Because of the times we are living in right now we anticipated changes...but were pleasantly surprised.  Our room was perfect!   The staff all seemed to go out of their way to make sure we were comfortable.  Any request was met with "My Pleasure" and was handled promptly.     I was a customer service trainer for a major department store, so I know good customer service.  I was pleased to call for assistance and get Hotel Operator Alisa.  She did not transfer me anywhere...she stepped up and took care of each request with the best personality ever!  I told her over and over how great it was to talk to her.  I thought to myself you have a gem here...then I
Manager Response: Hello Diana:  Thank you so much for the glowing review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand. As our very loyal guests, we are always pleased to have you back with us. Thank you also for the compliments of our great associates and the service they provided during your stay , which are always appreciated.  We hope to have you back with us in the near future. Please let us know when we may be of assistance.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Stayed here over the weekend and enjoyed it. With the pandemic, it appears that all steps are taken to make guests feel secure and that sanitation is taken seriously. The price you pay here is really the view and the service. The oceanfront rooms can‚Äôt be beat. The customer service top notch. The rooms are a bit dated but still good. I wish the beds were softer.
Manager Response: Hello RuffyMax!  Thank you for your compliments of Surf & Sand and the service of our associates during your recent stay.  It is always gratifying to know that our guests enjoyed their time with us. A total renovation of the resort has been in the planning stages for quite some time; however, has been held up with red tape and, of course, Covid.  We hope to further that effort in the  near future.  Please call upon us when you are able to return.  Warm regards,

Summary: Surf and Sand has been an amazing experience.  It has been so great that we extended our trip another 9 nights.  The valet especially have been exceptional going above and beyond especially Chris and Brandon.  All the staff have been a pleasure to deal with always making us feel right at home and always exceeding our expectations.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Richards:  We are so pleased to know how much you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for the compliments of our great Valet - Chris  & Brandon and the service our associates provided.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in booking your next stay.  Warm Regards,

Summary: This is my second time visiting Surf & Sand resort. I love their ocean front rooms. They are a complete escape from the world. I love the relaxed vibe of the grounds and how easy it is to walk to restaurants and coffee shops. Splashes also has the beautiful ocean front view and wonderful food. I will come back time and time again
Manager Response: Hello Green Eyed!  Thank you for your glowing review of Surf & Sand and for letting us and other travelers know how much you enjoyed your recent stay. As our return guests, we truly appreciate your compliments of the resort, our location and service.  Hopefully, we will see you back with us in the near future!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Ocean view, great service, kind of outdated building for a pricey experience
Summary: I booked a surfside-view room for over 500$ per night. When you enter the room, all you see is the ocean. The view is stunning and you can hear the ocean. The room itself was very clean and neat and looked good. One can see however that the whole building is somewhat outdated. There is a connection door to another room and I could hear every word that the guests in that other room were saying. This should be changed to a better insulated door.  If you like Valet parking, then this is for you. I prefer picking my car up myself but you can't choose, which is okay. Staff was very friendly and kind. I would stay again if I don't need to care much about money.
Manager Response: Hello Gaby:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand. We appreciate knowing you enjoyed your time with us. A total renovation of the resort has been in the planning stages for quite some time,  however, being held up by red tape and now Covid.  We hope to continue those efforts in the near future. We look  forward to your return!  Warm Regards,

Summary: Clean and Comfortable.  Great get away for CA locals.  Best room on the ocean for the price.  Friendly staff and food was great.  Get the corner rooms oceanfront.  Great place to reset and enjoy the ocean and the ocean sounds when the waves are big!
Manager Response: Hello Steeleplatt!  Thank you for providing your compliments of your recent stay at Surf & Sand and for letting other travelers know what to expect when staying with us.  As our local guests, we always appreciate knowing we met and exceeded your expectations.  Please call  upon us when you are able to return.  Warm Regards,

Summary: My husband and I were visiting from Missouri and decided to stay here for a night away to enjoy the ocean and warmer weather. From the moment we checked in everything was amazing! We ordered a few drinks from the bar and relaxed in our beautiful balcony view overlooking the ocean. It was so relaxing just listening to the waves crashing into the shoreline.
Manager Response: Hello Our Missouri Friends!  Thank you for letting us know how much you enjoyed your recent stay!  We always appreciate knowing we met your expectations in providing a pleasant stay. Hopefully,  you will be able to return in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm Regards,

Summary: We had an immediate family only COVID wedding. The  natural beauty of the location with hotel facilities providing for  the ceremony to overlook the ocean, the incredible staff (thank you Lav who helped us organize everything) and outdoor dining available after the wedding, all allowed the beautiful couple (my son and his now-wife) to have a very special day. We took photos after the wedding at sunset on the beach. Especially given COVID, we had an idyllic wedding day!
Manager Response: Hello Karhanten!  We are so pleased that you  have shared your wonderful wedding experience for your  son and (now) daughter-in-law!  Thank you for the compliments of the service we provided and especially of Lav, a true asset of the resort.  We hope to have you back in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Amazing Resort located on the beach with speculator views of the Pacific Ocean. Surf and Sand pride themselves on their customer service and it is seen throughout the Resort from Valet staff to front desk to restaurant staff - top notch! Highly recommend the Surf and Sand Resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your positive review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand, and for your compliments of the service our associates provided.  We are pleased that you enjoyed our wonderful location and ocean views, which can't be beat!!  Please let us know if we may be of assistance when you are able to return.  Warm Regards,

Summary: I have never had resort staff be so attentive to me. The guest services experience is 10/10. All staff was quick to take care of any needs and when a request was submitted the staff would follow up to make sure you were satisfied with the request fulfillment.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Jarvis:  Thank you for your glowing review of your stay at Surf & Sand! We appreciate your compliments of our staff and the services we provided.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance when you are able to return (hopefully, sooner than later)!  Warm Regards,

Summary: This was our first time visiting the Surf and Sand. I wanted to take my wife away for a two-night anniversary stay and I had heard great things about this hotel. Great only begins to do this hotel justice. We have stayed in coastal hotels all over, but we have never stayed in a room where the waves were literally crashing right underneath our balcony--stunning views! At check-in, upon hearing it was our anniversary, they sent a bottle of champagne and chocolates delivered with our luggage! The staff is exceptional and the hotel is absolutely beautiful and pristinely cleaned. We walked on the private beach each day and never closed the sliding glass door all day and night--I will miss those crashing waves. If you want a romantic getaway, look no farther! Thank you Surf and Sands!
Manager Response: Dear Inspire312568,  Thank you so much for the five star review! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your anniversary stay with us. Our oceanfront balconies truly are incredible. At hightide, it feels like you are on a cruise ship. We are so happy you were able to really enjoy the crashing waves.   We are looking forward to your next stay!  Cheers,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: If you are looking for a beautiful, peaceful, luxurious experience - this is the hotel for you.  You can spend your entire time on the patio and feel like you got everything you came for.  The waves break right in front of you and the sunsets are outstanding.  The room is beautiful appointed and you leave there feeling like you escaped to a beautiful experience
Manager Response: Dear AndreaLamb,  Thank you so much for the five star review. Our guest room balconies are the best place to be! I hope you were able to enjoy a nice meal from your balcony, perhaps overlooking the sunset. Please visit us again soon so we can continue to be your beautiful escape!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: My wife and I stayed for three nights in September. This hotel has incredible potential. The ocean front room was as close to the ocean as possible. From our balcony it was fabulous to watch the surfers and the waves crashed right below us.  The main restaurant had a nice ambience and you could hear and see the waves. The food was reasonably good. We enjoyed the pool with it‚Äôs sweeping views of the ocean.   On the downside, the rooms and hallways are in serious need of a full renovation. The bathroom was not even near five star standards. Additionally, the pool is quite small and is was difficult to find shade or available lounge chairs (even during COVID). The location was excellent. When this hotel gets a seriously needed face lift, it‚Äôs going to be extraordinary. However,
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for choosing the Surf and Sand Resort on your recent visit and taking the time to provide your feedback.  Please be assured that we value and appreciate your feedback, which is shared with our entire management team to address improvements. We do not take your comments lightly. Our sincere apologies that your experience was not completely positive. We regret that we failed to provide the service you expect and deserve.   Please know also that a total renovation of the entire resort is in the planning stages. We do hope you will consider staying with us again.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Super awesome stay with great view of surf at night.
Summary: Surf breaks within 20 feet of the room we stayed in . 413 surf side. We got up at  4 to watch the waves.(the lights are pointed out to the waves and it lights up softly) very relaxing to watch the sunrise or sunset. Only room we have stayed at that was almost better that walking around Laguna beach. We stayed in the room more than normal.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for this review! I love watching the waves at night. If you're lucky, there are times when you can even see the sea lions chasing their meal due to the lit up waves at night. It's truly incredible to see.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: Everything was perfect from arrival to departure. The team at Surf + Sand take incredible pride in their job, the property and making sure each guest has an exceptional experience. The only downside was having to depart. Can't wait to get back here.
Manager Response: Dear Rachellek,  Thank you so much for this review. It is true; we take such pride in our service and property. I am thrilled to know this was evident during your stay. Please come visit us again soon... for longer next time!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: The Surf and Sand in Laguna is the place to be! The room was beautiful, very clean and comfortable. Anahit from the gift shop was so sweet and was extra helpful as well as Tomohiro from the front desk. Truly enjoyed my stay!
Manager Response: Dear Sobrevan,  Thank you so much for the five star review! We will be sure to celebrate Anahit and Tomohiro's success.   Kindly,

Summary: We stayed at the resort for my parents 60th anniversary. She made our stay perfect.  She went out of our way to make it special for my parents and my family.  Thank you so much, Sandra and the Surf and Sand.
Manager Response: Dear Andreae,  Thank you so much for the five star review! We are very lucky to work with Sandra and are thrilled to know she made your stay special. We will be sure to celebrate her!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: My husband and I love the surf and sand.  We were in an ocean view tower double room.  Best ocean view and sun set ever with waves lapping right up to the hotel front.  We saw dolphins swimming and playing from the comfort of our sun drenched balcony .   My husband and I share the same birthday week and so decided to get a room at our fav hotel on Laguna beach.  The room was spotlessly clean.  The hotel followed all Covid regulations we felt very safe and protected everything had been cleaned thoroughly.  We were advised by Sandra the concierge where to get good take out food and Troy was very helpful with our luggage from and too the car .  Thank you for a wonderful stay as always .
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for the five star review! It really was a pleasure to read. I just love it when the dolphins put on a show!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: This resort is amazing. The rooms are a little older but gorgeous. The views are insane. The staff is the best I have ever experienced. We will stay again and again. The spa was closed because of the pandemic but can‚Äôt wait to use it next time.
Manager Response: Dear Traci,  Thank you so much for your feedback. I especially loved your comments about the staff. We are all looking forward to you visiting us again in the future, when our lovely spa has reopened.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: The most beautiful views I have seen in any hotel in Southern Cali. The water literally laps underneath the balcony. Looking at the water from a higher vantage point is so magical. We celebrated an anniversary there last weekend and we are still backing in the glow of Surf and Sand. The views are unmatched. Although we didn't get to experience the restaurants/spa, the room service was quick and delicious. Definitely, definitely going back.
Manager Response: Dear MAbila2019,  What a wonderful review; thank you! Doesn't it feel like you are on a cruise ship (but with a big and beautiful room) when you are out on your balcony? We hope you will make us part of your annual anniversary tradition moving forward.   Cheers,   Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: Surf and Sand is a unique boutique hotel with all the perks that add to its chic-ness   without the stuffiness.  Located right next to the water of the Pacific Ocean made this stay memorable.  Gorgeous views of the water during all hours of the day.  Surf and Sand is highly recommended; loved it and wish we could‚Äôve stayed longer.  :)
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the five star review! We are thrilled to know you were warmly welcomed to our beachfront resort! We hope you will visit us again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: This hotel really is the best.  The staff, the location, the view and the food are all amazing.  The sunset views from the balcony are magical and go great with a drink from Splashes or 1555.  The adjustments they have made for COVID times made me feel safe during my stay.  I love this place and cannot wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear 249amyr,  Thank you for the five star review! It is truly appreciated. We agree... the views we have here are magical! We hope you will visit us again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L.  Director of Rooms

Summary: To be honest, I am a bit surprised by the reviews of this hotel.  It does not have any AIR CONDITIONING. the rooms are hot. they face the sun half of the day. They do not advertise this fact . It is just very uncomfortable. If you like hot rooms all day long, go enjoy. Also, the rooms are old and the hotel is in need of a major renovation. Yes they have a great view but I would prefer to pay all that money for a hotel room with air conditioning and in better better shape. I would not return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Familytraveler5000,  Your feedback is very much appreciated. Please accept my sincere apologies for the lack of air conditioning and the sense of sub par updates.   I appreciate your compliments regarding the views.   When your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, we do hope you think of Surf & Sand!  Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: I still believe Surf and Sand is by far the Best Resort on the West Coast! The hotel is immaculate, the staff is incredibly efficient and professional,and the ambience is just Classy!! plain and simple...  I enjoy the accommodations (more)each time i visit....I will return in Januaryfor my Birthday... I will bring my family and friends to celebrate and enjoy!!  thanks again  See u soon   Mr Lorne G Grant
Manager Response: Dear Lorne,  We cannot thank you enough for this glowing review. We look forward to celebrating your birthday with you in January!   See you soon,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: This was a short visit for my 2 daughters and me before one of my daughters begins a difficult chemotherapeutic regimen to treat a recently-diagnosed cancer. Every single staff person with whom we interacted was gracious, friendly and helpful. The food was delicious and presented beautifully. Our room was clean clean clean and lovely, with wonderfully comfortable bedding and lovely towels. And the spa services were FABULOUS. I can't put a price on the great blessing this 24 hour respite provided for all 3 of us!
Manager Response: Dear Jodylps,  We are honored you selected our resort for this special getaway. It gives us great pride to know we earned your five star review! We hope to see you all here again soon.  Cheers,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed at many resorts over the course of the past several years and during Covid-19 (4 Seasons, Hilton, Ritz Carlton) and Surf and Sand has by far the best overall customer service in recent stays.
Manager Response: Dear Samuel N,  Thank you so much for the five star review. We pride ourselves in customer service, so are thrilled this was the highlight of your stay. Visit us again soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: We stay here each time we visit Laguna Beach. Undoubtedly, this hotel has the best location. From most rooms you can spit in the water. It is a little outdated however. Toilets don't flush quickly. Handles of the bathroom faucets are probably several decades old. And especially the bathrooms, carpets, common areas need basic revival. What is really annoying the most for me is in a very expensive hotel where each room is about $1000, they insist on using these Keurig coffee machines. I must have said to the management about 10 times to upgrade them. There are excellent Nespresso machines now with very fresh tasting coffee. Four seasons, and many other hotels now use them. Other than bad coffee, it is also super annoying that during Covid they completely shut down the hot tub.

Wonderful place, phenomenal view, wonderful staff! We had a great time, room was spacious and wonderful. Our balcony & view was second to none! Pool was wonderful and staff is so accommodating if you want to go to the beach and bringing you chairs, umbrella, etc.  Town of Laguna is awesome & quaint!

Summary Heading: Tired but wow what a view
Summary: When other hotel guests defy the rules there's not a lot the hotel can do to rectify the issue. We unfortunately had a smoker in the room below us. Funny, because its a nonsmoking hotel in the city with a no smoking ordinance. We had to spend the first night smelling cigarettes. Eventually, the hotel rectified the issue by moving us up to a higher floor. A gorgeous view of the ocean and  coastline. But the rooms are tired. Granted this was our first venture in the Covid era, so inconveniences such as lack of amenities put us back for the full price we were paying

You can‚Äôt beat the oceanfront location.  The staff are all super friendly and  experienced.  Splashes food was very good. The rooms are showing their age and are needed some maintenance. The faucets are old, paint needs updating, and the room needs air conditioning. Fan was squeaky on high speed. Overall very, very clean. It would be nice to have paper cups in the room. I understand with covid  regulations are weird, but at least some disposables would be nice. Room service was good, again we never met an employee who wasn‚Äôt friendly. Overall until they do some updating I would probably look elsewhere.

This was my first time staying at Surf and Sand, and I found it to be an absolute gem! I was in room 246 which has the loveliest covered balcony with gorgeous, sweeping views of the beach and ocean. There is an upscale and bespoke atmosphere - so peaceful. The staff are warm and friendly, and they went out of their way to explain health and safety measures the property has undertaken. Everyone from those working at the valet drive, to the front desk, to the room service folks - they were all personable and kind. Each guest was given a welcome packet that included a face mask and sanitizer showcasing their dedication to keeping us all safe.  As a side note: Try the nachos at the Splashes bar. Yummy!

Beautiful property , very nice staff and everyone is always so helpful We will definitely be returning to this hotel. We kept our windows open every night and listen to the waves crashing it was stunning

Having not been anywhere due to Covid, I really needed a vacation. After doing my research, I decided to splurge and spent the money, approx 2K, for three incredible nights here. The view from my oceanfront room with two queens (#212), was breathtaking. Like most hotels at this time, certain things are not readily available in your room and you will have to call guest services and ask to have them brought to you. That was totally fine because their staff is so friendly and helpful. Anything I requested was immediately brought to me! A very big thank you to Alexis and Stu! The room I stayed in is beginning to show signs of age, but was clean and having my own private balcony with amazing views made my stay memorable and made that a non-issue. I would definitely go back here.

We had so much fun staying here this week! We loved being right on the beach, having access to a pool, and other hotel amenities, and being close to all the downtown activities, restaurants and shopping. The best of all the beach experiences in one visit!! Great location, and the most hospitable staff around!

Summary Heading: Outstanding Customer Service from Security Department ( Dean B.)
Summary: Our 3 day stay in late September was very pleasant and relaxing. Once I got home, I realized that I left my kindle there and called to see if they can locate it. Dean B. answered my call and assured me that he will personally communicate it to the personnel and if found , he will place it in Lost & Found. I must say that Dean B. from Security Department was very professional yet very friendly and provided an excellent customer service. He left me a couple of voicemails letting me know that the team found my missing item. When I called back, he gladly arranged shipping the item back to me. The outstanding service that he provided sealed the deal for me and I will certainly return to stay at this resort. Thank You Dean B. ‚Äì You were awesome!!!  Surf & Sand Resort is lucky to have

Summary Heading: Great Place ‚Äî- Bad Stay This Time
Summary: I‚Äôve stayed here at least 20 times. The company my wife works for hosts their yearly Christmas party here as well. This is the first time I was not able to get a room on the ocean. I understand the room was booked through a third party and they have no control over what room I‚Äôm given, but $500 for a tiny room with a tiny tv with a blah bathroom and a tiny balcony with a sliver of a peak of a glance of the ocean is NOT worth it. Honestly, I didn‚Äôt even know this type of room existed at the S&S. Unfortunately, I needed to stay here on this particular night or I would have canceled the room and asked for a refund. I was also with someone from out of town. I bragged all day about how great the room was going to be. It was embarrassing when we arrived at the room. All in all, my

Summary Heading: No air conditioning, pool full of kids
Summary: Was hoping for a quiet romantic vacation, but toddlers in the pool (some with diapers) ruined the mood there. Lack of a/c is a problem when the humidity is high - fans help but for those room rates would expect more comfort. On the plus side food and staff were amazing!

We had a fabulous overnight stay, eating at the restaurants, and indulging at the spa! Staff was really attentive and helpful! I was especially impressed with the warmth and helpfulness of Olivia in the gift shop. She was so patient and helping me pick out gifts for my family and offering ideas/suggestions. We also found Troy and Chio to be warm, friendly and professional. We will be staying here again! PS, if loud waves bother you, make sure to bring earplugs or a sound machine. I was surprised at how loud the waves could be at night!

I brought friends to the resort and we considered booking a stay until we noticed that guests in the common areas were not all wearing masks.  Staff were advised but seemed to indicate that they could do nothing.  I will not stay at a hotel that fails to enforce its policies and keep guests and visitors safe.

Do not stay here if you are expecting mask enforcement.  People moving freely in common areas and staff members decline to enforce, they are clearly not empowered to do so and it puts them in a tough spot.  Decided for my safety to check out 10 minutes in and return to Hyatt near the airport which is doing a great job.

Me and my girlfriend had a dinner at the Surface and sand restaurant for my bday and we got service from Diego, we must say it‚Äôs one of the best understandable service we have had and we traveling a lot, thank you Diego!!  üôèüèª

My husband absolutely loves staying at the surf and sand resort in laguna beach On pacific coast highway.  From the moment you pull up to valet the car the customer service starts.  You are greeted with pleasant and courteous staff as soon as you walk through the door.  Jordon was so helpful at the front desk and we were allocated a tower room overlooking the pristine white powdery beach and turquoise sea.  The room was spotless and our balcony very spacious to Sit and unwind for the afternoon.  Sandra our delightful concierge managed to book a table for two at the restaurant sapphire, where we enjoyed excellent food and service.  I can not fault the service at the surf and sand it is exceptional and it was lovely chatting to Ali on the front desk who is always helpful and

You know the Goldilocks fairytale? ‚ÄúJust Right‚Äù is the theme and Surf and Sand Resort is just that! If the Goldilocks story was about AMAZING it would be spot on!   1st is location, location, location and this place is AMAZING! It doesn‚Äôt just have ocean VIEW but because it‚Äôs LITERALLY ON THE OCEAN you also get ocean SOUNDS! Our 6th floor tower building room (lobby is on the 5th) had a BALCONY that was great to chill on and watch the sunset, the surf or the sand! We left the sliding door open all night and the ocean provided the background sleep sounds!  Amenities, room size, everything was just right!  As good as it gets with hotel and great walking distance to everything, I was surprised at how happy the staff was! Like everybody! Especially during CoViD crisis! They kept

We stayed at the surf and sand for 3 days during the week. It was more than I could have ever expected. I woke up many times during the first night just to see the ocean, we were on the 2nd floor and it was so close to our bedroom. We dine at their restaurant and enjoy the pool also. Everyone was so nice and went above and beyond to make our stay memorable.    We loved all the amenities and expect to be back soon!  It was really amazing!

We had the best time at the surf n sand. I Absolutely love Spashes. The view and the sound of the waves are incredible. Our waiter, Rich Flores, provided excellent service!  The Spicy Margs and food are also amazing. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Thank you for always taking care of us! Wonderful resort right on the beach with beautiful sunsets!  We love staying there and the restaurant is fabulous - friendly staff and fantastic food.  Rich is super friendly and a nice guy!

I had the best service in Splashes bar with the most professional server Rich Flores. He went above and beyond to make my dining experience 5 star. The ambience was so beautiful and the service was amazing!!!  The drinks were perfect as well!!   The bartender Alberto made an amazing margarita as well!!!

Canceled several trips this year because of COVID-19 but just enjoyed three nights at the Surf and Sand, a place I hadn‚Äôt stayed for many years. The service, staff, food and ambience were all really excellent.  As a physician, I thought they took the COVID-19 precautions seriously even though some of the guests did not. I highly recommend this place and will stay there again.

If you are planning a trip to Laguna Beach and want to listen to the waves crashing on the beach all day and night, I highly recommend...the views are outstanding, the service is superb, and the food at the restaurant was excellent and delicious.  This was my second time here and can't wait to return!  What are you waiting for...stop reading and go and book this hotel, you will not be disappointed~

This was my first time at the surf and sand. I had the most AMAZING experience. I bought this beautiful orange dress at the gift shop and Anahit was working. Anahit was such a delightful person to help me. She has an eye for fashion let me just say! I love all my purchases and especially the beautiful dresses!! I love bright colors like this and she was a doll with the best customer service.  The surf and sand hotel itself is amazing. I highly recommend it! You won‚Äôt regret staying here

My wife and I decided to drive down from the Bay Area and splurged on a one night stay here. We‚Äôd heard good things from family and friends who admittedly haven‚Äôt stayed here but heard about ‚Äúcelebs‚Äù staying here. We arrived around 11, several hours before checking (4pm seems late). The valet was very friendly and helpful. The room wasn‚Äôt ready (suggesting high capacity during the pandemic...) so we put our luggage back in the car and went for a stroll. Ended up getting lunch at Oak which was delicious, during which we got notification that the room was ready (great! Because leguna beach seems very hit or miss on mask wearing). When we got to the room... it seemed very dated, like 1992 wanted their high end resort back. Wall to wall marble in the bathrooms, square sink knobs,

Greatest place. Adams 21st bday and of course he wanted to stay at surf and sand. The offered him chocolates and champagne! We stayed in the Catalina room 449 with a spacious balcony to invite guests for a quick cake and toast! Now the rest of the family will always choose SURF  and SAND RESORT with the friendly hardworking staff keeping us save from covid.

Summary Heading: Great if you want to catch COVID + NO AC
Summary: Yikes. Unfortunately this place is not what I expected. First of all, this should not be called a "resort," that to me implies space to roam. It's a hotel, and a cramped one at that. They really should be limiting the number of guests they accommodate, the common space are quite small and social distancing was not being enforced. Masks were not required at the pool which was basically a drunken club, the music was so loud and the clientele was clearly there to party. The last straw for us was getting to the room and realizing there was no AC. Southern California get hot enough that we need AC, and regardless, a "resort" should have it. So if you are looking to party (and maybe catch covid-19) then this is the place for you. If you are looking for calm and relaxation, try

Had an absolutely miserable stay here two weekends ago. The room was disgusting. We spent $500 a night to be in a room that had a pathway next to it that people walked by the entire time. No A/C.  No privacy. Pool was beyond gross- it was like vegas- packed, the water was cloudy and gross. People were not in any way respecting wearing masks while on the property. The in room dining restaurants were open, but only like 5 items available, we had to door dash our meals. The beach was so crowded it was unusable. Ive stayed here before and had a great time, and even had booked 2 rooms for myself and my family over the Christmas holiday, but after my stay last weekend I am going to cancel. So disappointed- this used to be my favorite hotel and now I will likely never return.

I've never complained about anywhere I've stayed before, but I feel the need to share my experience. My best friend and I stayed here three weeks ago for a little staycation and were looking forward to it based on the rave reviews and of course the luxury expected with what we paid. I don't think I've ever been so disappointed in my life. First and foremost, the staff was a bit rude at first, but I'm going to blame that on COVID seeing on how things are a bit all over due to the pandemic. Fine.  What surprised me most is what happened after check-in. We get to our room to find that not only is the sole luxury the ocean-front balcony, but that there was absolutely no air-conditioning. At first we thought it was broken because there was a thermostat as old as my great-grandfather

I read the reviews Of the dates rooms and I was expecting it. My $600 a night room (on special) with resort fee and parking and taxes on top is very dated and dirty. But honestly that‚Äôs ok. I am here for the view and to relax on my honeymoon. We checked in yesterday. The view is pretty awesome. The hotel is overall being safe. The pool is unusable because it is so crowded. We are told a bread of time the hotel had beach chairs and towel and valet service so we did not bring beach chairs. They beach chairs are pretty much dining table chairs with no recline. No service on the beach. The worst part of the stay is the service at the hotel and that is why we are checking out early. At one PM yesterday we requested robes, water glasses, coffee. Fours requests later at 8 :05 we

Summary Heading: Breakfast + view + over the top service= Expect me to return soon!
Summary: Wow! This place is hands down first class! The view is to die for! My friend and I were waited on by the fabulous Jhoana who made sure we were attended to perfectly! We went for breakfast and ordered the Ay Dios Mio Burrit0 (I think that's what it was called) and the french toast! YUMMMMMMM! The burrito comes with these mouth-watering potatoes and a generous side of salsa and guacamole for your burrito! You leave feeling fulfilled but not the yucky full feeling which I hate. I cannot recommend this place enough! Ooo might I add that the coffee is fantastic just as well! Don't think twice about coming, just come and see/taste for yourself!

We have come back many times And every single trip is absolutely amazing and filled with memories that will last a lifetime. This is Such a unique place and somewhere we truly cherish and cannot wait to comeback to every single year. The staff are fantastic and the property one-of-a-kind.

Highly recommend if the price is right. We loved our monday-friday summer stay. The location was perfect and the staff is amazing. On site beach access open til 10pm. Dozens of other nearby tidal pools and beaches. Dog friendly! No AC, which was fine because there is an adjustable ceiling fan. Bed was comfy and room was clean. Covid safer vacation choice, and so happy we spent our week at Surf and Sand!

Masks and modifications? Yes. Stellar experience? Still a yes! Waking up to the sound of crashing waves is one of my favorite things about this hotel. But the list continues with beach butler service, excellent masseuse at the spa (Brielle), heated pool, Splashes restaurant, multiple beach access points, and pretty much everything else. In room bathrooms could use a total gut remodel one day but that‚Äôs being extra picky. If you have small children, ask for the tent setup to surprise your little ones. There are also many cute dogs staying on the property; it is very pet friendly.

Where to begin? My hubby and I wanted to get away to celebrate our anniversary. The Surf and Sand did not let us down. From our arrival- reception was warm and genuine, walking the property, staff was helpful in directing us to where we needed to go. Room service was prompt, bell boy and valet were courteous. Dining at Splashes was a treat. Our server David was outstanding. He was down to earth, engaged with all his guests, made recommendations from the menu. The food was delicious and flavorful - I ordered the scallops and husband ordered the bone in prime beef.  The resort had bases covered to ensure COVID safety. Hand sanitizer stations all over, they provided extra masks and gloves at check in, stair wells dedicated to either going upstairs or downstairs.  My husband visited

After reading reviews of the lack of enforcement around COVID,we cancelled. We be stayed recently at other resorts and have had no issues. If you value your customers safety, and health this would seem like something you would want to address especially if it‚Äôs consistently being brought to your attention. They also don‚Äôt have air conditioning. Fine if it‚Äôs 75, but if the temp is higher it‚Äôs miserable. That being said, we have stayed here in the past, great location, great restaurants but overall the resort needs a refresh.

Summary Heading: It pains me to say this...
Summary: This is no longer my favorite hotel...sadly not even one of my favorites after my most recent stay. As others have mentioned, there is NO A/C which usually is not a problem but last week it was a major problem as temps were in the 90s and the room was so humid with no cross ventilation possible. Fans were available but they provided virtually no relief. The hotel really needs to invest in A/C or at least in better fans!  But the bigger issue was that there was no enforcement of Covid policies. Signs were posted indicating the need for masks in public areas and one-way direction on the stairs. All the staff, but only about half the guests complied. The pool area was a Covid seiche pool. PACKED each of the four days we were here!  (And the "no saving chairs" policy was not
Manager Response: Hello Ms. To:  Thank you for recently staying at Surf & Sand.  As our loyal guest, we regret that we did not meet your expectations during this stay.   We agree that the lack of air conditioning can sometimes be problematic and we are presently working on rectifying the issue.  Althoughtwe strive to follow the mandated Covid-19 protocols; it is difficult to do so at all times.  And, yes, the lack of amenities in the rooms is also due Covid requirements.  Hopefully, you will be able to return to Surf & Sand in the future when we return to "normlacy." These are, indeed, trying times. Please call upon us for any needed assisstance in ensuring a pleasant stay in the future.   Warm regards,

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed at the Surf and Sand many many times over the years, so I decided to make it the first place to go relax since the pandemic. Hoping to have a relaxing stay in the room most of the time, since I‚Äôm still not comfortable going around crowds, this did NOT happen.  Check-in was good, my room was ready thankfully as I just had a long drive from Northern CA escaping the fires in my hometown, and it was past 4 pm which is check- in time anyway. For some reason our bags took a very long time as well as room service, but the resort was busier than I‚Äôve ever seen it so I didn‚Äôt mind much.  I woke up the next day early to sit on the balcony as that is what I came for, and all I could smell was a vape pen and smoke. I am extremely sensitive to smells and have asthma, and happen
Manager Response: Hello Sunset Lover:  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. As our loyal, long time guest, we extend our sincere apologies that your stay was not as you had expected.  Your comments are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.  We strive to resolve the smoking issueswhich is a very difficult task, even with imposing $250 fees for violations.  Again, our apologies.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in cooler weather so that these issues will be alleviated.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future so that we are able to accommodate all of  your needs.  Stay safe and well!

Summary: Rare HOT August night in California,  i would have NEVER booked a $700 room with NO Air Conditioning.  Normally not an issue with cool California nights.   Unfortunately,  none of the rooms have cool air.  Certainly something to note on a hot night. Otherwise beautiful room.
Manager Response: Hello Cindy:  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay.  You are correct in that the lack of air conditioning is problematic during hot periods.  We look forward to your return when it is cooler and you are able to enjoy your time with us.  Please reach out for any needed  assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: No AC, not good when heat wave and humid
Summary: Everyone was very nice at the hotel, but even though our room was oceanfront, we couldn‚Äôt sleep from the humidity and hot night during this heatwave since the rooms don‚Äôt have AC. No one told us this, so after only sleeping 2 hours that night, had to leave to find a hotel with AC. Smaller older hotel. Waves super loud at night with doors open, which some might like, but didn‚Äôt help sleepless night. The high price doesn‚Äôt match what you get. If this was a less expensive hotel then I would understand- but with these prices, it‚Äôs not worth it.  Manager was very generous taking items off our bill to compensate for inconvenience. Great unobstructed view of the ocean though.
Manager Response: Hello   Thank you for recently staying at Surf & Sand.  We appreciate your feedback which is shared with our entire management team.  We regret that we did not meet your expectations and realize that during the summer months the lack of air conditioning is problematic.   We hope to rectify the issue in the foreseeable future.  Thank you also for the compliments of our associates.  Hopefully, you will be able to return at a cooler time of year when the resort is less busy and crowded.  Warm regards

Summary: My mother, 12 year old son and I have had a great stay at Surf Sands. The staff has honestly been INCREDIBLE. I travel a lot to Asia, where service is almost a religion, and I can honestly say the team at Surf Sands is at that level. Every interaction has been positive and enhances our time here. Can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: Hello!  And we cannot wait for you to come back!!  Thank you for letting us know we met your needs and the service our associates provided.  Please call upon us when your travels bring you back to lovely Laguna Beach and Surf & Sand!  Stay safe & well!

Summary: There were parts that I really loved about the Surf & Sand, and others notsomuch.   I loved the view from the room and from the restaurant. So relaxing. I also loved that they have staff on the beach to set up chairs and umbrellas for you. It takes all the bad parts of going to the beach out of the equation. I also appreciated that every staff member I came in contact with was warm & friendly.   Overall, I think the resort is far overdue for a major renovation. The outdoor furniture seems very dated and worn. The chairs on our balcony all had broken woven fiber and just looked sad. The furnishings in the room had also seen far better days. There are also no outlets near the bed, which made charging phones overnight difficult.   My major complaint is the lack of air conditioning
Manager Response: Hello Last Girl:  Thank you for choosing Surf & Sand on your recent stay, and for the compliments of our location and associates.  Your comments are valued and shared with our entire management team.  Please know that major improvements to the resort are in the planning stages which  we hope to be able to further our efforts in this very difficult time. We would enjoy having you return in the near future when it is cooler and we are better able to provide a perfect stay.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Excellent Getaway to the San & Surf w/Waves splashing right outside your balcony!
Summary: We loved the hotel for a Covid Getaway. The rooms are literally right above the surf and the sand, with the waves splashing right outside your balcony!  Be aware that the rooms have No A/C, but one didn't need it after all.  The pool deck and patio is great, but gets crowded early.  The food was just OK; the menus are limited and just average.  We ate off property every chance we could for dinner.  The staff and service were incredible.  The pool service exceeded our expectations, despite negative comments by others.  The phones were always answered promptly and happily-despite negative comments by others.  Housekeeping daily is available, but only if you ask for it.  They have a great service by Text Message where one can ask for anything, reserve anything by Text Message, or
Manager Response: Hello Primo!  Thank you so much for choosing Surf & Sand for your recent stay, and for your compliments of all the resort has to offer.  We appreciate knowing we exceeded  your needs and look very forward to your return.  Please reach out to us directly in booking a future stay.  Stay safe  & well!

Summary: This Hotel is beautiful. The staff went above and beyond to ensure our comfort. Social distancing measures were also impressive. The hotel provided Masks upon check in and hand sanitizer stations throughout the property. Our family will be back again.
Manager Response: Hello Nicole:  Thank you for your compliments of Surf & Sand.  Please be assured that we value and appreciate your feedback, which is shared with our entire management team.  Please call upon us in the future when you are able to return.  We look forward to assisting you.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Extortionate price for one of the worst experiences.
Summary: The view is gorgeous, and the beach was beautiful and that was it. The carpet was soggy and wet, which is alarming especially during Covid-19. Makes you wonder about their vigilance on cleanliness. The pool was tiny and completely crowded. The bed was uncomfortable, and the sofa bed had springs that dug into my children.  They didn't get to sleep well either. We couldn't wait to go home, which defeats the purpose of a staycation.
Manager Response: Hello Excursion:  We regret that your recent stay at Surf & Sand was not as you expected and deserve. Please be assured that we strive to provide exceptional service for our guests; however,  failed to do so in this instance.  Hopefully, you will be able to return when we return to some sense of normalcy in this very difficult and unprecedented time. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in ensuring a better stay in the future.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Given a dirty/uncleaned room during COVID.
Summary: I was given a dirty room that the hotel accidentally marked as clean. This was during COVID when hotels should have the highest cleaning standards. When i complained they told me they would upgrade me free of charge. The issue is that they actually tried to downgrade me. When i explained that to the front desk staff and show her on the surf and sand website that she was in fact down grading me, she became very upset and rude.  Once I finally received my room for the second time, hours later, it had lots of hair and food crumbs in the room. Melted chocolate on the table. A metal piece broke off of the bathroom sliding door and hit me in the head. The manager comp'd half my bill. They should have done a lot more. I have stayed at this hotel dozens of times if not more. It used to
Manager Response: Hello:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Our sincere apologies for the unfortunate circumstances you experienced and the miscommunication regarding your room type and the housekeeping issues.  This is certainly not the type of service you deserve and expect. Please be assured that we value your comments, which are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.  We are hopeful that you will be able to return in the near future when we are better able to meet your needs. Please call upon us directly.   Warm regards,

Summary: Room wasn't ready. Checked in only at 530 pm. 1st room smelled like cigarettes. Room didn't have an A/C. It is not mentioned anywhere that the hotel guestrooms are not equipped with an A/C. A 4 star hotel that charges 700 a night should have AC in ALL rooms. Staff and Manager didn't do a thing to resolve the issues.
Manager Response: Hello Matan:  Our sincere apologies that your recent stay at Surf & Sand was not as expected. Please be assured that we are working on improvements for the entire resort which will include the air conditioning issue.  Please contact us directly in the future for any needed assistance.  Hopefully, you will be able to return at a cooler time when the resort is less busy.    Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Surf n Sand Does Not Disappoint
Summary: 5 Star location 3 star rooms. But we will always return. The location and reliable weather make it a summer must. Walk to great restaurants. The rooms are a bit tired but not bad. The staff service overall was excellent.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for sharing your great experience at Surf & Sand during your recent stay. We are always pleased to learn that we met (and exceeded) your expectations. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Stayed 2 nts last weekend. At first sight we were shocked at how under maintained the property was. It hasn't seen a coat of paint in years. The outdoor rugs in hallways were weathered and filthy. Our room was basically clean but not everything had been wiped down based on their COVID promise of "clean and safe". No water or drinking cups, no robes, no ice bucket, no coffee. You have to ask for these items and wait for delivery. They don't tell you this at check in.  After the 1st night I received an email from my credit card company asking to verify a $144 charge from the hotel. It wasn't us so it was denied. The front desk wasn't able to tell me what it was for at that time or even at check out. We also had another persons drink added to our tab at the pool bar on Saturday.

This hotel was highly recommended to us.  Staff was pleasant, yet uneventful greeting in small lobby. Room was outdated but beautiful view of ocean. Ocean sounds loud at night with doors open, but I found that amazing.  Shower and faucets leaked.  Balconies so close to each other that we were bothered by wet clothes dripping in room above and cigarette and cigar smoke in rooms to the side of us.  For price, I would not do again. Beautiful, but now very small, beach. Great location.  Ok for a one time visit if you get bargain rate, but definitely not a ‚Äúdo again‚Äù at the $700+ a night range. Yikes.  Way overpriced.
Manager Response: Hello Voyage:  Thank you for recently staying at Surf & Sand.  Our apologies that you experienced a  less-than-perfect stay.  Please be assured that your comments are taken very seriously and are shared with our entire management team.  This is a very difficult, unusual and unprecedented time.  Hopefully you will be able to return in the future when we are better able to provide the type of service you expect and deserve.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: This resort by far is the most magical place as you can feel Hawaii and Italy depending on where you stand.  What makes this place even more magical are the people that work here. Everyone from check in to the pool and by the ocean service are happy to be there.  Everyone makes you feel at home by the way they greet you from the moment you enter.  The property and room itself is also so beautiful with perfect lighting, perfect sheets and everything luxury,
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for being our recent guest and for letting us know how much you enjoyed Surf & Sand!  We appreciate your compliments of our associates, location and accommodations.  Hopefully, your travels will bring you back to lovely Laguna Beach and Surf & Sand.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: The property came highly rated by a friend. I travel all over the world for business and pleasure. For my birthday, my friend any I devoting escape from LA. Thought we‚Äôd try surf and sand. $600/night. Horrible service, rude check in, room is outdated. Beach access and view is lovely. Not worth it.

Summary Heading: Hotel in desperate need of a remodel!!!
Summary: The hotel is in desperate need of a remodel.  Carpet, chairs and headboard were worn and had stains.  Closet doors and cabinets look so bad.  The wood is painted and cheap looking. Bathrooms need to be remodeled.  For such an expensive hotel, the rooms looked like a motel 6.  View and location are the only thing going for this hotel

When i ariived staff was very polite Everything is organized and in order  Plenty of help Clean and well kept This place is Great   the view is oustanding  I forgot i was in California Beautiful view  I will return several times !

Great location, beautiful pool, very professional staff and gorgeous room. We moved here after staying at the Pacific edge and we were absolutely disgusted and horrified by the condition of the rooms, the staff, the restaurant, and the absolutely disgusting conditions and also how my car got damaged.

I hadn't stayed at this hotel in over 10 years and wow shame on me for not reading the reviews before I booked this hotel.   The only thing this hotel has going for it is the location to the beach! I am one that loves the sound of the ocean! But besides that everything else about this hotel is awful.  Rooms are dated with bathrooms that are tiny. The shower was only 4 feet by 4 feet and you couldn't practically move without hitting the wall and or the door. Mold on tile and towels that have seen their day. For the amount of money, they charge it shouldn't be this way. I complained about the rooms and of course, they blamed it on COVID.  The last time I heard construction has not stopped for a single day due to COVID.  Property needs a major remodel. Don't spend your hard-earned

Hotel on the beach & excellent food and service at their restaurant Splashes.  Staff are great with Covid protocol with masks and gloves.    However, rooms are very dated with no AC, bathrooms super small with locker room showers and mold on the tiles, carpets smell moldy/dog & no one enforces guests wearing masks.    Hotel rooms need major remodel.  Benefit is being directly on the ocean.  I love the sound of the ocean but it‚Äôs loud and if you close your sliding Glass door you can‚Äôt hear the ocean, dogs/kids on the beach but then the room gets hot (no ac just overhead fan) and smelly.

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay on Beach Front Resort
Summary: This hotel had it all. If you are looking for a nice quiet stay on a private beach front resort this it. Request ocean front view. You will hear the waves hit the hotel. You will feel like you are sleeping directly on the beach. The staff was extremely professional and nice.

Went for an anniversary getaway and it was AMAZING! The rooms are gorgeous, spacious, and super clean! Views are incredible, food delicious, staff is nice, and there are tons of sanitizing dispensers everywhere! Great great drinks at the pool as well! 5 stars all around!

Summary Heading: 20th Anniverary at The Surf and Sand
Summary: We were able to check in early to our room which was a plus.  When we opened the door, the view was breathtaking - the ocean was right in front of us and the room itself was lovely! Then we saw the table - there was a bottle of chilled champagne and a plate of chocolate covered strawberries! Last, a beautiful card welcoming us and congratulating us on our 20th anniversary! What an fitting start to this milestone occasion.  The rest of the time spent was wonderful, the pool, the food, the service and the beach was top notch - can't say enough good things about The Surf & Sand and definitely will plan to return!

Summary Heading: Great Location, Dated Hotel and NO AIR CONDITIONING
Summary: Please do your research!  This hotel is in a great location, over looking the beach.  But...If you don't mind sleeping in a room with no air condition and are forced to leave the doors and drapes open all night be prepared.  The ocean is very loud and you will be awake at sunrise, if you are even able to sleep at all due to the lack of cool air.

Summary Heading: Not a resort, definitely a hotel/motel.
Summary: Great location. Walking distance to everything Laguna has to offer. Waves, pool, view are unbeatable.  Hotel is dated, and needs a desperate makeover. The use of the term "resort" is misleading, and for the price, better value can be found elsewhere. If you do stay, request a higher floor. Access to lower level rooms will make you question the money spent, and dampen your experience.

This was a much needed trip after all the current affairs.! I'm so glad I found SURF & SAND RESORT on Instagram! It was the perfect maiden voyage after social distancing! We went to celebrate my birthday, and I'm so glad we did! Every precaution was taken, during our stay! I felt safe & we can't wait to return!!! The staff met, and exceeded every need! Perfect beach getaway!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, stunning views and comfortable room
Summary: Be sure to eat at least one dinner at their restaurant. Fantastic view and food.  We liked that the bath tub was right at the room entrance so that we could wash the beach sand off before going into the rest of the room

Summary Heading: Beautiful ocean front views all around whole resort.
Summary: Enjoyed ourselves this past weekend. Walked into the room and the view is absolutely jaw dropping! Breathtaking really!! The beach was right around our building, round the corner and down some stairs. Loved that in avoiding people. Pool was heated and not crowded early in AM or at night. Had breakfast at Splashes restaurant. Ate outdoors by a heating lamp with again glorious view of the ocean. Food was delicious and staff was very nice! Bell service attendants were very kind and attentive each time we needed them for anything. Not sure if she was the manager of the hotel or what but the smug older lady at the front desk counter was kinda nasty nice to be honest. Wish I got her name. Other than that everyone was genuinely nice and helpful. This will be a quick get away I‚Äôll

I‚Äôve stayed here at least 10 times. It doesn‚Äôt get better than the Surf and Sand!  I have traveled the world and stayed in plenty of five-star resorts. The view, the service, the food and the staff are unparalleled. They treat us like family every time we return. I‚Äôve never heard the word ‚Äúno‚Äù at this resort. If you need something and they don‚Äôt count have it the concierge will go get it for you. If your kids are on the beach and dont have swim shirts, Diane will show up with half of the store because she didn‚Äôt know what sizes to bring. The food is spectacular! Try the paella and the octopus. Staying a while, ask the bartender to cork you your own bottle and keep it behind the bar for you. The employees are happy to be there and working and are looking to exceed your every

A place by the ocean, has a beach access and a lounge area by the pool if you want to chill by the sound of the waves. Friendly staff and rooms well designed and comfortable beds. Everything is a walking distance plus shops are near by, plus there‚Äôs a ton of things to do around here

I found Pearl of the Pacific this hotel years ago and I DO NOT stay anywhere ELSE.This resort has it all. Beautiful grounds and rooms and no crossing the street or having to figure out how to get to the shoreline...just open your sliding door and you are there. I‚Äôve stayed at the. Mark Hopkins in S.F. And the Intercontentel in S.D..In My Humble Opinion there is nothing that compares to what this Resort has to offer...Great Staff ,too!

Surf and Sand is a great hotel located on the beach. All ocean facing rooms with on the sand access. The pool is facing the beach and a great atmosphere. Great staff, amenities and great menu. It's definitely not cheap, but worth the price.

Welcoming/friendly staff; falling asleep to the waves; enjoying the comfortably heated pool; walking along the beach; walking to local restaurants...the reasons to revisit are endless!! It‚Äôs pricey, but well worth it and likely my go-to local vacation spot.  I can‚Äôt WAIT to go again.

My family, 2 elementary-age children and my wife and I were greeted and sought after with impeccable and perfectly respectful service from the time we checked in until the time we checked out.  We were sad to depart.  However, we will surely be back again!

Stayed in a Surfside room and the view was breathtaking. Loved coffee on the balcony at sunrise and a glass of wine at sunset. Amazing staff!  Fabulous restaurant!  Close walk to shops, trolley and other beach areas-Crescent Bay Beach, Victoria Beach and Heisler Park, for example.

Summary Heading: Best Rest and Relaxation and Surf
Summary: The Surf and Sand has been a favorite place for us for 25 years. They keep up the quality and amenities. Beautiful location. Beautiful rooms.  Oceanfront and wonderful sound of surf. We tried out a new model room. It‚Äôs going to be great. We‚Äôll be back again.
Manager Response: Hello - thank you for your glowing review of Surf & Sand and letting us know how much you enjoyed your stay.  We look very forward to having you back with us.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards

Summary: This place was extraordinary. I was a first-time guest this week. The staff is fun and low-key, the food is amazing, the room was amazing (Surfside King), the beach is great (dogs allowed), not a single hiccup. Two weeks ago I stayed at Montage which was three times the price and nothing worked properly. The only difference between this place and the really expensive resorts is that, here, you put the towel over the poolside lounge chair yourself.  (Gasp!)  I can't wait to go back.

I was fortunate to stay at the Surf and Sand Resort for work. The staff were extremely attentive. The food was top notch. The rooms were amazing - beautiful views of the ocean. I definitely recommend staying here if you can.

We  chose Surf and Sand based upon previous reviews and our experience exceeded our expectations. The entire staff is extremely customer-focused which created a very positive four night stay.   Our room was an 8th floor corner king in the tower as booked and the size and views were totally adequate. Quite the beach view with free sunsets.
