Yes, the room decor seems a bit dated, but that did not affect us negatively, but I would hope that the bathroom area woodwork near the floor could be cleaned and repainted.  The ocean lulled us to sleep each evening and we encountered no outside nor adjacent room sounds. We seemed to be at the end of the housekeeping schedule and had to request service one day after returning to our room after a day of exploring.  Within ten minute of the

I came here for my 10th anniversary and was more than willing to pay the high price thinking it was going to be a luxurious hotel. We were so dissatisfied. The pool was closed for an event for most of our stay.  This was not disclosed to us when we made the reservation. We also had a room that was small with no ocean view and only a tiny window. It must have been a storage closet at one time.  There are so many other nice hotels in the area for a fraction of the price. I would have been better off at the holiday inn in downtown Laguna. If you want luxury there are also a ton of options nearby. I would never come here again. Overall just not worth the splurge!!!

Every February after my husbands trade show in Anaheim we spend 4 or 5 days in Laguna Beach.  It‚Äôs our favorite trip.  Since we discovered Surf and Sand we will always stay here.  From the comfortable chairs on the deck there are stunning sunset views without ever leaving your room.

Really nice hotel - right on the beach/water - beautiful views from the rooms - all water nothing else. Room was very nice - The staff was very friendly. I was there for a business meeting the meeting rooms wre very nice and the food was very good.

Surf & Sand is a gem set right on the sand in Laguna Beach. When in your suite it feels like you're on the balcony of a private yacht sailing on the ocean you're so close. The sound of the sea is divine, morning breakfast in your room is a must. Room service is the best anywhere: variety, hot and fresh, service is timely and friendly and best of all you can enjoy while sea gazing watching the comings and goings of paddle boarders and surfers. The hotel is quiet but activity can easily be found at the pool, bar and restaurant. There is a lovely spa and garden which is surprising at a property this size and so close to the beach. Where this property lacks in size and "newness" it makes up for in gracious service, incredible cuisine, spacious suites and a location that can't be

My husband and I love this place! The resort is beautiful, clean and right on the beach. The staff was over the top and made our stay so wonderful and memorable! We enjoy Laguna and have stayed at the Ritz and Montage and this place ranks right up there with them with better beach access and closer to town. Recommend Surf & Sand 100%!

Love it!  I have stayed here many times and it never disappoints.  Staff is excellent and the views can‚Äôt be beat. I highly recommend this resort to anyone. I stay here every time I am in Laguna Beach.  Highly recommended

My husband and I had such a relaxing and romantic stay and the Surf & Sand for Valentine's Day. The room could not have been more perfect - with breathtaking views of the ocean. We watched the dolphins play while eating breakfast in the provided robes. What a treat! To make things even better, the staff went above and beyond to make our stay fabulous. They were friendly, accommodating, and helpful. Sandra, the concierge, organized hiking, dinner, and recommended the best places to go dancing at night! She also was so thoughtful. Each time we saw her she not only remembered our names, but also asked about how the day she had planned was going. It was clear that she truly cared that we enjoyed our stay, which made the whole experience that much more special. We are from San

My husband and I were in San Diego for a conference and decided to extend our visit to include Laguna Beach. After reading about The Surf and Sand Resort on your site, we booked a room for three nights. It was all we could have hoped. Our room, with its beautiful views and sounds of the surf, was so peaceful. Being able to walk everywhere or take the free trolley was a joy.  The staff was friendly and accommodating, caring for our every need. In particular, Sandra and Diane at the Concierge Desk were exceptional. From Sandra‚Äôs perfect dinner reservations on a busy holiday weekend to helpful advice and sparkling conversation from both, they were a sheer delight. Their lovely, lively, charming presence made our experience memorable.

With around 50 TripAdvisor hotel reviews previously posted, I generally leave fairly positive reviews.  However, our stay at the Surf & Sand Resort in Laguna Beach was only "average", and I do not suspect we will ever book a room there again.  We decided to visit Laguna during the extended President's Day weekend.  Obviously, room rates are a bit higher than usual for that time, and the hotel was seemingly at full occupancy when we arrived.  Check-in was quick and efficient.  The staff at Surf & Sand were all very engaging and personable.  However, the negatives of our experiences were significant.  To begin, we always prefer and request a "high room".  Obviously, with the hotel near full occupancy, I did not have any deep expectations.  Nevertheless, the check-in staff

We had (only) two nights here, and certainly wish we could have stayed longer. Our oceanfront room in the tower was enormous!  We left the sliding door to the balcony open all night, to hear the waves crashing in the beach. This is truly an exceptional place.   TIP:  The lobby is on the fifth floor, and the Towers go from 1 to 8 (or so).  So you might actually be going down in the elevator to get to your Tower room. This is due to the steep slope down to the water.   TIP 2:  the bar has blankets if you need to stay warm in the evening.

Our family has shared many wonderful moments at Surf and Sand resort.  We adore the casual yet beautiful atmosphere and the exceptional staff.  Such a special place, it's worth going back to year after year.

... otherwise my stay was wonderful!  Pros: Vast ocean views.  Spacious balcony with comfortable furniture Very comfortable bed with lots of good pillows Helpful staff.  Prompt & courteous valet staff Beautiful property & grounds Wonderful pool with plenty of chaises. The hot tub could be bigger, though.   Cons: The lack of outlets for devices. I asked the bellman who delivered my luggage & he didn‚Äôt know where they were & pointed out some standard outlets behind the furniture.  It wasn‚Äôt until my last day that I found them underneath the shelf by the large mirror by the table. Completely hidden from view, and nothing near the bed.  The dated clock with just one outlet is not sufficient.    Very limited refrigerator space.  Although I was told it was ok to move the contents

Summary Heading: Surf and Sand Resort came up short
Summary: The stay started off great, but as we stayed a few more days the overall experience was lowered by inaccuracies. We were put in a room that was already occupied after extending our stay and after making our way to our new room they forgot to send our bags, we had to call and follow up sometime after for our bags to be brought to our room. The robes had to be brought to our room as they weren't in there at check in. I feel that for the money those things shouldn't happen, the hotel is in a great location and have great views but there is alot of opportunity with un-knowledgeable staff and  ensuring guest are accommodated properly. My wife left a bit upset, which was the opposite of what this stay was for.

Summary Heading: Clean and close to the beach
Summary: We booked last minute and with not many choices in our budget I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel. Our room #14 was a bit worn and dated but clean and everything was functional. It was roomy and had a full kitchen and dishes, coffee pot (free coffee was also available in the office all day). The bathroom could use a fan but the window opened to air out after a shower. There was a large closet with hangers and a chest of drawers and night stand for storage.  There were some used beach chairs and umbrella at our disposal. The pool area was clean and lots of chairs and loungers. The huge draw back for me was the cigarette smoking. I do believe my husband and I were the only non smoker at the hotel. Even the care taker/owner smoked. They would sit outside their rooms night
Manager Response: Hello That's a Given:  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay.  Unfortunately, it appears that you may not have stayed at Surf & Sand at this time, as several of the items you mention we do not offer our  guests "we do not offer a room #14, full kitchen and dishes, free coffee in the office all day, no owner/care taker on property at all, used beach chairs and umbrella at our disposal." We wanted you to be aware and possibly offer your review for the correct property where they offered you these amenities.   If we are able to assist you in the future, please reach out.  Thank you.

Summary: Run, do not walk, if you are planning a visit to Orange County.  I loved this resort.  I chose it while on a business trip for its location.  I definitely will return I hope many times.  My room was right on the ocean, my preference. Spoiler alert: the ocean is LOUD; if you don't want to hear a loud ocean, request a room far away from the ocean.  Note: some rooms require a lot of stairs to access, though not all.  Here again, make your preferences/needs known when making your reservation.  Net message: Surf & Sand is a winner!  Splashes their award winning restaurant is fantastic! Staff helpful.  If you don't stay here when in Orange County you are missing something special.  No need to spend more $$$$ at the Montage down the road.  And I am not related to anyone who works
Manager Response: Hello Dinah J:  Thank you so very much for the high rating of Surf & Sand and your compliments of our location, restaurant, and our staff.  We are pleased to know how much you enjoyed your stay and for letting other traveler's know what to expect when staying with us.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please let us know how we would be able to assist you.  Best Wishes in 2020!

Summary Heading: The quality only starts with the views
Summary: Laguna Beach has a reputation for arts, great food, and relaxed atmosphere...And right there amongst it is the Surf and Sand Resort. Without a doubt amongst the best hotel experiences I have ever had...The staff have a goal of making sure that your stay is comfortable and memorable...Never have I experienced the level of service from the valet attendants, Bell staff, Front Desk attendants, food and Beverage staff and even maid service as I have during this stay. 5 Stars all the way...And I haven't even mentioned the room quality and the views from every room.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you so very much for your high rating of Surf & Sand and the compliments of all that we have to offer.  Your kind words are valued and appreciated by all of our associates, of whom we are very proud. Hopefully, your travels will bring you back to lovely Laguna Beach and Surf & Sand.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance. We look very forward to assisting you in the future.  Best Wishes in 2020!

Summary: Unbelievable view of the ocean.  The waves crashing on the beach lulled us to sleep at night. Super comfy mattress and pillows.  Staff were polite and helpful.  Can walk to downtown Laguna shops and restaurants
Manager Response: Hello NorthStar!  We are so pleased to know that you enjoyed Surf & Sand this past weekend. Thank you for taking the time to let us and other travelers know what to expect when our guests.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Warm regards in 2020!

Summary: Such a nice hotel. They really have an attention to detail and the location is amazing. It‚Äôs pricey but worth it if you are trying to make it a special trip. My husband and I got a night away for our birthdays with no kids and it was wonderful. Definitely would stay again

Summary: Surf and Sand is awesome and I highly recommend it. The location is tremendous and the staff is tremendously efficient and friendly from check in to check out and the valet service is spot on. Great time all the way.
Manager Response: Hello Charlie:  We are so pleased to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us for Super Bowl. Thank you for your high rating and the compliments of the resort location and associates. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Warm regards in 2020!

Summary: This a perfect place to get away, couldn't ask for a more friendly staff and beautiful grounds. Restaurants are great. Rooms are very clean. The sunsets and views are beautiful. We have never been disappointed in all the times we have stayed here,
Manager Response: Hello Howard:  We are so pleased to know that you enjoyed another stay at Surf & Sand for your birthday. Best in 2020!

Summary: The surf n sand is my husbands most favorite place in the world to stay.  We have stayed here several times and I have to say that we are never disappointed with our stay.  The hotel is situated on a pristine white sandy and non crowded beach and the most glorious views of the sea.  Today we were delighted to see a pod of dolphins near to shore making our stay extra special.  The staff at this hotel particularly Ali and Sandra are just so professional and helpful and really do go the extra mile to make your stay as comfortable as possible.  We ate at splashes the restaurant in the hotel and again service was impeccable and food delicious.  I have to say that Rodriguez really was a very attentive server. As always we had a lovely stay.  Can not recommend this hotel enough.
Manager Response: Hello Jeremy:  Thank you so very much for your high rating of Surf & Sand and the compliments of our location and service.  We always appreciate knowing we met all of your needs and thank you also for the accolades of Ali & Sharon - true assets of the resort.   We hope to have you back with us in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: For those who love the waves
Summary: Beautiful hotel towers over the shoreline.  Waves were so loud they provide ear plugs!  Can't imagine who would choose this hotel then not want to hear the sea.  This is a luxury hotel with beautifully appointed rooms but not stuffy in the slightest.  Everyone who worked there was very professional, welcoming and friendly.  Great morning group workout on the beach is included.  Easy walk to town and many great restaurants.  Loved it!
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for taking the time to let us and other travelers know how much you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Summary Heading: Amazing Service - Concierge is great, and Barbara the hotel operator goes above and beyond!
Summary: I rarely leave reviews on Tripadvisor but Surf and Sand deserves a review. This is simply an amazing place. The rooms are excellent and the facilities are top notch. If you just want to enjoy some "beach time", this is your place. You can relax at the pool and just walk down a set of stairs to an amazing beach.  I want to specifically call out Barbara at the hotel. She was so amazing answering questions leading up to our trip. She went above and beyond, was kind and helpful, and truly made our stay exceptional!
Manager Response: Hello Brian:  Thank you so much for the high rating of Surf & Sand, your compliments of the resort, our location and service. Summary: So walking under this place in laguna I have wanted to stay here for years. Finally we did it. First of all let me say that stuff is great, check in and out check was smooth and valet was great. The rooms however are pretty dated, they have a dusty smell and if you run your finger over the counter or tables there is dust that comes off.  If you do not like goat cheese there are not a lot of things on the menu you will like for room service it seems like they are really really into goat cheese.  I don‚Äôt think I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Alex:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay. Please be assured that we value your input and take your comments very seriously. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.   Best in 2020!

Summary: The Surf and Sand Resort is on the beach with unobstructed panoramic ocean views. The waves are so loud  from the room that the hotel provides ear plugs if you have a problem sleeping from the noise. Looking down from the patio, you can see ocean and beach in both directions. This is not a big chain hotel so  don‚Äôt expect many people to check you in. There is usually only one person at the check-in/check-out desk so expect to wait. I found the service very good  and most of the staff were friendly with a few exceptions. Splashes Restaurant and the bar also overlook the beach and the food is good but expensive as expected. There is also a beautiful pool and jacuzzi overlooking the beach. This is an exceptional unique boutique hotel and I will return soon.
Manager Response: Hello Mike!  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay over the weekend! Summary: We love Surf and Sand. It is always our favorite staycation. When you first enter the room and see the earplugs by the bed, you might think that it is a joke... but you might need them. The sound of the waves can be so loud that it wakes you up. It is FABULOUS.

Summary: pros:  The bottom line is that almost every room faces the ocean And the views are extraordinary. The sound of the waves all night is beyond belief. The rooms are beautiful. Staff were excellent.    cons:  no spa services are included in the hotel room fee.
Manager Response: Hello - thank you for the compliments of Surf & Sand and for letting us know you enjoyed your stay.  On a separate note, did you mean to give us a higher rating? Summary: We booked a last minute trip to Laguna for a trip after Christmas.  This was our first trip to Laguna Beach and wow what a great experience. She helped us get to La Jolla...which was awesome!  The Aggies were playing a football game while we were there...we were worried we wouldn't have a good place to watch it.  She recommended Avila's (which you can walk to) and it was perfect.  Lots of TVs, great service, and great food.  We went during HH and got some great deals!  Make

Summary: Right on the beach, if you get lucky, right on top of the beach. Seemed like every spot had a great view. Rooms were set up to take advantage of the fabulous scenery. Great place to unwind with wine on the patio.
Manager Response: Hello Joanne:  Thank you for the high rating of the resort and for letting us know how much you enjoyed Surf & Sand.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near  future.  Best in 2020!

Please call upon us for  any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Still one of my top five favorite hotels in the world!
Summary: I have been coming to this property for over ten years and every time it gets better and better. The service from Carmelo and Andrew, as well as the rest of the team was amazing. They took excellent care of us from the moment we arrived.  We started off in a lower Catalina suite, which was lovely, but a little dark for our taste. They worked with us and we were able to move into the two bedroom suite on the top floor, which is worth every penny! I have stayed at other hotels around the world for the same price per night and gotten a fraction of the same hotel room for the same price.  The two bedroom suite was spectacular. Almost the whole suite directly faces the ocean. There were two bedrooms and and two bathrooms, as well as a dining table and living room. Additionally, there
Manager Response: Hello Passion!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed your visit once again. As our long time, loyal guest, we value your feedback and appreciate the high rating of Surf & Sand and compliments of our location, rooms, pool, restaurant and all that we have to offer.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Happy 2020!!

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel for years. Great hotel with beautiful views. Very pretty lobby. Great restaurant. My only compliant is there was no hot water in the shower. Had to take an ice cold shower and run to a meeting.

Summary: I was not expected to stay in the area and needed a hotel last minute. The view from the room was unlike any other, directly above the water with the waves crashing underneath me. This is not an especially luxurious hotel but offers great value for the money and is in a great location.
Manager Response: Hello Wendy:  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent "last minute" stay at Surf & Sand. We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your time with us. We hope you are able to return in the near future for a longer stay. Please reach out to us for any needed assistance.  Happy 2020!!

Summary: We‚Äôre in the middle of our stay at Surf & Sand, yet I can‚Äôt wait another moment to share how much we love it here. Much has already been written about the friendly staff, and rightly so. Other highlights: Rooms are spacious, well appointed, and very clean. And we love the nightly turndown service! The pool and surrounding deck are ample in size, and the fitness center has enough variety in machines to maintain your cardio goals while traveling.   Of course the biggest draw ‚Äîwhat motivated our reservation in the 1st place‚Äî is the location. What could possibly rival unobstructed views of the Pacific Ocean...?! Bonus: the sound of waves below is both
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer:  We are so pleased to know that you are enjoying your time at Surf! Please call upon us when your travels bring you back to lovely Laguna Beach.  HAPPY 2020!!

Summary Heading: The Surf and Sand is our absolute favorite place to stay!!!!
Summary: What I  love about the hotel, other than the amazing location is the staff.  We are average, hard working people.  The staff treat us like we are royalty, and are so friendly.  We feel like it is our home away from home.  I would not stay there if they were pretentious or snooty.  They feel like a warm and loving family...so very, very accommodating!!  Best vacation ever!
Manager Response: Hello Colleen:  We are always pleased to provide you with the best service and that Surf and Sand is your "home away from home."  Thank you for the compliments of the resort, our staff and location.  We look very forward to your return to lovely Laguna Beach.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Only time for a short stay but as always it was wonderful!  Views and sound of sea (and of course courteous and attentive staff) always make this a favorite stop. If you are booking far enough in advance I would recommend a corner room as it will afford you beautiful views of sea and coastline (sparkling jewel at night). Splashes for a cocktail and an app is a must during your stay!
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for the great review of Surf & Sand and the recommendations to other travelers. We are always pleased to learn our guests enjoyed their time with us, albeit it a short visit. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future for an extended stay.  Warm Holiday Wishes!

Summary: Amazing views, great amenities and staff. We found this resort to be a fabulous location with friendly staff and everything you need. Pool,spa, and excellent restaurants. Easy access to a beautiful beach.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Holmes:  Thank you for the compliments of Surf & Sand and for the high rating of the resort. We are so pleased to know we met your expectations with "everything you need."  Please call upon us when you are able to return.  Warmest Holiday Wishes!!

Summary Heading: Luxury on the beach in Laguna
Summary: Fall asleep to the sounds of waves crashing and wake up to spectacular views of Laguna Beach. Manager Response: Hello Elizabeth:  We are so pleased to know that you enjoyed your Christmas stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for the compliments of the resort and for letting other travelers know what to expect when visiting with us.    Have a wonderful 2020!!

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a relaxing vacation!
Summary: Hotel is perfectly located on the beach and close to everything you need. Walk to wherever you want to go. Right on beach. Amazing views. Rooms are very nice. Well maintained. Fantastic but expensive restaurant. Highly recommend for a fantastic beach vacation experience!
Manager Response: Hello Recent Guest:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for the compliments of the resort that you have shared. We appreciate knowing you enjoyed your stay and we look very forward to your return.   Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Best Sleep, Best Views, Best Staff, Best Food. The Surf and Sand is the best hotel to renew and refresh in a increasingly tumultuous world. We always leave the Surf and Sand feeling we're ready for what ever the world throws at us. A real sanctuary.
Manager Response: Hello Traveler:  Thank you for sharing feedback regarding your recent stay and for the high rating of the resort. Please let us know if we may be of assistance.  Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Splashes food and service is AMAZING!
Summary: We loved staying at Surf and Sand! The food at their restaurant Splashes is incredible, and the service is even better. The manager Travis was incredibly accommodating and gracious and made our experience at the restaurant so enjoyable! Highly recommend Splashes!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed Splashes restaurant.  We always appreciate knowing that our guests had a great experience when dining with us. Thank you also for the compliments of Travis, who is a great asset of the resort. Please let us know when you are able to return.  Warm Holiday Wishes!

Summary: Incredible resort. Awesome views, great location, amazing pool and hot tub. Very friendly staff. Would definitely stay again. The valet was quick and easy to use, very friendly. The food and drink served at the pool made relaxing very easy.
Manager Response: Hello Minneapolis:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your recent stay and that we met all of your needs.  Please all upon us when you are able to return to lovely Laguna Beach and Surf & Sand.  Warm  Holiday Regards,

Summary: Arrived at the front desk. Both were open, but never attendant stay hello or offered to help, so I just chose one. I was not offered help with my three bags despite my room being at the opposite end of the property. The first room key didn't work, so I returned to front desk. The 2nd key did work, but room occupied - all belongings exposed to theft. I returned to front desk again and was directed to a different room. 3rd time was a charm. Public areas are all very well looked after. Getting on the beach you don‚Äôt even have to get your own lounger, someone comes and gets it for you. Food and drinks here are very expensive. They could just have a deposit system that gives you your money back when it‚Äôs returned, paying for it seems a bit much considering the cost to stay here. Summary: We absolutely love the Surf and Sand. The service at the beach and also at Splashes is always outstanding.  We will continue to come back year after year. Thanks Surf and Sand for being such a great memory for our Family‚Äôs Reunion!!
Manager Response: Hello Lisa:  Thank you for letting us know your family enjoyed their time at Surf & Sand once again.   We are very pleased to know we exceeded your expectations once again and look forward to your return next year.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful remaining summer season!

Summary Heading: Surf & Sand......Awesome Experience and Customer Service
Summary: If I could give 10 stars I would!  What a great resort that our family has been coming to every summer for over 50 years!  We know this property and continue to come back because of the facility, location, and customer service.  A special shout out to Pamela Hopkins, who helps us out every year, going the extra step to make sure that our stay in phenomenal, and it always is!  Thank you, Pamela, for all of your help.  The staff at the pool and beach, including Matt Heinz, the valet, who know us all personally always take special care of us, and the staff at Splashes, where the entire family spends most of their time during each day, including Sam, Roberto and all of the crew.....amazing!  What can I say, we will be back each year like we always do!   Thanks to you all.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you so very much for your flowing review, high rating of Surf & Sand and compliments of the resort. As our very loyal, long time guests, we appreciate you taking the time to special mention our associates and for letting other travelers know what to expect when they are our guests.  Please reach out for  any needed assistance for next year's stay in lovely Laguna Beach!  Have a wonderful remaining summer season!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great restaurant and bar, great service
Summary: From the rooms to the staff at every level (check in, Splashes, and esp the valet parking team) this hotel is stellar.  The location and views are of course awesome and very unique, but the  decor, the pool, the dining options and the staff are all simply outstanding, and the food at Splashes is great.   They do everything well.
Manager Response: Hello recent guest:  Thank you so very much for the high rating of Surf & Sand and for the compliments of our location, associates and service. We are always pleased to learn that we exceeded your expectations, and hope that you are able to return to Surf & Sand and lovely Laguna Beach in the near future. Please let us know when you are planning to return so that we may accommodate the details of your next stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: We always come back to surf and sands....cause every one  they‚Äôre are very professional,the room are impeccable and super clean,food,pool and privet beach always amazing  We just love love love this place,I was so sad to leave this morning,but already make plan to get back very soon... Just walk distance to everything  Thank  you surf and sands for make our week end best ever
Manager Response: Hello Jean:  Thank you so very much for taking the time to give Surf & Sand a high rating, and for the compliments of our location, associates and service.  We pride ourselves in  providing the best stay possible for our guests. As our return, loyal guests, we are very pleased to learn that we met your expectations once again.  Please let us know when you are planning to return so that we may assist.  Warm regardsm ,

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a honeymoon stop - right on the beach. The waves were crashing 10 feet away.
Summary: However there is essentially no beach to put chairs and a umbrella on as a consequence. A tiny amount of sand appeared at low tide, but was fleeting. If you are looking at great beaches to stay "on" in SOCAL # 1 for us would be the Beach Terrace Inn in Carslbad, CA (our favorite by far) and # 2 the historic Hotel Del Coronado in Coronado, CA which is the prettiest beach town in all of CA, and we have been everywhere.
Manager Response: Hello John:  Thank you for the high rating of Surf & Sand.  We appreciate you taking the time to share  feedback regarding your recent stay.  Yes, we agree that there are times when the tide is high and the beach is minimal; however, the majority of the time, there is plenty of beach area to enjoy and we supply beach chairs and umbrellas for your comfort. We hope to have you back with us for your anniversary!  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Good hotel. Pretty overpriced for what you get but it‚Äôs on the beach so it‚Äôs what you‚Äôd expect. Service was and pleasant. Very nice views and congenitally located a few blocks from downtown Laguna. Can‚Äôt beat Laguna Beach. The weather is always perfect
Manager Response: Hello Lola:  Thank you for the compliments of Surf & Sand and your high rating.  We are pleased that you enjoy visiting Laguna Beach and hope to have you back in the not-too-distant future. Please reach out for any needed assistance!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Surf and Sand  Resort-5 Star Service
Summary: This amazing resort in Laguna Beach is a GEM not just because of it's location but 100% because of it's staff.  They are phenomenal and far exceed expectations.  Especially Pamela Hopkins.  We have been going to this resort as a family since I was a baby - now many many many years later, we still go.  However, it's only been the past several years that I've come to know Pamela.  She takes care of us every year now, and, constantly wows me.  It's very apparent how expertly she communicates with her staff because we are treated like royalty and our entire stay is always flawless.  I can also see how well others around us are taken care of, so, all in all, Surf and Sand has a rock star crew.  Matt Heinz runs the outlets, and he is also amazing, as are the valet, the front desk,
Manager Response: Hello Caryl:  Thank you so very much for taking the time to share your feedback and high rating of Surf & Sand. As our very loyal, LONG TIME GUESTS, we are always pleased to have your family return to enjoy all that we have to offer once again. Thank you also for the compliments of our associates which is always appreciated!   We look very forward to your return.  Please always reach out for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful remaining summer season!

Summary: 4:12 room still not ready. Went to montage last week and checked in at 9:30. Monarch checked me in immediately. Had daughters wedding here and they have no idea of past visits. Service has declined dramatically

Beautiful rooms, friendly staff and beautiful beachside city.  The champagne and cheese board upon arrival was a lovely touch.  Would absolutely stay here again!  Laguna is very pedestrian friendly too.  Lots of great shops and restaurants less than a mile away.
Manager Response: Hello Amber:  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your recent stay.  Thank you for your great review, high rating of the resort and for taking the time to share your feedback.  Hopefully, you will be able to return to lovely Laguna Beach in the near future.  Let us know how we may assist.  Warm regards,

Summary: Excellent except the housekeeping issue with all the dangerous drugs in our world we have to be so careful!  We hope we all learn from this.  I know to inspect any hotel room very well upon arrival.  If our kids got a hold of this or even if I touched it and it was a dangerous drug like fentanol or heroin, our stay could have ended differently.

Our room was hot when we arrived and only then did we discover that there is no air conditioning.  Called the front desk and they said to turn on the fan and open the sliding door.  In the afternoon the room (we were on the 4th floor) was really hot.  We stayed two nights and slept w/o covers but even then it was warm.  The room was not cheap and it sure wasn‚Äôt worth it.  Never again

I have stayed at this hotel several times in the past. Beautiful oceanfront rooms with the waves crashing right outside your room  This is my first time here in the summer when kids are out of school. The pool is packed with kids and the place was crazy. Did not know that this hotel doesn‚Äôt have a/c!! Have never been here when it is hot, but summer can bring the Santa Ana winds and it was hot . In such a nice hotel A/C would be welcome ! This place is paradise and romantic anytime but summer!! The restaurant here is one of the best in Laguna!
Manager Response: Hello Ms. French:  Thank you for the high rating of Surf & Sand and your complements of the resort! Yes, the summer months when there are so many events and happenings in Laguna Beach as a whole can be challenging. We hope to have you return again at a cooler time of year! Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Regards,

Summary: This hotel was the perfect place for our quick trip while our kids were at camp. Their beach is suburb. The hotel is beautiful, clean and the views are stunning! The staff was friendly and accommodating. We'll definitely be back!
Manager Response: Hello Odyssey:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your "quick beach getaway," and for the high rating of the resort. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future for a more lengthy stay.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a great (remaining) summer season!

Summary: Shame on me.  Truly.  I‚Äôm an experienced traveler and I know better.  I paid a lot of money for two nights in this hotel.  Upgraded to an oceanfront room.  And just couldn‚Äôt wait to get here.  But I arrived in the afternoon.  And it‚Äôs very hot this summer.  My room is a sauna.  Just brutal.  Spoke with the front desk who advised that I open my sliding doors and turn on the fan.  Did so.  Hmmmm.  Called manager.  Same advice.  He did offer me a resort credit but that credit isn‚Äôt going to make this room habitable.  The problem?  Laguna is sold out this weekend.  So we either need to stay or leave the sweet little town we came here to visit.  For your info, there apparently ARE some rooms with AC.  They aren‚Äôt oceanfront.  And they are, of course, sold out this weekend.  So,
Manager Response: Dear SLucius,  Please accept my sincere apologies for the lack of air conditioning. The current heat wave we are experiencing is unusual for this area. I truly cannot apologize enough for this.   We do hope you will visit us again when the weather is much cooler, so you can thoroughly enjoy your oceanfront accommodations.   Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: Having stayed at hotels throughout the world, mostly 4 and 5 star, we have never had one without air conditioning, nor would it ever occur to me to ask with respect to a 4 star in Laguna. Saw nothing on the website when we booked but didn‚Äôt do my usual Trip Advisor search of reviews. Big mistake. With summer prices for an ocean front high floor and summer heat, not a choice we would ever make again. Very hard to sleep even with the fans put in the rooms. Beware! Food average, service exceptional, views lovely, ocean swells are huge so not a place for little ones to go in the ocean. Rated a 2 because of the lack of air conditioning which made our stay quite uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler1624,  Your feedback is very much appreciated. Please accept my sincere apologies for the lack of air conditioning and sense of average food.   I appreciate your compliments regarding the service you received and lovely views. Also, note that we are working through upgrades and do anticipate an improved product in the near future.  When your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, we do hope you think of Surf & Sand!  Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: So much love for Surf & Sand Resort! I couldn‚Äôt wait for the opportunity to get back to embodiment of relaxed class and taste. I had a check in snafu (my fault), but thankfully Tom and staff made everything stress less and complete. I had an oceanfront Tower Room because I love the sound of the surf, the breeze from the ocean and the drop dead views.  Phenomenal service at the pool, Roberto with Room Service made me feet like a princess and Rosa with Housekeeping was a ninja moving in and out of the room with stealth and an eye for detail. (I wanted to bring her home with me; she made my stay so effortless!)
Manager Response: Hello "Happy Place"!  We are so pleased to know you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for the high rating of the resort, and for the complements of our associates, which are always appreciated. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future when we are able, once again, to provide the service and attention you depend on.   Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary Heading: The highlight of our road trip!
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights over the 4th July weekend, whilst on a road trip travelling down from San Francisco. The location was perfect, we had a clean and spacious room and the view from our balcony was breathtaking! From arrival to departure all the staff from the resort couldn't do enough for us, a special thanks to Sandra in concierge for arranging our restaurant reservations and giving us advice on how to fill our days in the beautiful Laguna Beach, she couldn't have been more helpful! The free trolley was a great way to get around and visit all the pretty beaches. If we ever return to this charming beach town, the Surf & Sand will be where we stay!
Manager Response: Hello Travel:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand, and for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay over July 4th!  Laguna Beach is a very special destination and we are very proud to be part of your wonderful experience while visiting.  Thank you also for the complements of Sandra, which are always appreciated.  She is a valuable asset of the resort. Please reach out to us when you are able to return - hopefully, sooner than later!  Warm regards, safe travels!

Summary: This hotel is very overpriced. Average room, tiny hot tub jammed with kids eating snacks most times.  Maid service was late in the day and missed one day. Staff showed up 3 nights to deliver something that was for a different room. Taxes and fees are an additional $125 a night.

Every room is ocean front! To sit and enjoy a cocktail from your balcony and watch dolphins swimming is magical! We also saw sea lions! Very clean rooms, the nicest staff and a great beach! So many shops and restaurants in walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello Alia:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and your recent stay.  We always appreciate knowing that we met our guests' expectations. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: If you are ready to spend money for a quick and easy get away, this is your place.  Better romantic spot vs. family but the hotel does have a lot to do for children. The service, views and accommodations are fabulous. The rooms are not fancy but very comfortable. You are paying for the view and balcony of the rooms. You can hear the surf all night long even with the door closed. Pool and spa are upscale. Splashes Bar is unique. Just wish we got a sunset the night we we're there. Book hotel early.
Manager Response: Hello Katie:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your recent stay.  We value your feedback and take your comments seriously. Thank you also for letting other travelers know what to expect when they are our guests.  Call upon us for any needed assistance when you are able to return.  Warm regards,

Summary: Beware of the noise! It was the worst nights stay. Don't waste your money! Staff was less than helpful. We complained several times and nothing was done. Only thing redeeming about the place is the restaurant!

The good: Valets very helpful and nice ,room was clean, and was able to check in a little early around 2;30pm. Now, for the bad: valet is 35.00 per night, no free coffee in the lobby, not much choice at Splashes or room service for food, and it is expensive compared to local nicer restaurants. Secondly, I wrote on their contact page a few days ahead of time to remind them that it was our 19 year anniversary, and expected some kind of extra perk maybe upgrade to towers instead of seaview over the pool, flowers, wine, etc. Apparently, when you write Hotel email they don't get it? It was a 3rd floor room over pool, which had music loud during the day and screaming kids...at night Splashes had both nights heavy drinkers that were super loud out on patio .So, it killed romantic

My husband had a work conference so my kids and I tagged along. This was one of the best experiences we‚Äôve had at a hotel.  I called the front desk about a special in their brochure for kids. Delivered to our room was a tent and s‚Äômores free of charge for our little one. Made the trip so special at every turn.
Manager Response: Hello!  We are so pleased to know your family enjoyed Surf &Sand!  Thank you for taking the time to let us know we provided "one of the best experiences" you have had at a hotel.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in booking your next stay.  Have a great summer season!

Summary: It was 72 degrees. Views of Palm trees. Smells of sweet cocktails and lemon leaves. Having conversations with the ocean's breeze. Walking into Splashes Restaurant with sandy feet. More cocktails, something with the essence of honeysuckle squeeze. All my girlfriends sporting salty hair grease, but no one seems to care. I'll take this view any day. Another and another and another round served by a gracious staff, in a perfect portion of heaven, pretty please.
Manager Response: Hello Victoria:  Wow - what a lovely review! Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed Surf & Sand.  We appreciate your high rating of the resort and for letting us  know we exceeded your expectations.   Please reach out to us when you are able to return.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Surf and Sand Resort in Laguna Beach, Ca
Summary: Absolutely one if the best experience in hotel stays ever. Carmello the front desk check in attendant was absolutely great as was Barbara the hotel operator. Exceptionally clean beach hotel, spectacular room with a view, excellent room service, superb, friendly service in every department from check in to car valet. Could not ask for a better hotel! I have stayed at many Ritz Carltons over the years and the service was in some ways better and more efficient than that of the Ritz.
Manager Response: Hello recent guest.   We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and let us know we exceeded your expectations. Your special accolades of Carmello and Barbara are especially appreciated, as they are a great asset of the resort.  When you are able to return in the near future (hopefully), please contact us for assistance in booking your next visit.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Very nice resort which lives up to its name. The location is first class and the sea and beach are amazing. All staff we met were excellent.  Our room overlooked the pool area which was very noisy. We asked for a room switch but were advised none were available. We were there for 7 nights! Pool area was very busy and beds were taken very early with towels placed on beds early and then people not actually turning up until much later in the day. Perhaps a policy of if the bed is not used for 30mins then towels will be removed for others to use? Back of house areas and corridors down to the rooms are a bit unsightly and could do with some improvements and lift was incredibly slow and in need of refurbishment, however the room was spacious and clean and very comfortable.  Ate in the
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay.  We value your comments which are shared with our entire management staff to address improvements.  Hopefully, you will be able to return  at a time when the resort is less hectic so that you will be able to enjoy your  stay to the fullest. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful remaining summer season!

Summary Heading: One of the best kept secrets!!!
Summary: Surf and Sand is the most amazing resort on earth. It is literally on the beach... The ambiance is like no other place in the world. I really enjoyed my stay and highly recommend for anyone who is looking for the ultimate sensation... Totally blissful!!!
Manager Response: Hello Recent Guest:  Thank you for the glowing review of Surf & Sand and the high rating of all that we have to offer our guests. We are so pleased to know we met your needs and that the resort is "the most amazing resort on earth - totally blissful."  We appreciate your recommendation to other  travelers and look very forward to your return. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Second visit with my mom (75yrs) and daughter (15).  We love it here!  The feeling of luxury yet  very casual and friendly!  This is the only place my mom can actually enjoy the beach as it is a few steps to sand and she has trouble walking.  Love the option of beach or pool and that rooms are right above the sand/waves.  Staff friendly and always asking if they can offer anything to make our stay even better.  Can't wait to return when we are ready to splurge on another mini vacation.
Manager Response: Hello Jamie:  Thank you for letting us know your recent stay was so enjoyable, and for your high rating of Surf & Sand.  We are always pleased to know that we exceeded our guests' expectations and that your Mother, daughter and you were comfortable during your stay. We hope to have you return sooner than later when we are able to accommodate your needs once again.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed here a number of times and the service is consistently 1st class.  I highly recommend this property if you are looking for a quaint getaway without the large crowds you find at the Montage or the Ritz-Carlton.  It is a gem of a place.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Keller:  As our valued, repeat guest, we appreciate knowing that we met your expectations once again. Thank you for taking the time to provide a high rating of the resort and the complements of Surf & Sand.  Please call upon us when you are able to return.  Have a great summer season!

Summary: We stayed at surf and sand for our 11th anniversary having gotten married there 11 years ago. To thank us for returning, they upgraded us to the California Suite for free!  They treated us so well. After being there for 24 hours and experiencing the gorgeous weather and property, we decided we liked staying at surf and sand better than Hawaii or any other place we‚Äôve been.
Manager Response: Hello Brian:  We appreciate knowing you experienced the "Best vacation ever" at Surf & Sand. Thank you for your high rating of the resort and for returning for your 11th anniversary. Let us know when you are able to return so that we are able to, once again, provide a memorable stay for you.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Ok so I went with friends that reserved a me bedroom suite ocean view.  Upon arrival with lots of stuff to unload the valet was on top of it.  Check in was smooth.  Let me back track one of my friends is very high maintenance and the go around was traveling with a bump foot which required a wheelchair and scooter.  Ok. So the immediately got a wheelchair for him. The room had several steps in and out and the staff literally helped him in the room.  Room service called alot, he need a scooter they found a rental place had it delivered.  So I guess where I'm going with this is the staff and service was outstanding!   Now for the room, bed comfy, the the couch that opened not to sure since I brought my air mattress.  The room needed new carpet, and the louver doors needed soon TLC.
Manager Response: Hello  Theresa:  Thank you for your flowing review and high rating of Surf & Sand. We appreciate you taking the time to complement our associates, service and the resort in general.  We value your feedback and take your comments very seriously.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary Heading: Made our wedding night so special
Summary: My wife and I decided to enjoy our wedding night at the Surf & Sand Resort and IT. WAS. WORTH. IT.  The staff did not miss any chance to make sure our stay was memorable. From complimentary chocolate-covered strawberries to the most congratulatory and wonderful staff when we showed up in our wedding outfit! Falling asleep and waking up to the sounds of the ocean (and the wonderful balcony view) made every cent worth it.  For the high quality staff, location, and amenities at a reasonable cost, you cannot beat the Surf & Sand. We look forward to returning again and again on future anniversaries!
Manager Response: Hello Jonny:  Thank you for choosing Surf & Sand for your VERY SPECIAL OCCASION.  We are so pleased to know that we exceeded your expectations and you plan to return "again and again on future anniversaries."  Our goal is to ensure we provide the most memorable stay possible for our guests and it appears as though we succeeded in doing so.    Please call upon us when you are able to return in (hopefully) the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: We had an amazing, relaxing stay At the Surf and Sand. We loved the beach workouts, helpful and friendly staff, but what we loved most was the sound and view of the ocean from the room. Laurie from concierge was incredibly helpful and had awesome restaurant recommendations and always went the extra mile to make sure we were well taken care of.  Can‚Äôt wait to come back.
Manager Response: Hello Guso!  We are so pleased to know you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for the high rating of the resort, and also the complements of our Concierge, Laurie. She is very appreciative of you taking the time to special mention her and is pleased to know she exceeded your expectations.  Hopefully, you will be back with us in the near future.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Fantastic service. Unparalleled view. Delicious food. Amazingly accommodating with food allergies. Fun kids activities. Laurie at the concierge desk was incredible.  Everyone was so friendly and helpful. Loved every minute.
Manager Response: Hello!  Wow!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Thank you for the high rating of the resort, the complements of Laurie and all the amenities we offer our guests.  Hopefully, you will be able to enjoy returning for another wonderful stay.  We look very forward to having you back with us.  Warm regards,

Summary: Felt like a treasured guest at all times. This is one of our favorite hotels to stay at in all of california ! You can feel the quality of the place in everything they do . We are hoping that they will continue to offer specials!
Manager Response: Hello Sightsee!  As our loyal, repeat guest, thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed another stay at Surf & Sand.  We are always pleased to know we exceeded your expectations and that you "felt like a treasured guest at all times."    Let us know when you are able to return so that we are able to accommodate all your needs.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: We could hear the waves crashing all day long!
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights for our anniversary in June.  We got a deal on an oceanfront room.    The room is beautiful, and the view cannot be beat.  You can hear the waves crashing all day long!  Resort staff is friendly and helpful.  We originally booked 2 nights but got a deal on a 3rd night and opted to stay.  Only issues were -- there is NO air conditioning at all and the room was pretty hot even with it being cool (70's during the day)! This was an issue for me.  You actually need to call for the room to be serviced (we came back at 2P and it had not be done yet and were told after the fact we needed to call).  I asked for some extra shampoo and conditioners and then later that next day, they all disappeared (not sure what happened there.....). Weird.
Manager Response: Hello Lalewood:  Thank you for the high rating of Surf & Sand and for sharing feedback regarding your recent stay. We take your comments very seriously and they are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.    Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future when we are able to better meet your needs.  Please reach out to us for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: I got recommended from a friend to stay here, normally stay up the street at the fashion island hotel, but this hotel truly has better views ! I stayed here for a night, honestly wish I could of stayed longer, but will be back for longer visits. Views are amazing and service was perfect. Thanks for shayne the value guy !! He truly set the bar.
Manager Response: Hello Zaid:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Surf & Sand, and for the high rating and complements of the resort.  We always enjoy learning that our first time guests enjoyed their stay and plan to return.  Thank you also for the special mention of Valet Shayne.  He is very pleased to know that his service met your needs.  Please reach out in the future when you are able to return to lovely Laguna Beach and Surf & Sand!

Summary Heading: Ocean view rooms can't be beat
Summary: I've stayed at the Surf & Sand for years. It's pricey, but for the special occasion (this was our 50th wedding anniversary), the ocean front rooms can't be beat. Beautiful location and excellent rooms.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Volk:  We are so pleased to have had you back once again to Surf & Sand.  Happy 50th Anniversary! Thank you for the complements and high rating of the resort. We look very forward to your return. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Location was everything. Our room was oceanfront. I loved hearing the surf all the time, but my kids felt it was too loud. No big, we just closed the sliding glass door and it wasn't too bad. They also give you earplugs on the nightstand in case you prefer it quieter. We traveled with our dog and the Laguna Beach laws regarding dogs on beaches seem reasonable for SoCal. Though pricey, the dining options were excellent. Staff were all great and helpful, especially the ones working the beach. My only complaint was that our room wasn't ready until 5pm. But we checked in on a holiday so I was expecting it to be a busy afternoon anyways.  We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Hello Christine:  We look very forward to having your family return to Surf & Sand. Thank you for your high rating of the resort and for letting us know you enjoyed your stay.  We appreciate you taking the time to let others know what to expect when they are our guests, and that the service our associate provided met your needs.    Please call upon us for assistance in the future. Have a great summer season!

Summary Heading: Best hotel accommodation in California, if not the world!
Summary: We love this Hotel, having been back multiple times, it never disappoints! Looking forward to retiring again in 3 weeks!!!! The lunches in Splashes, with the service from Jhoana (the best), Oscar and Hussain, always make our experience great.  The help from Sandra and Ali on Concierge, means we can always find whatever we need and the smile and service they provide always makes you feel good!  All parts of hotel service are exceptional!
Manager Response: Hello Cruiser:  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed yet another stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for your complements of the resort and for acknowledging our associates, which is always appreciated. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future so that we are able to accommodate your needs once again.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: I've never stayed in a hotel like this. I came to Laguna on vacation from Texas. The staff were extremely helpful, courteous and professional. They upgraded my room just to give me a better view and experience. They went out of their way and bent some of their pet policies to accommodate my dogs. The food was out of this world, truly.  My only complaint, which is not the hotel's fault in any way, were the other guests. They're snooty, pretentious, ungrateful, entitled. Some lady threw a temper tantrum at the front desk when she was checking out because she wasnt happy with some caviar she had (she still ate all of it) and demanded a refund. Yea. That's probably just the type of people at Laguna Beach. But, the staff were still exemplary in their demeanor and professionalism.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for taking the time to let us know we exceeded your expectations and for your high rating of Surf & Sand. We are very pleased to know you enjoyed your recent stay and found us to be a "slice of heaven on earth."  Hopefully, you will be able to return for an even better stay.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: AMAZINGLY well maintained, beautiful hotel with a SPECTACULAR ocean views!
Summary: I stayed two nights at this beautiful hotel.  EVERY part of my stay was spectacular! This resort is exquisitely managed from top to bottom! I was greeted at the front desk and welcomed like I was family.  (Thanks, Bryce and Sandra!)    Once my room was available, I received a text.  I was in room 297, on the ninth floor of the tower.  WHAT A VIEW!  I had a bed that was positioned to face the balcony, with an impressive view of the endless ocean. The bathroom included both a large bathtub and a separate shower, as well as a double sink vanity.  The balcony view makes your stay worth it.  There were multiple comfortable chairs to sit on, as well as a small table.  The view just goes on!  If you don't have a fear of heights, you will spend most of your time on the balcony!  At
Manager Response: Hello So Cal Family:  Wow! Thank you so much for the high rating and glowing review of Surf & Sand. Thank you also for the complements of Bryce and Sandra which are always appreciated. They are definitely an asset of Surf & Sand.  Please call upon us when we would be able to assist you in the future.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: I live in NorCal with my wife and two children (a 2.5 month old and a 2.5 year old).  We all flew in to John Wayne and stayed at Surf and Sand.  It was a great stay.  The room was great and we had the best pool terrace and ocean view.  We took advantage of the resort amenities like the pool and the ocean front property.  Do not worry about bringing towels, picnic blankets, beach chairs, or anything else.  The resort provides everything complimentary, though it would be nice of patrons to tip the staff.  The valet services knew us by the second day and had our car ready in no time at all every time.  We will be back again with the grandparents, too.
Manager Response: Hello Compass:  We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your recent stay and look forward to returning. Please contact us when you are able to return to So Cal.    Have a wonderful summer season with your family!

Summary Heading: Absolutely Beautiful Hotel on the Water!
Summary: I cannot recommend the Surf and Sand Resort enough. We listened to the ocean all night in our Oceanside King room, and in the morning I sat on our balcony and watched dolphins playing in the waves. The room was beautiful and sparkling clean, the hotel grounds are gorgeous, and the staff are all so accommodating and welcoming. This is the absolute best way to experience Laguna Beach!

Summary: My wife and I stayed there for few days, and I got to say that it is the nicest hotel in Laguna! Between the amenities and the hotel itself, it makes it the perfect spot to unwind! Having the beach right at your feet and the sound of the waves at night is the complete package!

Summary: Surf and Sand resort was perfectly located on the beach, with wonderful restaurants and darling boutiques within walking distance. I was on the third floor of the Surf building with stunning views. At night the waves can be a bit loud, but the hotel offers earplugs and the view was worth it.  The staff was efficient and friendly. My room and the public area's were very clean.

Summary: Treat yourself to the finest beach experience in Laguna Beach, or maybe California.  The hotel is first rate in every area - with an amazing restaurant called Splashes, situated right ON the beach-with top notch rooms and all the amenities, and a staff that is as good as it gets. My husband and I have been coming to Laguna Beach for 50 years and stayed at all the finest hotels - and this is my favorite.

Summary Heading: SURF AND SAND HOTEL, Laguna at its Best......
Summary: Been to this hotel so many times I can't count........ Absolutely the best! You have to love the sound of the ocean waves crashing...and looking out over the sea to Catalina and walks on the beach to town and just lounging by the pool or shore......all time favorite hotel.....

This spot was amazing!  Located exactly near everything we wanted.  Hotel amenities were truly remarkable. The entire staff was friendly & professional at all levels of service.  Splashes had some of the best Sea Bass, ever!  For this weekend getaway, it could not have gone better.

The quirky things are tolerable (no air conditioning, strange and limited elevators, no real bar area, sort of a gift shop).  Splashes Restaurant is good with fantastic views, but there are equally good restaurants both in walking distance and on the free shuttle route to downtown.  Service at the resort isn‚Äôt really at the 4-star level (more grudgingly accommodating to requests than enthusiastic) but it‚Äôs overall OK.  The exception was a very helpful concierge desk. The real attraction is the beach right below the rooms and relative isolation from big tourist groups. Well worth a visit, but the nearby competition (Ritz
Manager Response: Hello Pasadena:  Thank you for the high rating of Surf & Sand and for sharing feedback regarding your recent stay. Summary: Spent 2 hours listening to a domestic dispute in the room next door. The hotel management sent someone to sit outside their room while we got to listen to the endless screaming and cussing. We asked if we could be moved but were told the hotel was ‚Äòfully committed‚Äô.  They apologized and said there was a wedding going on and people had been drinking...  as if that was normal? I arrive at the hotel at noon and I got my room key at 1:30pm while I was having lunch at Splash in the hotel. I like this hotel so much that I decide to come back here to spend a night a 2 here at least once every other month.

Summary: Such a wonderful resort with amazing staff. Everyone is friendly and knowledgable, the views are amazing and hotel is as close to the beach as you can get. There is no AC but the hotel is planning for major renovations on the next year or so. The temps were around 70 so not an issue during our stay. The sound of waves is loud due to proximity to ocean so if someone is sensitive to sound and a lite sleeper would recommend a higher floor. The hotel provides

Summary Heading: Great but read the small print !
Summary: This is a lovely but pricey establishment . The rooms are spacious and nicely appointed .Set right on the sand the highlight of my stay was dinner in the bar after dark , where one could watch the floodlit waves smashing against the hotel steps ! What I did not like was getting charged a 20USD daily resort fee ( +USD 2.28tax) on departure, which , I was advised, was for "wifi , use of the gym , use of the pool etc ". Really ???  Already having paid a motza for the room I thought this was sharp practice. My advice , should you stay there , is ask for a room on the higher floors and not over the pool . My first day was in a ground floor room which afforded a view straight across the pool , and was similarly looked into and not private.

Warm regards,

Summary: My first time to this beautiful resort RIGHT ON the beach! Every detail was covered.....from beautiful linens and very nicely appointed rooms, to a gorgeous balcony overlooking the waves lapping the beach.  It was hard to take your eyes off of! Breakfast on our patio every morning was delightful! The staff was very warm, friendly and helpful.  The restaurant was lovely, and the food in the bar was excellent.  Walking distance from many restaurants and shops in Laguna Beach, and close to Trolley Stop also. Awesome visit!!

Summary: Love this hotel! Upscale and quaint! Staff was very friendly and helpful! I would definitely come back!  Food was yummy too.  Rooms are huge and most of all have an ocean view.  Nice big spa tubs.  Turn down service offered every night.

Summary: This hotel has become my "go to" hotel when I"m in Orange County. It's location is the best in Laguna Beach, walking distance to all of the art galleries, shopping, and best restaurants in the area. The rooms don't just have an ocean view...they are literally right on the ocean. So you wake up and go to sleep each night to the sound of the waves crashing right outside your balcony. The restaurant, Splashes, has the best breakfast offerings and service of any of the hotels in the area, and the concierge service is second to none. Just ask for Ali North when you arrive and she is sure to make your stay a memorable one. Ask for Magdalena at the spa If you are looking to relax and pamper yourself, and if you are planning to go to Laguna Beach..or anywhere in the OC for that matter,

Summary: Staying at the Surf and Sand resort has been on my bucket list for 30 years. I finally decided to book a room as a form of self care for myself. Having the corner room gave an extra view to the pool restaurant and a stunning view looking up the coast towards Newport. The room was lovely, the view was stunning, and how the surf was lighted at night had me in awe!  The staff was wonderful. I loved how all I had to do was to text and I would get an immediate response to the Y5 password, asking for extra pillows, finding out more information, and actually having a set of scissors brought up to our room for a quick fix of a dress.  We order room service and it was brought
Manager Response: Hello!  We are very appreciative of you taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. Check-in was friendly and straight forward. When we opened the door to the room we were amazed. Finally a place that when it says ocean-side, it means just that. What a view... Beautiful... Room was superbly appointed with everything you could possibly need, even earplugs if the sounds of the waves are too much for you..! Lovely pool, with good service. Restaurant that again has great service and views, menu was varied and tasty. Need to book . Bar was located right on the surf.

Summary Heading: You are paying a lot extra for the ocean
Summary: This place is way too overpriced because it is one of the few hotels right on the ocean in Laguna Beach. The rooms are very basic and equivalent to a lower-priced chain hotel. You also pay an exorbitant resort fee for a basic gym and pool area that wouldn't be worth an extra fee if this weren't right on the ocean (hotels all really have to stop charging these fees - they are only MAYBE warranted at an actual luxury beach resort; it should be included in the price of the room as customers don't want to be nickel and dimed after you check in).   The hotel is awkwardly constructed, with parking decks often right next to the rooms and basic foliage and landscaping needed to cover up construction around the hotel and service items. Keep in mind not all rooms have ocean views and some

Easily the best place during two week California visit.  Ocean proximity is spectacular.  Other places nearby were almost as much $$$ but not the same Ocean experience.  First time I stayed in a place where earplugs were offered - and that was fine considering ocean noise volume.  Will stay again whenever we visit the area.  Very friendly staff.

We love this property and can't wait to continue making memories here!  Wonderful service and delicious steakhouse across the street---Selanne Steak Tavern.

The rooms are amazing and you can't beat the ocean views. You can walk to restuarants and shops or just take a walk along the beach. It's just an amazing place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello Getaway:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for sharing yet another experience! We had no idea where to start, this trip was a "do not plan it, just do it" type of trip. Wendy was more than accommodating, not only did she chat with us about being from Arizona, she assured us that we would be more than pleased with the resort. Wendy definitely set the stage for what was an amazing experience with Surf and Sand; she exemplifies customer service.  Valet's are more common than ever lately. However, I have never experienced the care, respect, and kindness that this valet team provided. From the moment that the gentleman opened our vehicle doors when we arrived, to
Manager Response: Hello "Firm Believer"!  Thank you so very much for taking the time to share your recent experience in staying at  Surf & Sand, and for your high rating of the resort.  We appreciate your compliments of  our location, concierge, valet, front desk and housekeeping associates  We also value  knowing that we exceeded your expectations and take pride in the services offered our guests.    We look very forward to having you back with us.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary Heading: Another relaxing weekend at the Surf and Sand!
Summary: We had another relaxing weekend at the Surf and Sand.  It was our second time there this year.  Its our new favorite place to visit.  Between our two visits we have stayed in the main building and the terraces.  Both are great.  The surf breaks below you in the main building, but the terrace is great for private dining.  Views are amazing from both.  The food and service is incredible.
Manager Response: Hello Road 41!  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for sharing your recent experience! Summary: This hotel was probably nice...years ago.  It is in desperate need of a remodel.  This is supposed to be a non smoking property, but the guests around me thought it was okay to smoke on their balconies which left a constant stream of smoke coming into my room.  I decided to check out early (and was still charged) because I had to keep my balcony door shut and there is no air conditioning in the rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Road04460589664,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. Please allow me to personally extend my apologies for the unfortunate experience.   If at all possible, please reach out to me directly. I would like the opportunity to make this right. I can be reached at 949-376-2762.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: This is a great place to stay in an awesome location.  We stayed in a oceanview room with a balcony and it was first class.  Some hotels may tout an ocean view and you can barely see the surf, but here it feels like you are on top of the water.  The rooms are very nicely decorated, linens and bedding were great.  Great for beach walks and plenty of restaurants nearby.  Staff was very nice, Trish at the front desk is great.
Manager Response: Hello Seaside:  Thank you for your glowing review of Surf & Sand and your recent stay.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed our oceanfront rooms, views and our great location.  We hope to have you back with us in the near future.  Have a great summer season!

Summary: Ended our family Disneyland trip with a stay at Surf&Sand, and it was absolutely perfect. The views are stunning, service impeccable. Very clean, all the amenities you could hope for. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hello Soccer Dance Mom!  What a way to end your family vacation.  Thank you for the great recommendation and for taking the time to let other travelers know what a great resort Surf & Sand is.  Please call upon us when you are able to return in the future.  Have a wonderful summer season!  Warm regards,

Summary: Great service, great personnel, overall great amenities, but poor handicapped-accessible room amenities. Missing high-rise toilet and grab bars at toilet, missing grab bars and shower seat or bench (although I got a shower seat after two requests), and elevators barely provided enough room for ride-on scooter and one additional companion.
Manager Response: Hello George H:  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback of your recent stay at Surf & Sand, and for your five star review.
