Please reach out to us so that we are more able to accommodate all of your needs.  Warm regards,

Summary: Great location, spacious stylish rooms most with a fantastic sea view. Good amenities.   It can be difficult to navigate where everything is at first with different floors and walkways but it takes a day to become orientated.  Recommend.
Manager Response: Hello John:  Thank you for your great review of Surf & Sand and the amenities that we have to offer. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the future since you are now accustomed to our beach front property, and we will be able to accommodate all of your needs.   Please contact us for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: This was our 2nd visit to Surf & Sand and it didn't disappoint!  The valet(s) who helped us with our luggage and car were very personable.  When I checked in the room was ready and we made our way to it.  It was poolside but on the first floor and we had a room on a higher floor last time we were there and this just didn't have the same feel.  My husband went back to the front desk to inquire if there was anything on a higher floor we could change to as we had been spoiled by the exceptional view from our last visit.  She told us she would check and let us know as soon as something was available.  We made ourselves comfortable outside and waited about 30 minutes only to be pleasantly surprised to find out they upgraded us to a suite!  We were there for my birthday so this only
Manager Response: Hello Kssimpsn13!  What a lovely 5 star review of your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your second visit.  We are always pleased to learn that we exceeded your expectations and that we were able to upgrade you to a suite!    Thank you also for the compliments of our service and associates, which is always appreciated.  Please reach out for any needed assistance for your future stay.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Stayed in Oceanfront room on the 4th floor. The view from the balcony was astonishing.  The location is amazing, right on the beach  Very luxurious, big and clean rooms,    Service staff is very knowledgeable, helpful, friendly and quick.  Great restaurants with delicious food, but kind of pricey.   The hotel is kind of expensive, however the experience is worthwhile
Manager Response: Hello Voskami:  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your visit to Surf & Sand. We are always pleased to learn that we exceeded your expectations and you enjoyed the experience of staying in an oceanfront room. We look forward to serving you in the future. Please reach out for any needed assistance.   Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: We loved this hotel so much that we will always come here when visiting! Food was AMAZING at  Splashes!!! Our ocean front room was spacious and clean. We took advantage of the pool and beach amenities too. The service was very courteous and helpful.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your return visit to Surf & Sand. We are always pleased to learn that we exceeded your expectations and look forward to serving you in the future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Second year in a row stay having come from Ireland,everyone from the valets to reception to Maureen in Concierge and of course the legend Jeremy at the pool bar and all the waiters in the downstairs bar,and the pod of dolphins outside our window and the Easter bunny that came for the kids, Top Marks Lads, See you next year. I‚Äôll take you home again Kathleen as the song goes.
Manager Response: Hello Old Reliable Cork:  Thank you for your "delightful" review of Surf & Sand and the high rating you have chosen for the resort. Our Associates always appreciate knowing that our guests appreciate their service.  Until next year,   Warm regards,

Summary: My company had it's 3-day offsite at the Surf & Sand Hotel.  This was my first stay here.  I was absolutely satisfied with every aspect of my stay here.  The room was spacious and clean.  I liked that earplugs were provided because I was right on the water's edge.  I didn't need them because I enjoyed the sound of the waves throughout the night. Everyone on staff, the bellmen, the valet, the front desk staff, and those who maintained the rooms, they were all friendly, responsive and went above and beyond to ensure I had everything I needed.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Vacation:  We are so very pleased to hear you enjoyed Surf & Sand, our location, staff and especially the WAVES! Thank you for taking the time to give us an excellent, five star review.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the very near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: This property exceeds all expectations! The setting overlooking the beach is extraordinary. The rooms are spacious, beautifully decorated, and luxuriously comfortable. The room service is outstanding. All the staff are cheerful, polite, helpful and provide superb customer service. This was our fourth stay and will not be our last. We can‚Äôt return soon enough!
Manager Response: Thank you for your glowing review and five star rating of Surf & Sand. We are always pleased to learn that we met our guests' expectations and that you plan to return to wonderful Laguna Beach.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in booking your future stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: I just returned form an amazing long weekend at Surf &Sand. I can‚Äôt say enough about the experience! From the moment you walk in the lobby, the staff is so welcoming and helpful. The resort is well maintained and offers breathtaking ocean views at every turn.  Here are the highlights if you are considering a trip:  Room: I stayed in a Deluxe Tower room. Immaculate, comfortable and good sized. Some have noted that there is no A/C at this hotel. Given the time of year I traveled (April), this was not an issue. I did not use the fan but did keep my sliding door open practically the whole time (I like fresh air). It was perfectly comfortable (sometimes cool at night).   Service: Friendly, consistently accommodating but not overbearing. Everyone was simply delightful!  Location:
Manager Response: Hello Pirate!  Thank you so much for your compliments and high rating of Surf & Sand. We appreciate you taking the time to let us and other travelers know what to expect during their stay in lovely Laguna Beach. Your review is very informative and we are so pleased that you were able to enjoy "the best sleep I've had in years." That means you MUST return and hopefully, soon!  Please let us know how we may be of assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Cheaper than the Ritz C and better views
Summary: We're locals based in LA and we know Laguna Beach really well.  Staying overnight can be tricky because the properties are generally older and the views and landscaping are so lovely there's not a lot of incentive to make the accommodations first-rate.  We've stayed at Montage and Ritz-C but didn't feel like taking out a mortgage to pay for our 4 night vacation.  Surf & Sand is beachfront, has a really good restaurant, and was high end enough to meet our needs.  Our balcony was amazing, and the furniture cushions, thick and comfy.  They also treated us like gold, including a lovely acknowledgment for our anniversary.  Everyone's smile was genuine.  A definite thumbs up!
Manager Response: Hello Daydream:  Thank you for your glowing, five star review of Surf & Sand. We are always appreciative of compliments of our service, location, staff and restaurant.  We are very happy to hear your anniversary was noted and your expectations met.    Please call upon us when we are able to "treat you like gold" once again.  Our pleasure.  Warm regards,

Summary: Beautiful hotel, great restaurant. They need serious help with their wi-fi. We had to work from the room a few of the days we stayed here and it was virtually impossible. If you will need access to wi-fi be sure to stay in the building that is connected to the lobby. Do not stay in the other building if you need wi-fi.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. Our sincere apologies that you experienced Wi-fi difficulties. The facility is lovely but there are so many beautiful hotels that are pretty.  This one stands out due to the amazing service. The food in the splashes restaurant was great too. The beds were super comfy. Their engineer even installed a gate around the balcony to keep our kiddos safe.   The view was beautiful. The hotel was clean and pretty and with beach access.  I couldn‚Äôt think of any way to make this a better place to vacation. Maybe if they offered a complementary breakfast? But that‚Äôs not a big deal since there‚Äôs a great coffee shop across the street with very good breakfast choices.
Manager Response: Hello Happy Wife n Mom!!  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Warm regards,

Summary: We stayed at Surf and Sand for a week. We had a hotel room that had a great view of the ocean and could see lots of dolphins. It is very easy to get to their pool. They are also dog and kid friendly. The pool food is very expensive though. For example a berry yogurt is 14 dollars. Three kids chicken fingers are 13 dollars. We will come back for sure though.
Manager Response: Hello Sydney:  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  We hope your family is able to return in the near future. Please all upon us for any needed assistance in booking your return visit.  Warm regards,

Summary: I had a great time at the resort. The staff was very friendly and professional and you cannot be the view. I left feeling relaxed and refreshed and was only sad when I had to leave. I would definitely recommend the resort for family, friends or solo travel.
Manager Response: Hello Carolyn:  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your time with us in lovely Laguna Beach. Summary: We just spent a week here for vacation. Rooms are awesome, view is great. We enjoyed falling asleep with the sound of the waves and the ocean. Walking to many restaurants, shopping and galleries very close. Food at hotel was very good too. Pool is set up with a view of the ocean too & excellent service from pool staff. The entire staff at the hotel was great. Highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Hello!    Thank you for taking the time to share feedback following your week's vacation at Surf & Sand. Summary: This hotel is right on the beach surrounded but lots of little restaurants and shops.  Rooms have Beautiful views, rooms are beautifully done , staff is very friendly and knowledgeable.  Love coming here.
Manager Response: Hello Sharifa:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and your very to-the-point review. We appreciate knowing that we met your expectations and look very forward to your return.  Hopefully, in the near future.  Please all upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Wonderful couples get away. Families can go elsewhere less expensive. Friendly staff. Enough great areas to walk to eat as you explore the area. Mostly art venues again, which is great, Saw whales and dolphins from our balcony. Want to return again next spring.
Manager Response: Hello!  We are very pleased with your five star rating of Surf & Sand and your compliments of all that we have to offer.  When planning your trip next spring, please reach out to us for assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary Heading: Like a Cruise Ship on Land
Summary: I have never been in such a wonderful hotel so close on water.  I felt as if I were on a ship when I looked out over the ocean from my room.   The Cesar Salad I had for lunch at Splashes was so incredible I had it every day.   Unbelievably fresh and simple.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for the accolades of Surf & Sand, our location and Splashes restaurant.  Hopefully, you will make it back to us in the near future for that Caesar salad.  We look forward to accommodating you once again.  Have a great summer!

Michael, Marcus and Jon with the Valet and Bell were a tremendous help and Jordan and Trish at the front desk were so accommodating at my arrival. I truly love staying the Surf and Sand because I feel like I get treated like family whenever I go and there is nowhere else in
Manager Response: Hello Niki:  Thank you so very much for taking the time to give Surf & Sand a very high rating and for  giving special mention to all of our associates who helped to make you and your sister's stay exceptional. Summary: WOW!! The weather cooperated, everyone made it in on time, the food was outstanding and service was through the roof. I had a lot of HELP to ensure my

Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for your compliments of Surf & Sand and your high rating of the resort.   We appreciate knowing that you enjoyed your stay with us, albeit short. Summary: Booked a 1 night ocean view room nearly a month in advance for approx $500. What they failed to inform us was that it was the bottom floor directly in front of the pool. On a Saturday, the pool was VERY busy. We had to keep our room closed up with a ceiling fans and a floor fan running because ocean view rooms do not include A/C. Long after the pool was closed at 10pm there was a loud gathering at the hot tub. From our bed it felt like we‚Äôre in the hot tub with the them. What‚Äôs the point of an ocean view room if the windows have to remain shut? The corridor to those ground level rooms in the 300 block look like the interior of an operational military submarine with laundry bins, carts, cleaning equipment, tools, and discarded broken furniture. Not exactly the most welcoming.
Manager Response: Dear Marc E,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   Sincerely,   Misty L. Summary Heading: Amazing ocean front property with a great pool and beautiful rooms!
Summary: We got a great last minute rate and a beautiful room. I booked with Booking.com from the car on the way into Laguna Beach and we were treated as if we had the reservation far in advance. Really great staff, gorgeous room, beach, pool and weather was wonderful...just what we needed! The only issue is price on drinks and food, watch out before you start ordering multiple drinks!
Manager Response: Hello Curious!  We are so pleased to learn that we were able to accommodate your last minute stay. Thank you for your high rating of the resort, as well as the compliments of the property. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: We are there every year, sometimes twice a year, and it's the greatest hotel with excellent service, good value, and right on the beach.  The rooms are beautiful as well as the suites which are in a separate building, but close.  Has a small but adequate gym and a wonderful spa.  We request the Tower, top floor corner if we can get it, and listen to the waves with the changing tides. High tide is the best as the waves pound the sand and come almost up to the property.  Low tide is more tranquil and a good swimming beach under the watchful eye of a parent or friend.  The restaurant is also popular for lunch or dinner, and they give you free coffee in the morning.  It also has a convention center and we've seen both meetings and weddings. There is a nice quiet place to sit and
Manager Response: Hello Dana:  As our very loyal, repeat guest, thank you for taking the time to share your recent visit at Surf & Sand. We appreciate your high rating of the resort and for letting other travelers know what is in store for them during their stay with us.  Hopefully, we'll have you back with us. Please call upon us for any needed assistance booking your future stay.  Have a great summer season!!

Summary: I love this hotel. The staff are incredible. From the moment I arrived, Trish took excellent care of me. They put me in the upper Catalina suite, which had its own private deck with a dining area. The waves were practically crashing on the deck.   You cannot beat the views from almost anywhere in this hotel. They also have live music at night on the weekends. It is a short 20 minute walk from downtown Laguna Beach.  The bed and bedding in my suite were extraordinary. I slept like a baby. There was also a separate soaking tub in my suite, which I loved, as well as a coffee machine. A few of my other favorite highlights at this hotel were their incredible Aquaterra spa, and their phenomenal restaurant Splashes. I really do not think my stay could have been any better. I will
Manager Response: Hello Jen:  Wow - we are so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed all that we have to offer here at Surf & Sand.  Thank you for your high rating of the resort and for your compliments.  We especially enjoy hearing that you "slept like a baby" and you look forward to returning to us.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: A total gem of a hotel!
Summary: I‚Äôve never felt compelled enough to write a review on here....until now. What an incredible hotel!!! I can‚Äôt rate Surf & Sand highly enough. The customer service here is above and beyond anywhere else I‚Äôve stayed. Having never been to the area before Ali, Diane and team (you really have made our stay, thank you thank you!) have gone to such lengths to make us feel so welcome as well as having such fantastic knowledge of the local area/restaurants/things to do. Manager Response: Hello Warren Family:  Thank you for your glowing review of Surf & Sand.  We are honored that you shared your experience as you have not done so previously. Summary: By far the best hotel in Laguna Beach.  You get the best service and personalized experience with an amazing staff who cater to your specific needs.  I was proposing to my then girlfriend and the experience was much more than what I had imagined.  Everything went far better than expected and I left there with unforgettable memories.  Surf and Sand is now forever ingrained in our history and I hope to create new memories there in the future.
Manager Response: Hello Jason:  Thank you for your glowing review and high rating of Surf & Sand. We are honored that you shared your experience and are so pleased to learn how much you enjoyed your very special (proposal) stay.   It is gratifying to learn that we provided "unforgettable memories" for you and hope to have you back with us in the near future.  Have a great summer season!

Summary Heading: Amazing surf and views from room
Summary: What a fantastic hotel, if you have a room over looking the beach you will love it. the views are fantastic and you can sit on the balcony sipping a Champagne and watching the sun set as you listen to the surf.  The rooms are great and I could not fault the one I was in.  The bed was so comfortable.  It has a pool that leads to the beach and is a great location.   The staff are very polite and courteous.  I hope to stay again when next in California.

Summary Heading: An amazing place to rest, do business or celebrate a special occasion
Summary: I can't say enough positive things about this property. It is simply beautiful. Every single staff member was beyond pleasant, helpful and really went out of their way to make my stay fabulous. The ocean views are stunning, the location is close to tons of shopping. I'd go again in a heartbeat.

The Surf and Sand was a sight for sore eyes after the airline lost my bags.  The staff was so helpful, the property so beautiful, and the waves splashing on the beach so calming.  I enjoyed dinner at Splashes and long walks on the beach.  Wow I wish this was my every day.

When you start planning your next beach getaway make sure to stay at the Surf and Sand Resort where luxury awaits you at this oceanfront paradise! We have been staying at this hotel for 16 years and make it a travel destination at least three times a year! The exceptional service starts the moment you are greeted with the valet and bell staff. They immediately provide top notch assistance. Check-in is always a pleasure where we are welcomed back by the helpful front desk team members. Each day we start at the Pacific Perk with morning Lattes where the ladies provide wonderful service! Along with coffee they have many delicious food and snack choices as well. The gift shop is next door; they have a broad clothing selection and an array of beach gifts. Daytime activities include

We had the best time in this beautiful setting. Beach waves were so soothing at night! Food was good at splashes. They let us enjoy the pool all day even after we checked out. Drinks yummy too! Love love love!

Summary Heading: Listen to the waves from your room, delight in the service!
Summary: I travel for work a lot, but was delighted to open my door and see the ocean view and hear the waves from my room.  However, what really made my stay memorable was the incredibly helpful staff. Barbara was so nice.   Above and beyond at every turn.  I was running late as I checked in so they brought my bags to my room.  Not something I asked.  Their attitude was always so positive and upbeat.  The bar setting must rank as one of the best places to have a drink in the US.

My husband and I have stayed at this hotel several times, usually for our anniversary.  This time, we were attending a conference, but we were fortunate enough to be upgraded to the same suite we have stayed in before for our anniversary.  It was an oceanfront suite with a huge balcony, large enough to entertain friends! The sound of the waves crashing on the beach is something we never tire of, but we did have to close the doors in order to sleep!  The hotel has a great restaurant, Splashes, where we ate a delicious breakfast.  The conference food was a buffet of a grand variety of all-good food.  There is a full service spa on site that I have gone to in the past.  This hotel is one of my favorites, and I highly recommend a visit here!

The property itself is on the older-side, but the rooms are clean, large, and well-maintained.  The shower was had good water pressure.  You cannot beat the location/view, and you can hear the waves at all times (I love this but perhaps not ideal for light-sleepers - though earplugs were provided!).  Staff members are very friendly and competent.  Looking forward to coming back again soon!

The Surf and Sand is the best hotel to stay in Laguna!  Great views,food and staff!  Wonderful linens!  We have been going back to this hotel every year for about 15 years!  We have never had a bad experience or problem at the Surf and Sand!  Everyone of the staff seem to really enjoy working there, you get a great vibe off all of the staff!

Simply spectacular! Fall asleep to the sound of calming waves and wake up to watch dolphins frolic in the sea. Wonderful service, great food and friendly employees all add to the picturesque setting in world famous Laguna Beach.

I go every year for 3-4 nights right after the Christmas holidays just to write, relax, listen to the ocean all day and night, and enjoy all that Laguna has to offer. Everyone is super friendly, helpful and and I am always a happy camper. The rooms are lovely, the food great, service superb, spa really nice and location just cannot be beat.  I also love the Capri Laguna for it's location and the staff, but the rooms were getting pretty tired and dated.

This hotel is a relaxing stay. Spa and restaurant are fantastic so if you don‚Äôt want to go anywhere is perfect. But if you do there‚Äôs some nice restaurants and shops within walking distance. The beach is easily accessible and that‚Äôs where we spent most of my time. Our favorite part, which we realize might not be someone else‚Äôs, is the ocean can be heard your entire stay. To us it‚Äôs relaxing but if that‚Äôs something that would bother you at night keep that in mind. They offer earplugs in the room.

I highly recommend this resort if you're in Laguna Beach. The staff were kind, responsive, and knowledgeable. The food was very good and the view from our room spectacular. Even though it was a business trip, I felt like I was on vacation.

This is an excellent facility with a beautiful setting on the ocean.  There are fun activities at the site. The staff was excellent, very cordial, and willing to help at every turn. The Splashes restaurant provided many healthy eating options along with great service.

Had the opportunity to stay at this resort due to a business trip.  Was fortunate to be on the ocean side, the 8th floor of the main portion of the resort.  The first night the noise of the surf kept me awake, but by the second night, it seemed peaceful.  Overall the facility is a bit dated but it is still nicely maintained. Nice balcony to enjoy watching the water.  Food at the restaurant and at the conference was all pretty good.

Lovely property!  We enjoyed the sound of the crashing waves.  A whale stopped to feed for about 45 minutes right in front of the hotel, close to shore.  We also saw lots of dolphins and pelicans.  The staff was pleasant and helpful.  The restaurant is great.  I really enjoyed spending my birthday here!

I've been staying at hotels in Laguna for over twelve years. This hotel has the best service by far. My beachfront room was clean, stylish and beautiful. The service at the front desk, valet, and room service was impeccable. There are really only three luxury hotels in Laguna, this one, is by far, the best.

I stayed here with my husband and 9 year old twins and we all agree that the Surf and Sand was enjoyable for everyone in our group.  The location is terrific with easy access to the beach and the pool, a lovely view of the ocean from our spacious and comfortable room, and walking distance to shopping.  The beds are extremely comfortable and it was a pleasant surprise to have a coffee maker and refrigerator.  We had room service several times and also had dinner at the restaurant.  All was extremely tasty and memorable.  The best part was the staff.  From the time we arrived till our departure, the entire team was pleasant and responsive,and made our stay even more enjoyable.  We look forward to returning.
Manager Response: Hello Scenic:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for sharing your recent experience! We are always pleased to learn that our guests enjoyed every aspect of the resort.   Thank you also for the compliments of our team.  We are proud of each associate and appreciate knowing we exceeded your expectations.  Hopefully, you will be able to return sooner than later. Please reach out for any needed assistance in booking your next stay.   Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Best location in Laguna Beach. Splash restaurant is super good, the food and service is outstanding. Service at this property is 5star no question. The staff goes out of their way to make you feel like you are special.
Manager Response: Hello Detroit:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for sharing your "wow" experience! We are always pleased to learn that our guests enjoyed every aspect of the resort once again. Hopefully, you will be able to return sooner than later. Please reach out for any needed assistance in booking your next stay.   Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: The room was excellent and right above the crashing waves. The staff was efficient and friendly. I would highly recommend this hotel for both the experience and the value. We walked to shopping and restaurants day and night.

This resort is very Outdated. Service was subpar for the price. Great view on the ocean. That‚Äôs the only thing going for this resort. Restaurant is overpriced and unimpressive. Perhaps I just overpaid for My stay...

Summary Heading: A Haven of peace and tranquillity.
Summary: I cannot express enough how beautiful and tranquil this resort is!  My daughter and I went with hopes of having a stress free vacation. It was that and more!  Imagine, your lying in you bed with the french doors opened to the sound of the ocean waves and to the gentle breeze of the ocean calming you and the feeling of complete peace.  The next morning we enjoyed a very lovely breakfast with the ocean as our view. While eating our breakfast we saw from a distance to what seemed like a whale, so incredibly beautiful!  The service from the moment we checked in to the moment we left was outstanding.   We highly recommend this place.  I personally cannot wait to go back!

Absolutely a 5 star experience for our family! Stayed here for my birthday and loved every bit of it. Starting with the wonderfully friendly and knowledgeable doorman Mike. He was incredibly helpful and directed us to a great local spot for dinner that our entire family enjoyed.  Our view was spectacular,  the beds were super comfy and the location was priceless.  Thank you for a great visit!
Manager Response: Hello recent guest:  Thank you for the high rating of Surf & Sand, your compliments of the resort and the special mention of Mike. We appreciate knowing our associates go out of their way to ensure our guests are well-informed and enjoyed their time with us.  Mike  always meets the needs of our guests with smiles and great recommendations!  Please reach out for any needed assistance when you are able to return.  Warm regards,

Summary: Took wifey away for her birthday.  Decided to head back to S & S.  Wonderful stay, the ocean right below our room, perfect.  And we got a peak of how the rooms are going to be redone - amazing.  This is now my favorite resort to getaway, don‚Äôt waste your time and money at the stuffy resorts down the coast (you know who you are), stay here.  Need to bring and book a group, large or small?  Call Amy in sales, she will take great care of you. We are just trying to find time to get back.
Manager Response: Hello!  We are so pleased to learn that Surf & Sand is your "favorite resort to get away" and that we met and exceeded your expectations. We agree with  you  - Amy is a great asset to the resort and we appreciate your compliments of her.  Thank you for the high rating and your positive feedback.  Hopefully, you will find the time to "get back" with us very soon.  Warm regards,

Summary: Surf and Sand  and amenities are outstanding.  Great location, Relaxing and wonderful views of ocean! Splashes is a great place for breakfast, dinner or lunch.  Great items on the menu for everyone. Pleasant and happy staff.
Manager Response: Hello Safari:  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed all that we have to offer our guests at Surf & Sand! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and provide feedback.  Hopefully, we will have you back with us in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: We were married at this hotel in 2010 and sadly had not been back since other than for a lunch or dinner when in the area. ( We are from Canada)   We recently returned and it is always wonderful when things are as you remember them to be. This hotel is perfection...   !   We had a room on the 1st floor - normally a low floor is a negative, but not hear, the waves come right under your balcony and the views are breathtaking!   The Rooms a beautifully decorated in beach hues and please do not ever think of changing this..  we love everything about this place. It instills a sense of immediate calm.   The Beds are comfortable.   The Bathrooms are simple ( maybe these could use a freshening up and I have always wondered why bathroom lights in hotels are not on dimmers so that you can
Manager Response: Hello Karina:  Thank you for your high rating and glowing review of Surf & Sand. We are so pleased that you were finally able to return to the resort and lovely Laguna Beach!   As our very valued, repeat guests, we appreciate your compliments of all that we have to offer and for letting other travelers know what to expect during their stay.  It is gratifying to learn that we  exceeded your expectations once again.   We hope you are able to return in the not-too-distant future. Please contact us for any needed assistance.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Four stars only because the access doors/corridors and elevator to the tower does not do much for first impressions and really do need to be updated and improved both functionally and aesthetically. However, outside of that, the hotel IS very nice and clean and rooms are modern and updated. The valet service was exceptional! Always very pleasant and helpful!
Manager Response: Hello Michelle:  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at Surf & Sand. We value and appreciate your feedback, and are pleased you enjoyed your stay. Thank you also for the compliments of our very accommodating valet service.  We hope to have you return in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: We have stayed at the Surf and Sand for over 40 years.  We brought out children here when they were young and now they bring their families here!  The service here is always first class.  This particular visit we had a car problem when we got here.  The Valet guys were amazing and took good car of us and our car until we got it fixed.  The rooms are perfect and housekeeping pays close attention to detail.  It is a very safe property and employees are always visible and polite!  You cannot beat the view!  With the high tides this month we wake to feeling like we are on a ship.  We love the waves and can sit on our deck for hours and watch them.  Room service enjoys setting up your meal or coffee with a flair!  We also love sitting down at the bar with the windows open and the
Manager Response: Hello Mrs. Fahey:  Thank you so much for taking the time from your leisure stay to let us know you are  enjoying another stay and that we, once again, met your expectations.   As our long time,  loyal guests, we value your comments and appreciate the compliments of the resort,  Splashes restaurant, our associates and location.  Thank you also for letting other travelers know what to expect when our guests.  Hopefully, you will return in the near future so that we are able to pamper you in the style to which you are accustomed!!   Warm regards,

Summary: I made a quick getaway to celebrate a major milestone in my life, the Surf and Sand is always the place i go for this. The resort is so quaint and you can not beat the views and the sound of crashing waves.  I love my solo time here!
Manager Response: Hello North Star:  We are so pleased that you were able to enjoy Surf & Sand once again. Thank you for the compliments of the resort and your high rating!  When you are able to return, please contact us for any needed assistance. Hopefully, it will be in the not-too-distant future.   Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Clean room with great view and friendly staff
Summary: Booked this room for a weekend getaway with my husband without the kids.  Got the package with free valet parking and free breakfast.  Our room was in the Towers on the 4th floor.  It was overlooking the ocean and the sound of the surf was sooooo soothing.  The room as bright and clean.  Bed was comfy.  There were a few things that may need upgrading such as the wooden cabinets in the bathroom but this was hardly noticeable.  The location was central to all the shops and restaurants.  We ordered room service for our breakfast and boy was it good.  We both had avocado toast; my husband had his with smoked lox and I had mine with crab meat.  Both were delicious and extremely filling.  We also ordered orange juice which came in a tall glass and was very satisfying.  There's a
Manager Response: Hello Deborah:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand. We appreciate your compliments of the resort and the service we provide our guests.  We are very pleased to learn you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your return. Please contact us for any needed assistance.    Warm regards,

Summary: we Spent the weekend even though raining. Location was great.  Still managed to visit local stores and restaurants. I would definitely book again.  Travelzooo booking was awesome. Spa service was great especially in inclement weather
Manager Response: Hello Curiosity!  Thank you for your high rating of the resort, and Laguna Beach as a whole. We are pleased to learn that you managed a great stay - this has been an "awesome" winter and we are grateful for the rain which was badly needed. Hopefully, you will be able to return when our weather is back to "normal." Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful views, excellent food, and exceptionally warm and helpful staff
Summary: We could not have been happier with our stay at the Surf and Sand!  Our room was spacious and comfortable with a view that felt more like we were floating on the water.  Every member of the staff that we interacted with was warm and exceptionally helpful.  We ate at Splashes (a much too casual name for a high end restaurant) and our meal was excellent...as was room service with was delivered more quickly than we would have expected.  I will say that this is not a new resort and there are some aspects that reflect this...but it still earns a full five stars from us!  üòä
Manager Response: Hello Catherine:  Your high rating of the resort is very much appreciated. We are always pleased to learn that our guests have enjoyed their time with us and that they were pleasantly surprised at all that we have to offer.  We look forward to having you back with us in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: Amazing place to stay.  We didn‚Äôt want to leave.  If I hadn‚Äôt paid for another place our last night in So. Ca, I would have absolutely extended my stay here.  We loved our room; second floor of the tower, ocean front.  We saw dolphins, sunsets, surf and sunshine.  The pool was sublime and the weather was warm enough that we could still enjoy what this Resort has to offer.  We just loved Splashes bar (I mean the restaurant is awesome too) but the ambience of the bar is so fun sitting over the water. Great coffee shop with grab and go items gave us another eating option.  We never had to leave the property and spent our last afternoon in the sun and just staring at the view from our balcony. There are many places in the area to stay but we really felt this ticked all the boxes for
Manager Response: Hello Happy Guests!  Thank you for the glowing review of Surf & Sand.  We are so appreciative of you taking the time to let us and other travelers know that you enjoyed all the aspects of the resort.  To learn that we exceeded your expectations is especially gratifying.    Please contact us when you are able to return to lovely Laguna Beach.  Regards,

Summary: The resort is stunning! The rooms have amazing panoramic ocean views and the resort is close and convenient to the town of Laguna. Splashes restaurant inside has the best ocean views and is well worth the visit for drinks or dining. I will definitely make a return trip to this resort.
Manager Response: Hello Cincinnati!  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay and for the high rating of Surf & Sand. We are always pleased to learn that our guests have enjoyed  their time with us.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Per the usual, an outstanding experience from start to finish. The concierge services are so helpful and the rooms have views that are unmatched at that price point. Breakfast at Solashes is amazing and the location is in a perfect location for beach, shopping, and dining activities. I have a hard time staying anywhere else when traveling to the OC.
Manager Response: Hello Brian:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for your compliments of our location, staff, Splashes and Laguna Beach as a whole. We are so pleased you enjoyed your  time with us and hope to have you back in the near future.  Please contact us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Staff is amazing and very accommodating...went out of their way to help arrange my proposal. The location is beautiful, with most rooms on top of the beach (literally). You know a place is good when locals choose it as their weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Hello Climber:  We are so pleased to learn you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for sharing  your experience, your high rating of the resort and letting other travelers know what to expect.  We hope to have you back in the near future.  Please let us know how me may assist with your future stay!  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Location, Views, Great Service and Fine Dining
Summary: Sprang for an upgraded room - corner in tower directly overlooking the beach and the ocean.  Spectacular sunsets every night.  About a mile from the center of town.  Room was clean and spacious.   Service was excellent - friendly, responsive and accommodating.  We had a situation, late in the evening, where my wife experienced temporary, but severe back pain and needed some Tylenol or similar product. The on-site shop was closed.  But, the security man on duty was able to get in and bring her the Tylenol.  It was much appreciated.  Splashes restaurant, on premises, is a must for dinner.  My wife had seared scallops with kabocha squash pur√©e, white asparagus, red wine poached pear and black garlic aioli.  I started with some lobster bisque.  For my main I had the seared turbot
Manager Response: Hello Mr. East:  Thank you so much for your high rating of Surf & Sand and sharing feedback regarding  your recent stay.  We value your comments and appreciate the compliments of the resort, location and Splashes restaurant.  We hope to have you back in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards!

Summary: Wonderfully romantic location! Beautiful sunset/sunrise, excellent service, amazing views. My husband and I had our first date at Splashes over 20 years ago. Celebrated our anniversary with 2 other couples and enjoyed a lovely week-end. Staff is friendly and efficient. Amazing views, Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hello Mrs. B!  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed another stay at Surf & Sand and appreciate your high rating of the resort. Thank you for sharing your feedback and the compliments of all that we have to offer.  As our loyal guests, we take your comments very seriously and value your input.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: The Surf and Sand Laguna Beach Hotel Staff is so warm and welcoming.  The special Valentine's offering at Splashes was wonderful, the meal was awesome - we will definitely be back!  The room was perfect with a beautiful view of the ocean...
Manager Response: Hello Flyer!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your Valentine's stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and provide a high rating of the resort.  Hopefully, you will return sooner than later.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: A few things to know about this place
Summary: If this hotel was on the Gulf coast of Florida, it would be a 3 star hotel. But because it's in California, they command much higher rates... but apples are apples, right? So, the staff are terrific -- sincere, friendly and very helpful. The location is fantastic. But If you end up in the building just behind the pool, especially room 331, move immediately. It's next to the elevator. It's also full of mold or mildew for some reason. They shouldn't even be selling this room. In any case, they were able to move us to main tower, which doesn't have a mold problem and it was great. They claim the rooms were renovated but it still feels like 1989 looking around. The armchairs were definitely not replaced. So, not bad but not a "wow - 5 star experience"
Manager Response: Dear Herculepoirot,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   We take pride in the quality services and products we provide for our guests. I will personally ensure the room you mentioned is closely inspected and up to standards for future use.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: Beautiful rooms with very comfy beds. Amazing view of the ocean and getting to listen to it every night while I slept. Location, food, facilities, staff.. everything. Best option to go with this resort on my honeymoon.
Manager Response: Hello Osama:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and letting us know you enjoyed your honeymoon stay!  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future,  as well as to celebrate your wedding anniversary next year.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: What can I say...this by far the best hotel in Laguna Beach! The accommodations, view, food and beverage and the staff were awesome. I hope to return once a year. In addition, I have been in the hospitality business for many years working for Loews, Omni and Ritz-Carlton. You are superior if not better and it shows by the professionalism and attitude of your staff. They all seem to enjoy working there and never had an unkind word. Keep up the good work and continue what you are doing!
Manager Response: Hello Joseph:  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know that we met your expectations during your recent stay!  Thank you for the compliments of the resort as a whole, our staff, location  and food & beverage.  Hopefully, you will be able to return so that we are able to, once again, provide the service you deserve and expect.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Ocean view, sound of the waves, peace, luxury
Summary: There are so many reasons to love this hotel.  It is the BEST location, being right on the water.  Just step out onto the sand.  The rooms are luxurious,   the balconies enable you to see seagull, seals, and pelicans.  It's quiet and peaceful.  The service is great.  Every person I met was polite, smiling, and helpful.  Kathleen at the front desk was such a help with information, and  answered all of my questions and had many useful suggestions, as well as being very very nice.  Trish at the front desk was also nice.  Sondra made a special trip to my room to give me the local pizza  brochure.  Mike, Michael, and John, who parked my car,  were smiling, very polite, and friendly.  They were welcoming, and gave me a bottle of water for my drive home. As a returning guest, they gave
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Webb:  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at Surf & Sand.  We are so pleased to have had you back with us and appreciate your compliments of the resort and all that we have to offer. Thank you also for the kind words of those you mention. Our associates always enjoy being recognized for the service they provide.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the not-too-distant future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Relax with the ocean at your feet.
Summary: We visit Surf and Sand in February each year.  When you enter the very lovely room the first thing you see and hear is the ocean stretching out before you.  Patio doors lead to a balcony with comfortable seating for reading or gazing at the sunsets.  After tearing yourself away from the view you turn around to find a wonderfully appointed  room and bathroom.  I've never stayed in a room with so much storage space.  There are drawers in the closets and in the room.  A desk faces the ocean.  Lamps abound.  This year it rained a lot .  We were lucky to have such lovely spot to spend our time.  Excellent restaurants are on site with outstanding room service as well.
Manager Response: Hello Trek:  Thank you so much for your very high rating of Surf & Sand and your compliments of the resort. As our very loyal guests, we appreciate you taking the time to let us know that we once again,  met your expectations.  We value your feedback and enjoy knowing you had another great stay. Thank you also for letting other travelers know what to expect when they are with us.  Please reach out in the future for any needed assistance. We hope to have you back in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: This place is breathtaking!  I loved everything about it. The day we decided to go, it rained. What made it nice was that everything was on the property.  Spa and restaurant so we never left.  It was a great time.  I highly recommend this place for any occasion.
Manager Response: Jessica:  Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for your compliments of the entire resort. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay during this rainy, winter season!!  Hopefully, you will be able to return when the sun is shining and you are able to take advantage of the beach and pool areas, as well.   Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: My best friend and I met in Laguna Beach for a girls trip.  I came from Playa del Rey, she from San Diego.  Accommodations, staff, on-site restaurants, location, was the best it could have been.  Highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Hello Lionel!  We are so pleased to learn that your girl's trip was a success. Thank you for letting us and other travelers know what to expect when staying at Surf & Sand. Your compliments of the entire resort are appreciated.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future when we are able to, once again, exceed your expectations.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stayvacation at the Surf & Sand Resort
Summary: Hubby won a gift certificate for a free night stay here. Everything was wonderful including our room right on the ocean, our dinner at the Splashes bar and our LA Times arriving in a beautiful sleeve the next morning.
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer:  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your "stayvacation" at Surf & Sand! Thank you for your compliments and high rating of the resort and for letting others know what to expect during their stay.  Hopefully, you will be able to return for a  longer visit in the future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.   Warm regards,

Summary: Love, Love, Love this resort. Beautiful ocean view. Bellhop, Lucas Garcia, was a wonder young man. Everyone was so helpful. This was my 4th visit. Can't wait to go back. Beautiful weather, great restaurants and shopping.... just a great escape.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Teeeee!  Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your fourth visit at Surf & Sand! As our very loyal, return guest, we appreciate your compliments of the resort and of Mr. Garcia.  Our associates always enjoy knowing their service is appreciated!!  Please call upon us when you are able to return - hopefully, in the near future!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Oh my... the sound of the waves is amazing!
Summary: I visited Surf & Sand for a business event that lasted several days.  The facility is top notch, the rooms are clean and spacious, and the beds were super comfy.  The cleaning staff was excellent and the sound of the waves was the most magical part of the entire stay at the hotel.  Whatever you do, get an ocean side room.  If you can't book one, find another date to visit when you can.  The sunsets and sunrises are a special experience, and the water is a clear deep aqua.  I am certainly bringing my husband back to this venue for a special occasion.   For a business meeting, it was top notch and the food service was excellent.  Special shout out to Sam who served us expertly.  If you go in Jan you might get to see a whale migrating like we did!  I was told there was a pod of
Manager Response: Hello Annie:  Thank you for taking the time to give Surf & Sand a high rating and for letting us know how  much you enjoyed your recent stay!  We are always pleased to learn that we met your expectations and were able to enjoy the special accommodations we offer.  And, yes, the winter months are different than any other time of year along the shore.    Please call upon us when you and your husband plan to spend a "special occasion" so that we are able to assist in booking your stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: This hotel is beautiful. It sits directly on the beach and every room has an amazing view of the ocean. If you like falling asleep to the sounds of waves crashing, leave your large, beautiful balcony doors open. It is an older hotel and a bit confusing to navigate sometimes AND if you happen to stay during the week or two when air conditioning would be helpful, you may not find any in your room. However, the hotel staff will bring in a floor fan and in combination with the ocean air, this makes it reasonable.   The rooms are extremely comfortable and well maintained, the staff is very welcoming, polite, and accommodating. The bar ‚ÄúSplashes‚Äù, is one of the most comfortable and beautiful bar settings I have ever experienced and is still largely a locals secret. The hotel is on
Manager Response: Hello!  We are so pleased to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay over the weekend. Thank you for your high rating of Surf & Sand and the compliments of our location, staff, guest rooms, Splashes and the service we provide.  Thank you also for the helpful hints to other travelers.  Hopefully, you will be with us again in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a couple of nights and loved it. The location is excellent for walking to restaurants, shops and bars. The hotel itself is beautiful and cozy. We had an ocean view room and it was very peaceful to go sleep and wake up to the ocean. Summary: We just spent the three day weekend at surf and sand with our family friends best birthday ever! We had booked our rooms for a party of 16 but needed help last minute to plan dinner on Saturday for everyone.  Ali at concierge helped us contact Matt who was AWESOME helped us set up a menu for our guests last minute  at 15fiftyfive lounge which was outdoors overlooking the ocean with fire pits AMAZING because we had a casual set up with couches and dinner catered by their restaurant Splashes.  I can not stress how our friends and family were so well taken care of by the staff at surf and sand! The outdoor band canceled but they asked if we wanted any genre of music and of course I requested Latin music! We felt like celebrities at the attention we received at surf and sand we had

Summary: You can‚Äôt beat the location but with all the competition in Laguna Beach and Laguna Niguel, the Surf and Sand really needs to step it up.  There is a constant layer of sand on the floors...not sure if they want to make it feel Beach but you think in the early morning. The floors would be clean?  I had a room on the top floor next to all the construction - looks like they are renovating one room at a time? There were no lights in the hallway, my room was dated and clearly. It renovated. There is no air conditioning yet so make sure you call to get an updated room.    Also, the food is terrible. The turbot at splashes came out like a piece of rubber. I hosted a meeting and the selection was no more creative than what a Marriott would offer. They were very inflexible too. They

Summary Heading: Why I love the Surf and Sand Resort so much!
Summary: I was born and raised in St. Louis, MO, about as far from the ocean as one could get. Luckily for me my parents brought me to the Surf and Sand for the first time when I was 6 and every year after that for 1 to 2 weeks until I was 18. I fell in love with the ocean and its creatures during those visits. As a result, I have had my own non profit ocean conservation organization for nearly 25 years now so I wanted to pay homage to the place where my childhood dreams were formed and then came true. That is why I chose to celebrate my 60th birthday at the Surf and Sand with the love of my life and our friends. All of it, from the service, to the food, and of course our room with that amazing ocean view are all superb! By far, this was the best birthday I ever had!
Manager Response: Hello Jeff P:  Thank you so very much for your high rating of Surf & Sand and for sharing your wonderful story of your history with the resort.  We always enjoy hearing from our very loyal, long time guests and the memories they still experience.  We are also happy to learn it was the best birthday you ever had and it was right here at Surf & Sand.  Hopefully, you will be able to return to us in the near future.  Warmest regards,

Summary: We recently stayed at the Surf and Sand Hotel which for 29 years was one of our favorite places to go. We encountered a problem that was a repeat from the year before. Turns out the maid was washing our used glasses in our room and putting them back on the counter neatly as if they were new glasses. It was a completely unsanitary situation. After complaining to two different managers who did not take me very seriously until I mentioned that I had marked the glasses. The manager tried to convince me that old glasses were sent to their dishwasher facility which was not accurate at all. For three days we had the reused glasses in our room. This is a very fancy hotel in a beautiful location. Very expensive. Personnel are very nice. There‚Äôs no excuse for providing unsanitary glasses

This was my first time visiting the Surf and Sand. It's about a mile south of the downtown area of Laguna, so be prepared for that walk or drive if you're planning on visiting restaurants or going shopping. Pros:- right on the beach- has a pool overlooking the beach- 1 mile from downtown (walkable or short drive)- pretty good rooms (older, but clean)- has decent restaurant and cafe on property - very friendly / prompt staffCons:- some of the property is VERY old (staircases, elevators, outside areas by some rooms); e.g. we had a bunch of chairs, tables, cleaning supplies, etc. piled up right outside our room. Our shower also would not drain, but they came and fixed it promptly.- no AC in ocean-facing rooms at least (our room was HOT in November; cannot imagine how miserable it

Summary Heading: My favorite place on this planet
Summary: We come here every time we're in SoCal. Surf and Sand resort is special. It is very intimate and right on the water.. The design of the rooms is so elegant, so airy, so romantic.. just perfect.. I haven't seen better design actually, and I have been to a lot of nice places. The rooms have direct ocean front view with many shades of Pacific turquoise and pink-purple sunsets up front and personal.. Great patios for champagne toasts. Their bar "Splashes" has that name for a reason. The water almost hits your table.. doesn't get closer to the ocean anywhere around.. And locals like to come by and hang out too, so it's always fun. Their restaurant is fabulous. Spa is nice. We often just stay and never leave the resort. And let it all soak in and recalibrate. Enjoy guys.
Manager Response: Hello Katya:  Thank you so much for your high rating and glowing review of Surf & Sand.  As our loyal guests, we appreciate your compliments of the resort and letting other travels know what to expect during their stay.  We look very forward to having you back with us.  Please reach out for any needed assistance so that we are able to accommodate the details of your future stay.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Not 5 Stars. Not worth the hype.
Summary: Took my wife to this hotel for her Birthday.  She wanted to go after hearing such great things about it. Here is my opinions on the hotel:  Pros:  Staff was extremely friendly and considerate. The weather was nice and the concierge service set up our room with candles and flowers as requested. Great views of sunset from balcony.  Cons:  Toilet was very low to the ground, toilet room small and cramped. Too many kids running around the pool and taking up all the space in the spa. Not enough beach chairs on sand. Food was over priced for what you received. $16.00 for chips and salsa, plus 20% gratuity plus $5 room service delivery fee. The hotel also has a 3% surcharge which makes up for the increase in minimums wage.  Overall I would not return. The view and my wife's happiness

The chicken nachos at Splash Bar ruined the five star dinner we had planned for later that evening. They were so out of this world that everything else after it tasted mediocre. I eat a lot of nachos but these were something else. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Hello  Janet L:  Thank you for your high rating and compliments of our chicken nachos!  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed the nachos and hope to have you return in the near future to enjoy them once again.  We look forward to your return!  Warm regards,

Summary: Absolutely beautiful hotel in a great location. From the moment we arrived we were blown away by the hospitality, beauty of the grounds, and the professionalism of the service rendered. The views from our rooms were stunning, especially the sunset on the first night. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Hello Ronald W:  Thank you for your high rating and compliments of Surf & Sand. We are always pleased to know our guests enjoyed their time at the resort and are anxious to return.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Absolutely perfect in every way! Casual elegance and unpretentious beach house hospitality at its best. We were comfortable from the moment we arrived! Our room on the fourth floor had a spectacular view of the setting sun overlooking the crashing waves.  Dinner at Splashes was outstanding; my personal favorites were the tuna crudo and seared scallops, the play on flavors in both was incredible. Our waiter did an excellent job pairing our dinner with the perfect wine. We used the trolley to  explore town; it was so nice to not have to drive anywhere all week-end long. We left feeling spoiled, relaxed and recharged. We will defiantly be back soon! Best anniversary yet!
Manager Response: Hello!  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for your high rating of the resort and taking the time to let other travelers know what to expect while staying with us.  Please return soon so that we are able to "spoil" you once again.  Reach out for any needed assistance!  Warm regards,

Summary: Such a beautiful hotel! Sadly just stayed for one night before heading home but hopefully will return one day. The staff were super helpful and friendly, especially Sandra and Diane on the concierge desk. The location is perfect, right on the beach overlooking the ocean yet an easy walk to restaurants and shops. That‚Äôs if you can tear yourself away from the pool and amazing bedroom and breathtaking views. Would highly recommend Surf and Sand and will be telling all my friends to visit!
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Yorkshire:  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at Surf & Sand and for your high rating of the resort!  We appreciate you letting us know that you enjoyed your stay and advising other travelers of all that we have to offer.  Sandra and Diane are a great representation of our Concierge team and an asset to the resort.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future for a longer stay.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Great resort, but incredibly, no A/C
Summary: My wife and I booked 4 nights here in October for a second babymoon. When making the reservation a few months prior, I never would've thought to verify that a 4-star resort in hot Southern California would have air conditioning. To me, that would be like somebody verifying a resort would have heat in Minnesota.   Despite how much we liked the room, the restaurant, the pool, and overall the fantastic views, it's just not worth it trying to sleep in a sweat box, and not getting quality sleep on what is supposed to be a nice relaxing vacation. And especially at $1k/night. I mean come on! We ended up cancelling our last 2 nights and instead spending the final 2 nights at the Monarch. I would not recommend this place or go back unless/until all rooms have air conditioning.

Summary Heading: A little pricey and not so friendly ...
Summary: My husband surprised our family with a 3 day trip to Laguna Beach. We are from Idaho and have been married for 20 years, this was our anniversary present. We saved up for 2 years for this trip.   I would not come back to this hotel. The rooms are old and outdated , it is like a wet jailhouse , the place smelled like mildew as well.   Our room was over $500 a night and we would not paid more than $150. The level of service from all staff was like a Holiday Inn or best western.   Best to stay away.

I had been recommend to stay at this hotel with my daughter by a friend who stays near by . I checked into the hotel to whom the check in staff seemed to have developed a sever case of amnesia as they failed to point out that they where going through a renovation in the hotel both beside the pool and also to the side of my bedroom . So if you like to relax by the pool listening to jack hammers all day ...then this is the place to be  ( I have since been advised that the renovations will be carrying on until December so at least if you read this review you will know ) When it came to check out and I received my bill ...I pointed out that there was a major descprecncy in my bill in such that they were charging myself twice on upgrading my room ... The checkout lady went out of her
Manager Response: Dear Jmk0ne,   Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay. On behalf of Surf & Sand, I extend our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please call upon us so  that we may accommodate another glorious stay!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: A special thank to Diane and Celia!
Summary: Had the most incredible stay a Surf & Sand this weekend. Not only only was the hotel beautiful and the room had an impeccable ocean view, but the service at the concierge desk by Diane & Celia was the highlight of our stay. My girlfriend and I travel A LOT and have stayed at some of the best hotels in the world, and the service we got from Diane and Celia is still the best we tried so far. Manager Response: Hello Stephan and Amal!  We are so appreciative of your compliments of Celia and Diane. Summary Heading: best weekend and most relaxing weekend I've spent in a long time.
Summary: I loved the balcony,  enjoyed my wine listened to ocean,  even though it was a grey weekend I still enjoyed it was great just to be there. Manager Response: Hello Recent Guest:  Thank you so much for your high rating of Surf & Sand and letting us know how much you enjoyed your time with us. Summary Heading: This is one of the best beach-front properties!
Summary: The Surf and Sand Resort is a fantastic beach-front property.  It has numerous amenities and their staff are amazing!  The regular rooms feel like suites!  Great location and easy to walk to many different restaurants and fun shopping.  I highly recommend dining at Splashes - amazing beach-front dining experience.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Buehler:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know that you enjoyed Surf & Sand, our property, staff and close-by  shopping and dining!  We appreciate your high rating and recommendations to other travelers. Hopefully, you will be able to return to lovely Laguna Beach in the near future.  Warm regards

Summary: This beach front , cold, old and dilapidated dungeon awaits you for $500 a night. The beds are old, the room has no cell phone service , and the staff was very inattentive. The pool was overcrowded with young teens screaming , and the entire stay was uncomfortable.   I would highly highly recommend NOT staying at this place. This is like a friend taking money from your wallet when you are sleeping , you wake up feeling cheated and upset.
Manager Response: Dear Jasonbarnes1234,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Summary: The Surf and Sand never disappoints. Built in 1948, the rooms are continuously renovated to always be like new. I love sleeping with the balcony door open all night to listen to the crashing waves. Beds are excellent. The weather is rarely too warm, but they will provide a box fan if you want one. Staff are friendly, professional, and ever-accommodating. All rooms open to the ocean, have a balcony with comfortable furniture, the pool is heated, and there‚Äôs a nice hot tub. There‚Äôs a nice honor bar in the room and also an awesome on-site restaurant, Splashes.

Summary: We have enjoyed staying and the luxurious Surf and Sand for sixteen years; we fondly refer to it as our home away from home. This was our first visit in October and we enjoyed every minute! The ocean front rooms are absolutely gorgeous! The sound of crashing waves while enjoying the balcony and a beverage is a perfect way to relax! Pacific Perk has wonderful lattes and yummy breakfast, lunch and snack options. Splashes Bar and Restaurant for drinks and dinner makes for romantic evenings! If you haven‚Äôt stayed at Surf and Sand Resort it is a must!! We visit several times a year; the location is spectacular and the resort employees make it even better!! It is a phenomenal five star vacation destination!
Manager Response: Hello Melody:  Thank you so much for your high rating of Surf & Sand and your compliments of all that the resort has to offer. We will see you in the not-too-distant future.    Hugs from All of Us!

Summary Heading: Amazing time with superb service at a dream resort
Summary: The resort location speaks for itself, located right on Laguna Beach, but what sets it apart is the staff, most notably Sandra on the Concierge Team. All 5 days we stayed were memorable, taking care of recommending places to go and things to do, making reservations and general organization was superb. Summary: Great service view food and people! This is place is a treasure! Loved it!! We had so much fun easy access to the beach great vibe. Everyone was very nice and hospitable the pool service was great. I can‚Äôt say enough good things!
