Summary Heading: The worst experience I have ever had.
Summary: So I didn't actually stay in the hotel. I had gone to visit my cousin who was staying here on her honeymoon. The carpark was very full and it was difficult for my sister who was driving to park the car due to lack lots. We saw a man standing in front of the hotel lobby next to the valet sign wearing the uniform of hotel employees. Due to this I got out of my car and asked if we could get our car parked by the valet. The man started yelling at me in a very aggressive manner asking where I was from and if I thought he was a valet just because he was a black man. I said no it's because you are standing next to the valet sign and wearing hotel uniform. He then started a tirade using multiple vulgarities including the F word. He also asked where I was from and when I said Singapore,
Manager Response: Dear Ali J,  On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize profusely for your recent experience. I will be investigating this with our security team so we can ensure it does not happen again.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: Stayed there for a wedding.  Being a  value hunter, I was slightly shocked by the prices as most upper end hotels add little value.  The Surf and Sand was a great experience.  We arrived early and enjoyed a leisurely afternoon at the pool with great ocean view and wonderful pool. Good poolside ceviche and drinks.    The room was nice with a good view of the ocean.  The room was recently upgraded with a nice floor.  The shower toilet area was slightly cramped.  Wonderful evening turn down service.  Nice Sunday paper waiting for us. Easy walking to nearby restaurants.  The grounds are well kept and the hotel displayed great intimacy.  Bravo!  My only complaint was the Wi-Fi in room 443 did not work very well and the cell reception was also poor.  It is a first world problem,
Manager Response: Hello Joe!  Greetings from Surf & Sand!  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your short stay at the resort and all of the amenities that we have to offer.  Our apologies that you did experience some difficulties that will be addressed for improvements.  Hopefully, you will be able to return soon to lovely Laguna Beach!  Warm regards,

Summary: Booked 4 nights here in an oceanfront room for a once in a lifetime experience, only to have Jet Blue (#$@!#) ruin night one by delaying the flight from Boston 5 hours due to equipment problems they knew about 10 hours in advance! We missed sunset, dinner, etc. and checked in after midnight East Coast time. The night manager was wonderful, gave us coupons for free drinks, free appetizers AND after we enjoyed those, sent a bottle of wine and chocolates to the room, all on the house. He saved our vacation. The rest of the staff is also great, the views are spectacular and the roar of the ocean is incredible. Someone complained about no air conditioning, but you really do not need it on the ocean. Surf and Sand is not inexpensive, but unlike most such places I have visited, worth
Manager Response: Hello Mark D:  Our sincere apologies that your trip to Laguna Beach got off to a bad start. We are pleased that, in the end, you were able to have an incredible vacation and enjoyed Surf & Sand.  Hopefully, you will be back in the near future so that we are able to, once again, accommodate your needs.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Sensational location!!  But room falling apart.
Summary: You cannot stay anywhere but here if you want to enjoy the ocean front at Laguna. We stayed in lower surf side king room. It was spectacular! The waves came right under our balcony. There are few locations where you can enjoy the ocean like this! It was mesmerising!  The room itself was basic. The cupboard doors (3) had even fallen off the hinges. The bathtub was mouldy. And it was best not to look too close at any fixtures. Things were seriously rusty and dusty. Corridors dark and many steps. HOWEVER this place has so much CHARM all these things can be overlooked. We are at the beach afterall. The room was clean. The staff are amazing! We both really loved our stay here and would love to return! This is is a superb location that words can hardly describe!
Manager Response: Hello Recent Guest:  Thank you for letting us know that you enjoyed the resort, location and our associates.  Please be assured that we appreciate your candor and would like you to know that major improvements for the entire resort are now in the planning stages. We hope to have you return when we are better able to provide an outstanding stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: Just got back after a two-night stay. We were very impressed with the facility and thought about staying another night as the weather was improving as we left! We were lucky (at a price) enough to have a north west corner room high up in the Tower Building which had great views, was quiet and afforded the wonderful sound of the crashing waves which may have been higher than normal due to the offshore storm that never materialized. Room was very well appointed, clean and bright and a perfect size for the two of us.  The hotel itself is not large, without being boutique sized, and appears to have grown by acquisitions of neighboring properties over the years, creating a tight footprint with various nooks and crannies which the hotel makes the most use of and makes it quite
Manager Response: Hello Robert:  Thank you so much for sharing your very informative feedback regarding your recent first stay at Surf & Sand. We are always pleased to learn that you enjoyed your time with us and let other travelers know what to expect during their stay.  Whenever we may be of assistance in the future, please call upon us when your travels bring you back to lovely Laguna Beach!  We hope it will be in the not-too-distant future!   Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Trip to celebrate birthdays and baby moon
Summary: Ishan was the person who checked us in today when we first arrived at the hotel. He asked my wife and I about the reason we were visiting the resort and we let him know we were celebrating several things. I mistakenly booked a room with 2 queens when I meant to book a king room. Once we relayed all this info to Ishan he went out of his way to try and help us out. He upgraded us to an ocean front corner king suite! We are highly impressed with the resort as well as the great customer service Ishan displayed when we arrived! I highly recommend celebrating a special event at the surf and sands!
Manager Response: Hello Joseph:  We are so pleased to learn that you had such a pleasant experience during your recent stay. Thank you for letting us know that Ishan was instrumental in ensuring we met your expectations. Compliments of our associates are always appreciated and shared!  Hopefully, you will be  able to return to Surf & Sand in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: This resort is located right on the beach.  It feels like the ocean is at your tips.  My room was on the first floor and the sound of the waves, the water, was so relaxing.  The sunsets are mesmerizing.  I love the location, valet parking for the car, spa is nice, location is perfect.
Manager Response: Hello Tara:  Thank you for letting us know how much you appreciated all of the amenities of the resort during your recent stay, and for informing other future travelers what to expect when staying at Surf &  Sand!    We hope you are able to return in the not-too-distant future.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Poor customer service , misleading information from staff
Summary: This is a beautiful place located in the heart of Laguna Beach. However , the stigma associated with the rudeness of OC DEFINITELY transcends to this hotel.   Very poor customer service and we stayed in the double room penthouse. The pool was filled with teenagers running around unsupervised , drinking and yelling , it was not a fun crowd. My husband and I are not big parties , we wanted to get away for a weekend.  And you would think $1800 a night would buy some peace and quiet ?? NOOOO....  I would never go back to this place.  Even if it was free. The staff did not listen to any of our concerns , requests for water , a stirrer for the coffee , there were NO cups or plates or silverware in the room. It was just a very , very bad customer experience.

My wife and I just checked in today and what a disappointment especially after such a great experience last year. If you ever stay here make sure they assign you a room on a higher level...definitely avoid the first or second floor...there is no cell phone coverage in the room. Once we complained and asked for the room to be changed as we wouldn‚Äôt be able to receive a call from there kids, it didn‚Äôt seem to have any effect. Their solution was to send. Technician..they somehow seem to believe a technician can fix cell coverage.   Anyway hugely disappointed with this customer service received.

Summary Heading: Our stay at Surf and Sand Resort
Summary: Ahhhhhh what an amazing time we had at Surf and Sand Resort in Laguna Beach. I highly recommend this hotel. It was clean and beautiful!!  Our room had a fabulous ocean view and the perfect balcony to see the sun set. It was romantic and I didn‚Äôt want to leave!!!  We hope to be back again soon!!!
Manager Response: Hello Mary Lou!   Thank you for taking the time to let us know that you enjoyed your recent stay!  Thank you also for the high rating and recommendation to other travelers, letting them know what to expect when staying at Surf & Sand.  We hope to have you back with us in the near future!  Happy Fall!

Summary: we were transferring from another Laguna Beach hotel from the previous night, where we had a sub-apr experience and were very dissatisfied.  One call to Surf & Sand, and they told us to come right over and enjoy the pool and beach while they got us a room ready.  From our early arrival, we were made to feel welcome, and the desk and house keeping staff had us in our room as soon as possible.   we were amazed and so grateful ;-)  This was our third stay here, I will never try to be "cheap" again...   You get what you pay for and this place is worth every penny.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for letting us know that we met your expectations once again.  We are also pleased that we were able to accommodate you after the unfortunate issue you experienced.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future. Just let us know when you need our assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Lack of A/C and lack of customer service
Summary: My husband and I checked in last night (for a four night stay) and were given a room overlooking the pool. We asked at that time if it was possible to stay in the main building in an oceanfront room. The answer was no, they were completely booked for Saturday night.   This morning (Sunday) around 7:30 a.m. we stopped at the front desk and asked about possibly switching to an oceanfront room with a king bed (previous night was not restful due to loud pool noise, and we were very warm- not a lot of ocean breeze when you are back behind the pool). The second night we ate in the bar and thoroughly enjoyed people watching and the food was great.....altogether a much nicer experience. Diane on the concierge desk so helpful and friendly when we had a slight issue with

The bath plug was unreliable and so were the room staff who did not visit for either room cleaning or turn down service at all on one day of our stay. Manager Response: Hello Sally:  Thank you so much for sharing your feedback regarding your recent dinner at Splashes. Summary Heading: Absolutely loved the service and hotel

Summary Heading: Excellent Resort with perfect view of sunset
Summary: The Surf and Sand Resort was recommended by a friend. The hotel was excellent from the valet to the entire staff. The hotel itself was beautiful and we had a huge room with a king bed and a balcony with a view of the ocean where we watched the sunset over Catalina Island.

Warm regards,

Summary: This hotel offers unparalleled view of the ocean, This place will blow you away with guest service. Manager Response: Hello Nick:  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Thank you for your feedback and for the compliments of Ishan. Summary: Room was first rate and the view of the ocean was unbelievable. The staff was always professional, and went above and beyond to make our stay more pleasant. There onsite restaurant made it so much easier to dine or enjoy a drink or two. The pool made it convenient to enjoy a leisurely dip and the outside bar made it simple to order food or drinks.
Manager Response: Hello Recent Guest:  Thank you for letting us know that you enjoyed your recent stay.  We appreciate and value your input and are pleased that you were able to take advantage of most of our amenities.  Thank you recommending the resort to future travelers.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: We had one of the Surf Side rooms and stayed for 4 nights, the bed was set so you could see the ocean view.  The sound of the ocean and the view from our room was incredible.  Our package included a full breakfast which was wonderful.  The staff was attentive and pleasant.  The food and coffee was really good. I would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Richard:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your stay at Surf & Sand.  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed the amenities of the resort and that you highly recommend our property to future travelers.  Please reach out to us when you are able to return so that we may accommodate the details of your stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: Laguna Beach is a beautiful and quaint town. I actually live close by, but I brought my mom down for an overnight birthday stay-cation. We enjoyed our time at the hotel. I gave it a good rating, but I do have a few suggestions. They really need to paint their lobby and replace the white sheer curtains there. They were filthy and not in line with the status of the hotel and the price of the rooms. The food delivered to our room was delicious! I give their breakfast very high marks. The only bummer was, they charge for delivery, automatically. I didn‚Äôt know that, as there was no menu in our room. So for 2 egg breakfasts, they charged a $5 delivery fee, which is fine, but I tipped him $15, because they didn‚Äôt mention the other charge.  I ended up unknowingly tipping $20 for 2 egg
Manager Response: Hello Debby:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay with your Mother. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future and contact us so that we are able to accommodate all of the details of your stay to avoid any discrepancies during your stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: Amazing hotel located in the heart of Laguna Beach with lots of shops and restaurants, all within walking distance! Every aspect of this hotel is beautiful.Our ocean front room was breathtaking, not to mention the spectacular, clear view of the Catalina Islands! Room was very spacious and beautifully decorated.It was very clean with big, comfortable beds.  Every staff member we encountered, from the Valet, to the Front Desk, to the Pool were very friendly and accommodating.  The pool area was so beautiful and relaxing with an attentive Wait staff to bring you drinks and food- Ahhhh, that's the life! (PS- a must try is the blackened chicken nachos!). There is also easy beach access from the pool, a definite plus!  The only negative thing about our stay is that it wasn't longer!
Manager Response: Hello Lisa Marie:  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand. We take pride in providing the best service possible to our guests and appreciate knowing we met your expectations.    Thank you for your compliments of our resort, associates, location and lovely Laguna Beach as a whole.  We hope to have you back in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: If you don't like being pampered, spoiled rotten,  and made to feel like you are the only guest on property. eating the tastiest food ever. While overlooking the beautiful  ocean, Than this is not the place for you.! The turn down service was over and above anything I have experienced in my travels. There is a light under the bed which illuminates like candles. They put the Rogers at end of bed. Then the tv is playing soft sounds along with the sounds of the waves crashing out side! AMAZING!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Darline L:  Thank you so very much for sharing your feedback and compliments regarding your recent stay.  We always enjoy hearing that we met the expectations of our guests and appreciate you letting other travels know about all the special touches and amenities at Surf & Sand.    We certainly hope that you will be able to return as our guest in the near future.  Please reach out to us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: We hadn‚Äôt initially planned to come to Laguna Beach on our first family holiday to America but I am so glad we did. Surf and Sand was such a lovely hotel, with great staff that made us feel so welcome. This included giving a soft toy to our daughter after she had been sick and been so kind to her throughout the stay. They looked after us so well from the beginning to the end. I couldn‚Äôt recommend this hotel more highly. The rooms are lovely, the facilities are great and it is only a short walk to the centre of Laguna Beach - all along a beautiful beach. They were really accommodating to us having a baby - changing sheets, providing water etc - and made us feel like a truly valued guest. We loved our stay and would definitely come back again. I would recommend this to all my
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for letting us know that you enjoyed your first stay at Surf & Sand.  We appreciate your compliments of our staff, location and amenities. Please contact us directly when you are able to return. We look very forward to having you back with us!  Warm regards,

Summary: Surf and Sand Hotel is located right on the beach in Laguna. It's a 2 mile (approx) walk to the main village.  The hotel has a tower (I stayed in room 828), and also offers suites, larger units, and another small beachfront half tower.  The hotel itself is a bit older looking, but was well kept.  Room was clean, nicely decorated. Bathroom was not as large as the newer hotels, but was spacious enough for us.    As far as getting around the property, it can be cumbersome. The tower has two elevators (slow). One elevator was inoperable when I was there. This made moving around slower.    We had lunch at the bar before we checked in. Sitting at the bar is like sitting directly on the water. Great view.  You can eat from the restaurant menu or the bar menu, which is a nice option.
Manager Response: Hello Musictrekker:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. We take your comments very seriously and appreciate you letting us know the areas that were of concern to you.  Please know that  repairs and changes to the property are an on-going priority.  During your stay, our elevators were undergoing a complete "make-over" to better serve our guests in the future.   We appreciate you letting other travelers know about the amenities we offer.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in Southern California - Bar None
Summary: I cannot say enough positive things about the Surf and Sand.  There is no hotel I have ever stayed at that has the customer service this hotel provides.  If you need anything the staff will take care of it for you.  I have stayed at the Surf and Sand at least once a year for the past eight years and it always feels like home.  It is upscale, yet comfortable.  The view from any room will take your breath away.  If the hotel is booked, you still need to come have a drink at Splashes bar and watch the sunset. You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer:  Thank you so very much for your compliments of Surf & Sand, our associates, location and service. Please contact us for any needed assistance.

Summary: the property and the people who manage it was truly wonderful.  it was my wifes birthday celebration, and almost everyone with whom we came in contact took a moment to wish her happy birthday.  the room was exactly as advertised.  we have nothing but praise.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I am thrilled to read that you and your wife had a wonderful stay with us. Happy belated birthday to her! We hope to see you back next year to celebrate..... if not before!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels in Laguna!
Summary: My wife and I love going to this property for over 20 years. Beautiful location, great staff, very clean. Close to downtown Laguna. But far enough away to avoid some of the congestion during the busy summers.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for the five star review! I am honored to know that you have been visiting us for over 20 years. Cheers to another 20 years worth of visits to the beach! We appreciate you.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Laguna Beach Gem with built in Ocean Sounds
Summary: Great location at the beach that allows you to stay at the resort for a total getaway or wander through Laguna Beach.  The location is a short drive from all the Southern California attractions and a destination itself.  The ocean is right out every room and falling asleep to ocean sounds has never been more satisfying.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the five star review. The sounds of the ocean really are just the best. I am so happy you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: I recently stayed a few days at the Surf and Sand Resort in Laguna Beach for some sun and relaxation. There are less expensive lodgings in the area but I doubt many could match what the Surf and Sand is offering. The accommodations are wonderful, nice room, good quality linens, turn-down service with chocolates; the kind of amenities you'd expect from a resort hotel. The facility is right on the beach with an unobstructed view of the ocean (yup, saw a whale breaching). A few people have complained about the noise of the waves but I liked it and left the sliding door open at night. The beach itself was great since there weren't any crowds, it is February after all and probably the "off-season". Also mentioned were issues regarding the lack of air conditioning but I had no problem
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   WOW! Thank you for this review. It sounds as if you had an excellent stay. Whale season is my absolute favorite. You are incredibly lucky you got to see one breach. Be sure to visit us again in March. We tend to see tons of dolphins throughout the month and whales very often!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: We visited the Surf and Sand for a family celebration. The entire staff from the concierge to room service to bell hops and valet were extremely helpful, friendly and cheerful.   Our rooms were beautiful and the ocean setting could not have been more spectacular. We enjoyed drinks around the pool and time in the jacuzzi. With a one stay, we didn't have time to use the other amenities.  Can't wait for our next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   One night just isn't enough! Come back to see us again soon.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: My sisters and I took our Mom to the hotel for her birthday where we all had a spectacular time. We had ocean-front rooms with amazing views. We were able to walk to local shops and restaurants as well as enjoyed our meal at Splashes. The hotel's staff were very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear PattyM,  Thank you so much for spending your mom's birthday with us. We truly appreciate it! Please let us know what we can do in the future to provide you with a five star stay.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Also, the front desk and room service called our room serval times, which wasn‚Äôt very cool when we were trying to rest. I should‚Äôve requested texts only. My husband also got a drink when we got there that he didn‚Äôt even end up finishing because it was gross (they made it with half and half instead of milk) and when we got our bill it was $21!!! Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We cannot wait to see you again soon!   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

It did not help that the front desk manager was dismissive, flippant, and defensive. We have just checked into the Ritz Carlton in Laguna Niguel, about 2 mikes down the road, it‚Äôs fabulous! The

What I don‚Äôt expect is the manager telling me ‚Äúwell the website doesn‚Äôt say that we do have air conditioning‚Äù.  Really????  So what I learned was that we all must assume that if a hotel does not say that it has air conditioning we should expect that it doesn‚Äôt. We were NOT told there is no air conditioning and we were miserable at night in 80-90 high temps. If area is smoky-couldn't leave sliders open. A box fan is provided. Waves are wonderful but very loud depending on your floor on ocean edge rooms. Absolutely the nicest housekeeping staff and bellmen.  Room service needs some training and menu is limited. Great place but not equivalent of other 5 star resorts at all. Needs updating and refresh.
Manager Response: Dear TwoTravelers,   Thank you so much for the review. I am absolutely thrilled to read that you saw whales, dolphins AND a sea lion during your visit. How incredible! Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Amazing stay Right On the beach and Great staff

Summary Heading: A beautiful resort in a beautiful location - a bad apple spoiled my experience.
Summary: I found this property on trip advisor and was attacted  to the beachfront location and many reviews of return guests. With only one day in Laguna Beach, we really wanted to take it all in. Unfortunately, I didnt have much time at the resort for me to get past it and enjoy the rest of the staff.
Manager Response: Dear Vanmglass,  Thank you so much for the review. I am very sorry to read that you had a negative experience with our valet team. Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Surf & Sand as our first night away from our children (ever). The front desk check-in was quick and easy and we checked slightly early. The hotel sent a small bottle of wine and some delicious chocolates to our room to celebrate my husband's birthday. Chocolates at turn-down, love it. Everyone who worked at the hotel was very friendly.   As we have distant ocean views from our home, an ocean view hotel room has to compete - and the Surf and Sand certainly does. Our
Manager Response: Dear Venicegirl,  Thank you so much for the detailed review. We really appreciate all of your feedback and it will be shared with our entire leadership team. Summary: Of course I would love for this hotel to be more affordable for more frequent stays, but then it perhaps would lose its charm. Overall I was thoroughly impressed. Amazing rooms, stunning views, walking distance from many shops and restaurants, and the service was spectacular. I am already dreaming of returning.
Manager Response: Dear Missmadisonv,  You don't have to dream it.... come visit us again soon! Thank you so much for this incredible review. We truly appreciate it.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

The pool and restaurant are also really nice.  We frequently go to the pool for some drinks and lunch.  Service is great and attentive, food is good too w nice portions.  Once we check in, we never leave the hotel grounds during our stay it is so amazing.  If you love

Summary Heading: Amazing one night stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: Stayed here in January with some friends for one night in a gorgeous full ocean view room. The service from beginning to end was outstanding. Jordan who checked us in at the front desk was so friendly she even gave us a room upgrade how sweet of her! Marcus parked my car he was so professional.  Needed some restaurant recommendations, went to concierge and Sharon did not disappoint. She was so knowledgeable about all the restaurants in Laguna, this was a 10/10 stay and will definitely be back again!
Manager Response: Hello Kevin C:  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand. Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: So my friend & I decided to get some drinks and catch up at Splashes Bar... 1) Kaweo at the front desk was very nice & welcoming when directing us to Splashes Bar. 2) Kimmy at Splashes Bar was probably the best waitress/ server I have ever had. Thank you Surf & Sand for another Uhhh-Mazing experience!!!! üòâü§óüíï
Manager Response: Hello Brian F:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your visit to Splashes!  Thank you for sharing your thoughts and compliments of our restaurant and staff!  Please be assured that your positive comments are very much appreciated and are shared with those you mention!  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future!  We look forward to having you back at Surf & Sand!  Warm regards,

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel two times now and have also had dinners and brunches at Splashes and I absolutely love it there.  First, the sunset view from my room, the restaurant, and outside seating is priceless.  Also, the service is first class.  The people who service the front desk, in room dining, pool, and restaurant are so kind, helpful, and inviting.  Third, the beach is literally at your fingertips.  Going to the beach is so convenient and easy!  Last, but not the least, the rooms were clean, functional, and fun for my family.  I have two kids under 5 and the room had lots of space for my family to enjoy and relax.  I feel like it's my home away from home.

Summary: Wanted to like this place.. amazing location. Looks at first glance like a Malibu Beach Inn twin.. but oh man..its so not.. Inefficient check in, 3.5 hour wait and repeated calls for bags to come to my room, public areas away from the lobby look downright down at heal eg you need to take a shower after using the elevator..which has more of a service elevator feel.. rooms 2 star .. very much in need of an upgrade.. cheap and tired 1980s looking furniture and pictures.. old and dysfunctional bathroom.. the flush did not work on my toilet..thin walls...check out and car valet collection both proceeded with hitches.. The view from my room of the ocean was great and I am sure thats how the place stays open.. I usually stay at the Pelican Hill Resort or Monarch Beach and be assured..
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Summary: As usual, we loved our stay-cation at the Surf and Sand! This is my favorite place to visit and relax. Love the rooms, the view, the grounds- just everything about this place! The beach is peaceful and quiet- true paradise!!
Manager Response: Hello Kathleen:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know that you enjoyed your time at Surf & Sand once again.  As our loyal, return guests, we value your feedback very much and are pleased that you have shared your experience and recommend the resort to other travelers.  Hopefully, we will have you back with us very soon!  Warm regards,

Summary: ".  .  .  have we slept in a hotel where the waves rolled directly under our room! This hotel has a unique setting right on the shoreline of lovely Laguna Beach, which makes it a rare commodity indeed in terms of location. The hotel has a more intimate feel than some of Orange County's grander beach resorts such as the Ritz Carlton, Monarch Beach Resort, The Montage or Pelican Hill. Our balcony overlooking the beach made for an ideal breakfast setting, the bed and room were most comfortable, and service was great throughout our stay. The pool looks out over the ocean and we enjoyed cocktails from comfy lounge chairs there during the beautiful sunsets. The hotel provides beach chairs which come in handy as you are
Manager Response: Hello Tahiti:  Thank you so very much for your glowing review of Surf and Sand, and  lovely Laguna Beach  as a whole.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your recent experience and are very pleased that you thoroughly enjoyed your time with us.  Thank you also for recommending the resort to other travelers for future stays.  We hope that you are able to return in the not-too-distant future. Please reach out to us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards!

Manager Response: Hello Jerold:  We are so pleased to have had you back with us!  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with others so that they are able to enjoy Surf & Sand as much as you have! Thank you also for the compliments of our associates and our property as a whole.  We look very forward to having you return in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: The beds were great, the views were amazing.  I thought it was very pricey and their was nothing to do at the hotel itself other than lay out at the pool or on the beach.  Pool was very small and the drinks were very overpriced.  However you are within walking distance of some great restaurants.  The fact that you had to walk out to the street to smoke was not cool at all.  The thing I loved most was opening the balcony at night and hearing the waves while sleeping.

If you do visit us again, please feel free to speak to the concierge team about the best places to go to smoke. There is a beautiful cigar lounge not too far from the property.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Can‚Äôt get a better location / view / experience than Surf and Sand. Sleeping with the sound of. Crashing waves. No need to even leave your room. Can‚Äôt get that anywhere else. Their customer service is outstanding. They go out of their way to accommodate guests. A perfect experience. Couldn‚Äôt be any better.
Manager Response: Hello recent guest!  Thank you for the outstanding review of Surf & Sand and for sharing your experience with other travelers regarding your recent stay. We are so pleased you enjoyed your time with us and, hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance!  Warm regards,

Summary: We entered the hotel and at first I was like hmmmmm - small driveway, small check in, but the surroundings were very clean and elegant- can I say everyone was so happy and accommodating- then outside we went out to a beautiful view of the ocean with cozy chairs and a fire. We went to our room, which was perfect for a family of 4- we did ask for a rollaway for my son as he likes then ( he‚Äôs 10) The hotel restaurant was great and the beach was fine- not huge but good enough.  The sunsets were amazing and I suggest leave by your bedroom patio doors open the ocean waves and breeze put us all to sleep. I would recommend going surfing- that‚Äôs what you do there! My kids (10,13)had never surfed and my son after 5 days was a natural born surfer dude. Drive your car along the coastal area
Manager Response: Hello Gail T:  As our first time guests, thank you for sharing your recent experience at Surf & Sand!  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the resort and all that we have to offer, as well as Laguna Beach as a whole.  Now that you are familiar with the resort and its surroundings, you will be able to return and become frequent guests as well.  Please reach out to us for any needed assistance in the future. We look very forward to having you back with us!  Warm regards,

Summary: Everything about his hotel takes your breath away.  All the rooms overlook the beach and the rolling surf.  The arrival and staff and top rate.  The rooms are well appointed and highly functional with modern, quality fixtures.  The sound of the surf is everywhere on this property, including the rooms.  Earplugs are provided but the surf sound will lull you to sleep.  Great restaurant, lots of parking, nice spa and fitness room.  Checks all the boxes.
Manager Response: Hello Our East Coast Guests!  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed all the amenities that Surf & Sand has to offer. Thank you for sharing your experience and for the compliments of our Resort!  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the not-too-distant future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in booking your next stay!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: My husband and I came for a few days to rest and enjoy the beach. We are never disappointed at the Surf and Sand.  Watching the waves roll in and out while sitting on the beach or the balcony or in bed is an EPIC experience!
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Lori:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your stay once again at Surf!  And thank you also for letting other travelers know how special our location is!    Hopefully, we will see you back at Surf & Sand before too long.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Wonderful experience.  Beautiful room, loved having the door open and watching the waves.  Excellent food, so nice to sit by the fire and watch the waves with a nice glass of wine.  Really wonderful resort.
Manager Response: Hello Wanda:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know how much you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand.  We always appreciate compliments of our location, restaurant and total ambiance of the resort.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the very near future.  Please contact us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: My wife and I came here for a few days during my business conference held at the Surf and Sand. We were very impressed with the welcoming and efficiency of the staff from the moment we stepped out of our Uber. The front desk checked us into a first level room hours before normal check-in time! Walking into the room and seeing the ocean right there was just the start of our overall wonderful time at the S&S. One of the elevators was not working at the time and the other was finicky, but these things happen. We weren't in a hurry. Overall this was a very enjoyable stay and the facility for the conference was great as well.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Neff:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. We are so pleased to know that we exceeded your expectations, and that our staff met your needs.    We hope that you are able to return in the future, either with your repeat conference, or as a leisure guest.  Please let us know when we may be of assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort with top notch staff
Summary: This place is gorgeous with beautiful ocean views.  With so many restaurant options and a fantastic beach to stroll, you will not regret your stay.  The rooms are lovely and who doesn't enjoy an ocean breeze?  I want to be sure to give a HUGE shout out to Megan in reservations for going above and beyond the call of duty to help my husband and I secure a reservation in the room type we wanted.  Her patience, desire and determination to find us a room for our return stay is highly commendable.  Thank you Megan and thank you Surf and Sand for another remarkable stay!
Manager Response: Hello and Happy New Year!  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience and feedback of your recent stay with us.  We appreciate you letting us know that you  enjoyed our location, views, rooms and staff.  Please be assured that we will pass along your compliments of Megan, which are always appreciated.  Hopefully, your travels will bring you back to lovely Laguna in the near future. Please reach out to us so that we may accommodate all your needs.   Warm regards,

Summary: If you live in the desert, as my family does, the Surf & Sand is truly paradise. The rooms are right on the beach, the guest rooms are gorgeous, and the staff is friendly and helpful. I like the boutique feel of this resort, compared to one of the chains.
Manager Response: Hello Debbie!  We are always pleased when our desert guests are able to break away from the heat to enjoy all that Surf & Sand has to offer.  Thank you for the compliments of our location, room, and staff.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please each out for any needed assistance.  Happy New Year!

Summary Heading: 3 for 3 - why go anywhere else in Laguna Beach
Summary: This was my 3rd time staying at the S & S, but now my 1st review.  All 3 stays have been spectacular!  There is no resort I have ever stayed at where you have the ocean closer, the sound of the waves crashing out our balcony was soothing and relaxing.  You can't get that sound anywhere else. The hotel is not your cookie cutter resort, rather a special place with charm and character. I will be bringing back a group this October and working with AMY in sales has been wonderful - in fact, she has worked harder to get my business than any sales person I've worked with in the past 15+ years.  The staff did whatever was needed to make our stay perfect!  The hotel is walking distance to everything, shopping, restaurants, bars, etc... you don't need a car.  Uber from the airport and
Manager Response: Hello!  As our loyal guest, thank you for providing feedback of your recent stay at Surf & Sand!  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know that  you enjoyed all of your stays with us and will be returning in the not too distant future.  Thank you also for your compliments of our great Director of Sales, Amy McLimore, who has been a benefit to the resort for many years!  They don't come any better than Amy!    We look very forward to having you back with us. Thank you again for your input!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Loved everything about the Surf and Sand
Summary: There simply wasn't a downside.  Valet, perfect, check-in, perfect.  Room?  Amazing.  The quality of the service, the location, the amenities all hit the mark.  My wife and I won't stay anywhere else except the Surf & Sand.  It's money well spent.
Manager Response: Hello Bob:  Thank you so much for your glowing review of Surf & Sand. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and compliments of our resort, and that your and your wife "won't stay anywhere else except Surf & Sand." We look very forward to your return (hopefully in the near future). Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Happy New Year

Summary Heading: Beautiful view but unable to enjoy it
Summary: My wife and I have stayed at the Surf and Sand a few times over the past couple of years. Unfortunately, this stay wasn't as enjoyable.  The pool area was closed for a corporate function at 4:30pm on the day of our arrival so we were unable to use it. Later that evening, the same corporate function hosted a party featuring a live band. It was too loud to sit on our balcony and even with the slider closed we could still clearly hear the music. I called the front desk and was told the event was supposed to end at 9:00pm. It was already 9:15pm when I called. Even after the music finally ended, the party carried on for awhile. Once it was over the staff had to break down the party and reset the pool furniture. Normally that would not be a big deal, but it went on into the wee hours
Manager Response: Dear Brian D,   On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize profusely for your negative experience. We pride ourselves in the quality services and products we provide for our guests. We clearly failed you in your recent stay. Please be assured that your comments will be shared with our entire leadership teams so we can seek ways of improvement together.   I do hope that you will visit us again so we can provide you with a flawless stay, which is what you have come to expect from Surf & Sand. Please reach out to me directly at 949 376 2762 for any future needs. It would be my pleasure to offer you a discount or upgrade for the future.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: What a lovely hotel, rooms are incredible and the views of the Pacific were stunning. The decor was so pretty and modern opening onto a spacious balcony.   Listening to the sea and the waves was just the perfect way to fall asleep.    Staff were so helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Ang:  We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay.  Thank you for sharing your experience and making other travelers aware of the many amenities we have to offer.  Please let us know when you are able to return (hopefully in the near future) so that we are able to accommodate all of the details of your next stay.  Happy New Year!

Summary: The ocean view is spectacular - what an amazing location! The rooms are very nice, very clean and well kept. The beds are extremely comfortable!  The staff was always friendly, courteous, helpful and prompt to respond. The food was good in both the on-site Splashes restaurant and the coffee shop.  The Splashes restaurant and bar are very romantic with the ocean view/ambience. Also conveniently located are the spa and gift shop. The resort is centrally located to numerous good restaurants/bars, shops, art fairs, sightseeing tours and best of all, tons of beach activities.  All are within very close walking distance from the resort. The staff was extremely helpful in coordinating last minute restaurant reservations and had many suggestions on things to do during our stay.  We
Manager Response: Hello Melinda:  We are so appreciative of you taking the time to share your recent experience at Surf & Sand and provided your glowing review for others to enjoy a first-hand description of all that we have to offer.  We are pleased that you were able to take advantage of all of our amenities, and that of Laguna Beach in general.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the very near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Happy New Year!

Summary: Both the view and sound of the sea from our ocean front room on 7th floor were sensational. (Earplugs are provided, but what better lullaby than the ocean?) You can sit on the balcony with your morning coffee or evening glass of wine and feel as though you are in paradise! Rooms are well appointed and large, with modern bathrooms and luxurious (and cruelty free -- a bonus for this animal lover!) bath products. Coffee maker and mini-fridge in room  provide additional convenience. The outside area is pretty, and the compact lobby lends an air of subdued intimacy. However, the true stars of this property are the staff, who are endlessly helpful and courteous. Our concierge, Sandra, deserves some big gold stars for going to extreme lengths to make our anniversary stay a memorable
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand.   We are so pleased that you were impressed with our location, resort amenities and staff.  Sandra is a great asset to our Concierge team and will be very pleased with your compliments of her service.  Thank you also for recommending our resort to other travelers.  We hope to see you back at Surf in the very near future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards and Happy New Year!

Summary: The didn't tell us at first hoping they could charge the battery, when the failed and we waited for an hour, they said they needed more time to charge, wouldn't take a report and didn't take responsibility.  They then needed to jump start, but didn't really want to do that either, didn't offer us breakfast or anything while we waited over 2 hours to get our car.
Manager Response: Hello Michelen142,  Our sincere apologies that you experienced difficulty with our Valet service during your recent stay. Please be assured that Mr. Aklar, with whom you spoke at the time, has researched and addressed the matter as a reminder of the importance of ongoing training for our associates.  I  have also tried calling you to follow up and offer a credit however your mailbox is full. Please call upon me personally when you have a moment. I can be reached at 949.376.2778. Please be advised I will be out of the office on Monday. I look forward to speaking with you.  Warm regards,   Misty Lindo Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: Put this on your "To Stay" List!
Summary: This place is amazing. We stayed in the Ocean Front Queen room and there was plenty of room for 3 of us. The rooms are literally right over the sand. The waves crashing below are the most relaxing thing ever. We stayed right before Christmas and our stay was the most relaxing couple of days we have had in months. Very comfy beds, a mini bar where we were able to store our own stuff, a nice clean bathroom, anda view that is hard to beat. Definitely do yourself this favor and book it! You will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Hello BC:  Happy New Year!  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback of your holiday stay with us!  We are so pleased that we met (and possibly exceeded) your expectations.  Thank you also for your recommendation to our future  guests.  Hopefully, you will be back with us soon.  Happy New Year

Summary Heading: Run down and dirty‚Äîbut nice staff
Summary: I came in late and checked into room 322. The room was above the pool and you could hear everything going on down below so the manager moved me to a room in the main building. So nice of him to upgrade me but the room was filthy. The toilet looked like it hadn‚Äôt been cleaned in a while and there was long blonde hair everywhere (on the toilet, on the counter, on the towels). I couldn‚Äôt take it...I checked out at 11:30pm.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Our sincere apologies that the guest rooms you experienced were not up to standards. Please know that this is very out of the ordinary. Your comments are taken very seriously and our leadership team is looking into ways of improvement together. I understand we reached out to you the following day, however you had already arranged alternate accommodations. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at 949-376-2762 for any future needs. It would be my pleasure to oversee your needs personally to ensure perfection, which is what you should expect from Surf & Sand.   Sincerely,   Misty L. Director of Rooms

Summary: We went for a one-night getaway on New Year's Day and it couldn't have been more perfect!  We had a beautiful and spacious corner king room in the main building.  It was heavenly to lay in bed and gaze out at the ocean and listen to the surf, and we made good use of our balcony with its stunning panoramic views.  The resort is within walking distance to great restaurants and shops, and the staff is always so friendly and helpful. It is one of our favorite spots and we always hate to leave! Can't wait for next time! Thank you Surf and Sand!
Manager Response: Hello Jeffndev:  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Surf & Sand.  We are  appreciative of you taking the time to compliment our resort, location, views and staff.  We are also pleased that we are a favorite spot and you don't want to leave us.  Please call upon us in the future when you are able to return.  Warm regards,

Summary: You must stay here at least once, then you want to come back!  Not only they are right on the water, but the hotel itself has a great vibe and their rooms are nicely decorated! Love the bed, so comfy!!
Manager Response: Dear Da M:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your time with us.  Thank you for the compliments of the resort. We hope that you are able to return in the very near future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards - Happy New Year

Summary: This is an excellent resort! I've never been at the Four Seasons or Ritz Carlton, but I imagine it would be like this. Superb facilities, great food, and unbeatable location right on the beach AND right in town (other resorts are more removed from restaurants and shops). But the best feature of the hotel is the staff: super helpful, extremely friendly and accommodating. We really enjoyed the pool area, since it sits right above the beach, just steps away from the sand. What else can you ask for?
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for the five star review. I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed every moment of your stay. We hope to see you again soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Wonderful resort with rooms on the beach watching dolphins pass by with Catalina Island as a back drop.  Rooms are extremely comfortable.  Staff is ultra friendly and helpful.  We will be back next year.
Manager Response: Hello Rick:  Happy New Year!  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Surf & Sand. We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed the resort and will be returning in 2018.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance!  Warm regards,

Summary: My husband and I stayed in Laguna Beach for his birthday and our 5th Wedding Anniversary. The Surf & Sand Resort was perfection! Alexis made us feel so welcome at check-in and was very generous, just wanted to thank her for the complimentary appetizer at Splashes. The brussel sprouts were amazing! I also wanted to thank her for putting us on one of the top floors, the views of the beach and sunset were spectacular. We will definitely be coming back here to relax!
Manager Response: Dear BrittanyNicoleG,  Thank you so much for the perfect review. We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay. Alexis' success will also be celebrated. Thank you so much for the kind words. We hope that you will make this an annual birthday and anniversary staycation. See you soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: #1 TOP Hotel experience in Laguna Beach is SURF & SAND
Summary: Our family has returned to the Surf & Sand every year for almost 10 years. This is an A+ top notch, first class hotel/resort/restaraunt. First...the location -- untouchable! All Rooms have ocean views. Second...the staff - when we pull up every year, it is like we never left (look at the employee name tags and you will see there are many that have been there for years - they love working there and it shows. Third -- everything is first class. The quality of the rooms...the lobby...the gift shop...the pool...the beach...the valet...the spa...At every turn at this property, it is first class. I think they have elves that come out at night that clean and polish every corner. Our family is a big fan of the Surf & Sand. We would HIGHLY recommend Surf & Sand.
Manager Response: Dear Jason,  WOW! What a review. Thank you so much for all of the kind words. We are so happy that you and your family continue to visit us.... your home away from home! Your photos are beautiful. We are very lucky to work in such a beautiful location and we look forward to seeing you soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Excellent location and great hotel experience
Summary: There are many places to choose from along the Orange County coast, the Surf & Sand best upholds its name.  It is right on the sand and surf is right out the window or your deck literally (if you get a seaside room).  If you love the views and ocean noise ... it is so close they furnish ear plugs by 3M for those that don't like the sound of the surf.  Staff is well trained and we found the service to be great.
Manager Response: Dear Bob,  Thank you so much for the five star review! Nothing makes me happier than getting to work in a place in which I hear the beautiful ocean waves every day. Please come visit us again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Amazing location, stayed in the ocean front suite and loved it. Worth the cost! Be aware there is no air conditioning, which can leave the room a little stuffy during the day. Clean, comfortable, and wonderful customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Ali Z,  Thank you so much for the five star review. I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed your oceanfront suite. With the beautiful coastal breezes, the rooms really cool down once you open the slider doors and enjoy the sound of the waves. I hope you will visit us again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: My wife  and I live in Irvine.  We drove twenty minutes to the Surf and Sand in Laguna Beach.   The view of the ocean and the sound of the waves at night  were  magical.  Better than Mexico or Hawaii.  Air fare was  zero dollars and we spoke the native language.  No racing  to catch a plane when we left.  We drove back home in twenty minutes taking our memories with us.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for the five star review. It sounds as if you have found your official staycation location. We hope to see you many times in the future so we can become your home away from home.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Come for view but not the facilities
Summary: I was here for a corporate event and there seemed to be more than one. All staff were friendly and efficient. The facilities and the food however were unimpressive. If it weren‚Äôt for the Ocean front location this would have been a 2 star experience.   My tub/shower did not drain. The pool elevator and building walkways to the rooms looked like a poorly maintained motel 6. I am from SoCal and have stayed in Laguna Beach many times over the years.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for your review. Your constructive comments and candid feedback are very important to us. We take pride in providing exceptional customer service and facilities for our guests and learning that your overall visit did not meet your expectations is disappointing.  It is only through feedback such as yours that we may continuously improve upon our services and facilities. We appreciate your comments and hope you will give us another opportunity to welcome you back in the future.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We had an ocean front suite with a very large deck and LOVED every minute.  Although  our stay was much too brief, we were so relaxed, it felt like a real vacation.  We ordered room service happy hour appetizers and a full breakfast, so we could use the great deck and enjoy the view.  Amazingly our food arrived hot and was absolutely delicious.  We decided to keep it simple and have dinner at Splashes, so that except for long walks, we never left the hotel.  Every member of the staff we spoke with was gracious and welcoming.  It felt like people enjoy working at the Surf and Sand.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Marilyn A:  Thank you for sharing your experience regarding your recent stay.  We are  very happy to learn that you enjoyed the amenities that we offer, along with your praise of our entire staff.  Thank you also for recommending Surf & Sand to future travelers.  We hope to have you back with us in the near future.  Warm holiday wishes,

Summary Heading: Best Place Ever  ~  View is Breathe Taking
Summary: This hotel is the very best, the ocean crashes right under the rooms.  The food is so amazing  and cannot ask for better service.  Rooms are spacious.  Pool area is clean and service by the pool is top notch.   Right on the Beach with clear view of the ocean from every room.  Just cannot say enough nice things about this resort.  Worth the price..
Manager Response: Hello Sharon P:  Many thanks for your feedback and compliments of Surf & Sand.  We appreciate knowing that we met your needs and you enjoyed your time with us. Thank you for the compliments of our location, service and dining.  We always like hearing we met your expectations.  Hopefully, return in the near future.  Happy Holidays

Summary: Wonderful hotel and great amenities. The ocean views where spectacular. We booked one of the Hotel Special rate offerings and were pleased with our service there and stay. Great location and wonderful restaurants and pool on site. You never have to leave the hotel. We had a great stay and would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Lisa:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know we met and exceeded your expectations, and for recommending Surf & Sand. We appreciate the compliments of our staff, location, service and restaurant.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the new year.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Breath taking experience, I don‚Äôt review places I stay too many times as I travel through out the year...this stay at S&S was the best I‚Äôve ever had, especially in regards to service, most beach side hotels rely on the views to do most of the experience but I live near the beach so I‚Äôve seen it all, from the incredible weather to the movie like sunsets.  The service my wife and I experienced this past weekend will last us a life time, thank you to everyone involved in make it magical.  We especially loves the food at splashes, the restaurants head chef ‚ÄúRon‚Äù also made a table side visit to introduce himself and to top it off made us our own special dish. Manager Response: Hello Mr. Azizi:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts and compliments of Surf & Sand. We appreciate knowing that you enjoyed your time with us and all of the amenities we offer.  We are so very lucky to have Executive Chef Ron to prepare his outstanding dishes for our guests.  Please be assured that  Pepe will be informed of your praise of his service, as well.  We hope that you are able to return in the very near future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance in booking your stay.  Warm Regards,

Summary: A stay at the Surf and Sand is a wonderful experience. Do yourself a favor. If you love the finer things in life... the ocean, fresh air, fine food and feeling pampered book a stay at The Surf and Sand. You won't regret it.
Manager Response: Hello Kurt:  Thank you your compliments of Surf & Sand and all that we have to offer. Your message speaks volumes which, I'm sure, repeat and future guests will appreciate.  We look forward to having you back with us in 2018!!  Happiest of Holidays!

Summary: You'll get more surf and sand than you can imagine- it's perfect. The location is unmatched, perched over the sand with spectacular views north and south. Wonderful rooms, great service. Pool side bar is quite nice as well. Extra bonus for having Tesla chargers on the property!
Manager Response: Hello Mrg128!  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your time with us.  Thank you for the compliments of our property and amenities.  It is our hope that you are able to return in the not-too-distant future. Please contact us so that we are able  to accommodate the details of your stay.   Have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary: We had the most unbelievable Thanksgiving holiday.  From the moment we checked in the day before the busy holiday until the day we checked out, we were pleased with every aspect of our stay. Staff was efficient, our room on the top floor was unbelievable and nightly turn-down service, help make for a special and memorable time. Our Thanksgiving turkey dinner at Splashes helped add to an unforgettable holiday that didn‚Äôt disappoint!
Manager Response: Hello Guests:  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your holiday at Surf & Sand! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience and provide this helpful information to other travelers.   Hopefully, you will be able to return in the New Year and make Surf & Sand your go-to vacation spot!  Happy Holidays

Summary: This is a great hotel right on the beach. The views are amazing and the staff very kind and helpful. Note there is no AC in the room (at least ours ocean front) and dogs are welcome which can add some noise from inattentive owners. The maid service was under par (had to request service each day and one day had to ask 3 times to have room finally cleaned). The overall experience was great though and we had an excellent time. We will likely return.
Manager Response: Hello Mark:  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  We appreciate your comments and will address those areas where we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that this is not our usual standard of excellence we strive to provide our guests.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay as a whole and hope that you are  able to return in the not-too-distant future.  Please reach out to us for assistance in booking your next stay.  Happy Holidays

Summary: Ocean Front is the Biggest Plus.  Clean Beach.  Room Shower is Tiny and located w Toilet.  Was clean but not what I‚Äôd expect for this Price Range.  No Air Conditioner and at times can be a issue even though its almost winter.  Sink was plugged up and Shower would not drain.  They corrected but of course there high cost does not allow you to look past issues we had to deal with.  Overall it‚Äôs a nice hotel with room for improvements.
Manager Response: Dear Deerod,  I am so sorry for the concerns in your guest room. The rooms should be perfect for you so this is unacceptable. I appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Everything was as we hoped from check-in through check out.  Courteous, well informed, efficient and responsive personnel at all point of contact, i.e,, valet, front desk, restaurant, housekeeping, etc.  But very friendly and not the least bit stuffy.  We fully enjoyed our seventh floor deluxe tower king.  Spacious, well designed as well as nicely furnished and decorated.  The only improvement might have been two bathroom sinks and  six or eight inches added to  the height of the balcony railing . . . it's a long ways down.    Proximity to the ocean was the draw of  the Sand & Surf for us and we weren't disappointed in the least.  We could look straight out at the surf and ocean and straight down at the beach. When the sun was fully out in the morning  (after a leisurely late
Manager Response: Dear Randall-Anne,  What a fabulous review! Thank you so much for sharing; it is truly appreciated. The views here are absolutely incredible! We are so happy to read that you enjoyed your stay. We hope you will visit us again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Sand and Surf Hotel has it all figured out.  You will feel special from the movement you arrive.  It is centrally located and has a beautiful beach!  Pool and bar and restaurant are top notch!  Love this place and plan to return every year!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   I agree; Surf & Sand is heaven! It is such a special place that I am incredibly proud to work at. I am very happy to read that you loved your stay. Thank you so much for the five star review. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: On most occasions, checking into a hotel and staying in the room is an ultimate no-no. When there is so much out there to explore, how could you confine yourself to a one room, filled with three other people. Alas, this was the case with Surf and Sand Resort. We checked in, entered our new oasis, and were amazed. The hotel sits right over to the crashing waves of the Pacific, which prompted us to open the door to the balcony, along with the entrance door and let the sound of the waves breaking and the breeze envelope the room. I collapsed in the very comfortable arm chair on the balcony and opened my book, warmed by the January sun. It was almost too warm out there, but I corrected my spoiled self and reminded myself that there are people back east who would sell a kidney to be
Manager Response: Hello Gena L:  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay.  We appreciate you recommending Surf & Sand to other travels and are delighted we met all of your expectations.  It is great to learn that you enjoyed our location, comfort of your room, views, and lovely Laguna Beach as a whole.  Please contact us in the future when you are able to return. We look forward to serving you once again.  Happy Holidays

Summary: We had the absolute best Anniversay overnight getaway at Surf & Sand Resort! Sharon our concierge/check-in attendant helped make our stay at the Surf & Sand absolutely amazing! We had the most beautiful oceanfront room that she upgraded us to & made our stay extra special with several added bonuses that made all the difference. Our room was gorgeous & had the most stunning ocean view. We enjoyed a wonderful bottle of champagne & chocolate dipped strawberries as we watched the stunning sunset over the Pacific Ocean on our beautiful balcony. I can still hear those mesmerizing ocean waves calming every part of our body & soul. Such a romantic overnight getaway! Can't wait to return to the Surf & Sand for our Anniversay next year! Highly recommend this beautiful resort to everyone!
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for your compliments of Surf & Sand, our staff, location and guest rooms. We are so pleased you enjoyed your time with us and your special mention of Concierge Sharon is very much appreciated. We pride ourselves in providing a positive, memorable stay for all of our guests and we are very pleased to learn we met your expectations.  We look forward to having you with us once again.  Please contact us for any needed assistance.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: I recently stayed at Surf and Sand with my boyfriend who was there for a work event. I fortunately got to relax while he was in full day work events from Sunday to Wednesday. Right away, I loved the location as it's right on the beach and how nice the staff was. My favorite part of the hotel in the lounge area which is outside with comfy seats and fire pits. On Sunday they had a bar set-up and a singer. My free time was spent there reading as well as exploring the grounds which included the beach and pool area. The main street has loads of yummy restaurants and cute shops. I can't rave enough about the views from the hotel but also when you dine in other locations and walk around, just beautiful. This place truly made my stay warm and welcoming.
Manager Response: Hello Danielle:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed all aspects of Surf & Sand!  We are very pleased that you were able to experience a leisure stay and  take advantage of Laguna Beach, as well.    We look forward to having you back with us in the not-too-distant future. Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: This hotel has all front ocean view rooms. That is the special thing about this hotel. You will not want to leave your room because the view is as good or not better in your room as it is on the hotel grounds. I was on the 8th floor room 231. The room is spacious and has a unique set up. The waves crash hard on the sand all night long so be prepared to bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper.  Splashes Bar is fantastic and I do have to give a special shout out to KIMMY!!! She is AMAZING! So lucky to have such a professional, nice, hardworking server in this establishment. I want to steal her. I cannot say enough about her. Her smile lights up a room and her customer service is by far one of the best I have encountered. I love this hotel and will be back.No doubt.
Manager Response: Hello TTherese:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience of your recent stay! We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed the resort and made special mention of our views, the grounds, rooms, and Kimmy in Splashes.  We strive to provide a positive environment to all of our guests with the type of service which they deserve and expect. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the very near future.  Please reach out to us so that we are able to accommodate the details of  your stay.  Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: The Surf and Sand Gold Level Location and Service
Summary: The surf and sand does not disappoint.  My husband and I stayed the weekend to celebrate our 35th wedding anniversary,  beach front room:  The location is second to none.  Every staff member provided excellent customer service; made us feel special.
Manager Response: Hello Welasc0:  Thank you for taking the time to let us know we met your expectations for your 35th anniversary! Hopefully, you will be able to return to lovely Laguna Beach and Surf & Sand in the near future. Please let us know if we may be of assistance.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: We have just returned from a delightful romantic get-away that was perfect - guest services, accommodations, food and weather.  Twenty four hours at this resort was more relaxing then a week at any five star hotel in Hawaii (and only 30 minutes from home).  Can't get much closer to the sand and water unless you're swimming or surfing.  Barbaros Aklar and staff rock!
Manager Response: Hello Marilyn T:  We are so pleased to learn that we met your expectations for your romantic get-away! Thank you for sharing your feedback and positive comments of our property and staff.  It is very much appreciated.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: The Surf & Sand is heaven on earth.  Situated at waters edge, each well appointed room has a glorious balcony view of the ocean.  Not only are the rooms lovely, the grounds are beautifully maintained and peaceful; plus staff are always friendly and professional.
Manager Response: Hello Dodger Buf!  Thank you so much for letting us know you enjoyed all aspects of Surf & Sand! We appreciate your kind words and hope that you are able to return in the not-too-distant future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Fabulous Hotel from it's location to it's staff members to it's on-site restaurant, Splashes. It's a must-stay the next time you are in Laguna Beach. The hotel staff will treat you like royalty. And the sunset views from the Splashes Bar and Restaurant are the best in California.
Manager Response: Hello 1000 Palms Carol:  Thank you for taking the time to compliment our property, staff and restaurant. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay.  Thank you also for your recommendation to future guests who are not familiar with Surf & Sand!  Please call upon us when you are able to return to lovely Laguna Beach so that we are able to accommodate all the details of your stay!  Happy Holidays!

Summary: I arrived in the valet area in front of the hotel and was greeted immediately.  The valet was very friendly and thorough.  Once in my room, it opened to one of the best sunset views in southern California.  Splashes offered excellent service and great food options.  Hearing the waves crash below the room all night was very relaxing and I woke up refreshed and ready to enjoy the day in Laguna.  All in all, I highly recommend this resort when your travels take you to Laguna Beach!  Thank you Surf and Sand!  I will be back!
Manager Response: Hello A Parsons:  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at Surf & Sand. We appreciate your compliments of our outstanding views, Splashes restaurant and valet service.  Thank you also for recommending Surf & Sand to others who travel to lovely Laguna Beach.  We look forward to accommodating their stays as well.  Please call upon us when you are able to return.  Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Ideal location, wonderful staff, overall great place!
Summary: This was a nice find, and pleasant surprise.  I simply booked it from finding it online, and reading some reviews.  Our room had balconies that literally hung over the beach, and you could be lulled to sleep by the waves (ear plugs provided for those who need them).  Ideal setting to read a book, watch the sunsets and wake up to.  The staff upon arrival to the concierge, to housekeeping, restaurant and check out, were very nice, helpful and enthusiastic about us being there.  Pool are area was nice, great temp and staff very helpful.  It was so nice being right on the beach and yet could walk to downtown to all the lovely restaurants (great food and wine in the area).  Nothing is very far away for what you'd want to do in Laguna.  Highly recommend it!  And don't forget all the

Summary Heading: Perfect for a sojourn from Los Angeles
Summary: Clean, excellent position, pleasant staff, comfortable too, and especially bed and sheets. West facing, so lovely sunrise. Good surfing, for those who like it. Ocean a bit rough for me, with a newly healed broken ankle. Great restaurants nearby and shops  from fancy boutiques to tatty tourist shops. A perfect break.
Manager Response: Hello Shirley:  Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience during your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  We are always pleased to hear that our guests enjoy our location, property and the city of Laguna Beach.  Hopefully, youi will be able to return in the near future.  Please call upon us for personal assistance.  Regards,

Summary: I have stayed at the Surf & Sand Resort twice and both stays were terrific.  Almost all rooms open directly to the ocean and to sleep at tight listening to the constant, gentle crashing of the waves is peaceful and hypnotic.  The unobstructed views of the ocean from almost everywhere on the property is also an enjoyable escape from the clamor of the city.  The staff is friendly and helpful and the entire experience is memorable.
Manager Response: Hello Bob:  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your return stay at Surf & Sand. Summary: The staff at the Surf & Sand is the best out there and made the trip so relaxing. We stayed at the Catalina section; the room was immaculate, and the service was superb. The staff assisted us in chartering a boat to go fishing, and made sure we had everything we needed. I would highly recommend staying at the Surf & Sand.
Manager Response: Hello James!  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed out property and service. Summary Heading: We loved the beachy,yet elegant feel of this hotel!
Summary: We were on the top floor with a view of the entire shoreline, and could hear the waves crashing below us. The room amenities were plentiful and the staff went above and beyond with their service. This resort is a must for those who want the best Southern California beach experience fully accommodating.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel several times most recently last weekend and this place never disappoints. The beach access and the pool and spa are my favorite parts of this resort. To be able to walk up from the beach to the pool and spa area is awesome. Also the food there is amazing. You can tell the chefs take pride in their food. Summary Heading: A fantastic experience at the beach
Summary: We now live in Texas and Florida. Came back for a nostalgic weekend. When we lived in L.A., we came to the Surf & Sand every 4th of July for 15 years. Our kids grew up playing at the beach beneath our balcony. The beach is not quite as wide now.
