The only negative points are that the beach and the pool areas are much smaller than the photos suggest so it can be difficult to get a sun-bed around the pool and they only provide sun-chairs on the beach.  They also allowed dogs on the whole beach area, rather than restricted to certain areas as some hotels do. However, we did thoroughly enjoy our three nights at this hotel which is located quite close to the town. We caught a trolleybus (which is free during peak season) to explore some of

Summary: Everybody talks about stunning views and breathtaking sunsets (all true!) but there is so much more I would like to point out about Surf and Sand. My family and I had such a great time and we could not be more pleased with our experience. It is perfectly situated on the ocean and only a few minutes from the center of town. From the moment we arrived we had a very positive first impression with such helpful and friendly staff at the Front Desk. We had a cocktail at the bar which was very crowded (it was too small for the size of the hotel) and  had dinner at the restaurant Splaches, which was nothing special.  The hotel is worth for their location, we loved to sleep with open windows and listen to the waves...
Manager Response: Hello Isabel:  Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay. Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future at a less-crowded time. We look forward to having you back!  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.   Warm regards,

Summary: I absolutely love the location of the Surf & Sand. Having the ocean so close is amazing! We took a month-long summer trip from San Diego to Seattle. The highlight of my trip was Surf & Sand. I was ecstatic over the views. And very disappointed in the customer service. From check in to room service to the Splashes restaurant, the service was lacking. I realize we were there over 4th July. Our toilet was broken as soon as we checked in. The room was humid and had no circulation. For the price, we should definitely have AC. We are native Texans and hate to sleep without an AC. I was disappointed after hyping it up to my husband and son.

Summary: This hotel is probably my favorite in the US. An amazing place at the beach, great food & drinks and (for the most part) friendly staff. I recommend it for couples to both hide away and be in the middle of a great and poche atmosphere. We will definitely come back.

Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for complimentary review of Surf & Sand. Summary: Our stay here exceeded our expectations. The view was incredible, the service impeccable and the room was beautiful. We ate dinner at Splashes which was delicious and the view was spectacular. I highly recommend staying here and for joying all this property has to offer. I posted a picture of the view from our room.
Manager Response: Hello Rhisa G:  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at Surf & Sand. We appreciate the compliments of our property, service and Splashes restaurant. I don't know if all the rooms in tthis hotel are that way.  There was a fan over the bed and another fan in the closet.   It did cool down at night if you open the windows.  Fair warning:  Those waves are loud!  I guess every time

According to the front desk air-con is not required as the hotel is right on the beach so all you have to do is open the siding doors all night for the breeze, this might reduce the temperature but it also means due to the noise from other patrons and the beach you literally can not  sleep. As for the resort, on a whole it looks like it needs a good scrub, I don't think the paving around the hotel as ever been cleaned. But what made the whole stay an absolute nightmare was  the hotel did not

Summary Heading: BEAUTIFUL HOTEL - ABOVE & BEYOND CUSTOMER SERVICE
Summary: I am a Corporate Travel Manager and I sent the CEO of the company I manage travel for to the Surf and Sand.  He has always stayed at Loews in Santa Monica.  I finally convinced him to go to Laguna...it's my hometown :)  His first stay was rain all weekend so he wanted to give it another shot.  The 2nd stay he really enjoyed his Tower Oceanfront King and his 3rd stay this past weekend I had to confirm a Tower Oceanfront with 2 queens because the Kings were sold out.  I put a request in for a King oceanfront and spoke with Brian at the front desk the day of his arrival to check if anything had become available (not yet) and to request an early check in for him that day.  I also spoke with Kathleen at the Concierge Desk who was kind enough to get chocolate covered strawberries to
Manager Response: Hello Julia:  Thank you so very much for letting us know that we met your CEO'S  expectations. So disappointed that we hear that Laguna beach bureaucrats shut down the Sunday taco bar located on the upper deck. what ever the reason, it wasnt a good enough one for me.  shame on them for ruining one of the best outdoor sit down spots to enjoy a sunday afternoon.

Please each out to us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort in the middle of Paradise..."
Summary: We had room 271 (double-double ocean view 7th floor). Roomy, waves crashing 24/7, needs updating but clean. Good valet guys. Comfy beds. Out-dated gym. Easy check-in process. Wonderful property. I would go back despite my average experience at Splashes.

Summary Heading: Luxury with sand, surf and scenery
Summary: We spent a wonderful anniversary weekend at this luxurious hotel that sits on a picturesque beach proving incredible views and the sounds of the ocean. A short drive from Los Angeles or nearby John Wayne airport, this hotel prides itself in excellent service. From email exchanges with the concierge pre-check in, to text requests once the stay was under way, each request was handled quickly and with a smile. The restaurant, Splashes, offers great food and fairly reasonable prices. And the bar provides for great sunsets. Pool is great and just. Few short steps to the beach and ocean. Hotel offers a great spa. The hotel is walking distance to great shopping, galleries and restaurants. Will definitely be returning for more.
Manager Response: Hello SRowe:  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for taking the time to point out the services we provide, our restaurant, spa and our entire staff. We strive to provide a memorable stay for each guest and hope that we meet their expectations.   We hope you are able to return to lovely Laguna Beach in the very near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful Location, but hard to sleep
Summary: I've spent 5 nights over the last 2 weeks at the Surf and Sand.  The location is amazing and the view are stunning. Service is also excellent and we had 2 dinners at Splashes that we loved.   I didn't believe it was possible before I stayed here but the ocean waves are way too loud for sleep. I tried earplugs and normally sleep through anything, but it was just too much. We couldn't shut the door because there is no AC and the room would be too hot. I really want to love this place, but I think for our next trip we will have to go somewhere else where we can turn on the AC and get some sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Kristi S,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. It was a pleasure to share your positive comments on service levels, location, views and Splashes experience with our teams. Please consider me as your resort liaison so that I may personally assist you in finding a better located guest room further from the surf with multiple view options and A/C should you choose to give us another opportunity. I can be reached at 949-376-2762.   Thank you.   Barbaros Aklar  Director of Rooms

Summary: Nestled in the heart of Laguna Beach, this resort is iconic in outstanding service and very personable. Perched on the beach, perfect sunsets are easily captured while the Beach sounds lull one into total relaxation. From the restaurant Splashes to the Aquaterra Spa, each experience is welcoming and unique. The resort staff is not only extremely accommodating and friendly - they anticipate one's next adventure. The locally recommended restaurants, cafes, and shops make the Laguna Beach experience even more inviting. We will definitely return!
Manager Response: Dear Monbel/1601:  Thank you so very much for providing positive feedback regarding your recent stay. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know and let our potential guests know that you enjoyed our property, staff, restaurant and Spa.  We are looking very forward to having you back with us.  Please contact us when we may be of service once again.  Warm regards,

Summary: The first night we stayed there we had a suite, the second night we stayed in an Ocean Room. The Ocean Room was cheaper and we liked it better than the Suite. The Suite was layed out weird and had a strange floor plan with a TV that didn't work. And switching from one room to another was a cluster mess. We tried to book a massage but they messed up our reservation twice so we said forget it and the service in the Cafe left little to be desired. That said, I had a wonderful time. The area was beautiful, and when you have an awesome boyfriend like mine, life is good wherever you are!
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Lee:  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your recent stay.  Our sincere apologies that you experienced some difficulties and we did not meet your expectations.  Please be assured your comments will be shared with our management team to address improvements in the areas you mention.  We are very pleased to learn that, despite the snafus, you enjoyed your time with us. Please reach out in the future when you are able to return so that we may accommodate the details of your stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: Our second visit to this hotel.. The rooms in the tower are perfect for a romantic getaway.  And Sandra, the concierge is AWESOME...Really helpful and a very friendly, welcoming approach.... We'll always go back!!
Manager Response: Hello Rachel:  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand once again. Thank you for providing your positive comments and your praise of our Concierge Sandra.  Please be assured that Sandra is aware of your compliments and appreciates them very much.    Please call upon us when you are able to return so that we may accommodate the details of your stay.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Amazing property, outstanding food and perfect location
Summary: My husband and I just returned from Surf and Sand Resort and were absolutely THRILLED with our experience.  The property is stunning- right on the beach.  Beautifully appointed, clean and convenient to all that Laguna Beach has to offer.  We had the most amazing food at both the bar area and in the restaurant.  There is not a thing we would change- and will most definitely plan on coming back.  we give it 5 stars all day long!!
Manager Response: Helllo Mrs. Bateman:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback  regarding your recent stay.  We certainly appreciate your compliments of our property and amenities.  Please call upon us when you are able to return. We hope it is in the not-too-distant future.  Warm Regards,

Summary: I've been coming here for 40 years now and have been instrumental in booking over 600 room nights into the property, so some of what follows comes as no surprise.  First of all, the link between housekeeping and the front desk continues to be problematic. On our second day, we returned after a day at the pool to find that our room still hadn't been made up - at 5pm! Complained to the front desk but to no avail. Left to go to dinner at 6pm - still no response. (Perhaps one signal that all isn't well in this area is that there's no button on the phone for housekeeping). Anyway, the room was finally cleaned while we were at dinner. Speaking of dinner, we ordered the artisanal cheese plate at Splashes, waited half an hour for it to arrive, and when it finally showed up it had two
Manager Response: Dear John C,     Thank you very much for your loyalty over the years and choosing Surf & Sand as your destination for your birthday celebration. Happy Birthday once again! Please accept my sincere apologies in regards to the inconveniences that you unfortunately experienced.  I would like to assure you that your candid feedback is very valuable to us and we will follow up with our teams to ensure we consistently provide the level of product and service excellence our valuable guests expect. I look forward to having an opportunity to talk to you personally and restore your faith with us. I can be reached at 949 376 2762.    Thank you,      Barbaros Aklar  Director of Rooms

Summary: Wife and I had quick local getaway. Location is great. It's about 1 mile from downtown Laguna Beach. It's right on the beach. I think all the rooms have an ocean views. The 2 restaurants both almost sit on top of the beach. The pool overlooks the beach. If you want beachfront, this is the place.   There are a few cons. It does run a bit pricey. They do nickel and dime you. $20 for resort fee and $35 a night for overnight parking. The wifi is nice and fast. 60mbs down and 60mps up.  They've maintained it relatively well, but there are a few places where you can see the age or just accelerated wear from the salty ocean air. Only some of the rooms have AC. Usually not a big issue as the rooms have ceiling fans and it usually doesn't get too hot being right on the beach.... but if
Manager Response: Dear Nahlalee,  Thank you so much for the five star review! You will just have to dine in Splashes during your next visit so you can see just how delicious our food is. Our Chef just won a battle of the chefs for Orange County! We hope to see you again soon. Thank you for the five star review!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Great hotel in Laguna Beach from Lisa at reservations, Zack at the front desk and the two ladies at the Concierges desk. The room was spacious for a hotel room and very comfortable, the view was great, the restaurants, beach, pool etc... were excellent. Everyone was very nice and upbeat. We loved our stay!
Manager Response: Dear Jen,  Thank you so much for the five star review. We will be sure to share this feedback and celebrate it with Lisa and Zach! Thank you again and we hope to see you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Spent Labor Day weekend at the beautiful Surf & Sands Resort. Over the years we have vacationed at many luxury resorts, but have always found the service and the hospitality at Surf & Sands to be world class. The staff works hard to make sure your stay is exceptional and the grounds and facility is always up to par. Location, location, location is what makes all of this completely wonderful!
Manager Response: Dear Loriandrews,  Thank you so much for the five star review and your continued loyalty! We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We recently spent the weekend at this amazing hotel. The location is incredible, right on the beach and easy walk to local stores and restaurants down PCH. We really enjoyed our time and our kids can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear Yellow4,  Thank you so much for the five star review. We are so happy you and the kids enjoyed your time here. Keep bringing them back! One of our favorite things to do is get to know our little travelers and see them grow up year over year. We have so many guests that used to come as a child and now bring their children. That is so special to us. We hope to see you all again soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Stunning Property and Super Kid Friendly!!!
Summary: We stayed here the end of August for a mini staycation! We loved every minute and was a very special mini vacation for me and my family. We ended up getting two rooms on the ocean. Now the rooms have the best view possible however the waves are so loud it woke me up 4 times. The week we stayed there I counted 25 kids in the pool area, now it's a very small pool but the kids loved it! Between the beach and the pool they met so many friends. We enjoyed the food at the resort and the service is wonderful!!!
Manager Response: Dear Twoman,  Thank you so much for the five star review! We are so happy you and the kids enjoyed your stay. It is nice to know they went home with some new friends. We hope you will all visit us again soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: From the moment my family and I arrived we were welcomed with smiles and a bottle of water. They where in the middle of a heat wave so it was much needed. The views where amazing as the hotel was set on the side of a hill overlooking the water.  Our room was not available so we ate lunch at the hotel restaurant, which was delisious. Our room was extremely confirmable and even enough room for a cot. There was no air conditioner, but when you opened the doors, turned on the fan and listened to the sounds of the waves crashing right outside your door and it was perfect.  I would recommend that you request for your room to be made up by 2pm otherwise you will have no fresh towels until 6pm. The hotel is walking distance to shops and restaurants. Oh yes, A  trolly which takes you
Manager Response: Hello Gail T:  Thank you, thank you for sharing your positive comments regarding your stay at Surf & Sand.  We are always pleased to learn that our guests enjoy their time with us. Thank you also for all of your helpful hints for other guests who may be coming to the area or resort for the first time. It is very much appreciated.  We can't wait to have you back with us.  Please contact me directly for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,   Mr. Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms 949-376-2762

Summary: The ocean view rooms are outstanding.  Splashes has great food, the pool is very nice and the service is 5 star.  The staff works hard to make your stay perfect. It is centrally located with easy access to all the shops and restaurants.   All in all a wonderful visit.
Manager Response: Thank you Joe R, for your compliments of our property, staff and Splashes. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your time with us and hope that you will be able to return in the not-too-distant future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,   Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms 9489-376-2762

Summary: The ocean front rooms have killer 180-degree views with balconies that practically hang out over the surf. I stayed in a room w/a king size bed, fashionably angled out from the corner, which was a nice touch. The decor is light, airy and beachy. The staff is very helpful. Drawbacks are the various fees such as parking $35/night, resort fee $20/night, and room fee $68/night, which are all in addition to the room rate ($695 + tax) ~ adding at least an extra $100 to your nightly stay.
Manager Response: Hello PacPalKaren:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your  recent stay. We appreciate knowing that our guests enjoy our property and staff.    We look very forward to having you back with us in the future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Regards, Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms 949-376-2762

Summary Heading: Where the Ocean Waves Lull You to Sleep
Summary: Love-Love-Love the Surf & Sand!  Great location in Laguna Beach to enjoy the beach.  Rooms overlooking the water.  Only down side is no air conditioning, which is usually not a problem, but this last weekend it was a bit uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Hello Psicokitty:  We are so pleased to learn that you "love Surf & Sand." Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know you enjoy our beach location and rooms. Hopefully, you will be able to return when the temperatures are more moderate and comfortable.  Please call upon us when you would like to book your next stay. We look very forward to having you back with us!  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Pageant of the Masters and Beach getaway
Summary: Surf and sand is great in general. But this time we had a first floor ocean view and they were working on the outside flooring in front of our room all weekend. It was always wet and dirty to get into our room. Service was outstanding and people were great but this one thing took away from the experience.
Manager Response: Hello Matthew:  Thank you for sharing your thoughts regarding your recent stay.  We are pleased to learn that you enjoyed our property, service and staff. It is unfortunate that you experienced maintenance work during your stay. Hopefully, you will be able to return so that your stay is what you expect and free of unfortunate circumstances.  Please reach out for assistance in booking your next reservation. We look forward to meeting your expectations.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Any closer to the beach and you will be wet!
Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights with my wife and 2 children aged 13 and 11 years old and loved it and would return there in a minute.  The pool was a little crowded but it was to be expected given the last week of summer but the beach is wide open and spectacular.  Our room had 2 queens and was large enough to fit a roll-in as well.  It was a surprise to learn there was no AC in the rooms and normally would be 100% fine but we were there during the record Los Angeles heat wave of all time.  The room was warm during the day time (which we were rarely in) but by bedtime with the patio door open and the fans blowing it was fine - besides the fantastic views and the sound of the waves crashing right outside our windows made it all OK anyhow.  The concierges were all really friendly,
Manager Response: Hello Slammy 25:  Thank you so very much for sharing your feedback and compliments of our property, staff and restaurant.  We again apologize for the housekeeping issues you experienced and are pleased we were able to remedy the situation with a positive outcome.  We hope you are able to return very soon. Please  contact the Executive Office for assistance in booking your reservations.  Warm regards,

Summary: The location is great, awesome restaurant and beautiful property. The hotels highlight is also its downfall...the rooms are literally RIGHT on top of the ocean. This makes for amazing views but if you sleep with the patio door open the ocean noise is way too loud to sleep, but you cant sleep with the patio door closed because there is no air conditioning and it's too hot. they provide ear plugs but we found those uncomfortable to sleep with them in our ears.
Manager Response: Hello Ellen V:  We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed our location, property and  restaurant.  It is our hope that you are able to return at a cooler time of year when temperatures are more comfortable.  We would like to assist you with the details of a future stay. Please reach out to the resort directly so that we are able to accommodate all the details of your stay.  Hoping to see you back soon!  Warm regards,

Summary: We spent 2 nice nights with baby in tow.  Location is perfect, staff was great, and rooms are very comfortable.  We did a package that included parking and breakfast, which was worth it.  Downsides are the pool is way too small for the size of the resort and therefore over run by kids (it was even closed for a day when we were there due to bacteria) and no air conditioning (usually not an issue but with a baby it was too hot).
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent stay.  We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed our location, staff and  guest room.  Hopefully, you will be able to return at a less busy and cooler time in the near future.  We would enjoy assisting you with your  reservations so that all of your needs are met.  Warm regards,

Summary: This is a lovely hotel, well located and friendly staff. But It has one very major problem. No air conditioning. I'm not sure how they can get away with this for plus $700 per night. We spent 5 sweltering nights in this sweat box. It's not even that hot outside, maybe high 70's, which is typical for August. We have lost sleep and I'm leaving this hotel very tired, after hoping for a relaxing vacation.  The waves are too loud at night to leave the screen doors all the way open, however, we tried it anyway, and it didn't make much of a difference to this sweatbox.  Humid, hot, so unfortunately, not worth the money at all. In fact they should disclose this to people when booking them room.  I wish I could get a partial refund. They need to retrofit and get some sort of a/c. I don't

Tower rooms have beautiful view and staff is extremely courteous. I would love to come on a weekday when it is less crowded although guests and staff handled the crowds well. Loved it.  Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Hello Laurie R:  Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed our property and staff.  We look very forward to your return at a more quiet time so that you are able to fully enjoy all of the amenities of Surf & Sand.!  Please reach out for assistance when you are able to be back with us!  Respectfully,

Summary Heading: Amazing! Literally right on the Ocean!
Summary: Here for a meeting in one of the many gorgeous suites.  Truly impeccable surroundings with undeniable customer service.  If you haven't yet visited this is a must on your bucket list.  One of the best properties in So Calif.
Manager Response: Hello Pink Pony 2:  We are so pleased you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Thank you  for taking the time to share your feedback and for letting others know  they are in for a great experience.  We always appreciate positive responses from our guests.   We hope you are able to return in the near future.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: best hotel in southern california for beachfront luxury rooms and personal service..
Summary: Rooms are immaculately clean, newly decorated combined with all amenities, i.e. Spa workout facility, immediate access to pool and beach...great indoor outdoor restaurant and bar adjacent to the Beach and pool...In my case all my needs were met with Pamela Hopkins in management making my trip that much more special...Thanks Pamela.  Mike S
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Starkman:  Thank you SO very much for responding to our Trip Advisor and offering your compliments of our property.  We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience (and thank you for the special recognition.  We hope to see you back at Surf in the not-too-distant future.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: No AC No WiFi and Terrible Customer Service
Summary: This is a beautiful property that is terribly mismanaged. First of all, no A/C in a "Luxe" property. Our WiFi was not working during our stay but they advertise WiFi and charge a resort fee. We were told because we booked through a 3rd party (hotel tonight) we were given a low room category room and that was the reason we were having issues. Additionally, when we asked to have our room moved the manager on duty lied to us and said there were no other rooms. Funny they had rooms listed on their website and third party websites. We spent $300 on room, $35 on parking and a resort fee. Avoid the Surf and Sand and spend your money on a true Luxe resort.
Manager Response: Hello Breezzy:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. On behalf of our team, please accept my sincere apologies for the inconveniences that you unfortunately experienced. I would like to assure you and all our travelers that we strive for product and service excellence with each guest experience and your experience was not a reflection of our high standards. I would very much welcome the opportunity to talk to you directly so that I can address your concerns and restore your faith with Surf & Sand Resort. I am available at your convenience and can be reached at 949 376 2762. Thank you.  Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms Surf & Sand Resort

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Laguna Beach!
Summary: The hotel is right on the water with spectacular views. The staff are all extremely friendly and helpful. The restaurant on the property has a huge variety of quality foods and beverages. This place is one of the best we have ever been to.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you so very much for your compliments of Surf & Sand, our staff and restaurant.   Your kind words are appreciated; we are pleased you shared your positive views on Trip Advisor.    We hope that you are able to return in the very near future.  Please reach out for assistance so that we may accommodate the details of your stay.  Warm regards,

Hotel reservation representative was not inform me that there is no a/c in the room, if does, I'll not consider to staying at their hotel. On behalf of our team, please accept my sincere apologies for the inconveniences that you unfortunately experienced. I would like to assure you and all our travelers that your experience is definitely not a reflection of our culture of service excellence as your genuine care and comfort is our highest mission. Summary: I wanted to love this place but one thing after another made it a huge disappointment. We asked for a quiet room on a higher floor, and got put right over the pool area with music pounding non stop late into the night. Not quiet at all, and apparently no other rooms to move to.  When I inquired multiple times about moving, the front desk did not seem very interested in helping me. With no air conditioning, you have to leave the door open to get any air flow.  Again, very noisy. The shower had terrible water pressure. I had to get on my knees in the tub to rinse out conditioner under the faucet. There just wasn't enough pressure in the shower head to do the job. The beach chairs were not available at 11am because the key got lost, and the beach disappears at high tide. The
Manager Response: Dear BeachBaby328,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. On behalf of our team, please accept my sincere apologies for the inconveniences that you unfortunately experienced. I would like to assure you and all our travelers that we strive for product and service excellence with each guest experience and your experience was not a reflection of our high standards. I also would like extend my sincere gratitude for recognizing Diane as the bright spot of your trip. It will be my pleasure to share your high notes with her. She is a shining star. I would very much welcome the opportunity to talk to you directly so that I can address your concerns and restore your faith with Surf & Sand Resort. I am available at your convenience and can be reached at 949 376 2762. Thank you.   Until then,   Warm Regards,   Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms

Summary: Surf and Sand Laguna is a very special place to my family.  The rooms are charming, with incredible ocean views, and the warm vibes from the staff can't be matched anywhere.  The staff goes out of their way to accommodate any request.  The team at the concierge desk is 5 star all the way!  Sharon and Sandra were eager to do anything they could to make our stay even more enjoyable.  We look forward to our trips to Surf and Sand every year.  I have been hesitant to review, because I almost don't want the word to get out.  This is a boutique, beach hotel at its finest!
Manager Response: Hello!!  Thank you so very much for "finally" sharing the details of your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  We are very pleased to know our special efforts to servicing our guests is appreciated.    Please be assured that your compliments of our Concierge team will be shared and are always enjoyed by each associate.    We look very forward to having you back with us. Please reach out for any needed assistance with your future stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: Finest hotel experience I've ever had in Southern LA - and that's saying a lot given the amount of travel I do. The entire staff was stupendous, courteous and very warm/funny to interact with. The views are remarkable. The pool and beach worth the price of admission and we found the other guests charming as well. The Spa was not crowded the day we stayed so they offered the steam room on the house.   Also of note: I lost a pair of very expensive sunglasses in the ocean and somehow they miraculously found their way back to my room a couple hours later.  If you go, be sure to say hi to Sandra, Sharon and Kathleen at the concierge desk. Wonderful women!
Manager Response: Hello Jason:  Your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand is quite outstanding! Thank you so very much for the accolades of our associates, Spa, pool/beach, and our wonderful Concierge team!  Please be assured your kind words are shared with those you mention and are appreciated.  How wonderful that your special sunglasses made their way back to you!!    We hope you are able to return in the very near future.  Please reach out for assistance with the details of your next stay!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Had an amazing stay at this beautiful property!
Summary: Spectacular service at this beautiful property!  Sharon and Sandra are wonderful concierge and Misty and the entire team at the front desk.  Wonderful housekeeping team, room service, the crew at the pool, and splashes.  We celebrated two birthdays and just loved this place.  New traditions.  The most beautiful sunsets!   Love to hear the ocean and waves crashing.  Just a treat for certain!
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Seabert:  Thank you so much for your kind words regarding your recent stay.  We are  delighted to learn that you enjoyed all aspects of Surf & Sand, and are  especially pleased that you have started a new tradition that we hope will continue well into the future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance when you are able to return to lovely Laguna Beach!  We look forward to having you as our guests once again.   Warm regards,

Summary: Terrific hotel, location and food - A very special thank you to Sandra, Concierge, for her great help and making our stay even better.  She represented the hotel extremely well and we appreciated her greatly.
Manager Response: Hello FC Morris:  Thank you for sharing your feedback and compliments of our property and staff.  We are very pleased that we met your expectations on your anniversary stay! Sandra will be appreciative of your special recognition. Our Concierge's team is very special and truly enjoys meeting our guests' needs!  We hope to have you back at Surf & Sand in the very near future.  Warm regards,

Summary: We arrived early for our 4 pm check-in but this did not present a problem.  We used valet parking and they checked our bags until our room was ready.  A little pricey at $35 a day but  no other choice as parking is nonexistent near the hotel.    Great accommodations while we waited for our room.  Our room overlooked the ocean with a small balcony patio.  The room was nicely appointed.  A point of note is the breaking surf directly below our room.  If you are a light sleeper you may want to consider a non surf side room. The service is indisputably the best I have ever had from valet, front desk check-in, restaurant, bar, room and check-out, could not be better. Food selection and service was excellent.  Great get-away place to be pampered.
Manager Response: Hello Emory B:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Surf & Sand. We appreciate your compliments of our associates, amenities and property, and are pleased to hear that your anniversary stay was enjoyable.  Please contact us in the future when you are able to return so that we may accommodate the details of your stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: We always end up staying a few times a year at the Surf and Sand! Surprisingly, there is very few hotels in California with that old school ocean front feel. The place is small and totally free of any " fuss". The location is brilliant, on a great beach for the kids. Walking distance to all shops and restaurants. The store across the street " Soul Project " is a must . The staff is always sweet and attitude free. The restaurant is just great, best breakfast ever. The waiters have been there for ever, all eager to help. The place is ready for a little updating. But there is this ease when you get at the Surf and Sand that I have not been able to find in any other hotel in Southern California, true California living! Our kids, even the teenager love it there!! We bring our dog as
Manager Response: Hello Long Time, Loyal Guest:  Thank you for ensuring that you make it back to Surf & Sand often.  And,  thank you for sharing all of the amenities we offer and those in lovely Laguna Beach so that others are able to try them out for themselves.  We hope you are able to return very soon so that we are able to accommodate the details of your stay once again.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Love this place....So beautiful, peaceful and just a great place for some get away time. We have been coming  here for 15 years!!!!!!! The Surf and Sand never disappoints.  The staff is so accommodating and friendly.   Ali North the concierge is the Best and always willing to help, she is an angel!!!!! April and Brian - Check in and Check out Irene -  Housekeeping  Phil - Bellman  This by far is our favorite place to stay!!!!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Susan B:  We are so happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay at Surf & Sand once again. As our long time, loyal guest, we truly appreciate you sharing your sincere compliments of our accommodations and associates.  Please be assured that  those you mention will be informed of your kind words and appreciation of  their efforts.  Please let us know when you are able to return. We hope it is in the not-too-distant future.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful view but a tad disappointed in the room
Summary: Okay----let me be clear, this is a lovely place. The service is wonderful, restaurant is delicious, our room had a gorgeous view, but......( no air conditioning) in the rooms. I know it's California and lots of places do not have AC, but when you're playing $800 a night for a room, you'd like the basics. If you go, don't go when it's hot or during peak season. It's was 82 degrees outside when we were there and we decided to leave after the first night because it was too hot in our room. (Even with windows open and box fans running) Happy traveling!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I would like to extend my sincere gratitude for your nice comments on our Service levels, our Restaurant food quality and our famous views. On the other hand, we apologize that your experience did not meet or exceed your expectations due to air conditioning. We do have different types of rooms with air conditioning as well. I would welcome the opportunity to talk to you in person and ensure your next stays are wonderful here at The Surf & Sand Resort in all aspects. I can be reached at 949 376 2762.  Thank you   Barbaros Aklar  Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: No Air Conditioning in Beach Front Rooms
Summary: We made the mistake of trying to stay in Laguna Beach during Pageant of the Masters.  Even booking 4 months in advance the prices were outrageous and everything was either sold out or required a 2-night minimum.  So Surf & Sand was the only option.  For $800/night - it should be luxurious in every way.  It was not.  The pool was extremely overcrowded, due in large part to the resort offering day passes to non-hotel guests.  We couldn't find a place to sit.  We originally booked a room with a full ocean view, but a few days before check-in learned that our room was not air conditioned.  Given the summer heat, that was unacceptable, so we were switched to a room with air conditioning and no ocean view.  The room was clean and spacious, but very dated.  And the shower was so small
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I would like to extend my sincere apologies that your experience was not a reflection of our high standards. I would welcome the opportunity to talk to you in person and restore your faith with the Surf & Sand Resort. I can be reached at 949 376 2762.  Thank you   Barbaros Aklar  Director of Rooms

Summary Heading: It doesn't get better than this!
Summary: We've been coming to the Surf and Sand for many years and always have a wonderful time. The ocean front rooms on the lower side wing (not the tower) are the way to go. Our view plus sunsets conveniently located near pool and beach stairs was a plus. Beach service with chairs, unlimited towels and umbrellas without feeling like you have to "check them out" like in other hotels. Food on the beach was actually very good too.   Our room was great but the bathroom is in need of some repair and extra cleaning. Shower was terrific though. Can't beat the sound of the waves crashing all night long and wow those sunsets!   Staff is very good and accommodating especially to repeat guests even if a while ago they remember. That's a nice touch. In addition to the Mauna Kea on the Big Island
Manager Response: Hello Brooklyn478!  As our long time, loyal guests, thank you for letting us know you enjoyed Surf  & Sand once again.  We are so pleased that you were able to return and hope to have you back in the very near future.  We are also happy that we are a favorite property of yours also.  We appreciate your feedback which we take very seriously.  Warm regard,

Summary: I booked a trip for my "birthday" through Preferred Hotels & Resorts, a 3rd party promoting luxury hotels and resorts worldwide.  For Phase 1 of my birthday trip we stayed a few nights at Surf & Sand Resort.  Upon arrival at the hotel, my stay started off a little rocky.  My room was directly above the pool which during summer vacation can be very noisy.  I was seeking rest and relaxation and something a little quieter for a birthday celebration with my sisters.  The hotel staff went above and beyond to accommodate my request for a room away from the pool area, due to my request for quietness.  The staff quickly accommodated my request with professionalism and excellence.  I was pleasantly surprised of the proximity of the property on the ocean.  As a result of the awesome
Manager Response: Hello Jeanniene:  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Surf & Sand.  We take great pride in our property and are so pleased that you enjoyed our beach location and the attention of  our staff.  We are also happy to know that the issues you mention were met promptly and with professionalism.  Please call upon us when you are able to return so that we may accommodate the details of your stay to ensure all of your needs are addressed.  Warm regards,

Summary: We had the most amazing time at Surf and Sand.  Everywhere we turned someone was there to help us.  Not out of obligation but there to make our family reunion experience the best it could be - Emily in event planning, the concierge, and then there is Jeff who greeted us every afternoon on the terrace...we loved being here!!  If you want a smaller and intimate high quality experience than a large chain...this is your place in Laguna Beach!  Thank you for making our time with family so special and a time we will never forget!
Manager Response: Hello Crashlee:  We are so pleased to hear that your family reunion with us was suceessful and enjoyable!  Rest assured that your compliments of our associates is very much appreciated and will be shared with those you mention.    We hope that you are able to return again in the very near future - possibly next year's reunion??  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: I have to say this hotel is by far the worst 4+ hotel experience of my life. At best maybe a 3star.  I travel with my family about 5-6 times a year and I have never experienced a more non caring service in a hotel. I have attached some pics to justify my review. The rooms are mediocre but not a big deal. ok with that but no air conditioning is a major problem in Aug!! No where on their website or any of the online websites does it state that they don't have air conditioning. So they bring us a big fan that is useless and tell us that if we had paid more we would have had a/c and a view.  Next the flush in our toilet plugs all the time!! Lastly and might be the worst is the hallway our room is in!!!  I pass by garbage and storage to get to our room and this is  suppose to be a 4+
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I would like to extend my sincere apologies that your experience was not a reflection of our high standards. I would welcome the opportunity to talk to you in person and restore your faith with the Surf & Sand Resort. I can be reached at 949 376 2762.  Thank you,  Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms

Summary: Surf & Sand has a great location on a beautiful beach in the darling town of Laguna Beach.  What sets it apart from other resorts are the employees.   The hotel staff bent over backwards to meet our needs and help us enjoy our stay. We met Diane, a fabulous concierge, at the pool.  She worked with my husband for an hour to find the perfect spot for dinner.  She is personable, knowledgeable and a total asset to the Surf & Sand staff.  Thank you Diane!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positive feedback regarding your recent stay. Your compliments of our associates and, especially, Diane at Concierge are very much appreciated and will b shared with Diane.  We are so pleased you enjoyed our property and staff and look very forward to having you back at Surf & Sand!  Warm regards,

Summary: Had a massage by Michelle Muhammad and it was amazing! She was so kind and provided a very relaxing experience. I will be returning to her for sure!  She noticed where my body needed a little bit more attention and adjusted the massage to fulfill my needs. It was one of the best massages I have ever gotten. The spa is clean and beautiful and so relaxing.
Manager Response: Hello!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your massage treatment with Michelle. Your compliments are appreciated and will be shared with Michelle.  Thank you for sharing your experience and letting us know you enjoyed your time at Surf & Sand.   Please reach out in the future when you are able to return.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: There's No Place Like Our Home Away from Home
Summary: Two years ago my wife and I retired and move to  Sedona, Arizona and feel we  have truly found paradise.  But to get our beach fix,for the last seven years,  we have traveled to the Surf and Sand and spend a week after Christmas, and then two weeks during 4th of July.  There are several other high end resorts along the Laguna coast but only the Surf and Sand is truly located on the ocean's edge.  We always stay in our Top of the Surf corner room with a 180 degree view of the Pacific.  The balcony, bed, room orientation and d√©cor is perfect.  To be able to take the elevator down to the 1st floor and walk out on the sand, have the pool guys set us up with umbrella, chairs, and towels, call a server over for fish tacos or a summer salad with cool drinks is just the best.  The
Manager Response: Hello Stan & Marie:  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience of your recent stay at Surf & Sand. As our long time, loyal guests, we are always so pleased to have you back at your "Home Away from Home!" Please be assured that your kind words of all of our associates are shared and very much appreciated.  Ali and her team are the very best Concierges and always go the extra mile to ensure our guests are comfortable and satisfied.    We look very forward to your holiday stay and your 2018 4th of July.  Please call upon us so we are able to accommodate all the details of your stays.  Warm regards,

Summary: I have just spent two nights at the Surf & Sand Hotel in Laguna Beach. Paid a fortune for both nights together with meals, bar consumption etc...  I really expected more, considering how expensive the rooms were for July.  The hotel is in a fantastic location but I had the sensation that it was not taken care of as other luxury hotels I have stayed in.  The common areas were dirty and the rooms were never cleaned properly (when the cleaning staff came).  The second day I had to call reception at 5pm as nobody had showed up to clean the room!  We were given room 211 that was located near Splashes Restaurant. People returning from dinner had no consideration at all for other guests and made a lot of noise when leaving the restaurant!  The swimming pool area was dirty.  The sunbeds
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing a detailed review of your experience. I would like to assure you and all our travelers that Surf & Sand has the highest levels of cleanliness and product standards. I apologize your experience was not a typical Surf & Sand Experience. I would welcome the opportunity to restore your faith with us and can be reached at 949 376 2762.  Kindly,  Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms

Summary: This is a great place to vacation with your family. Perfect for kids and adults. We loved the view from the room, the service, and the pool. There were so many activities for kids but we could still relax as adults.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and complimenting our resort and amenities.  We are always so pleased to hear that children enjoy the  resort and activities as much as the adults.    Please plan to return in the near future so that we may accommodate another pleasant stay for you!  Have a great remaining summer!

Summary: This a great resort we always have excellent service, great restaurant, nice pool and beautiful view  close to shopping and other activities. We always look forward to coming back this our special place to come to get away.
Manager Response: Howard A:  As our loyal, return guests, thank you so much for continuing to choose Surf  and Sand as your "special getaway place."  We appreciate knowing we meet  your expectations each and every stay.    We will see you back soon - please contact us for any needed assistance!  Warm regards,

Summary: The Surf and Sand takes my breath away everytime I visit and it does for anyone I refer! The view is amazing!  I have found no other hotel that can compare with the Surf and Sand for the view and/or customer service.  We have stayed a handful of times there and the staff always remembers us.  Such a homey feeling at such an elegant place.  I literally cannot find the words to express how happy this hotel makes me every time I visit!!  The food is amazing and the events held at 1555 are always fun and the beach and surf are literally touching the hotel, which you don't find many places like that in California.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Spiers:  Your feedback regarding your recent say is very much appreciated.  As our very loyal, return guest, thank you for the compliments of our resort, staff and amenities.  We are so pleased that those you refer feel the same as you do, and hope that everyone will be able to return in the very near future. It is gratifying to learn that we continue to make you "happy!"  Please contact us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: This is my second time visiting Surf & Sand and loved, loved, loved it! Great pool with great service, lovely beach with easy access, super kind staff and wonderful restaurant and bar options. Also utilized the spa and got a great couples scrub and massage from Sal and Annette. Both so kind and good! Great place!!!
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for taking the time to share the details of your return visit to Surf & Sand.  We are always pleased to learn that our guests enjoy our location and amenities.  Please be assured that your compliments or our spa associates will be shared with them, as they strive to ensure our guest's enjoy their services.    We look forward to your "third" visit with us and, anticipate many more in the future.  Warm regards,

Summary: If you desire a beautiful resort located right on the beach, look no further, the Surf and Sand Resort in Laguna Beach, California, sits oceanfront with the most amazing view of the ocean from your balcony. This vacation getaway is on our "must go" list at least three times a year! The resort is the home of the phenomenal Splashes restaurant and bar where you can sit viewing the crashing ocean waves while enjoying splendid food and drinks. It's perfect whether you want a snack or a full course meal, you will be impressed! Pacific Perk boasts delicious lattes along with a variety of wonderful food selections to start your day. 1555 is also a great option for food and drink! The resort has a wonderful gift shop with an excellent selection; I always return home with many purchases.
Manager Response: Hello Melody M!  As our long time, very loyal guests, thank you so, so much for your  compliments and kind words of Surf & Sand!  Our entire "Surf Team" always looks forward to your yearly return(s) and find it a genuine pleasure to accommodate all of your needs.    2018 will be here before we know it and we anticipate, with pleasure, your return to the resort!  Always reach out for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful remaining summer!

Summary: Great hotel and great staff! The only negative about this hotel is the air conditioning and the bathrooms which are small and need to be updated! The Spa is new and beautiful and everyone who works there is very polite and helpful. The music at the hotel is great and on weekends the guitar player was very entertaining! We really enjoyed the music!
Manager Response: Hello Rhonda:  Thank you for sharing your experience regarding your recent stay. We always appreciate receiving our guest's feedback so that we are able to make improvements.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed our spa and  had a chance to relax to our entertainment.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Read some reviews of hotels in the surrounding area and Surf & Sand Resort caught my eye. I'm glad I chose this hotel because my stay there was nice and relaxing. I enjoyed the view, the staff was friendly and helpful with any questions I might have had and the room was nice and clean. Which to me, those things are very important. Great first-time experience and I would definitely go back. The only downfall, I wish I could have stayed two more days since I was only there for the weekend.
Manager Response: Hello April:  As our first time guest, we are so pleased that you enjoyed Surf & Sand! Thank you for choosing our resort and sharing the "important" features of the resort.  Hopefully, when you are able to return in the near future, you will be able to stay longer and enjoy even more of our amenities.  Please reach out for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: We have been coming to Surf & Sand Resort for 30 years for our girl's annual getaway vacation weekend.  It's our favorite beach resort.  The staff is welcoming, friendly, helpful and always welcomes us back each year.  We love it here!!!!
Manager Response: Hello Rosemary!  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed your time with us once again.  As our long time, very loyal guests, we anticipate your stay every year and look very forward to accommodating you in 2018.    Have a wonderful remaining summer season and we will see you back next June!!  Warm regards,

Summary: I can't say enough about this amazing hotel. The staff was so friendly and welcoming. I really actually felt important. My husband and got couples massages at their amazing spa. We absolutely loved Splashes, which is their beautiful oceanfront restaurant. Everything we ordered was awesome but the scallops were to die for! This was my first trip here and I can't wait to return. We're thinking of making this our annual trip. If you're looking for a nice romantic weekend with your special someone this is THE spot.
Manager Response: Hello Ashlee:  We are very appreciative of your compliments of Surf & Sand. We are especially pleased that you enjoyed all of our amenities on your first visit with us. Thank you for taking the time  to point out the best features we have to offer. Please plan to return in the near future so that we may accommodate all of  your needs.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Super Resort and On Beach facility
Summary: We had planned a beach resort for three days at another place and it SUCKED! We left there and headed to Surf and Sand. WHAT A WONDERFUL PLACE. If you are looking for mid-sized beach experience THIS IS THE PLACE. Great helpful and courteous staff
Manager Response: Hello Jim!  We are very pleased that we were able to save your vacation and met all of your expectations.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We hope to have you back with us very soon.  Please contact us if we may be of additional service to you.  Regards,

Summary: What a nice place, decor and ambience is great!. You have to try the spa, best Massage ever! Food is great, the view is wonderful, service five star, I am so happy I was there, will be coming back for sure
Manager Response: On behalf our our entire "Surf Team", thank you for your compliments of Surf &  Sand.  We are very pleased that your massage was the "best ever", and our location and restaurant offerings earned five stars!   Hopefully, you will be able to return for another great experience.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Happy remaining summer!

Summary: Our unequivocal and complete thumbs up recommendation of this hotel. We have stayed all over the world and it is nice to know that a place like this is available in our own comparative backyard. The Hotel is relatively boutique yet has all of the benefits of a large enterprise. The property is an attractive modern well-maintained decor resembling its name and venue, at the ocean's edge with splashes of light emerald green amidst a palette of soft sandy tans, whites, shutters, seashells, finer details like crown mouldings, among other things, and fabulous views, particularly from the ocean-facing upper units, almost as if you are living up in the clouds and seeing the shore so far, directly below, and in fact you are. As well as also so far up that an occasional seagull might
Manager Response: Hello Richard!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your wonderful experience at Surf  & Sand.  Please be assured that your special recognition of our Concierge staff will be shared with those who assisted you during your stay.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed our location, staff and property in general.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the  not-too-distant future.  Please calll upon us for assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: Beautiful property. I have been celebrating my birthday at the surf and Sand for the past 30 years. Lovely rooms, easy access to the beach and amazing staff.  There is one young man who goes over and beyond to make our stay more memorable.  Thank you Aaron.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your compliments of our location and associates. Please be assured that your praise of Aaron will be shared, as our staff always appreciates knowing their efforts are appreciated.  Please call upon us when you are able to return to your "Happy Place." We hope it is sooner than later!  Warm regards

Summary: Been coming to this great resort every June for 30 years because of the beautiful beach and great staff!! It makes you feel special when staff members greet you back by nameüëçTake advantage of the ocean or pool to swim and after enjoy a great snack from the restaurant or sidewalk cafe that serve some great soups and salads
Manager Response: Hello L R:  As our loyal, long time guest, we are so pleased to have had you back at Surf & Sand.  Thank you for sharing the great tips on our property and  staff.  We truly enjoy hearing that we have met your expectations once again.  Hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future!  Have a great remaining summer!

Summary Heading: Lessons learned from taking advice from trip advisor reviews
Summary: Take to heart the poor reviews you read here are warnings. Secondly , view positive reviews with skepticism as they mostly share the quality of being non authentic  . The valets and other workers are very nice. The exterior courtyards are nice , but once you get in the non air conditioned rooms it's a 1974 roadside motel. Do not book a luxury 1400.00 + a night suite , A restaurant is right above your head , the ceiling / roof is thin , and you will be woken up quite early by excessive restaurant  noise. If you do venture out onto your terrace , you will be closely watched by dozens of people enjoying their meal.
Manager Response: Dear Starfruit,   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. On behalf of our staff, I would like to extend my sincere apologies that we were not able to meet and exceed your expectations. I would like to assure you that we strive for product and service excellence with each guest experience and hold our teams to the highest level of standards in luxury hospitality while keeping the Surf & Sand casual yet refined ambiance. I would welcome the opportunity to restore your faith with us. I am available at your convenience and can be reached at baklar@jcresorts.com or 949 376 2762. Thank you  Best Regards,  Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms

Summary: My husband and I spent our anniversary there and it was the best time ever. We go every year and are treated like royalty.  You won't be disappointed  the rooms and service are spectacular and the views are beyond belief!  Make sure and visit Splashes the restaurant on property.  Very romantic!
Manager Response: Hello Tammy B:  We are so pleased that you were able to spend your "special" anniversary with us. Your compliments of our property, restaurant and service are very much  appreciated.  We look very forward to having you back with us!  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: LOVE this jewel in Laguna Beach!
Summary: This gem is right on the sand in Laguna Beach and such a great get-away.  The views are beautiful and the staff is friendly, on-point and professional.   I want to make special mention of Pamela Hopkins who is awesome to work with and takes such great care of me and our staff who stay at the resort.   It is popular and definitely a favorite of our team.    The location is ideal and has so many cute shops, nice restaurants as well as the beach....is right there!!!!    One of my dear friend's had her daughter's wedding here some years ago and it was such a beautiful event with great service, yummy food and the setting was amazing!  You definitely want to take in the Surf and Sand Resort and their outlets....and I definitely want to go back!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback and helpful hints of our property and  surrounding area.  Your kind words complimenting our staff, service and amenities are  very  much appreciated.  As our repeat guest, we are pleased that you enjoy your time with us and we look very forward to having you and your team return!  Warm regards,

Summary: The beach at the resort is beautiful.  The views are amazing.  Lots of relaxing and fun, a perfect getaway.  Enjoy some delicious meals at the Splashes restaurant!   Staff is friendly and aim to please.  Rooms are clean and comfortable.  Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Hello Mindy F:  Thank you for sharing your experience with others in "highly recommending" Surf &  Sand Resort.  We are always pleased to learn that our guests enjoy  all that the resort has to offer.  We look forward to having you back with us!  Warm regards,

Summary: Amazing Resort, Great Rooms with Great Views, Ocean Front with Great Beach Access, Good Food, and the BEST staff you will find! The location of this hotel is one of the best.  You are so close to the pool and beach.  The room are very nice and very comfortable.  The staff will get to know you and make you feel right at home.
Manager Response: We are very appreciative of your compliments of our resort. Thank you for sharing your experience. We are pleased that we made you feel at  home and look forward to your return.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance in booking your future stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: It was beautiful and the staff was amazing!!! We had dinner there and it is a vacation I will cherish the memories forever!! 5stars all the way around! The staff was so polite and helpful. The food was great!
Manager Response: Kyla A:  Thank you for your kind words and compliments of Surf & Sand. We always appreciate hearing that our guests enjoyed their time with us and all amenities of the resort.   Please all upon us for any needed assistance in the future. We look very forward to having you back with us!  Regards,

Summary: The Surf and Sand is just wonderfully spectacular.... Splashes restaurant is overlooking and directly on the beach ! Love the pool area which is also directly on the beach with the best customer service never leaving me hungry or thirsty .... the rooms are always so inviting with the balconies overlooking the water and the sound of the waves in the evening is decadent ... the property itself if beautiful with a luxurious spa to top it off ! Lastly it is right in the heart of Laguna for my favorite shopping experience ! Cannot wait to go back ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf &  Sand. We are so pleased that you enjoyed our location, customer service and  restaurant.  It is our hope that you will be able to return in the very near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful remaining summer season!

Summary Heading: Gorgeous Location, Great Staff, Unbeatable Views
Summary: If you enjoy being lulled to sleep by the sound of the ocean waves crashing just feet below you, this is your spot. The Surf & Sand is a gorgeous hotel located on the cliffs. Below is a private beach area with chairs and umbrellas. If you prefer, you can hang out at the pool also overlooking the ocean. The pool bar is fun and a great spot to relax.  The staff is courteous, professional, and there to assist you with whatever you need, from making reservations at Laguna Beach's trendiest restaurants (including their own, Splashes!), to hooking you up with a local whale watching tour.  The rooms are very well done, always clean, and again, the views are unbeatable. If you can splurge on a suite, go for it! We can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Hello Kristin M:  We appreciate you sharing your wonderful experience and letting us know that you enjoyed your time with us.  It certainly appears that you were able to take advantage of most of our amenities in and around the resort, and the  adventures offered throughout the area/off property.   Hopefully, you will be able to return very soon.  Please call upon us so that we are able to accommodate the details of your future stay.  Warm regards,

Summary: We booked this resort on line and the hotel advertises a lower level suite ocean view. However, a lower level suite is not on the first floor but is considered not on their top floors. Our suite #442 looked out on top of the building below us and had not beach view at all and limited ocean view of what could be seen beyond the building. Our room had no air conditioning and was hot during the day. The beach is dirty and the sand is dark like mud. The swimming pool is very small and over crowded. We asked to be moved to a more accommodating room and was told there were no more rooms. We elected to check out and go down the street to the Montage. If you are trying to decide between these two hotels there is no comparison. If you are an experienced traveler and like the finer things
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I would like to assure you and all our travelers that we strive for product and service excellence with each guest experience and hold our teams to the highest level of standards in luxury hospitality while keeping the Surf & Sand casual yet refined ambiance. I would welcome the opportunity to express my sincere apologies in person and restore your faith with us. I am available at your convenience and can be reached at baklar@jcresorts.com or 949 376 2762. Thank you  Best Regards,  Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms

Summary: Loved this resort! It very well kept and has a friendly staff that's very helpful with recommending things to do in the area. I enjoyed the massage in the spa and relaxed and enjoyed the amazing sunset.
Manager Response: Hello Amy W:  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed our property and were able to take advantage of what lovely Laguna Beach has to offer. Please be assured that  your kind words will be shared with our Spa associates, who are always  appreciative of favorable feedback.  Hopefully, you will be able to return to Surf & Sand in the near future. Please call upon us for assistance.   Warm regards,

Summary: When I was a kid in the 1980's and 1990's, flying to Laguna Beach from Portland, Oregon, to spend Summers with my Mom, we would always go to the Surf & Sand for breakfast at least once. She loved the place, and would stay there a few times per year as a mini vacation. She was a very stylish woman, and after staying at the Surf and Sand recently, I can see why she loved it so much.  My wife and I were recently in Laguna visiting family over a long July 4th weekend with our 1 year old son. Our family gave us an amazing gift, and told us that they would watch our son for a night so we could have a date night. WOW! BEST GIFT EVER! We decided to stay at the Surf & Sand for the night, and we are so happy we did.  First of all, the Surf & Sand is in a great location. It is on a
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience at Surf & Sand.  It is always a pleasure to hear from long time, loyal guests!   We are so pleased that you, like your Mother found Surf & Sand to be a very special place.   Thank you again for the compliments of our associates, restaurant and location.    We hope that you are able to return in the not too distant future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  We look forward to having you back!  Regards,

Summary: Stayed here for a second time recently and enjoyed our stay again very much!  The resort is very nice and comfortable. Excellent service and you can't beat the location - right on the beach!  The food in the bar and restaurant is great. Will stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed Surf & Sand for a second time. We hope you are able to return in the near future.  Please call upon us  for any needed assistance in booking a reservation.  Have a wonderful remaining summer!  Regards,

Summary: My family and I have been coming here every year since 1995. Once you step onto the property you're part of the Surf and Sand family. From the valet, to bellman, to the receptionist, and to housekeeping you get superior service. They remember your names and ask if they can make your stay any better. The property is in the ideal location but I believe most people want to feel special. Surf and Sand Resort does that effortlessly.
Manager Response: Hello Rick M:  Thank you so very much for your feedback regarding your return to Surf & Sand. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our property and associates once again. We hope you are able to return in the very near future.  Please all upon us for any needed assistance.  Happy Summer!

Summary: We are celebrating 34 years of marriage this year. Officially empty-nesters, we are out and off to rediscover one another ... our likes and dislikes, our common joys and our individuality. With a weeks vacation before us and the local temperature headed to the dreaded "triple digits", we called the Surf and Sand last minute. We are NOT high-rollers. Nor do we live on "bondo-bucks" (i.e., credit cards) so the decision to go away for a night faced some monetary constraints. Nonetheless, I contacted the Surf and Sand and requested the most economical lodging they had available. Settling on a room overlooking the pool, we were able to splurge and also purchase the "Resort Package" that covered parking, the "resort fee", and breakfast for two. We were excited! Escaping the heat and
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your detailed feedback on your recent stay at Surf & Sand. We are very appreciative of you taking the time to compliment our property, service and associates.  Now that you have "found" us, we hope you will be able to return in the very near future. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Have a great remaining summer season!

Summary: First off, Laguna is the coolest and best little strip of a beach town on the west coast.  The surf vibe, the laid back cafes and shops.  The Surf and Sand is blocks from all of this, yet seems like its on world once you are there.  Set, as the name implies, directly on the sand and the surf.  We stayed on a Thursday / Friday in late June in the California Suite, which is a two bedroom penthouse in the beach building.  Beautifully appointed and new, it has a 180 ocean and beach view and sat 5 stories above the pool.  We ate that evening in the  Splashes Restaurant which earns its name at high tide.  the food was great, service..not so much.  I would recommend eating in the bar, same food, same view, less expensive and not a 3 hour deal.  other than that, the coffee shop, the
Manager Response: Hello Joseph U:  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed our location in lovely Laguna Beach. Thank you for sharing your experience and we hope to have you back with us in the near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance when you are able to return.  Happy Summer!

Summary: We spent only one night here. Terrific location in Laguna beach. The surf almost keeps you awake for being pretty loud. We stayed at the surfside rooms which are more expensive but overall it has  great staff and service. Rooms are needing a bit update but the view trumps it all.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Surf & Sand. We appreciate knowing that you enjoyed our resort and service.  Please call upon us for any needed in the future when you are able to return. We look very forward to having you back!  Warm regards,

Summary: We returned to the Surf and Sand after an 8 year absence.  This time with our two boys.  The Hotel was fantastic.  The staff was the best. The Food amazing.  This place exceeded our very high expectations and delivered a wonderful family experience.  We stayed in the towers on the 8th floor.  Just fantastic.  We look forward to returning soon.
Manager Response: Hello Tim S!  We are so pleased that you and your family were able to return to Surf & Sand! Thank you for your kind words and compliments of our property and staff.  We certainly hope that you will be able to return in the not too distant future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance to book your reservations!  Have a wonderful remaining summer season.  Hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Easy Access to a Beautiful Beach But Not For Everyone
Summary: Very easy access to a beautiful beach is the reason to pick this resort over others in the area. It's a great beach and the resort is comfortable and generally well appointed. But it is not for everyone. The (affordable) pool-view rooms are LOUD all day with the thud of dance music coming from the pool. (I imagine you would not get this noise if you were not in the center building which overlooks the pool.) This is unfortunate because the loud music drowns out the sound of the waves from about 10:00AM -8:00PM. The pool itself is small and always crowded, 1/2 with families with kids, and 1/2 with a "hip" party crowd. So because of the loud music and party atmosphere I would say this is not the best bet for older people or those seeking solitude. It is also not the best bet for

Summary Heading: This place just keeps getting better!
Summary: We have stayed at this resort several times and just when we think we had the best visit ever, they kick it up a notch and blow us away! From the moment we checked in to the moment we left, we were treated with fabulous service. This was the first time that I have had a spa treatment there but it will NOT be the last! A darling gal named Chelsea checked us in and out. She was so sweet and made us feel very comfortable and relaxed. She showed us all of the amenities, and even came back to check on a us when she walked over new guests, just to make sure we were having a nice time and did not need anything. When we checked out she gave us some great recommendations of products in the spa gift shop to take home with us.  My masseuse Annette was absolutely amazing! She was so
Manager Response: Hello Kimarie:  Thank  you so much for your very informative feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  We appreciate you taking the time to point out the amenities you enjoyed and your kind words and compliments of our associates.  We certainly hope that you will be able to return in the very near future.  Please call upon us for assistance.  Have a great summer season!!

Summary: Rundown motel grunge marketed as a resort. Felt truly sorry for the other guests, suckered at $$$ rates. For the price, we should have stayed at nearby lovely, luxury hotel -- Montage Laguna Beach.   Photos best tell the story, but in our $600+ a night room, the paint was peeling, the glass table-top horribly scratched, the shower grout blackened, the toilet paper roll corroded, the shutters jammed blocking our ocean view. In public spaces, the hallway was littered, the elevator door scraped black, the pool water murky, the plantings interspersed with candy wrappers and garbage. A promised roll-away bed took multiple follow up calls and pleading.  The one oasis -- the restaurant, where service was polite and the food, good. Although even here, a clumsy busboy flipped the lid on
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. On behalf of our staff, we would like to extend our sincere apologies for your recent experience. We strive the provide the finest personal services and facilities for all our guests. I would welcome the opportunity to talk to you directly to restore your faith with us and can  be reached at 949 376 2762  Warm Regards, Barbaros Aklar | Director of Rooms

Summary: If you want o stay at a resort "on the beach" this is the place for you!  You are right on the beach at this resort and the servers and staff who attend to you on the beach are the best, they are so friendly and take care of your every need.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Frahm:  Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed your "beach" time at Surf & Sand. We appreciate you taking the time to share your recent experience and look very forward to your return.  Please contact us for any needed assistance when you are  able to be with us once again.  Warm regards,

Summary Heading: Surf and sand first time I stayed there it was wonderful.
