Summary: Beautiful Hotel great view. Rooms were very nice. I would highly recommend the hotel. The bar was incredible because of the server Kimmey. She was exceptional with a great attitude, great help.  Pool, view and location were great.
Manager Response: Hello Lew246!  Thank you so very much for letting us know that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Please be assured that our associates always appreciate knowing that our guests appreciate their service and attention.  Please call upon us when you are able to return.  Hopefully, in the near future.  Have a great summer!

Summary Heading: I love staying at this place
Summary: If you are a real beach person you don't want to simply look at it but you want to be at it.  This is the perfect place to do that.  I cannot say enough good things about how casual, comfortable and accomodating this place is.  The staff is friendly, the rooms are perfect and the pool and beach service is terrific.  I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Hello Travel Girl!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your beach time with us, and took the time to let us know you appreciated our property and staff.  Thank you for  sharing your experience!   We look very forward to having you back with us.   Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: This property is an outstanding experience in every way... from location to service to amenities & most importantly their extremely professional friendly & courteous staff from top to bottom.   Diane & Sandra at the concierge desk really made our weekend a most memorable 25 year Anniversary 4 day weekend!! They went far & above setting our room up with wedding pics & flowers sent ahead of our arrival & adding champagne & strawberries requested for a finishing touch. They took care of all of our dinner reservations we requested for the weekend as well. We just showed up relaxed and enjoyed!!  Although these 2 stood out for us...every single staff member from valet to bell to housekeeping to restaurant staff to gift shop to coffee shop to maintenance staff to beach staff to front
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you so very much for sharing your 25th wedding anniversary with us. We appreciate you taking the time to provide your feedback and compliments of our property and associates.  Please be assured that your kind words will be shared with all those you mention, and it is greatly appreciated.  We look forward to having you back with us. Please contact us for any needed assistance regarding a future stay.  Have a wonderful summer!

Summary: Our family has been staying at the Surf and Sand Resort for 35 years!  The resort is beautiful with rooms that hang right over the beach.  One of the few hotels in OC that has an ocean front pool. Splashes Bar is our all time favorite spot.  Not to be missed!  Upscale California Casual at its best.  Can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Hello PBO!  Thank you so much for your compliments of Surf & Sand.  We are always pleased to learn that our long time, loyal guests continue to enjoy their time with us. We are hoping you make it back to lovely Laguna Beach and Surf & Sand sooner than later. We always look forward to your visits!!  Warmest regards,

Summary: Right on the sand and great location. Parking is limited to valet, $35 per night for guests.   Checkin was friendly and quick.   Room was very clean. You are on the beach so there are no air conditioners. There is a ceiling fan and floor fan of you need it.   Bed was very comfortable and leaving the patio door open to hear the ocean all night was fantastic.   If you are willing to spend some money and need a place to stay this is a great hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Thexprt7!  Thank you for sharing your positive experience with your recent stay at Surf & Sand.   We appreciate you taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our property and hope you are able to return in the very near future.  Regards,

Summary: This resort made for the PERFECT beach vacation. The rooms were very nice and roomy. They look out onto the ocean and I loved being able to see and hear the ocean even when we were in our room. The beach at Surf & Sand is gorgeous, with a neat little area of tide pools just a short walk from the resort. It was so nice to have everything we could want all in one place. Great service, delicious food (I keep craving the fish tacos) and ideal setting made us want to stay a lot longer than the 3 days we were there! I definitely plan on coming back.
Manager Response: Hello Megsshockley!  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for your compliments of our property's location and amenities. We look forward to your return.  Please contact us for any needed assistance when making your future plans.  Regards

Summary: Very impressed with this lovely accommodation. Staff super-friendly. What a gorgeous view, & very well designed to maximize. So close to the ocean. The beds and pillows are soft (but not too soft) & so comfortable.  The pool, bar area & fire pits etc are just so lovely. We loved our 2 nights here. Would definitely recommend this beautiful place  Loved the gorgeous little compendium which was informative & well designed
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive feedback regarding your recent stay.  We always appreciate compliments of our property and appreciate knowing that you enjoyed your time with us.  We look very forward to having you return to lovely Laguna Beach.  Please contact us for any needed assistance.  Warm Regards.

Summary: Taken off our balcony,can it be more spectacular the Surf and Sand hotel is so very special we only go once a year but it's so worth the wait, you will never forget the time spent there, especially if you are sharing it with loved ones.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments of our resort and for sharing your experience.  We are pleased that you are able to be with us yearly and hope to have you back with us more often. Please contact us directly for any needed assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: We were there this past wednesday - saturday   we had a fabulous time! our room was fabulous!!! beautiful view of beach and ocean.   the resort has a great vibe to it and every employee we encountered was smiling and super helpful!  thanks to sandra and diane for the help with dinner, etc. they are cdertainly a pleasure1  justin at pool bar - thank you for the "you are young" comment - made us laugh for quite awhile! lol  front desk staff is pleasant.  splashes bar - what a view!!! great service too.  all in all, we loved our stay and will be back
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us.  Please be assured that your compliments and kind words of our associates will be passed along to each one, as positive feedback is always welcomed and appreciated.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay and hope to have you return in the very near future.  Have a wonderful summer!

Summary: I can't wait to come back!!! Great customer service, extremely clean rooms, and the view! Definitely recommend treating your self to a massage at there spa. The food was great at the Splash bar, but we didn't real enjoy our food at the Splash restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments of our property and customer service.  We are delighted that you enjoyed our amenities and, especially, your spa treatment.  We hope to have you return in the very near future.  Please contact us for any needed assistance.    Warm regards,

Summary: I would rate this property as a 4.5 star resort with a 6 star location. It's not the Montage but it's a nice place for the money.  I spent 2 nights at the resort. The staff was great and the service was very attentive.  I had a tower room on the 2nd floor that was well appointed with coffee service and bathrobes.  The turndown service is a nice amenity with the chocolate on the pillow.  Bar and restaurant are just above the beach with great views. Didn't eat enough of the food to comment.  The beach has county lifeguards  during the summer.  Local surf break.  Beach service includes towels, umbrellas, chairs, and drinks.  Pool has a walk up bar.
Manager Response: Hello!  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience regarding your recent stay. We always welcome positive feedback and appreciate your feedback.  We are pleased that you enjoyed the amenities of the resort and hopefully, you will be able to return in the very near future. Please let us know if we may assist in any way in the future.  Warm regards,

Summary: What a wonderful stay we had at Surf and Sand Resort!  I booked a Surfside King room, and at check-in we were upgraded to a Corner Tower King.  After mentioning this was an anniversary trip, a bottle of wine and small box of chocolates were sent to our room.  Nice touch. The corner room was nicely decorated in beachy colors, very spacious room with spectacular oceanfront view from our balcony (that had comfortable cushioned whicker chairs and side tables), and a perfect breeze with the windows and the slider partly open.  The bathroom had double sinks, and a separate tub and shower.  The room also has a small coffee maker and fridge.    We had drinks and food at Splashes Bar.  The bar is small, but the open windows and crashing waves give it great atmosphere.  We had calamari
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your very informative, positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. We appreciate you taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our property, amenities and lovely Laguna Beach and surrounding areas.  We hope you will be able to return in the very near future.  Please let us know how we may be of assistance when your travels bring you back!

Summary: I came here for a chamber event and wanted to recognize how excellent the banquet staff was! Rad, michael and Roberto were so incredibly hospitable and attentive. The food was incredible and ofcourse the view of the ocean over the 1555 lounge was breathtaking. Front desk and Valet were also incredible as usual!  I'll be back forsure ;)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience at Surf & Sand.  We always appreciate knowing our guests enjoyed their time with us, and your kind words regarding our banquet staff will be shared with those mentioned.  We hope you are able to return in the very near future.  Please let us know when we may be of assistance.  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary Heading: Great but could have been even better.
Summary: The location is what you are paying for. Yes, it's very expensive but you can't put a price on hearing the surf crashing all night. Beds were mostly very  comfy with the exception of the too-soft pillows.  This hotel is showing it's age a bit but still very nice. There was a crack in the bathroom sink and the outside corriders seemed small and dingy. But it's the beach!  My primary complaint was with the WIFI; I would not recommend this hotel for a business conference if WIFI is important.  There was an incident of poor service at Splashes but the manager did his best to apologize and make it right.  Also, I asked on my reservation to be near the elevator due to a disability but was actually placed in the room FARTHEST from the elevator. In addition, if you have any problems

Spent several days here on an anniversary trip. Well organized, friendly, accommodating. Staff is terrific and very helpful. Great beach area. Views from tower are amazing. We thoroughly enjoyed our visit.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for taking the time to let us know you enjoyed our property and staff.  We hope you are able to return in the very near future.  Please call upon us for any needed assistance!  Have a wonderful summer season!

Summary: Quiet retreat for a few days after a 50th wedding celebration (not ours). We had a room as close to the ocean as could be without being wet at high tide. There was a section of beach about 1/4 mile long that ran from one rock formation to the arches (another rock formation) in front (back) of the resort. The Alturra Spa is available on premises for massages and facials. The restaurant (Splashes) was fantastic. Take the waiter recommendation for desserts. The first two on the menu were fabulous.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know you enjoyed our property and amenities.  We are very pleased to learn that you were able to explore the beach and take advantage of our spa and restaurant.  Please call upon on for any needed assistance when you are able to return!  Have a wonderful summer!

Summary Heading: Wow. Whale watching from our deck!
Summary: The concrete stairs and simple motel like hallways mask a truly fabulous resort. The rooms are right over the surf with a fabulous ocean view and we saw whales right from the deck. Fall asleep to the sound of the ocean below you. Great friendly staff and restaurant. It is not cheap to be certain but worth every penny for a truly relaxing oceanfront vacation.
Manager Response: Hello Yogaperson:  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  We always appreciate learning that our guests enjoy our wonderful, seaside location and proximity to the ocean.  Please be sure to call upon us when you are able to return so that we may accommodate the details and needs of your stay.  Warm regards!

Summary: While this place is not inexpensive my our standards, the location is top notch. Our room was on the first floor almost on the sand. Sharon was great checking us in early. Room was large, plenty of balcony space. Pool was nice, jacuzi decent size. I do not like the "resort" fee of $20 a day that so many hotels now add on. Just add that to the dally price of the hotel. $35 a day to park car - too expensive while paying the daily hotel rate. But hotels can charge this so they are.
Manager Response: Hello John A:  We are delighted that you enjoyed our resort's location and amenities, and  appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  We sincerely hope you are able to return to lovely Laguna Beach in the near future and return to Surf and Sand. Please call upon us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards!

Summary: I highly recommend a trip to Laguna Beach if you are visiting Southern California.  Surf and Sand is a great hotel located right on the Pacific Ocean.  The rooms are great, although it can get expensive in high season.  The restaurants and bars are located right on the ocean and you can really enjoy the waves crashing at Sunset.
Manager Response: Dear Stuart:  Thank you so very much for your compliments and kind words of our property. We always appreciate knowing our guests enjoyed their time with us and share their positive experience!  Please call upon us when your travels bring you back to lovely Laguna Beach and you are able to be with us once again.    Warm regards!

Summary Heading: A business location with a vacation vibe
Summary: I found myself here for a recent business retreat. Right on the beach this isn't what you typically expect on a business trip. The rooms are spacious and face the ocean. Some people have trouble falling asleep with the constant noise of the surf but I rather enjoyed it. The business facilities were very good and so was the food we were served throughout the meeting. The only criticism is that the meeting rooms were cooled down to freezing temperatures.
Manager Response: Hello Annabell M:  We appreciate very much, you taking the time to let us know that you enjoyed our property for your business retreat.  Our sincere apologies that the meeting room temperature was not comfortable and regret we were not aware of the condition at the time of your conference so that we could have made appropriate adjustments.   Hopefully, we will have the opportunity to rectify the issue in the future for your group.  We look very forward to having you back at Surf & Sand!

Summary: Simply breathtaking location for a conference! The venue was perfect with a mix on in & outdoor locations! Was able to leave the door open & hear the waves all night long! Went for an early AM jog on the beach too!
Manager Response: Hello TampaNugget29:  Thank you for providing your positive feedback regarding your recent stay.  We are pleased to learn that you enjoyed your conference at Surf & Sand and hopefully, you will be able to return in the near future.    Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Warm regards,

Summary: the best hotel ever!  The food was fresh and so were the drinks.  Nice amenities and cool classes. The room was clean and the view, breathtaking.  Full fridge made it very convenient.  Friendly staff, nice gift shop.
Manager Response: Hello Raquel F:  Thank you so much for your compliments of our property and associates.  It is always a pleasure to share positive feedback from our guests, and we appreciate you taking the time to inform us that you enjoyed your recent stay.  We look very forward to having you back at Surf & Sand!

Summary: The resort is beautiful- I did a lot of research. My boss wanted to surprise his niece and her family. I put through credit card authorizations for full payment to go to my boss. When she checked out she was charged $600 additionally. Either they didn't read ALL charges or didn't care to adhere to it. Additionally I called the hotel about 6 times and no one ever had any answers or any time to talk: bad customer service.
Manager Response: Dear RinaBoBeana,  I am so incredibly sorry for any frustrations. I am here to help and look into this further. I have sent your a private message with more details.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I came for a business function but want to come back for either a girls trip or family visit!  First, the staff was very friendly from the valet, to front desk, to the team that set up our meeting rooms. The projector we brought didn't work and their team brought us one within 10 minutes!  That's unheard of compared to other venues I have worked with!  The rooms are clean and stylish and you are literally sitting on the ocean. If you love the sound of waves, you'll be thrilled when they lull you to sleep. The restaurant food and the banquet food were all fantastic. I can't say enough really, it's probably one of my favorite hotels and I stay in a lot of them!  There are few where I think, 'I have to come back' but this one is!
Manager Response: Hello Laura W:  What a pleasure to receive your lovely feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know that you enjoyed our property's amenities and staff.  We look forward to the return, whether business or leisure, in the very near future.  Please reach out to us for any needed assistance.  Warm regards,

Summary: We a quick one nighter in Laguna to meet up with out of town family. I have wanted to stay at the S&S for awhile so this was an opportune time to check it out.  We arrived around 3 & the room was not ready yet so we hung out & relaxed outside at the fire pit area. It was chilly out so the fire was welcomed ! We walked down to the spa/ store & got a snack from the little gift shop .Very sweet staff there.  We had an oceanfront tower corner king.Pretty room -very comfy bed,soft muted creams & taupes & beachy vibe. Great view. The whole room shuddered at every crashing wave. The balcony was scary . I'm pretty sure the railing was WAY to low & not up to code. I would not dare go out on it let alone let anyone else out there. Seriously -it freaked us out & it takes a lot to freak us
Manager Response: Hello "WeRTrippin"!  Thank you for your compliments of Surf & Sand! We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay. Hopefully, you will be able to return for a more lengthy stay in the near future so that you are able to experience all of our amenities and room types.  Please let us know when you would like us to assist in accommodating the details of your next stay!  We look forward to having you back with us!  Happy Summer Season!

Summary: I recently had the opportunity to stay at your beautiful resort as a guest of my brother. I was looking forward to a restful weekend & some quality time with family. As we drove onto the grounds of your hotel, I was already experiencing the beautiful environment. Within minutes of entering into the front lobby, I was greeted by 2 cheerful, friendly, professional women named Diana and Sandra. They both immediately made me feel welcome & I knew this was going to be a great experience. They were able to answer all of my questions and give helpful suggestions to make my experience more pleasant. Their sweet personalities together were a delight and I was impressed by their teamwork. Our dinner that evening at Splashes was great & we loved the brussel sprout appetizer (which was also
Manager Response: Hello Sissy S!  Thank you so very much for your compliments of our property and Diana and Sandra. Please be assured that your kind words will be shared and are always appreciated by all of our associates.  We are very pleased that you also enjoyed your dining experience and the suggestions of Diana and Sandra!  We hope your travels will bring you back to lovely Laguna Beach and Surf & Sand. Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future.  Warm regards,

Summary: I am a high school teacher, and I travelled as a member of the chaperone team for my school's annual senior trip. Surf and Sand helped us host nearly 200 12th graders in high style. Although the trip is a school tradition, and we have used Surf and Sand before, this is my first visit there, and I feel compelled to review.   The property itself is stunning, built right on the cliff's edge with panoramic views of the ocean from every room. Even the basic rooms are opulent, and I was able to visit two different levels of suites which were used by the trip leaders. The high level suites are mind-blowing, with gorgeous amenities, stunning views, and huge balconies. My room had a balcony and an unbelievable view of the beach, which is just a short staircase away. The beachfront
Manager Response: Hello Chad P!  We are extremely pleased that you were able to join the school group in their annual trip to Surf & Sand, which has been their vacation destination for many years.  Thank you for your complimentary feedback regarding our property, associates and amenities.  It is always a pleasure to learn that our first-time guests enjoyed their time with us and are anxious to return.   Please call upon us for any needed assistance in the future. We look forward to having you back as our guest when your travels bring you to Laguna Beach.  All the Best,

Summary: My husband and I just returned from Surf & Sand Resort, celebrating our 25th wedding anniversary.  It was our first visit to the resort, and it did not disappoint.  From the initial welcome at valet and check-in, to the cleanliness and view of the room, to the personal service of each staff member that we encountered, everything was excellent.  We never shut our glass door to the balcony and enjoyed the sound of the waves whenever we were in the room.  When on the beach, there was always someone available, to offer chairs, umbrellas or food service.  I even saw one of the servers get her shoes wet (and with a smile) as she went into the surf to get a guest's order as he stood in the water.  We would definitely choose this resort again to enjoy a get-away in Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Hello CWurstAZ:  Thank you so very much for your positive feedback and compliments of our property, associates and amenities!  It is always a pleasure to learn that our first-time guests thoroughly enjoyed their stay and are anxious to return.    Hopefully, you will be able to return for another special occasion in the very near future.  Please reach out to us for any needed assistance.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Best of everything in Laguna Beach!
Summary: Every element of the Surf and Sand is perfect.  The location on the beach with the waves splashing as you fall asleep, the kind and conscientious staff, the incredible rooms and amazing on sight bar and restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear PJKeller,  Thank you so much for the five star review. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Escape to paradise at the Surf & Sand Resort!
Summary: Some friends and I recently had the most delightful stay at the beautiful Surf & Sand Resort in Laguna Beach and it was everything we had hoped for and more!   The staff greeted us with a warm welcome and were so friendly and attentive. Much to our surprise our room was ready early and we were able to check in at noon! Before sending us off, the staff answered all of our questions and made sure any requests they could attend to were accommodated, and with a smile! They offered us free DVD's to view in our room, made extra keys, gave us directions to our room and acquainted us with a quick layout of the property, nice!   Our room was so lovely, very clean and well stocked! We were lucky enough to be upgraded to a larger, higher room, located on the 7th floor of the Towers
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  WOW, what a review. Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a detailed, five star review. We truly appreciate it. Your kinds words in regards to Nick will also be celebrated with the entire team. Thank you! We look forward to seeing you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Booked this room for my son and his Bride for their wedding night and the bride used it before the wedding to get ready. The staff made my Son and his Brides wedding night so special! Amazing service! Complimentary Champagne and Chocolates! Setting up rose petals, Champagne and chocolate strawberries! Beautiful View! What a place! Thank you to everyone from the Concierge to the front desk to room service delivery for making this such an Awesome experience for them! They said Breakfast was wonderful the next morning and they felt so spoiled. That's how it should be on your wedding night!
Manager Response: Dear Nancy,  Thank you so much for this five star review. We truly appreciate it.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Lovely Hotel in a Beautiful Location
Summary: We had a very nice stay in this lovely hotel.  I believe the rooms all look out to the ocean, although we had a bottom floor room and our view was mostly of the pool.  (We got a good deal through Hotwire, so I can't complain.)  The room was large and tastefully decorated, with lots of light from the big sliding door, and we had an outdoor deck attached.  The property had lots of pretty lounging areas and we could walk into town from its location.  There were lots of families while we were there.  I love children, but they did kind of hog the hot tub.
Manager Response: Dear MindyIndy,  Thank you so much for this review. We truly appreciate it.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The room was immaculate, the service was excellent, and the food was a damn fine experience! And I'd like to extend a special thank you to Debbie at the front desk and Kyle at Splashes. Wow! Can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for this five star review! A special thank you for the kind words in regards to Debbie and Kyle. We will be sure to celebrate their successes.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Best view around. Beautiful rooms. Fall asleep to the ocean. Love staying here!  I have visited multiple times and it is always my first choice!  Whether it's a couples trip or the whole family we have always had the best stay. The property is amazing and beautiful. It doesn't get better than this along the coast!
Manager Response: Dear Keilani,  Thank you so much for this five star review. We look forward to continuing to be your resort of choice when visiting the area. See you soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I know I'm a little late in doing this review, but nonetheless I wanted give props that's due to this beautiful hotel.  Our first stay here at Surf & Sand was in May of 2016 for our anniversary.  I booked the Upper Catalina Suite and it did not disappoint. The view from our private deck was AMAZING!!!  Having dinner on our deck at sunset is something I will never forget!   The grounds were clean and beautiful and the staff very friendly. We were always greeted with a "hello" and "can I help you?" Oh, and the food was delicious!  My husband still talks about the meal he had. lol.  Our son was so jealous when looking at our photos from our anniversary weekend, that I decided to book a surprise end of summer weekend for the 3 of us. This time, I had just booked one of their regular
Manager Response: Dear Borgas Family,  WOW, what a great review. We are so happy you enjoyed both of your stays. What an honor to know you loved your anniversary visit so much that you brought your son to experience the same. We truly value this review and cannot thank you enough for it. We look forward to seeing you again soon..... perhaps we can be your new anniversary tradition!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for our wedding anniversary and we would certainly recommend this resort to anyone. We had an oceanside room with the most comfortable bed we've ever slept in. The room was very well decorated and the service was top notch. We had breakfast every morning at Splashes restaurant, which had great food and great views. We look forward to coming back here again next year.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for the five star review. We look forward to you visiting us again.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: From Check in to Check out we were treated with nothing but the best service. Dinner in the restaurant was amazing with quick and polite service. Marcus one of the doorman always remembered who I was even though I only retrieved my vehicle from valet twice. Stephanie at the Front Desk is amazing! Her astounding customer service did not go unnoticed, she was truly exceptional. From the front drive, the front desk, to those amazing oceanfront rooms, there is nothing bad to say about this hotel! I stayed here for just one night on the way to San Diego and we almost did not leave. After staying @ a 5 star hotel in SD and being disappointed we will certainly be back to Laguna Beach soon!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for this five star review. We will be sure to celebrate the successes of Marcus and Stephanie. We look forward to your return visit.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We've stayed at the Surf and Sand a few times now even though we are local. You can't beat the location-- it's so close to downtown and right on the water.  Recently, I had a small birthday party on the property and worked with Emily in sales. She was so patient and helpful with all of my questions. I will definitely work with her again for future events.  We stayed in a gorgeous room with a large balcony. The day following the party we went down and spent some time at the pool, which is very chic and has amazing views of the whitewater. Everyone from time of parking to checkout, was fantastic. I can't wait to stay here again and wake up to the sound of the ocean outside my room.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for this five star review. We look forward to your return visit.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Thank you to the staff of Surf and Sand for the sparkling wine to help us celebrate ! Such an awe inspiring view from our room. The pounding surf was mesmerizing and service was excellent. We will definitely return to this wonderful place.

We recently spent three nights here. Everything was perfect. When we arrived, the place was very busy with guests coming and going as well as private parties.  The staff was incredibly helpful and attentive.  The poolside drinks and food (fish tacos) were delicious and the servers around the pool were so friendly.   Same thing at Splashes - great food and service.  There was some sort of corporate party taking up most of the bar.  We were the only people in there who were not part of this group and the server took great care of us even though she was waiting on a very large, boozy group.   We had perfect service the entire stay. Trevor was awesome and very welcoming!  Same with the GM, Barbaros  and Victoria in the coffee shop.   The view is beautiful and the proximity to the

Summary Heading: The best property in Laguna Beach
Summary: This is the best hotel property in Laguna Beach. We've been coming here for 30 years and still love it. We wish we never had to check out!! The staff was so wonderful on our last trip. Thank you Marcus at valet and Emily in sales for all of your hard work , making our stay a success .

I recently stayed here for just one night with 2 of my best friends. Though it was a short stay, it was full of vacation vibes and truly felt like we were there for much more than 24 hours (as we fit so much in!!). From beginning to end it was really a first class experience--everytime we walked in the room we felt like we were dreaming a little bit, because I tell you, that view!!! We especially loved relaxing on the oceanfront balcony, and falling asleep to the sound of the ocean :) The staff were all fantastic too, they couldn't do enough for us. I especially recommend getting breakfast at Splashes --the lemon and ricotta pancakes are to die for! It was definitely a girls night for the books. Can't wait to go back üòªüòªüòª
Manager Response: Dear Charlotte,  Thank you so much for this five star review. It truly means the world to us. While we are glad you got to do so much in your 24 hour visit, you hope you can stay longer next time! We hope to see you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Everything about this hotel is top class! Fantastic location, light and airy rooms. Can't think how hot the rooms would be in high summer! No air con and only a ceiling fan! But that's a minor point. Very friendly helpful staff. Obviously expensive but no complaints. Definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Colin,  Thank you so much for the perfect review.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This has been my most favorite get away hotel for years now. The moment arrive at the hotel, all the stress drifts away and I automatically get a permanent smile on my face. The best place to get away from it all, even if only for a few days!
Manager Response: Dear Pienka,  Thank you so much for the perfect review. It is so great to hear that our resort brings an instant (and permanent!) smile to your face. We hope to see you again soon.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: A great place for a relaxing weekend
Summary: My wife and I were recently visiting Laguna Beach and were looking for a hotel with an oceanfront view to stay in. We have stayed in a few but this was by far our favorite thus far.   The hotel is located right on the beach and we paid for an oceanview room. The room was very well decorated, cozy, and the sound of the waves from our balcony were amazing.  We were super impressed that they had an outdoor seating area with fire pits where we were able to sit and enjoy the sunset with a glass of wine. We loved our stay and will definitely be back soon.
Manager Response: Dear Casey,  Thank you so much for the perfect review. We are so happy to hear that we are your favorite resort in the area. We look forward to your return visit.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Had a amazing time at this resort and spa! Very pet friendly! Had a small issue with tar on my dogs paw and the bellman was so kind to get me oil and tell me how to remove it üòç! The spa was so relaxing had a manicure and pedicure! The staff here was so nice and greeted you as they passed you in the hallway. The restaurant, bar, and pool had amazing views of the sunset I think I took a million pictures.
Manager Response: Dear Misty S,  Thank you so much for the perfect review. We are so happy your and your pet enjoyed your stay.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Amazing Hotel, even more amazing SPA!!!
Summary: We had the greatest time visiting mini paradise in Laguna Beach. Surf and Sand has become a home away from home and we love spending time there any opportunity we get. During our last visit we had the chance to experience the spa under the new management. Ana, the spa supervisor is a sweetheart who goes above and beyond to make sure the guests receive a 5-star treatment. The only bad thing about my trip was that it was toooooo short!!!! Thank you Surf and Sand, thank you Anahit and April the Spa and thanks to the front desk personnel for amazing room upgrade and hospitality!!! We'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear Mara V,  We are so happy you enjoyed your recent stay, including a relaxing visit to the spa. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Bought a brand new car on Thursday.  Picked it up on Friday and drove immediately to the hotel with my famly.  The car is a "higher end" car.  They parked it right in front of the hotel in their "staging" area with a tremendous amount of activity.  When I asked whether it would be safe there, was told by the valet that they're all experts and it would be fine.  Went out the following day and there was a dent in the car.  Now, they are claiming that they are not responsible.  And, by the way, it took 3 calls to the hotel and 2 weeks of waiting before anyone even returned my call.  Beyond that, the food was marginal and the hotel is not particularly young child friendly (lots of stairs).  The view is amazing.  But, it isn't a four of five star hotel so the Montage is a better
Manager Response: Dear Jason F,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience as we value and learn from all guest feedback.  I would like to assure you and all the travelers that genuine care, comfort and safety of our guests is our highest mission as validated by overwhelming positive guest experiences shared. I am available at your convenience and can be reached at baklar@jcresorts.com.   Kind Regards,   Barbaros Aklar Director of Rooms

Summary: My friend and I stayed at the Surf and Sand for two nights. We are 23 year old girls, and we're definitely treated as such. The only sincere employee was the bell man, Nick. The front desk and concierge managed to move at the slowest pace possible. Additionally, the system was down so all the reservations were done by hand. We booked ours on TripAdvisor for a lower rate, and had to argue to keep that rate because they couldn't actually access TripAdvisor reservations. The main woman at the front desk was extremely unfriendly, and would never look up or smile.  When we went to the pool or beach, we were never served. We had to go up to get towels, order food, or order drinks. We had to constantly ask for a server, which made us feel like nuisances. When we went to the restaurant,
Manager Response: Dear Annie M,   On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize profusely that your recent stay was not up to standards. Any one of the concerns you pointed out would be enough to lead to a disappointing stay. It is embarrassing to read that so many things went wrong during your short visit. Please know that your comments will be shared with our entire management team so we can seek ways of improvement.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Breathtaking views. Exceptional service, comfortable beautiful rooms.
Summary: We truly love this hotel. It's our second visit, this time for a week, and all of the previous exceptionally high standards were met again. The rooms are well appointed, beautiful and comfortable. The views as breathtaking as we remembered. We were welcomed back and always felt well looked after, particularly by the concierge ladies Diane and Sharon. It must also be said that every single member of staff encountered anywhere in the hotel were helpful, happy and polite. Pool service was superb and we saw whales and dolphins every day. The terraces are lovely for relaxing by day or night and perfect for fire pit smores This hotel has got it all right. The restaurant and bar are excellent too. We hope to go back, as it always hurts to leave this special place. Out two sons who are
Manager Response: Dear FishJ1,  Thank you for visiting us again. It sounds like this recent stay was truly memorable as you saw whales and dolphins! What a magical time of year. We hope to see you and the family again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Not a Four or Five Star Hotel
Summary: The view is amazing, but beyond the hotel rests on its laurels by touting its spectacular location as its ace in the hole.   As far as the resort itself, it is a hodgepodge of different outdated buildings that make the journey to/from your room like a consistent maze. The rooms themselves sport small, outdated bathrooms with very few amenities (hope you don't want mouthwash!). The shower in our room was smaller than those in most cruise ship cabins. Most shockingly, the hotel DOES NOT HAVE AIR CONDITIONING!!!! How, in 2017, can a hotel in Southern California not offer air conditioning? That should really be disclosed. As someone who likes the room relatively cool, especially when I sleep, this was a nightmare. During the daylight hours the room temperatures can be relatively
Manager Response: Dear JustinBrandonLA,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Nice but not a luxury hotel
Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights.  The views and pool area are really nice.  Our room was very average.  This hotel is like a maze and there are a lot of steps involved in getting to your room.  Our room looked like it needed a good cleaning and a coat of paint.  Very noisy-we could hear the people talking in the room next door, the shower in the bathroom next door and people in the hall outside.  It was very cold while we were there.  The baseboard heater in the room did not keep our room warm, we called for a space heater and they brought us a fan.  Room is an odd layout with the bed at an angle so room seems very small.  Bathroom is extremely small.  Single vanity.  Bathtub has no surround and the tub was dirty.   It was very slippery like there was sun tan oil that had not been
Manager Response: Dear momandktravel,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   It is embarrassing to read about all of the negative experiences throughout your stay. I would love the opportunity to discuss them further. If you have a moment and are willing to discuss, please call me on my direct line at 949 376 2778.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: SPECTACULAR location, but could use an update!
Summary: This is in a great location right on the beach.  My room was right off a large patio with floor to ceiling windows and an ocean view.  The view was great, but the room was out of the way and it was a pain to haul the luggage there.  It has a great oceanfront bar and pool.  It is within walking distance of shops and fantastic Laguna Beach dining!
Manager Response: Dear Rachel K,   Thank you so much for the review. We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay and really enjoyed the views and proximity to the beach. We do strive for five star service, so we will be looking into making possible upgrades in the future. We hope to earn a five star review from you next time! We look forward to seeing you again.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I cannot wait to return to California and can't imagine staying anywhere but Surf and Sand.  EVERYTHING about the trip was amazing.  We spend four days here and wish it was longer.  Every person on staff was excellent.

Wonderful with or without kids. We've done both! You can sit at the pool right in front of the Pacific, watch your kids in the pool and swim in the ocean at the same time. You will never wait for a drink or poolside snacks. Wonderful rooms, restaurant excellent and you can walk to everything in Laguna!! Loved the on premise coffee shop, fun to sit at fire pit and have your morning cup. WE LOVE SURF & SAND...

Almost like being on a cruise, with waves at your window! Great food.  Walking distance to shopping and restaurant area. Staff were very helpful Valet service was great.  Room service experience was very nice.  rooms are spacious ,

20 years ago it was possible to build a hotel in Laguna Beach right on the ocean and expect that the proximity to the water would keep it cool, this is no longer the case. I'm so glad that I stayed in April and the weather was in the high 60s/low 70s otherwise this place would have been way too hot. There is no AC, the fan in the restroom hardly works and if you don't jiggle the toilet handle then the water will continue to run. All that said, this hotel is dated.   The bonus is that it's one of the better hotels in Laguna, it's right on the water and you can hear the waves all night long. It is loud, which you know upon check in because they provide ear plugs. It's clearly kid-friendly because there were a lot of kids running around.   I would never ever pay full price to stay

Summary Heading: After visiting this Jewel on the Pacific since 1991 we are back
Summary: As far as we are concerned this is the number one resort in the world.  Having traveled to most countries except Russia, this property is overall the best.  Best Bar right on the Pacific Ocean. Exceptional dinning at Splashes Restaurant and same at the bar.  Pool and the Ocean are to die for.  Every room is on the Ocean View and Sound.

We stayed here for a couple of nights for a wedding. Location and service is good. The actual grounds need a bit more attention and upgrade. We used the pool, which was warm for this time of year and the service and drinks on the pool deck was exceptional. The bar is an excellent place to watch the sunset and actually attracts the locals to come each night so you have to get there a bit early if you want a sit back with a drink and watch the gradual sunset(s) - which are the usual spectacular southern cal colors - not as great as Hawaii but a close second. The wedding itself was great and the ballroom setup and food was well done. The place can be a bit of a maze getting from one side to the other but that adds to the charm. As far as value goes it is a bit on the pricy side for

We visited this resort for a wedding. The price we paid for the accommodations does not reflect the experience.  This is probably good for tourists with families but not weddings    The rooms are not ready until after 4 pm.   Some do not have A/C.  Although the staff were friendly, we were rushed for time between check in and the wedding.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie,  Thank you so much for staying with us. On behalf of Surf & Sand Resort, I apologize for the disappointment in your recent stay. I understand there was a delay in your room readiness which must have been very frustrating when trying to get ready for the wedding. Please accept my sincerest apologies. I hope you will consider staying with us again in the future so we can show you just how perfect your stay can be!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: A vacation destination that you must put on your travel list! The Surf and Sand Resort is beautifully located on Laguna Beach. Each room has an ocean front balcony which allows you to take in the glorious ocean breeze while enjoying a glass of wine or appetizer from their wonderful room service menu. The property is absolutely beautiful and offers all the amenities you need to have a perfect stay.  Pacific Perk has delicious coffee and treats to get your day started.  The spa is wonderful to pamper yourself with a massage or mani/pedi. Continue your day poolside overlooking the ocean with lunch and a cocktail from a great poolside dining selection. You can take a long walk beach front our work out in their hotel workout facility. End your night at Splashes where you can dine
Manager Response: Dear Melody,  WOW! What a survey. Thank you so much for sharing your feedback. We truly appreciate it. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Surf & Sand is a one-of-a-kind hotel literally on the beach.  You are tucked right in to Laguna with all the fun shops and dining within walking distance, but you don't hear any of the traffic because all you hear are the beautiful waves from the ocean.
Manager Response: Dear Kyle D,   Thank you so much for staying with us and for your excellent review. We truly appreciate it!   Kindly,  Misty L.  Director of Front Office

Summary: This hotel is so amazing the view breathe taking the staff amazing the overall experience just superb. I suprised my husband for his birthday and he was taken away. I mean the room sits right on the beach the sound of the water at night is so soothing and amazing. The small details seashell lamps and night lights. The beds super comfy nice size TV. The staff is so welcoming the Valet guys are so nice. My experience was all around AMAZING.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are so happy you selected Surf & Sand for your husband's surprise birthday trip. We are even happier to hear that the stay went perfectly. We hope to make this a birthday tradition!   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Had an amazing time at this resort wish it was longer stay then just one night our girls loved the pool my husband and I loved the beach view from the room  to be able to walk to the beach just downstairs simply amazing a dream come true we will definitely come back any time there is rooms available .very  clean very well organized from the minute we walked inn the service was stupendous.when we walked in our room I was receiving a text of the hotel service to help with our stay that help a lot for getting drinks and they made our reservation at splashes the restaurant where we had a wonderful dinner thanks to the management who welcome us with some delicious appetizers fallow by our meals we loved the food the drinks best tea ever with alcohol of course THANK YOU ALL FOR MAKING
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   It was truly our pleasure having you. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Having stayed at this hotel many times, dating back to the early '70's as a child, I can say that this property is like a fine wine, it gets better with age!  There is nothing better for the soul than to spend a few day in the splendor that IS the Surf & Sand Resort.  Make sure you request an Oceanfront room, and observe the sunset with the requisite reverence it deserves. Whether it be a glass of wine or a glass of water, take a moment in time to watch the sun go down and the lights go on in Laguna Beach.   The rooms are impeccably maintained, and the staff is incredible!  There are amazing places to dine, just a short walk from your room.  Stay, play, and leave with memories that will last a thousand lifetimes!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  How incredible! Thank you so much for being such a loyal guest. It is so neat to read that you have been coming since the 70's as a child. We truly appreciate your continued support. We can assure you we will continue to get better in time. We look forward to your next visit!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I stayed here with a friend and my two kids, 12 and 9. We all had the best time. The kids love the pool and beach. The food/beverage service at the pool is the best I've ever experienced. The lovely gentlemen on the beach set up your chair and umbrellas lickety split. And the valet are the fastest, friendliest ever. Beautiful rooms, great pillows. Fantastic food at the restaurant Splashes.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Best hotel ever! What a compliment. Thank you so much for this perfect review. We truly appreciate it. We look forward to your next visit.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We LOVED our time here!  We had an oceanfront king suite and the view was amazing.  Room service was great for breakfast.  We dined at restaurants around Laguna Beach for lunch and dinner.  We ended up staying an extra night and driving into LAX.  It's a bit pricy (like everything else there) but well worth it!!
Manager Response: Dear Pam,  Thank you so much for your visit and this perfect review. We appreciate it! We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The initial room I was placed in just happened to be underneath one of the large meetings rooms that a liquor distributor had rented.  Needless to say, I requested to be moved to another location but the hotel was at capacity that night.  The staff were very accommodating and did move me the next day to a room with ocean view and patio.  The  resort was having difficulty with the elevator that week, but there were several sets of stairs to go up/down.  The room has a mini frig stocked but I never found a price list so I was a bit afraid to take anything from it.  The food that was prepared for the meetings I was attending was wonderful - great presentation and taste.  It was cool the week I was there so I wasn't able to enjoy the ocean, but we were able to beach comb and watch

Summary Heading: You cant get closer to the SURF!
Summary: I was very surprised at how wonderful this property was, I had never stayed here before and went for a work event. The service is outstanding everyone from the valet and bell, the front desk and the maids, all were friendly, helpful and pleasant.When I got to my room I had to stand out on the balcony to look down at the sand, all you see is the Ocean from your room.  I will definitely  be coming back to this hotel.

Surf and Sand Resort in Laguna Beach, Ca. is THE BEST spot in California to be ON THE OCEAN. JC Resorts and Surf and Sand have the best property, a fantastic staff and their attention to detail is second to none! When my wife and I get days off, we try to relax and get some fresh air, scrumptious food and the best views around. Splashes has a great view, mouth watering food and drinks and is situated almost on top of the water. Honestly, this place is pure BLISS. We can't wait to see 'ya again soon! Scot and Karen L.

Wonderful rooms overlooking the ocean, terrific staff and a beautiful property.  And incredibly reasonable considering all that you get and considering the location on the beach.  We will definitely return!

Despite the uncooperative weather we had a great time.  Our room overlooked the pool and ocean.  The pool area was just beautiful.  We had an executive suite very nice bedroom and bathroom.  We enjoyed the main restaurant which overlooked the ocean.  The staff was very attentive throughout the resort.  Valet parking was very prompt and responsive.  Nice outside area to sit and enjoy the atmosphere day or night.  We plan on staying here again.  Hopefully there won't be any fog next time!  Within walking distance of many great restaurants and shops, something for everyone.

Love this hotel!! I've stayed here many times, and I've never had a bad experience. Waves break below your balcony and the view is to die for. You can enjoy the pool or sit on beach. Walking distance to bars and restaurants. Staff is very attentive and always makes sure our stay is enjoyable. I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear Leslee,  Thank you so much for the perfect review. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The property always seems to have a nice mix of customers - leisure, wedding, and small conferences.  The hotel property is right on the beach, there is a small restaurant/bar, Oceanside pool, spa, small workout facility, and outdoor gathering areas with fire pits and heaters.  The rooms are spacious, comfortable and nicely appointed.  We love this property and love to go back again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for the perfect review. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Good property with very good views
Summary: I was attending the conference, did not get to use the property much but whatever little, it was worth spending my time there. My room had a spectacular view and staff was very friendly, and the restaurant on the property has a very good quality food and services.
Manager Response: Dear Vijay,  Thank you so much for the review. We hope you will visit us again when you are not working so you can really enjoy all that the resort has to offer.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Overpriced, broken elevators, no cell reception
Summary: Certainly not a 5-star experience. Their elevators were broken so despite being on the 1st floor had to trek up 4 flights of stairs to get to main restaurant area on 5th floor without an elevator, and with my luggage on way out! Separately, no cell service in rooms... but was still charged ~$100+ for 2 short calls. WiFi spotty at best, so that wasn't an option for important calls. Sheets are all polyester. Housekeeping knocked 3 times the morning I was checking out BEFORE checkout time - don't understand why. Reception charged me for parking even though I didn't park there.... Just not very impressed at how this hotel was run during my stay there.
Manager Response: Dear Olga,  I am so incredibly sorry for the negative experiences during your stay. This is certainly not who we are. I understand this must have been very frustrating for you. If you used your guest room phone because you had poor cell reception, we are happy to waive those fees for you. I have found your reservation and have refunded the card on file. I would love the opportunity to discuss the rest of your stay with you if you have a moment. I will provide my phone number below. Again, this is not who we are and it truly saddens me to read that you had such a negative experience at our resort.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office  949 497 4477

Summary: Beautiful resort on the water. Fall asleep listening to waves crashing! Great restaurant with outstanding service staff. This property is IDEAL for a romantic getaway! The surfside rooms face the water and are on TOP of the water at high tide. Dining is about 200 steps away...
Manager Response: Dear Thomas,   Thank you so much for the perfect review. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We were only here one night for an event but had a 5-star experience.  Gorgeous room, great food and drinks, great service and an amazing view at every turn.  We did not have time to use all the amenities at the hotel but we will definitely come back!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for the perfect review. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I was there only one night for business but it was magical! The service was amazing, the room was huge with a super view which I enjoyed in the morning with a coffee. Splashes... what a great place for drinks and great food with the most stunning view ever. I couldn't recommend this hotel more! Well done to Surf & Sand you guys rock. I will certainly bring my family from the UK to experience your hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We cannot wait to meet your family from the UK! We are so happy to hear that your stay was magical.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Wonderful resort right on the beach in Laguna
Summary: The Surf & Sand Resort is amazing. Our room was on the 5th floor and the balcony provided outstanding view of the ocean and beach. Every night we were lulled to sleep by the sounds of the waves. The room is well appointed and spacious and very clean. You can't be the location. There is a free tram the runs to town, or you can just walk (it's about 1 mile). Room service was fine as well as the hotel restaurant.

What s great hotel . Stayed in room 436 looking over the Pacific Ocean , watched dolphins whilst having breakfast on the balcony . Great food , great service , laid back approach but with finesse . Will definitely stay again
Manager Response: Dear Neil,  Thank you so much for the five star review. I just love it when the dolphins pay us a visit! They certainly are welcomed guests. We hope to see you soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The staff must be treated really well, because they all seem happy and are all experts at their jobs. I love this hotel and would be very happy to return. The colors are all tastefully muted and match the beach colors. The food is surprisingly good. I loved the soothing sound of the waves.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   What a wonderful review. Thank you so much for sharing! We all truly enjoy working at such a beautiful property and we are glad that it shows. I especially loved your comment about how good the food was. Many times you find restaurants right on the water really lack in their flavor. We pride ourselves in having the best view with the best food in all of Laguna Beach! We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: My husband booked this wonderful resort for a romantic getaway. The rooms were great and tastefully decorated, but our favorite part was the gorgeous ocean view balconies. We grabbed drinks by the pool and enjoyed them out on our private balcony just watching the waves and dolphins. We fell asleep to the sound of the ocean and woke up super well rested due to the comfiest bed! The visit from start to finish was wonderful, the staff could not do enough for us!¬†I would like to say a special thank you to the lovely ladies at the concierge desk, Sandra and Diane, who not only managed to get us a last minute dinner reservation but kept us entertained with their cute British Banter. Looking forward to another visit very soon!

The Surf & Sand was amazing!  The view from our room of the ocean was spectacular.  We could see Catalina Island.  All the staff were very helpful and polite.  The shrimp cocktail at their bar is great.  We will definitely be back!!

Summary Heading: Beautiful ocean views, nice location and good service!
Summary: We had a 50+ business meeting over three days at this hotel and were very happy with the entire event.  All the staff at this hotel went out of their way to make us feel welcomed like family.  We didn't have one problem the entire event.  We booked over 50 rooms and not one complaint.  I would highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for a beautiful place to stay in Laguna Beach.

Summary Heading: An outstanding property with friendly, excellent service.
Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Surf & Sand Resort. This is a one of a kind property.  And the word excellent may not come close to describing our experience. The room was beautiful. The ocean view was extraordinary. The service was incredible. The staff members are friendly and focused on providing the best possible experience. We'll be back--hopefully sooner than later!
Manager Response: Dear John,  Thank you so much for the review. We will be here waiting for you! Hope to see you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Great ocean front hotel, staff & service
Summary: Two couples for a long weekend.  The rooms have nice balconies on the ocean side with spectacular views and large sliding doors/windows.  You can listen to the waves come in all night long.  Ali the concierge assisted us with sailing reservations and did outstanding follow up throughout the process.  Cecil was wonderful with restaurant reservations for a busy Friday night as well as printing work documents for us no problem.  Valet guys were so polite & outgoing.  Overall the entire staff was spot on with great attitudes.  Rooms were very nice, clean and included turndown service.  The restaurant & bar has great ocean views as well.  Walking distance to many great restaurants, bars, shopping and the beach.  We will absolutely go back.   Rooms are not cheap, we paid $500 a night

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel with the most accommodating, friendly staff!
Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at this hotel for a staycation and I can not rave enough about how wonderful my trip was! Let me first begin by saying how absolutely wonderful the entire staff at this hotel is! After valeting my car, I was first greeted by April whom was very friendly and welcoming. I was early for my check in and while the room was prepared, she graciously showed me where everything was located on the property map and had my bags checked by Jon, who stored my luggage so I didn't have to carry it around while I waited.  After being given the most helpful information by April, I made myself familiar with the property and my room was ready within a few minutes!  Phil brought my bags up to the room, and he was also so friendly and sweet. He quickly delivered my bag,
Manager Response: Dear Chelsea,  What an incredible review with many teammates to celebrate. Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We are so happy you enjoyed your staycation with us. We look forward to many more!   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I spent a relaxing birthday weekend with my sisters at the Surf and Sand in February. I always love being so close to the water, and you can't beat the sunsets by the firepits. I also had the sweetest in room dining personal. His name was Romey. When he found out it was my birthday, he made a special trip back to my room to deliver a festive and yummy birthday treat with candle included even though it was a busy morning for him. Extra attention to detail and great staff like this definitely make me want to visit the hotel  again : )  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Bridget,  Thank you for the review and for spending your birthday with us! I am very happy to see that Romey was able to make it extra special for you. We will be sure to share your feedback with him. We look forward to seeing you for your next special occasion.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Love, love, love the Surf & Sand!  The best views in Laguna Beach and the most helpful & friendliest staff around!  Splashes  and the 15fiftyfive patio are great places to unwind with fabulous food and drinks.  The concierge personnel are very helpful with almost anything you could want to know about or do.  Friendly and courteous staff all around.  Great hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Ruthann G,  Thank you so much for the five star review. We are so happy to know that you enjoyed your time with us. We love having you visit so truly hope you will return soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I had an amazing time at the surf and sand resort. I took my family for 2 nights in the ocean view towers and had an amazing view all day long. We needed to get away and the staff members at surf and sand made it feel like we were in paradise. Kaweo is super cool and very knowledgeable about the hotel and rooms, Jordan is super sweet and kind hearted, Kevin would go out of his way to help my family and I at the drop of a dime, Che was very nice and funny keeping my kids laughing while we were trying to check in, and our favorite kaeleena, she is remarkably gorgeous and very professional, we loved our check in with her, she upgraded us from the sea view in to the fully ocean front tower view. She provided plenty of places to go eat and explore in our paradise adventure get away.

Summary Heading: The staff made this stay the most special night of my life!!!
Summary: I got engaged on Valentine's Day. I planned my entire event at the Surf and Sand Resort, starting with dinner at Splashes (where I made my proposal, which she accepted!) and ending in a beautiful 9th floor jacuzzi tub room overlooking the ocean. I had specifically reserved the tub room when I called, but somehow there was a mixup and I was given a regular room... still on the 9th floor, but no jacuzzi.  When I mentioned this to the staff, I was more than a little disappointed, and was pretty pouty and whiny about it... lol. They took my poor attitude in stride, apologized and offered me a free upgrade to the Catalina Suite, which is a much more expensive room. I was still set on the tub room, as it was just more romantic. They put me in a tub room and gave the Suite upgrade to
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  WOW! What a great memory, I am so happy Sandra and Diane were able to capture it for you. Congratulations to you and your fianc√©! This year is certainly a Valentine's Day you will never forget. Thank you so much for spending it with us.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: READ for room you should avoid to ensure a great stay!
Summary: When we first checked in we were put in room 314.  I think this room has to be the worst room in the hotel.  It is right behind the pool, the view is completely blocked by the pool setup.  It's also really loud right by the pool (ground level).  We called over to the front desk and they were very nice and moved us two floors up.  MAKE SURE YOU ARE NOT PUT INTO 314. Our second room was very nice and had a beautiful view.  The room's a bit dated but very clean and the view's great.  The welcome chocolates and wine were a nice touch!  Love that there is a restaurant, bar, gift shop, coffee shop, pool bar and a outdoor lounge bar all in close range!  The food and drinks were very good at each place as well.  We made the mistake of not booking a dinner reservation in advance and had
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   I am so sorry for the disappointment with your first room. I am very happy to read that it was sorted out quickly and to your satisfaction. Thank you so much for staying with us and providing your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Poor security procedures and guest relations
Summary: If a guest is interrupted in the evening  during their stay so security can figure out (their initiating) what guest is smoking very potent marijuana which permeates the halls, the guest whose room is being used and therefore is inconvenienced for an hour should receive some...any compensation or demonstration of gratitude. Even a cookie would suffice. It was confusion and surely not professional, aside from not the relaxation planned...at quite a price. The Hotel had always been a special place for our family for many, many years.. Sadly, it will no longer have that status with us. Very disappointing.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   I am so sorry for your negative experience. This certainly seems out of character for our resort. I truly cannot apologize enough for this major inconvenience. I do see you stayed in September. If you are able to recall any more details, I would be happy to receive them so we can ensure our team is followed up with and trained properly.  Whenever you have a moment, please feel free to reach out to me by dialing 949 497 4477 and asking for Misty.   I do hope you will visit us again and provide us with the opportunity to give you a perfect stay, which is what you have come to expect from Surf & Sand.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: For some reason I expected the S&S to be really luxurious. I think they were trying for it to be, but it falls short. That said, The room was gorgeous with an amazing view. The restaurant for breakfast was small but right on the ocean. We ate in the bar one night which was the best. cozy with tables right on the beach practically. almost like being in a little cave...loved the atmosphere. We had massages which were good. Everything was really good, not great. I think i would give this a 3.5-4. It was an easy girls' weekend. it poured rain the whole tile we were there, so no pool or beach time for us.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for staying with us and providing us with your feedback. I wish it had not of rained during your girls weekend so you could have enjoyed relaxation by the pool. I do hope you will visit us again. We will do everything we can to earn a five star review!   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Surf & Sand is our home away from home.  A very luxurious, oceanfront amazing home!  We have a special place in our hearts for the Surf and Sand as this is where my husband proposed back in 2012.  We try to get back as often as possible and even bring our little girl with now since welcoming her to the family.  The staff is always extremely kind, attentive and helpful.  The rooms are beautiful, all of them.  We've stayed in all tiers of their rooms and have never been disappointed. The pool area is great with easy access to the beach below.  The restaurant is delicious but we typically prefer the bar where you can have a cozy view of the water on a high padded bench.  My absolute favorite thing about this place is the large sliding door/s in each room allowing the ocean wave
Manager Response: Dear Leah,  WOW! What a review. Thank you so much! We are incredibly honored that you continue to visit us here at Surf & Sand. We look forward to seeing your little girl grow up with us! We are happy to be your home away from home and look forward to your next visit.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The first night we stayed in a lower one bed suite and someone was walking/pacing frantically on top of us all night. The person started banging around at 2 am and never stopped. We called the front office and nothing happened. They allowed us to move rooms but we were like zombies the whole next day. We were here for our 10 year wedding anniversary with our 2 children, ages 6 and 9. We would NEVER stay in those rooms again but only stay in the main tower, even though less privacy for adults with children.  The front desk SAID they would send someone to tell the person to be quite, It never happened, We had a bad day Saturday as we were all groggy from no sleep. We work really hard during the week, I am an oncologist( cancer doc) and my husband works for wells fargo and so
Manager Response: Dear Ness & Bill,   On behalf of the entire team, I'd like to apologize for the lack of sleep and frustration you experienced during your first night on property. It is very disheartening to know that it caused you to have a groggy day and I can imagine that it was especially concerning as you were traveling with children. Again, I apologize profusely for this.  I do hope your travel plans will bring you back to the Laguna Beach area. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at 949 497 4477 for any future needs. You will just need to ask for Misty. It would be my pleasure to personally ensure your future stay is perfect.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We are coming to the Surf and Sand next week and I can't be more excited! This will be our 3rd visit here and it's truly my favorite getaway place! We are from Arizona and the ocean right out your door is truly amazing! The staff has always been outstanding and we love the restaurant for breakfast lunch and dinner! We also have enjoyed the spa services and will look into that again for next week! Super excited for our trip!
Manager Response: Dear Kathym,  Thank you so much for your continued loyalty. We truly appreciate it! We look forward to seeing you this week. Feel free to call us any time if you have any special requests or preferences.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: You can't go wrong here!  Lovely rooms, gorgeous views, super friendly and helpful staff, and delicious food.  Staff remembers you and calls you by name :)  The views cannot be beat.  Service is prompt and efficient - we love it here!

Have been coming to the Surf & Sand for over 25 years.  The facility and staff are first-rate.  All rooms face the ocean, providing a relaxing, calm and rejuvenating getaway.  Rooms are well appointed and comfortable.  Am always sad to leave after a stay at this classy, relaxing, luxurious hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Dodgerbuf,  WOW! 25 years worth of stays at Surf & Sand. We are so thankful for your loyalty. We look forward to 25 more years of relaxations and rejuvenation!   See you soon!  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This is the 5th time we have stayed here and everything was as good this time as the very first time. No compromise on anything.  We stayed in building 2 - right on the ocean.  Sliding doors were left opened to hear the waves.  Great way to fall asleep.  Breakfast in the Splash restaurant was spectacular and Pedro our server treated us like we were the only ones there.  We are coming back.
Manager Response: Dear John,  Thank you so much for the review! We are so happy to read that you and your wife continue to enjoy staying with us. We will be sure to share your feedback with Pedro and his success will be celebrated!  We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: My husband added another night to our accommodation. He mentioned that it was my birthday. The reservation agent gave us a great deal with breakfast. When we got to the resort, they upgraded us to the an oceanfront room. The service from the valet, to the room attendant was outstanding . They made my birthday staycation very special. Will definitely come back. The view from our room was amazing. It was a million dollar view! üòä
Manager Response: Dear Dodzsky,  Happy Belated Birthday!!!!! We are so happy you enjoyed your staycation with us. Our Million Dollar View will be here for many years to come.... we look forward to enjoying it with you again soon!  Kindly,  Misty L.  Director of Front Office

Summary: I arrived early at the Surf and Sand. They checked me right in and upgraded my room for just $20 more to the ocean view in the tower. I was thrilled with the room. It was roomy and beautiful. The beds were so comfy. The private veranda overlooked the ocean. The room was very quiet. I even saw whales migrating one day. The staff was very nice. You do have to pay for valet parking here, which seems silly, since I could see the car was right there next to the hotel and I would just as soon get in it myself and not have to pay someone to do it. $30 a day- I believe.   bathroom was very nice, 2 sink vanity and separate tub.
