The shower and toilet area were a bit small.They had cozy robes for your use as well. The lotion was very nice quality and smelled really good.   Main beach park
Manager Response: Dear Tiffiny,  Thank you so much for your review! I am very happy to read that you enjoyed a relaxing stay with us. I am thrilled to read that you saw whales from your balcony. We are approaching the season in which we see them fairly often. It is amazing and I am truly happy you got that special experience.   I will be sure to pass on your feedback to our chef in regards to the breakfast and do apologize for your disappointment.  I hope you will visit us again!   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: My husband surprised me by booking a room here for my birthday. Our room was amazing and we were right on the beach so could hear the waves throughout the night - breathtaking. Sitting out on the balcony watching the waves was serene. A huge thank you to Diane who made our stay extra special. She was wonderful and helped make this a truly memorable experience.   I will definitely be staying at Surf and Sand again.
Manager Response: Dear Raj P,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your surprise birthday visit. We will be sure to celebrate Diane's success with the entire team. We truly appreciate your review and kind feedback.  We hope to see you again soon. Perhaps you can return the surprise trip and bring your husband here for his birthday! We promise to make the stay just as enjoyable and serene.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: always a pleasure to stay at the surf and sand
Summary: The location in Laguna is adjacent to the "surf and sand" like they say, and that makes for magical views. I still remember watching the dolphins frolic in the waves from my bedroom. The staff seems genuinely happy to work there, whether in the restaurant or cleaning. The restaurant was excellent with imaginative and healthy selections. My wife enjoyed the spa services. If you get on their mailing list you will be informed of occasional specials (e.g., free parking or breakfast).
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for this magical review. We are so happy to hear that you were able to see the dolphins playing from your room. You should be sure to visit us in March when there are plenty of whales in the area! Many times you can see their spouts from your balcony. We hope to see you then.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Had our Company Christmas Party Here
Summary: The location is beautiful as it's right on the water located on PCH. The food and service are exceptional, if you are just trying to get away for the weekend, this is an excellent choice. There are many shops and restaurants walking distance or you can just veg at this resort.
Manager Response: Dear Allyoop,  Thank you for your review. We are happy you enjoyed your company Christmas party here. We'd love to see you again soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: First time staying at the Surf and Sand and it definitely won't be my last! Everything about this hotel is outstanding! Beautiful, comfortable rooms over the beach, Amazing views of the sunset over the ocean, luxurious amenities, and next level service!  Everyone at this hotel was amazing, from the valet, front desk, concierge, room service, housekeeping, and bellman. They were all so kind and helpful! Kaweo at the front desk really stood out. He was so professional and knew everything about the hotel, but he had such a bright welcoming personality! This young man is the definition of hospitality. He makes checking in feel like being welcomed home!! And he even remembered my name days later when I was leaving!  All around such an unforgettable experience at a perfect getaway,
Manager Response: Dear BossyBee,  WOW, what an incredible review. Thank you so much! The words you left about Kaweo are extremely thoughtful. We will be sure to celebrate his success with the entire team.  Thank you again. We hope to see you soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Very nice hotel right on top of the sand, gorgeous private beach with the sound of the waves crashing outside your patio door. My wife, the organization is conference I attended,  and myself will all likely return over the years.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin M,  Thank you for the review! We look forward to seeing you and your wife in the future.... hopefully she will not have to work so hard next time!   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: You can't beat hearing the lull of the ocean as you fall asleep and wake up; you can't beat waking up right on the water either...no sidewalk, no patio, nothing.  This place is amazing.  We've been here before and loved it so much, we had to come back, but this time we had a little one with us.  We had a large corner room last time, so we were a bit sad to get a smaller room that was a bit of a walk to get to.  Nice consolation was that the staff came by twice: once to offer complimentary waters and another time to offer a complimentary fruit/cheese plate with Pellegrino.    The (room service) dinner we ordered arrived hot, but be prepared that it will not be filling (if you are hungry).  Their ricotta ravioli and roasted duck breast were both divine, but both hubs and I

If you want to be right on the sand, then right on the sand you'll be.  This place couldn't be better located. All rooms have ocean views.  The Staff is super friendly and the rooms and quite big and comfortable.  There's a pool perched up on a deck overlooking the ocean and the sand is literally underneath the resort.  You couldn't get closer if you tried.   Special shout out to THE BED.  It's SO COMFORTABLE and the sheets and pillows are perfection. You'll sleep great with the sound of ocean waves.  Amazing! Loved it.

Surf and Sand was beyond exceptional. Not only was the staff incredibly sweet and warm, but the location and views were second to none. We will definitely be coming back. What a wonderful getaway spot.
Manager Response: Dear Marissap,  Did you get engaged while here!?! If so.... a giant congratulations from the entire team here at Surf & Sand. We have a beautiful terrace overlooking the Pacific that is a gorgeous backdrop for weddings. We hope you will consider us for your big event. Congrats again!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front office

Summary Heading: The Surf and Sand Resort is the best!
Summary: We stayed mid-week for two nights at this resort for a Birthday/Anniversary celebration. It was our first time there and we were so delighted we chose Surf and Sand. We checked in with Kevin at the front desk and needless to say, he took total care of us! The upgraded room was more than what we could've asked for. The resort and it's location are enough to rank it #1, but the service we received set it apart for any other resort we've stayed at. Nicholas in valet was very helpful and offered us great advice for our stay. Housekeeping and Food Service addressed all our requests and did it with professionalism and a smile. Enjoying a mai tai and conversation with Patrick at the pool bar was another example of the level of service we were impressed with during our stay. Checking

Summary Heading: Great Get Away Close to Home
Summary: Feels like a far away vacation spot when only a 45 minute drive from home.  Love the oceanfront room with waves crashing below. Room very comfortable and amenities nice.  Love the restaurant, Splashes for lunch or dinner.  Close to downtown, can catch the trolley across the street.

We stayed here for eight days in early December. The service was outstanding. All their employees went out of their way to be friendly,professional and provide us with fabulous service, from the room upkeep and plenty of towels to even the valet parking. Rooms were spacious and very comfortable with great,peaceful ocean views. The restaurant, Splashes was fabulous also with great food,wines and views. The entire restaurant staff was very helpful and the food presentation and tastes were incredible..Will definitely stay here again in the future.

This was our second stay at the Surf & Sand and we were again delighted.  Only an hour from our home, this has quickly become our favorite local place to go when we need an escape. The entire property is inviting and beautifully decorated.  Add to that the never ending rhythm of the ocean and it doesn't get any better.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your review. The never ending rhythm of the ocean is my favorite part about working here! We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Loved this place slow season nice and quiet rooms well appointed views spectacular  Kawoe in reception was excellent very personable and knowledgeable  Would stay here again close walking distance to everything and beach is at your front door
Manager Response: Dear How1234,  Thank you so much for your review. Your comments about Kaweo are especially appreciated. We will be sure to share his success with the entire team!  We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Surf & Sand - The BEST way to experience Laguna Beach and Southern California
Summary: We are an Arizona family that visits California every year. About 10 years ago we were introduced to the Surf & Sand Resort. Since that time, we have made a point to go back once a year. It is that good! The level of service is top notch and the location of the property and the amenities make it the best in the area. It is magical.
Manager Response: Dear Jason,  Thank you so much for making us part of your family tradition while visiting California. We look forward to another ten years worth of visits! See you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We are locals but come to stay at the Surf and Sand whenever we need a "staycation" or have family in from out of town. It is hands down the best hotel in the Laguna Beach/Newport Coast/Newport Beach area. The location and the views are unmatched - absolutely stunning. The rooms are gorgeous and serene. The sounds of the ocean lulls you to sleep every night and eases you out of bed in the mornings. The staff are kind, friendly and helpful. The resort has a beautiful beach front as well as spa facilities, a pool, jacuzzi and fabulous restaurant (Splashes). There is a ton to do within walking distance and the concierge is always extremely helpful in getting the right reservation and activities planned. During our last stay we were a large group with specific requests and are
Manager Response: Dear Amanda,  Thank you for such an amazing review. I am happy that you are our neighbor and can take advantages of staycations with us! We look forward to many more in to future. Again, thank you so much for your feedback. It is truly appreciated!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We stayed 4 nights at this resort and were very pleased with our stay. The staff was accommodating and friendly, the room was clean and pleasantly decorated, balcony is literally steps away from the water - splashing of the waves was very relaxing and not too loud when you close the door. There's not AC but that wasn't an issue this time of year. Splashes was also a great restaurant. The pool was super crowded, so get there early. They will also set you up on the beach. We'll definitely be back!

The Surf and Sand is a First Rate Resort on the West Coast. - No problems from making reservations, arrival, stay and leaving.  Come to Surf and Sand, park you car and enjoy everything you need at the resort - you never have to leave.  The Resort/Food/Spa/Staff is the BEST!

Ocean Front gorgeous property in Laguna Beach...kind of a locals secret....you are "on the sand"...hard to find in Orange County....Best bar in Orange County hands down....Alberto the bartender makes awesome drinks....fun music always playing....open windows view the waves crashing right before your eyes...doesn't get better then this
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for the kind words and great review! We will be sure to share this feedback with Alberto and celebrate it.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: What a lovely stay at a beautiful location
Summary: The room we had in the surfside building looked freshly renovated ...It was sparkling new and nice ...We had wine and chocolates in our room upon arrival...The ocean waves crash literally feet from your balcony ( ear plugs are provided for a quiet nights sleep )  Staff was beyond friendly...The room is not just a place to stay overnight, but a true memorable destination !!!

We have stayed at the Surf and Sand over 20 years.  No place like it in Laguna if you want the waves splashing as you sleep at night.  Best location, view and great service.  The staff cannot be more professional and friendly.

This was my second visit to this property. I wasn't going to write a review- but the property really went out of their way and I feel the staff deserve it. They understand hospitality. Both times my flight from the east coast arrived early in the day and my room was made available to me long before check in time.  First, a few nice things about the property. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, and the building is designed so that each room overlooks the gorgeous ocean. Rooms are tastefully decorated and include small thoughtful touches like ear plus for those who don't want to be rocked to sleep by the rhythm of the waves, free water replacement daily, and ample storage space. I didn't love the showers, which seemed cramped to me, but I've stayed in two different rooms and
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   What a detailed, well thought out review. THANK YOU so much for this. It will be shared with our entire team so we can celebrate their successes. We truly pride ourselves in the services we provide so appreciate the feedback greatly.   We hope to see you again for visit #3 soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We are at the restaurant in the resort. It is beautiful. It overlooks the ocean and you can hear the waves crashing on the beach. We had a lovely brunch there but it is on the pricier side. What a beautiful place to celebrate a special occasion or just to enjoy each other's company.

Brian Gibbs is an incredible add to your team. Friendly, knowledgeable, accommodating and treated us like a VIP. We will definitely come back and ask for the exact same room. Thank you.  Also, Che at the front desk made us feel very welcomed and even remembered our names on the way out. Him acknowledging us and saying thank you was above and beyond.  Great Job Surf & Sands, we will highly recommend your resort to clients. family and friends.  Merry Christmas!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for this review! We will be sure to celebrate Brad and Che's success with the entire team!   Happy New Year!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We were very impressed with the location, cleanliness, and staff service. It has a great view of the ocean and nice pool. The only problem we had was that there's no laundry services on site but there was a laundromat close by.

The surf and sand is a lovely resort.  We had an enjoyable stay.  Our room was lovely and spacious with plenty of amenities and storage.   We paid a premium price for a Summer 4th of July stay.  It is never inexpensive at the Surf and Sand.  I do however expect just a touch more luxury for the price.     However.  The pool area is far too small.  There are simply not enough lounge chairs for all.  This could easily be remedied as the property is quite large.  Even the addition of a spa on one of the other decks would be a vast improvement for the guests without children.   Our son enjoyed the daily activities and I was pleasantly surprised at all of the activities there for him.  The restaurants are just okay.  Not fabulous.  The alfresco dining on the upper patio is sometimes

We live 1.5 hrs away, and did a birthday staycation here. LOVED everything about it! We were delivered complimentary wine and chocolates for my b.day. restaurant was wondering,  food very good, price high, but worth it. The room was Hugh, but the waves ware very loud to sleep through, but you can close the patio doors  and they provide ear plugs. They will set up beach chairs and umbrellas on beach for free. We did that one day as the pool was packed with kids and families. WILL STAY AGAIN
Manager Response: Dear BabsRamage,  Thank you for staying with us and happy belated birthday! We look forward to your next visit.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This was luxurious to the max.  The location cannot be beat.  Felt so relaxed!  The only thing is that the airline lost my luggage and when I asked the staff to call me at any hour of the night when it arrived, they didn't.  I slept in jeans and they told me it arrived after I called in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Crishie2,  Please accept my apologies in regards to failing to properly communicate when your luggage arrived. Sleeping in jeans certainly does not sound comfortable! I am happy to read that you were able to enjoy the majority of your stay. You are right; our location truly cannot be beat! It's fabulous to have the Pacific Ocean as our backyard.  We hope to see you again soon!  Kindly, Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: One of the best properties I've stayed at, anywhere.  Room was large, had everything you needed and balcony sits right on the shoreline. The service from the front desks was excellent and friendly. I was with a large group (36) and all had high praise. Could probably do with another bar as the only bar they have, whilst a brilliant location, is fairly tight and you need to get there early to get a seat. Food served there was excellent. Overall greatly impressed by the property.
Manager Response: Dear James C,   Thank you so much for this review! Hearing that your entire group had high praise is certainly something we will be celebrating with the team. Thank you again for staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We went for a group Christmas Party. Staff was absolutely wonderful. Very accommodating. Beautiful rooms and of course the view spectacular. We will definitely be back again, this time with family, so they can enjoy it as much we did with friends.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for the kind words and great review. We will be thrilled to host your future family visit! See you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: A boutique hotel with smiling staff, excellent beach access, fine amenities, and service that is fast, courteous, and pleasant.  I would add that this a very informal atmosphere which made the experience even more enjoyable. We would definitely come back!

The Surf and Sand has the location and so much more!  Top notch service and facilities. Beachfront location offers sweeping views that won't soon be forgotten.  A great place to relax, rewind, and rejuvenate.

The property is in great shape and is located right next to the ocean. The service and food is top-notch. We stayed there for my wife's birthday and she said this was her birthday ever. All of the staff members were extremely helpfuly. We had only one problem and that was with a party of people below us smoking "grass" which rose up to our room. I reported the issue and it was taken care of by security.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for this review. Please accept my apologies in regards to your neighbors. We are a completely non-smoking resort so I am happy to read that Security was able to take care of this concern.  Perhaps we can become a birthday tradition for you and your wife!   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This place has the best view of any place in So Cal-  quiet & right on the sand and perfect for sunset dining or a quick cocktail at the bar. The wine list was sorely lacking but the chef made my food precisely to my dietary requirements. How often does that happen! I thoroughly enjoyed the experience-  perfect service and food. I will be back!

Summary Heading: The most beautiful view in Laguna Beach
Summary: This is a very nice hotel, right on the sandy beaches of Laguna Beach. It is pricey, but is a great getaway for families and couples. It has a great restaurant downstairs and the room are right on the beach, a few feet away from the ocean. Staff is not the friendliest but overall, I give this place 5 stars because of it's location in the midst of all action in Laguna Beach.

I would've easily given this place a 5 star if not for jack hammers hammering on nearby balconies.  They're putting in glass which will be lovely, but 9am-5pm it is LOUD.  This place is gorgeous, and you cannot get closer to the amazing ocean and waves crashing.  We slept like babies listening to the surf, lying in a super comfortable, clean bed.  The room had glass doors where you could enjoy the view from inside, as well as a window that we left open during the night.  We saw a pod of dolphin while hanging out on the balcony when we got up.  The room was spacious, and the bathroom had a soaking tub and stand up shower.  There is a restaurant onsite that we didn't try- We walked just a few minutes to Mozambique (sp?) which was delish.  We would definitely stay here again when
Manager Response: Dear Laura D,  Thank you so much for the review! Please accept my apologies as the balcony renovations disturbed your stay during the day. We are very excited for the upgrade, but hate to hear that it disturbed anyone. Please do note that we are maintaining the balconies and there will be no major changes, such as glass, on the balconies.  We do look forward to your next stay! The balcony renovations should be done before Christmas so hope you will visit us again shortly after.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: My husband and I had been recommended to the Surf and Sand. This resort is so beautiful and delivered on everything! We did have a little trouble with the lock on our door so we were moved to another room. Wine and chocolates were brought to us for our trouble.  Our room was so pleasant and large! We had a king room on the 4th floor. We loved listening to the rolling waves all night! And enjoyed room service and our balcony! We can't wait to return for more r&r!
Manager Response: Dear Danielle,  I am so happy to see that you and your husband enjoyed some well deserved R&R while here. I was disappointed to read about the lock concerns, but am happy it was addressed immediately.   We look forward to your next visit.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Perfect venue for a team meeting!
Summary: What a treat to have our team meeting at the Surf and Sand! Waking up to the breathtaking ocean view was just the perfect motivation to start our planning meeting for 2017. The staff took incredible care of us at all times. Form the staff to the food, we did not have to worry about a single thing.
Manager Response: Dear RobertMeister,  We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that the team meeting was a success! Thank you so much for sharing your pictures with us.   We look forward to your return in 2017!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Beautiful grounds and ocean front location. Spa was lovely as well and the staff was polite, friendly and attentive. My husband had stayed there before for business, in a fantastic suite, and liked it so much he decided to book one for our anniversary.   He also mentioned that he decided not to book a more affordable room, due to the one small elevator which he often had to wait for. Opting instead for a suite with an outside separate door near the spa (#443). Though it was a nice enough suite, and did have an ocean view, it had an even bigger roof view which was very disappointing. We were also surprised that though ocean front, this expensive luxury resort did not have air conditioning. Another small problem were the pillows. They were very thick and uncomfortable.   In spite
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for the review and for staying with us! We appreciate your kind words in regards to our spa, staff and restaurant. I apologize for the disappointing in the Catalina Lower Suite that you booked. Please do call the hotel directly for any future bookings. We will be happy to go over all suite details with you as we have several other suite types that are full ocean front as opposed to this partial view.  We hope you will visit us again. Happy Holidays!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: A company team event this weekend introduced me to the resort's seaside Splashes Bar. The views are incredible from any seat! Yummy appetizers & drinks complemented the picturesque views. It's a treat I would definitely share with family & friends.

I loved some things and some things were ridiculous. I loved the little shops on the property they had some cool stuff.  I had a massage at the spa and enjoyed the tranquility of the facility.  The grounds around the spa are beautiful. The employees inside the spa need to be more attentive though. We enjoyed dinner at the restaurant.  We had to ask some questions regarding the menu but our wait staff was great, so was my fish,  no complaints.   I'd love to give the Surf and Sand 5 stars but I can't.  I paid high-end, 5 star prices for a typical resort.  I guess I paid for the beachfront access, and this is where the low rating comes from.  The access areas to the beach were full of trash (i.e. In&Out, dirty diaper, random clothing, cigarette butts etc.) and this stuff was there
Manager Response: Dear Katy N,  On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for your disappointment with your stay. The items you listed are extremely concerning. You are absolutely right in stating some more attentiveness from the team would have solved your concerns. Please know that your comments will be shared with our team so we can seek ways of improvement.   I do hope your travel plans will bring you to the area again. Please feel free to reach out to the Executive Offices directly at 949-376-2761 for any future needs.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Thanks for such a wonderful experience at a beautiful resort! A special thank you to the Concierge; from places to see, things to do, restaurant reservations and car rental. Ask and ye shall receive. It's a beautiful thing!   Kerry in Tampa
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for this incredible review and kind words about our concierge team. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Had an amazing weekend experience here recently. Accommodations were fantastic, hotel staff were all friendly and went above and beyond to make sure that my wife and I were comfortable, rooms had fabulous, breathtaking ocean views. I would highly, highly recommend this hotel and I am looking forward to my return (hopefully soon)

Summary Heading: Perfect stop after full day of travel
Summary: We absolutely loved the tower room and resort amenities- will definitely return again! The workout room was perfect for our needs and the on location restaurant was  cozy and elegant for evening food and drinks

Living in Orange County we have occasionally stopped into the Surf and Sand for appetizers and a drink or two with a killer view.  It has long been on our list to stay overnight for a "special occasion".  We booked it for our 15th Anniversary and could not be happier.  Checked in at 4 on Saturday and left Sunday rested and refreshed.  Thanks to Kevin at the front desk for making sure our anniversary was a special one.   We made reservations at local favorite restaurant but when we saw the room...we decided room service would deliver the best dinner views and experience.  I like how the desk is set up with in-room dining in mind.

Our room was on the ocean side, one level above the swimming pool.  We had a partially obstructed view of the ocean, but could still see and hear it quite well.  The room had 2 queen beds and we added a rollaway for one of our granddaughters.  We ate dinner in the bar and had a great view of the beach, breaking waves, and sunset.  The only problem we had was that we were charged $42 after we checked out for mini-bar supplies that we absolutely did not use.  When I called them they apologized and refunded the $42.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for the review! I am happy to read that you enjoyed your time here with your granddaughters. I apologize for the confusion with the honor bar charges, but happy to read it has been resolved.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The hotel is located directly on it's own private strip of beach.  The hotel offers services for guest- beach umbrellas, beach chairs, and even food and drink service.  The spot is perfect for jumping in and enjoying the mild waves.  My family, ranging from 10 to 48 years of age, all enjoyed the day on the beach.  There is also a pool and hot tub located on the beach-side of the hotel (a bit small, but nice for relaxing on a chaise lounge).  The rooms on the ocean-side of the hotel are spacious and clean.  The only down-side was having to use valet for parking- I never like waiting for my car ;-)  Hotel is also located within easy walking distance to shops and restaurants (there is a nice restaurant on site as well).
Manager Response: Dear Kelly,  I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay with your family. Our location truly cannot be beat! We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: It never fails, the Surf and Sand is like balm for a tired body and soul - Its my go to place if I need to unwind and relax. This Time I went after hectic days in LA with a friend, just took strolls on the beach, sat on the balcony overlooking the beach, the pacific ocean and the most insane sunsets!!! the rooms service is great, both a fabulous selection and the staff is so attentive and nice! In my opinion this is the only place to stay in the region and of course, one really big reason is the setting ON, I mean ON the beach!! You wont be disappointed!!  If you are flying in from NYC to LAX, make the detour on the return and fly out from the Santa Ana airport, soo much more civilised and less chaotic!
Manager Response: Dear Magnus,  What an incredible review. Thank you so much! We are always here to be your quick pick me upper and look forward to seeing you again.... hopefully soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Just had a wonderful staycation in Laguna Beach and this resort was amazing!! We have stayed in many hotels in Laguna, but by far this was the best. Amazing oceanfront king room with the water just outside our room.  The room was clean, up to date and spacious. We ordered room service and it was decent. The pool was nice and the staff friendly.   A lot of stairs if you are staying on the lower floors and no elevator. Bell boys were great though. Only other downside was the waves crash pretty hard right outside your door in this type of unit. They provide earplugs. Didn't bother me once I fell asleep.   Will definitely be returning..

Summary Heading: Beautiful and right ON the ocean!
Summary: Impeccably kept, friendly, and perfectly located with the "surf and sand" below your balcony, this hotel is by far my favorite in Laguna Beach. Nice staff, pretty swimming pool by the beach, good restaurant, and lovely "beach style" palette of colors used in decorating the rooms, which also have handsome plantation shutters, A stay here is a lovely, relaxing experience.
Manager Response: Dear Jerdunn,  Thank you so much for this review. I truly love our beach style vibes and the shutters are my favorite feature in our rooms! We hope to see you again so we can provide you with another lovely, relaxing stay.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This is my favorite place to celebrate special occasions. This hotel is located in the perfect location in Laguna Beach. The staff goes above and beyond to treat you special and the hotel is so nice and has the perfect beach,  great food and just so easy to relax.
Manager Response: Happy Belated Birthday Brettfan! We hope to see you again for your next special occasion.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Located actually on the beach (feet from the surf) in Laguna.  Most (if not all) rooms have an ocean view.  French doors and balconies let the surf noise in.  Beach is also very nice.  Cannot walk too far in either direction without having to hop over large rocks.  Rooms are very spacious and well-appointed.  Pool and surfside restaurant.  Great service.  Pricey, but you get what you pay for here.  Town is nearby but requires a long walk or shuttle.  A negative:  fans but no a/c so it can get hot in the room, especially if you don't want to hear the loud surf and close the doors.

Great beachfront hotel (provided you book a room beachside). On par with Ritz Carlton price point.  Surf and Sand is good. The Ritz does it better. It can be hot in the room during daytime hours being some rooms have no air conditioning.
Manager Response: Dear Denise C,   Thank you so much for your feedback. I am very happy to read that you enjoyed our beachside location yet disappointed to read that the lack of AC led to an uncomfortable stay during the day. I apologize for this!   Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We spent the night so we could take in the air show the next day. This is a motel across from the beach. Very friendly staff. We liked it, but it was not fancy. Good relatively inexpensive place to spend the night.

We did enjoy our stay at the Surf and Sand resort but it was a bit crowded because we went Labor Day Weekend. The hotel is nice and we had a great ocean view room. I wasn't happy that we had to wait a long time to check into our room. I don't think the hotel was equipped to handle the large crowd at the resort. The restaurants were always crowded, could never get in anywhere. They had booked several events that took up most of the space. You were out of luck if you were there on your own. Also, I am not a fan of pet friendly hotels. Too many problems with dogs roaming around. In fact, I'm just not a fan of Laguna Beach. I think our visit was overpriced, could have stayed elsewhere much cheaper and less crowded.
Manager Response: Dear Kakalina,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed. The particular weekend you visited is one of the busiest weekends of the year. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded and more relaxing.   Generally speaking, visiting Laguna Beach during the off season will provide you with a completely different experience than you had over Laborl Day weekend.  I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.  We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Our family stayed at the hotel for two nights in August.  Three kids ages 10-16.  First, the good:  The hotel is right on the beach, with stunning ocean views.  And, by ‚Äúon the beach‚Äù, I mean right on top of the beach.  So if pure ocean vistas are your thing, the views here cannot be beat.  The rooms are beach chic in style and updated, but relatively modest in size and not fancy.  The beds are very comfortable.  Bathrooms and shower are a little small, but more than serviceable.  The surf ‚Äì and it is a strong surf (see below) ‚Äì is very loud in the rooms., which is why the hotel supplies ear plugs in each room.  If you are okay listening to loud surf while in your room and trying to sleep, it is no problem.  I suspect many guests enjoy the white noise and the unique sound of the
Manager Response: Dear WestLAFamily,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your August stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed.  We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter, cooler and we have the ability to offer more economical rates. You will find the pool area much more luxurious and the rooms much cooler during the office season.   I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance. We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The facility is kept extremely clean and well maintained; the staff is always looking for ways to ensure its appearance is perfect; the staff is very helpful; the food was delicious; and the view is amazing;

The beach was lovely.  I don't feel as though I was treated very well on arrival.  Generally staff was not friendly.  Two lights didn't work in my room.  one of the pillow cases was dirty and stained.  I didn't like having to use the stairs so much.
Manager Response: Dear RooBeer,   On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for your disappointment in your recent stay. Having a warm, caring, and friendly team is something we generally pride ourselves in. It is evident we failed to provide you with a welcoming experience and therefore failed as hoteliers. Additionally, the maintenance concerns experienced in your room are unacceptable. Please accept my sincerest apologies.   We would love another opportunity to showcase our service to you. If your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, feel free to contact our executive offices directly for your reservations needs at 949-376-2761.  Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Great hotel. Laguna beach is still warm and beautiful in October. We went with our 4 month old for one day. The sounds of the waves were a perfect sleeping sound. Pool was a nice temperature for our babies first swim. Room was comfortable and they brought us a crib. Bring your own wine and snacks to enjoy on the balcony.

The hotel staff and accommodations are very nice.  One point of contention was the lack of air conditioning.  It was unusually warm at night while I was there so it was a bit uncomfortable. Overall though the views are amazing, gorgeous beach, friendly staff and spacious rooms.

Dated dirty hotel, very over priced, loud children running around, terrible restaurant, rude and unhelpful staff. Its a shame, because it was such a nice property. I cannot recommend anyway stay here.
Manager Response: Dear RSQuayle,  Your feedback in very much appreciated. Please accept my sincerest apologies as we failed to exceed your expectations. We pride ourselves in the quality products and services we provide for our guests. I truly cannot apologize enough for your negative experience.   We would love another opportunity to showcase our service to you. If your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, feel free to contact the executive offices directly for your reservations needs at 949-376-2761.  Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We celebrated our first anniversary at the Surf and Sand in Laguna Beach. It was the best time ever . We ate dinner in our room every night and watched the most incredible Sunsets. The staff was outstanding. Set a beautiful table for us.The staff was very friendly and always knew our names. The Valet staff knew our names and had the car waiting. Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Happy Belated Anniversary! Thank you so much for this kind review and for spending such a special occasion with us.  We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Sit by the bar area to watch the ocean come in.  The waves are big and the drinks are thirst quenching. Take a dip in the waves and shower off right next to the pool then come in for something to eat. Appetizers are fine.
Manager Response: Dear NH2CA,  Your review made me thirsty! I am happy to read that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the review!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: The Only Place to Stay in Laguna
Summary: I've been coming to the Surf & Sand for too many years. They are the only hotel that gives us the resort lifestyle and beach access in one shot. They have beautiful rooms, restaurants and staff. I've seen the transition of remodels and it keeps getting better. They are there to make you feel like you are their only guest and i love that attention!
Manager Response: Dear Armani,   We look forward to you visiting for TOO many more years! Thank you for being so loyal.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This hotel is the very best place to stay in Laguna Beach! The view from the balcony down to the waves is amazing.  The hotel services are excellent. At low tide you can walk all the way to Main Beach!! Falling asleep and waking up to the sounds of the waves crashing is one of the best parts of staying at the Surf & Sand, Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Tricia,  Thank you for this review! We truly love having you as our guest and look forward to you returning in the future.   Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Not What We Thought We Were Getting For The High Price We Paid  - Very Disappointed!
Summary: My husband and I stayed at Surf & Sand Resort in early June 2016. We paid $550+ for what we thought was going to be a wonderful ocean view room. It did have an ocean view but we were one floor above the hotel pool that was packed with people. It was loud and we had no privacy on our balcony. We requested another room and was told by a young woman at the front desk that we had to wait for a room opening on a higher floor to be cleaned. We waited patiently and finally called back the front desk after no word for 1 1/2 hours. They had no record of our request for a new room, they advised that the young woman who was helping us already left for the day and they then told us that room was taken by someone else and there was nothing else available in the whole hotel.  Thus, we were
Manager Response: Dear Tool Girl,   On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize profusely for the negative experience you and your husband had. It is embarrassing to read that so many things went wrong during your stay. I will be following up with our Front Office and Security team to ensure we are more thoughtful in how we handle these situations. It is imperative that we take good care of our guests. We clearly failed to do this during your recent stay.   We would love another opportunity to showcase our service to you. If your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, feel free to contact our executive offices directly for your reservations needs at 949-376-2761.  Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Can't say enough about the staff, location and overall experience we had at Surf and Sand Resort. It was the perfect getaway weekend and my whole family had a great time. The pool is easy access and enjoyable for everyone in the family and being steps to the sand gives it that added bonus. Book here and you won't be disappointed, everyone is very friendly and accommodating.  If you are debating on the price, it is worth it for what you get.

Great place with wonderful rooms and service. We have been going there for over 40 years, and will continue to do so. Not cheap, but worth the price... Since it's right on the ocean, the waves at night can be a bit loud, so just shut the doors and windows and you can sleep like a baby.
Manager Response: Dear Woody,  WOW! 40 years. Thank you for such loyalty. We look forward to many more years to come.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I've traveled all over CA, but the Surf and Sand is BY FAR my favorite hotel. It is right on the water. You hear the waves crashing right below your window. The beaches are beautiful and the entire hotel is breath taking. My husband and I were so taken by this hotel that we chose to have our wedding here on 10/01/2016. I cannot say enough good things about the staff and wedding coordinator. If there was anything that went wrong the day of, they did not let on at all! Everyone was cool, calm and collected. They ran everything according to schedule. I was able to relax and enjoy my day without any stress! I love this place! My husband and I will be visiting for anniversaries to come!
Manager Response: Dear MD1147,  What an incredible review! There are many hotels in California, so we are thrilled that you have selected us as your favorite. We are even more thrilled that you and your new husband decided to spend such a special day with us! THANK YOU!  We hope to see you for every anniversary!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of nights at the end of our Californian adventure :) what a great place to finish on! We were upgraded to a tower room that directly overlooked the beach. Fabulous views, and a very large balcony with furniture. Really enjoyed our stay. The staff were very courteous, and the huge room was tastefully furnished with everything you could want.  We had an excellent dinner in the restaurant, and were very well looked after. I wish I was still there :(
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Come back! We wish you were still here too :)  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This place is a jewel.  it has the best location in Laguna Beach.  It is so close to the water you would not believe how close it is to the water and sand.  The rooms are large and the staff is friendly.

Summary Heading: I went to sleep every night listening to the ocean
Summary: This hotel was on the beach. The sounds of the waves was all you heard. The rooms were huge and the bathrooms very nice and the best thing of all, was that it was on the main street and close to everything. We walked everywhere.    My only complaint was that they had no air conditioner and you had to sleep with the patio door open which didn't have a screen.

This hotel is literally on the beach. The hotel also provides ear plugs if the waves get too loud. One thing to be aware is that there is no A/C in this hotel, so depending on the time of the year of your visit, this can be a problem. Room is spacious but hotel ground is average.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda,   Thank you so much for the review! For the majority of the year, our coastal location creates a nice cool breeze which truly creates a nice atmosphere throughout the resort and guest rooms. As you mentioned, we literally could not possibly be any closer to the beach! Recently, we did experience a heat wave so I do apologize if this lead to an uncomfortable stay. We do invite you to visit us during the off season when the resort is much less crowded and cooler.   We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Surf and Sand is everything you want in a Southern California vacation.  Amazing coast, fall asleep to crashing waves, unreal views and located all within an adorable and walk-able downtown.  Even the restaurant and bar here are amazing!  Food is fantastic and the restaurant is so romantic.  LOVE LOVE LOVE this place!

Summary Heading: Great location right on the beach
Summary: Haven't had the opportunity to stay her in many years.  The Surf and Sand is great.  Right on the beach.  The building and units are very good given their age.     Dinner at the restaurant was great.  Server was friendly and more than helpful.  Food was delicious.  Would definitely stay here again.

I've stayed at many beach resorts and you can't get closer to the water than here. The Towers rooms are gorgeously appointed and spacious. The service is very attentive too. Great valets and bellman. So Cal living at it's best.

Summary Heading: Best Deal for "ON" the Beach Hotel
Summary: If you want to stay right on the beach, hear and feel the waves break almost to your room, see the morning glassiness of the ocean and the romantic sunset from almost everywhere on the property, then stay at Surf and Sand.  The Splashes bar is good for drinks and food (mushroom, truffle, flat bread is a favorite) and the restaurants are upscale for a special night.  The rooms are comfy - every is an ocean view with a balcony you can leave the sliding glass door open to feel the ocean breeze at night. Showers are great and robes are provided for you and your loved one.  It's a perfect place for weddings and honeymoons.   We've had two company holiday parties there and everyone enjoyed the food and the special treatment from the staff.

My boyfriend and I just stayed for the night and had the most amazing time. Kaeleena checked us in and was so friendly and helpful telling us of all the fun things to do/places to go nearby. She made our stay celebrating our anniversary extra special and we can't thank her enough! The hotel was beautiful and we loved our stay and can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for this review! We will be sure to celebrate Kaeleena's success and truly appreciate your kind words.  Sincerely,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The room is right on the beach which is good and bad.  the good is the view.  The bad is its an old building patch together so the insulation is terrible, you can hear people walking and dogs barking at all hours.  And no air conditioning, so it is an oven unless you open the windows.  Opening the windows is great on paper but the ocean noise is probably too much for most people.  Overall, its a luxurious hotel but old and honestly a bit tired, they did some cheap renovations and you can tell the construction quality is not great, for example the wall in the shower actually overhung the tub by half an inch.  The door on the closet was about way out of alignment so the doors were impossible to close.. I mean its not life changing but come on the room was like $500 per night...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   I would love the opportunity to discuss this in more detail with you. Your experience is very concerning, especially your comments about the Valet and car damage. I apologize profusely for your negative experience.  When you have a moment, please reach out to me directly at 949 613 4726.   I look forward to hearing from you.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Nice place to play and stay
Summary: Ambiance, romance, sun and surf. Beautiful clean,  pleasant staff. Great food. Wonderful rooms.close to shops and other restaurants , within walking distance to main beaches. Or walk outside your room to your own strip of beach. Great get away.

Thank you Surf and Sand for another outstanding and relaxing Birthday for my wife. So relaxing I sometimes wonder if it is her birthday or mine! We ate at Splashes, she has the egg frittata and I had the short rib quesadilla, would recommend both.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for this kind review. We are happy to hear the birthday celebration for your wife was relaxing. Sounds like you just may have to celebrate your birthday with us as well!   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This resort is beautiful and clean and friendly staff.  Just make sure to ask about any hidden cost (amenity fees $200 a night held on your card) and not just for this Resort but all resorts.  My husband took me for my Birthday and it was breath taking. Loved it.

Laguna Beach is my absolute favorite beach in the US. I lived near here in 1999 and always make a trip back as often as I am able. I love the Surf & Sand because I can listen to the waves crash. The pool and restaurant are also convenient. This is a place I love to stay when I would like privacy and to be near the ocean.

Summary Heading: Romantic peaceful weekend on the beach
Summary: Best Valentine's Day gift ! Our stay was absolutely perfect, to a T. The room- decor, bed, bathroom, the view, the staff. Though it's hard not to be happy when your balcony has waves crashing underneath it...  It's lovely to walk to "town" for a casual or upscale meal- depending on your mood. I love it here and we can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Dear Caterine J,  Perhaps we can become your valentine's day tradition! We look forward to seeing you again.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Beautiful spot in Laguna Beach - Paradise!
Summary: It was my first trip to Laguna Beach and this hotel is excellent! The view from my room (and I think all rooms are ocean facing) was outstanding and you are just right on the beach. All rooms have great balconies I believe.  Room was large, well appointed and clean.  Location was perfect.  Pool and pool area were nice.  The beach was amazing. The restaurant is very good with amazing seafood.  The bar is also good (too expensive in my view for almost $20 drink without any option to order just nuts or chips for snack).  Loved the place really. Starting with the friendly staff and ending with the view from the room (which is now the background of my phone)  I cannot find any faults to this great place. They thought of everything. Relaxed luxury, my favorite.
Manager Response: Dear Francesca,  We are happy you enjoyed your stay. We love relaxed luxury as well. I often refer to our resort as "barefoot luxury"!  We hope to see you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Great hotel and a great location
Summary: Surf & Sand Resort is located on the ocean side of PCH (route 1) in Laguna Beach. It is within a walking distance (2/3 of a mile) from the main beach and downtown.   Surf & Sand offers not only great accommodations, but also terrific food.

Summary Heading: Were felt like we were home
Summary: Don't ever think of going any where else.  It's right on the water and the walk on the beach is amazing The staff treat's you like family. and you won't want to leave.  Thats why I keep going back. The sun set's the food you can't beat and you can walk into town.
Manager Response: Dear Penny P,  You are right; our sunsets and food cannot be beat! Thank you so much for this review. We hope to see you soon.... since you are now part of our Surf & Sand Family!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This hotel by far is the best we've stayed in Laguna Beach.  The rooms are amazing and the staff is incredible.  Beachfront Tower is top notch.  Your room is directly over the water.  We stayed in March and had the best trip we've ever had in Laguna Beach.  It is a bit further out of town so the walk to get there a bit longer, but worth it!  Extra steps on the Fit-bit!  Recommend this place to anyone!

Surf and Sand provides the perfect combination of location and elegance for any event! They gave us a dream wedding and reception experience! The sales and catering staff are exceptional. There was no request they could not meet. They absolutely put customers first, and maintain a 5 star standard of elegance and comfort. The sales and catering manager, Erin Hooper was excellent! Even though it was a destination wedding from the east coast, she was flawless in making everything perfect. She even helped wipe sand off of my brides feet! This resort is beyond equal in the area. I highly recommend it for any event, and look forward to returning for my anniversary!

Summary Heading: Even better than the website shows
Summary: The room was absolutely beautiful, the location on the beach was beyond exceptional, the staff was awesome, and the food was far better than expected.  I was thrilled with everything about the Surf and Sand.  It exceeded my expectations in every way.  I would definitely recommend it.

Great hotel!!!! Loved staying there. Would recommend it ! Excellent service. Great beach. Staff are friendly and professional. I enjoyed every moment. Wonderful vacation. Wil come back. Lovely view. My family can't wait to get to spend time here next time.

We were a rather large group (300+ people) and everything from checking in, getting our rooms, the meeting room, our meals, the other facilities available to us (pool, restaurants, spa, gift store ...) everything was run like a finely tuned and oiled machine.  All the staff was friendly, helpful, and professional.  This place went above and beyond.  What an extraordinary experience.  All that and you are right there on the sand with an incredible ocean view!!!

My husband 16 yr old daughter and 15 friend stayed for a weekend getaway.  The hotel is nice - sits right on the beach - at night you can hear the waves crashing all night - and it's loud so if a light sleeper they do provide ear plugs- there is no ac so it was warm even with the ocean breeze.  Good restaurant - pool is nice - I felt like everything was cramped together though.  Easy walk to restaurants and the shuttle goes everywhere you want to go.  It gets crowded though so sometimes a long wait.   Honestly it is so expensive I don't think we would stay again- probably there isn't anything less expensive right on the beach though  The rooms are very spacious even with two double beds  The chairs and umbrellas are included in the resort fee.

This is a great place.  The rooms are clean and the atmosphere is fantastic.  It is also right on the beach.  Literally just a few steps down from the pool and you are on the sand.  And the beach is awesome.  They set you up with a chair, towel, and umbrella, and you can even order food.  I will definitely be returning!

My wife and I and some friends stayed four nights, and everything was marvelous. Our room was delightful and overlooked the ocean (earplugs provided by the hotel in case you have trouble sleeping with the crashing surf). The S&S is just a short walk from town, but far enough to be away from crowds and heavy traffic. Food at the hotel's restaurant was excellent. Probably best of all was the friendly, accommodating, efficient, and competent service‚Äîincluding everyone, from the front desk to the housekeepers to the valets. My wife and I highly recommend the Surf & Sand Resort.

Me and my wife visited here for 3 nights at the end of August. Upon arrival staff were welcoming and checked us straight in (around 4pm). The valet and bell boys sorted our cases out and we went straight to our room right on the beach. The rooms are beautifully decorated, and over look the beach and ocean. As it was a special occasion the bell boy also brought us 2 complimentary of sparkling rose. The sliding doors open to a lovely balcony overlooking the beach and ocean. Well worth sitting on watching the sunset. With the doors open the sea/waves can be loud but what do you expect, your on the beach of an ocean that always causes large waves. Plus you'll enjoy playing in them during the day! Those that complain about it, have a little intelligence, seriously. The rooms don't

Way to over priced for the service provided. Rooms are nice and the view is amazing. Bar/restaurant service is very slow and over priced so order up 2 drinks at a time and enjoy the view cause it will be awhile before they return.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. The delay in your drink delivery must have been frustrating.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Beautiful location right on the sand, very friendly staff and comfortable rooms with ocean front balcony. Disappointed that our room wasn't ready at 4:00- and we were just staying one night. The lobby and check in was hectic- lot's of unhappy people waiting for rooms at 4:00.

Summary Heading: Lovely staff but wish it had better beach
Summary: So I will start by saying that the staff was all wonderful and highly responsive to any needs. There were some things I would have preferred to know before coming though--most importantly, there are no full loungers on the beach! Only chair loungers. Of course this is due to the second thing I wish I had known, the tide comes in every afternoon and effectively removes 95% of the sand part of the beach in front of the hotel!! It was a nice treat to have food service at the beach, but the food was not so tasty and obviously very expensive. I really wanted a beach getaway so these things sort of broke the fun. The pool is small, so that didn't feel like a viable alternative and the hot tub was essentially a kiddie pool for all four days we were there. I will say though that most of
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed.We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter, cooler and we have the ability to offer more economical rates.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: thanks.. the hotel is quite nice, with very good proximity to the beach. i would defnitely stay there again.  especially nice, is the fact that you can walk down the street to restaurants.  they wish more letters, but none are necessary.   they wish more letters, but none are necessary.   they wish more letters, but none are necessary.   they wish more letters, but none are necessary.

The hotel promises a check-in at 4:00PM, which is as late as any property. Then, after you have pre-paid and arrive, the check-in was never "guaranteed" for 4:00PM. There had to be 20 of us who waited until after 5:00/5:30PM. We even heard them tell a guest it would be after 6:00PM. Seemed like this is a daily event at "Surf & Sand". At over $500 a night, you would expect better! Resorts far cheaper don't treat their guests so poorly.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed. I apologize profusely that your room was not available by 4pm. We do our very best to have all rooms available by this time, and apologize for failing to guarantee this for you. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded and more relaxing.  Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Family holiday in August.  Laguna is a lovely resort.  Hotel has fantastic rooms with ocean views and friendly helpful staff. My only complaint was they have a lovely outside area, where you can eat and drink and not as formal as the Splashes restaurant.  The tables have a lighted fire in the middle which adds to the atmosphere.  It was a shame that it was not always open where you needed to order 'room service' if you wanted a drink.  Should be open all the time in my opinion.

Summary Heading: Worst Hotel service I ever got.
Summary: This was an forgettable terrible hotel experience as as I was traveling with Kids and family. Check in time was 4pm. Went to the hotel a bit earlier but the room wasn't ready even after 4pm the room still wasn't ready around 5pm I finally got my room. Later in the day we're leaving I requested for a late check out and they told that wasn't available "you could stay for 25/30 min but not a min more" they said.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  My sincere apologies on the delay of your check-in and not extended your check-out time.  I will be following up with our Front Office team to ensure we are more thoughtful on how we handle these types of situations.  We would love another opportunity to showcase our service to you.  If your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, feel free to contact me directly for your reservations needs at 949-376-2759.  Sincerely,  Joanna Bear  General Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary Heading: 10+ visits, pool needs expansion and renovation
Summary: After many visits to the Surf and Sand, I believe this last visit will see us staying somewhere else next year. The property has a fabulous location right on the beach, but it seems they bank everything on their location and therefore don't tend to the issues that need to be addressed. Every summer the pool and hot tub is over run with people and kids because the hotel is at full capacity. The pool area is simply too small to accommodate the number of adults and kids who want to use the area. It does appear that there is room to reconfigure the space and renovate but the Surf and Sand has not yet done so.   There isn't any air conditioning in most rooms and, even though they are positioned on the beach, during our hottest months of August and September, the rooms become too hot
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Your feedback is very much appreciated.  And as a repeat guest, please accept my sincere apologies for the lack of space in the pool area, lack of air conditioning and the sense of dated bathrooms.    I appreciate your compliments regarding breakfast burrito/pancakes offering  and we discuss with our team about having it daily for next summer.  Also, note that we are working through bathroom upgrades and do anticipate an improved product in the near future.  When your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, we do hope you think of Surf & Sand!  Sincerely,  Joanna Bear General Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: We were hoping for a wonderful anniversary trip. We checked into this place with high hopes. We were early and told we could wait for a room on a floor we desired. We waited 5 hours and were sent to the room that was originally available. First floor, a step from the restaurant. We voiced our displeasure and were sent to a second floor room. We drug our luggage there only to open the door to a couple already occupying the room. They had just arrived and were startled by the fact we were able to barge into their room! Since then we have spent a single night and the bad service has not subsided. We were not served at the beach, not served at the pool, and it took 3 calls and 3 hours to get ice  from the bell desk (the only option for ice here). We are canceling our next two nights
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize profusely for your negative experience. Being issued an occupied room is certainly not the way we do business here and is mortifying. Additionally, being issued the wrong room to begin with must have been extremely frustrating.   The lack of service you experienced throughout your stay is truly out of character. Please know that your comments will be shared with our entire management team so we can seek ways of improvement. I am very sorry for all of this.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I am at the hotel as I write this and I would just say don't stay here. The service is not even close to what it should be at this price point. We had 4 nights booked and gave it a chance, but are leaving after 2 nights.  At check in, we were given the option to wait for a room on a higher floor. After waiting 5 hours we were put back in the room that was available earlier, first floor, right beside the restaurant.  After informing the staff of our displeasure we were redirected to a different room. At that point it was 30 minutes past check in and we walked into an occupied room. All in all it took 7 hours for us to get a room. The bad service has not subsided and there are no expectations that have been met at this point. The restaurant was great, but the service at the pool,

An excellent resort right on the Pacific Ocean!  Some of the best ocean views I have every experienced. Close to restaurants and shopping.  Overall a great experience!  I will definitely return, for both work and pleasure.

Before our stay last week at Surf and Sand I saw some reviews that were not as good as usual.  Surf and Sand has been a favorite get away of our for over 20 years and the thought of things going down hill was disturbing!  NOT TO WORRY, if anything, the service, facilities condition and staff were even better than before...and that's saying a lot.  We never encountered a staff member without a smile and greeting, if you had a question or concern it was dealt with promptly, efficiently and with a smile.  I have said before that it was not be the least expensive resort on the PCH, but it's well worth the $$$ and you definitely get what you pay for!!!  We will continue to return!

So this is a great pls e to stay focused you are in Laguna .. Nice shops .. Great restaurant .. Lovely pool great place to take kids or with out kids ...Also the views are amazing  My only problem is its too close to the crashing waves.. And I mean crashing !!! At night they can be a little ( well a lot ) distracting for sleep ..ask for a room on the top or the corners   And the lower  rooms feel like your going to slip into the surf ..
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your comments and compliments regarding our resort.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed the local area, Splashes restaurant and pool area.    My apologies about the noise caused by the crashing waves.  We do offer ear plugs for those guests that are not accustomed to hearing the ocean.  When your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, we do hope you think of Surf & Sand!  Sincerely,  Joanna Bear General Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: Check in time was 4pm and we drove down from LA for 2 hours and arrived at 1:30.  Prior to 4PM I checked in twice and the room was not ready yet.  At 4 PM the room still was not ready.  They remedied it with an appetizer and 2 drinks at a $700 a night resort.  I was already annoyed and hangry at that time so I just let it slide.  We were in town for only 3 nights and we did not appreciate the delay.    The room was a bit dated however you're definitely not there for the room.  The ocean breeze, sunsets, views and relaxation was amazing.    Bed was large, clean and comfortable.  The room was quite large for a hotel room as well.  TV was modern and had a wide selection of programming to watch.  I definitely did not think the $659 per night cost and $30 a night   What made my stay
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your recent stay at Surf & Sand Resort.  My sincere apologies for not only failing to meet our standard of guaranteed check-in time, but also for the inconvenience this caused you, our guest.  I am pleased to see your compliments regarding our views, bed and TV in our guestrooms.  Also, please note, our rates do fluctuate during the year, particularly outside of the summer season.  When your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, we do hope you think of returning to Surf & Sand Resort!  Sincerely,  Joanna Bear General Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: Best hotel, staff, location, amenities, rooms and view!  Walk around, free trolley service- beautiful place!  Gorgeous area, spend a little more for hotel so worth what you get!!! LOVED. GOING BACK! Best hotel of the 6 we had during out trip.
Manager Response: Dear Bklyn,  Thank you so much for this 5 star review! We are honored to be the best out of the 6 hotels you visited! I will share this success with our team so we can celebrate.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This place has been the same for over a decade. Awesome views and killer bar in the heart of Laguna Beach. As peaceful as it gets usually.   My only complaint was we had a room above the swim pool. It was so noisy. I wish they would highlight when booking that those block of rooms are for females with children. Just no fun hearing screaming kids all day and into the evening.   That said we will be back just will make sure we pay close attention to where our room will be!!!

loved it, just FYI, I believe if you stay in a room above the 2nd floor, you don't have ac in the room. we slept with the window open. we had a great time. hope to return one day, again.loved the beach. I wish they played music by the pool. great margaritas by the pool.

Summary Heading: Can't get closer to the beach in this beautiful hoteliers
Summary: An absolutely perfect hotel the rooms in the Surfside had amazing views and the sound of the crashing waves at night lulled us to sleep!  So not only was the room beautiful and perfect everyone of the employees could not have been more friendly and helpful especially the concierge Kathleen and all of the valets. If you visit Laguna in the Summer months the free trolley is the best idea this city has come up with. We will definitely be back in the future for, hopefully another perfect romantic vacation.
Manager Response: Dear Sherri,  We are glad you had a perfect romantic weekend. We can't wait to host your stay again.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Location and amenities were perfect. Beds were comfortable, there were good working fridge in the room and coffee maker. Knowing the sliding doors can be left open and have the ocean breeze come in the room, it would still be nice if the aircondition was working good. It was nice to sleep hearing the ocean and waves slamming on the shore. There was a night everyone can make smores by the lobby. Customer service is an A+ and theres a few restaurants in walking distance to eat at.

Spent a few days at this beautiful hotel!  Gorgeous views!  Amazing staff!  Comfy cozy rooms!  Delicious food and drinks!   Service is impeccable!   Great place for pleasure, a wedding, or a meeting!   They work hard to accommodate whatever your needs are!    Wonderful, relaxing spa!   Great coffee & gift shop!     I have been coming here for years and every visit is amazing!     We can walk to and from downtown and it is so enjoyable!   (About 2 mi).   But the trolley is across the street if you can't walk!   But then you will miss all the cute shops and restaurants along the way!  Wonderful place to stay!   I always request an ocean view!     Be sure to tell the hotel if you require an elevator as they are not in every building.   We walk a lot so no problem for us.   But be

I highly recommend the Surf and Sand in Laguna. Gorgeous views. Lovely staff. Great bar!  Easy check in. Most beautiful view of the Pacific Ocean from rooms, restaurants and bars.  Will definitely stay there again. Great for business and family.

We stayed here numerous times and have never been disappointed. The rooms are just the right size and amenities first class. The lack of air conditioning is not a factor since the ocean breezes cool your room with amazing ease. Highly recommended.

I cannot speak highly enough of my stay at the Surf & Sand resort.  Gorgeous location, spotless hotel and fantastic service.  Everyone I dealt with was friendly and helpful without being obsequious.  I had a lovely trip and can't wait to get back to this wonderful hotel.

From the moment we walked in to the time we left, we felt like we were special. The Penthouse Suite is one of the nicest places I have ever stayed and I am a global traveler. It was clean, well kept, an astounding view of the beach and ocean, yet quite. I would recommend this to ANYONE. Best Ever 5 Star Resort.

No air conditioning, run down decor, dirty cloudy pool filled with sand and plastic bar cups, hotel room toilets back up with feces and sulfur water from the taps. Stay anywhere but here. The view is amazing from a high up room but that's all this hotel has going for it.

Summary Heading: A Magical Hotel on the Sea
Summary: This was a magical time. Pure magic. My husband & I are new parents and we had such a wonderful and restful visit.  The rooms are gorgeous and they are right on the beach. We stayed in a Surfside King & would choose this room every time. At night, when the tide is up, if you look out your window, it seems like you are floating out to sea. The stars & moon reflecting on the ocean is all that we could see when we looked outside. I can't rave enough about the view. It is unbeatable. I'd like to address the no AC complaint - while slightly "humid" during the day, at night when you sleep, you don't even notice the lack of AC. They provide each room with a very powerful fan in addition to a ceiling fan. In fact, my husband & I were a bit chilly since we slept with the door open so we

In short, a great spot but disappoints on service and management.  My family of 4 (2 teenage boys) stayed at the Surf & Sand for 6 days in early August. We had never before stayed at this property, but used to live in Newport Beach and were familiar with it and the surrounding area. We reserved 2 adjoining rooms in the main towers building.  Arrived for checkin early (slightly after noon) and stored our bags with the valet. The front desk said our rooms were not ready (as expected) and that we would receive a text when they were available. Normal checkin time is 4:00. Checked back at  the front desk at 3 and was told the rooms were still not available. At 4 I went to the front desk for a 2nd time asking about the rooms. After what seemed like forever, finally received a text at
Manager Response: Dear OmahaMP,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide such detailed feedback. It is very disheartening to read that your stay was not perfect. I understand that we have already discussed the stay, but I feel terrible that we were not able to turn things around while you were here on property.   I do hope that you will reconsider visiting again, as I am positive we could give you an absolutely flawless stay. Please do not hesitate to reach out to me personally on the email address I provided in an earlier response. It will be my pleasure to oversee any future accommodations personally to ensure absolute perfection.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I had a decent time @ Sand & Surf, but I expected better.  I ultimately think the resort is overpriced for what you get, but it definitely offers above standard accommodations in a great location.
