The good:   Location (not RIGHT in the thick of it, but that's good - less crowded).  Located within walking distance of all the hot spots, and it's RIGHT on the beach with private access.   Bed + linens: Like a cloud!  Couldn't have asked for better.   Gym: Better than typical - decent amount of equipment.    Room: Gorgeous, ocean front   The bad: Parking - ridiculous that they require $30/night valet - this is not on their website (or is hidden) nor is it even on this TripAdvisor page.  I disputed and they did take off.    A/C - there is no A/C!  A lot of other reviewers have
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand Resort.    Your feedback about the location, gym, bed and linens are appreciated.  My apologies for the disappointment with the friendliness of the team, valet parking fees and lack of A/C.  Your comments will be shared amongst the entire management team, and follow up training will be prioritized.  Please know that when your travels bring you back to Laguna Beach, we would love another opportunity to have you experience Surf & Sand Resort.  Sincerely,  Joanna Bear General Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: Surf & Sand was a pleasant surprise! The hotel was recommended to us by a friend. We loved the location because it was halfway between the Montage and main beach Laguna. Upon our arrival, a cheese board was deliver with a welcome message from management. Our view of the ocean was breathtaking. We will definitely return because of the impeccable service of the hotel staff  and simple beauty of the facility. Guests need to be forewarned that there is no air conditioning in the rooms. A box fan was supplied, but not really ample for cooling. The hotel is so pretty and staff so friendly that the a/c problem was easy to overlook. We will return.

This place is beautiful settled on the beach in Laguna.  I had a room on the lower level and the ocean was right outside my deck.  Although this place isn't new, they put a lot of care and the rooms and grounds are very well maintained. Breakfast options at the restaurant on the property were great!  Although I traveled her because of a company meeting I would certainly come back with my husband!

The property is very well positioned.  The hotel is clean and well kept.  The front-desk service has a lot to be desired though, both on check-in and check-out.  They do not put themselves in the shoes of the customer who is likely paying $300 - 400/night.  They sent me to the bar when my room was not ready at nearly 4:00 in the afternoon on check-in.  The bar was so crowded, I could not find a seat, and no one was there to help.  On Check-out, the front-desk clerk was on the phone and didn't acknowledge my presence.  I had to leave a note to have her send me my receipt.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand Resort.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations during your front desk and bar experiences.  Also, thank you for your compliments regarding our location and cleanliness.  Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   When your travels bring your back to Laguna Beach, please feel free to contact directly at 949-376-2759, or jbear@jcresorts.com.  We would love another opportunity to showcase our services levels we pride ourselves on.  Sincerely,  Joanna Bear General Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: Our King Superior - Deluxe Towers room was very pleasant.  Newly decorated in light beachy colors and decor.  The bed and pillows were comfortable.  There is no air conditioning in the rooms, which I suspect is not a problem most of the time, assuming you are willing to have the sliders to the balcony open at night.  There was a strong, fresh ocean breeze when we were there - delightful.  There is also a ceiling fan in the room.  The room was plenty large enough for two people to spread out.  Our room was not ready until about 5:20 or 5:30 -- checkin is stated as 4:00pm.    From the outside, the property has the feel of a 1960's motel.  Inside, as I said, our room was lovely and we had no complaints at all.  Dinner was good;  we thought breakfast was just okay.

This boutique hotel sits right on the beach and is beautifully elegant. The entire staff was top notch and went above and beyond in making every effort to make our stay fantastic. They succeeded!   Room service arrived quickly and was delicious. We were able to sit on our balcony and enjoy our ocean view sunset with our dinner.  Breakfast at the restaurant was also incredible. We had ordered for one person in our group that ended up not coming down for breakfast. When the manager noticed her food still sitting there he took it, made a fresh omelette and boxed it up for us to take to the room.  We tried telling him that wasn't necessary, but he insisted. Very sweet!! Every staff member we ran into was friendly and helpful.  After we left, we received a phone call from the hotel

We made a last minute booking for a quick overnight anniversary getaway. We knew the caliber of this hotel from visiting Laguna during our wedding and from visiting tripadvisor.com.  From the moment I called to book the room..because i saw the price on tripadvisor, but had a question and ususally when you call the hotel directly and speak to someone, it's a more personal experience and they usually give a little extra. I don't feel like just another IP address making a reservation. From the moment we arrived, we felt like royalty. The staff was polite and professional. Everything was taken care of, it was like we didn't have to have a care in the world. We arrived early to spend the day and our luggage wasn't even a second thought...they took care of us, quickly got us

Stayed 3 nights at Surf and Sand. Room was spacious for the 5 of us. View was good looking out to the sea but also roof of rooms below so not straight onto the beach. Breakfast was great as was the food in the bar which is fab sitting having a drink with waves crashing in. Gym was adequate. Customer service good. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. I am so very sorry the room was delayed upon your arrival. I am happy that the rest of our stay went smoothly. We will be sure to celebrate the success of our teammates, especially Kaeleena and the team at the pool and beach.  We hope to see you again!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Its my luck that there is a wedding party going on..so when we got there at 4pm to check in, its so crowded at the lobby and the room is not ready yet. I was able to check-in at 530pm.   Room:  Got the 2nd floor @ the seaview tower, the room is ok..keurig coffee maker..free water and all. I didnt really like the bed, its so bumpy..and yes..NO AC..we had the balcony open all night ..and ceiling fan blasting...still hot..you need to request extra fan to cool the room. This room is overlooking the pool so if you want more privacy while hanging out at the balcony...this is not the tower or room for you however if you want easy access to the pool or beach..then you got this right.  Pool and Beach: Pool is good size..jacuzzi is nice. Clean towel, beach chairs and umbrella is provided.

Summary Heading: Amazing views of ocean and service was outstanding
Summary: We stayed two nights and it was outstanding. The check in was great and they carried our bags to room. The room was very clean and our view of ocean was amazing. We had a small balcony overlooking the ocean. The pool area was a bit small and if your late getting to pool then Your not getting a chair. People come down early in the morning and place their towels on chairs to reserve the chairs. The service at the pool was great.

Great Gem of a hotel in the Laguna area. Have done the St Regis and Ritz Carlton in neighboring Dana Point but Surf and Sands beats them both. I spent the night with the patio door open listening to the sounds of crashing waves. Oozes romance in even the entry level rooms. A great staycation spot for Angelenos.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Experience- Best spot in Laguna Beach!
Summary: Surf and Sand is such a wonderful spot for a weekend getaway. We always refer it to friends and family. The service is so accommodating and personable. Beautiful views and rooms, delicious foods and libations. Our most memorable experience was at the at the outdoor bar by the main entrance. Fire pits, live music, fast service, and delicious bites. Our server Aaron was outstanding. He remember our names, our likes/dislikes, and always knew when it was time to check on us. Not to invasive, just friendly and efficient. We look forward to visiting him again soon!   5 Stars Overall!

I really enjoyed staying here.  The best part of the rooms were the balcony and being RIGHT on the oceanside.  The rooms have the beach shell vibe and are spacious with everything you need.  The service is what you would expect of a hotel like this, and have turndown service.  I thought the restaurant was good but not exceptional to match their prices.  The pool was nice, the seating area was a little crowded.  You can walk for lunches and dinners but the majority you would need to do a quick uber, which I easily was able to get there.  I would definitely come back.

I am sold on the Surf and Sand Resort and will stay again and again, it's truly a special spot with fabulous views, a great stretch of beachfront and can honestly say Surf and Sand Resort made my stay. Treat yourself.
Manager Response: We are so happy you decided to treat yourself to a stay with us! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: new favorite place to stay in the Laguna/Newport area
Summary: We have read often about this hotel on TripAdvisor, but finally decided to stay there for a night on our last trip.  We absolutely loved it.. we were in the Ocean Tower and loved hearing the sound of the surf all night. The room was spacious and simply beautiful and there were very nice bed linens, which is a must for staying anywhere these days.  We have often eaten at Splashes or in the bar, but this time we did it all again, plus we walked to the Pageant of the Masters... the hotel is in a great location if you enjoy the galleries, shopping and restaurant choices. Our children are grown now, but it would be a great place for families since you are right on the ocean...very accommodating hotel and they have thought of many nice ways to make you feel at home, like the morning

Summary Heading: Another delightful stay at The surf and Sand
Summary: My wife and I visited the property the second week in July.  We have been regulars, trying to visit at least once per year (and often twice) since 1995. As usual, our stay could not have been better.  The friendliness of the staff (and this includes valet, bellmen, concierge, front desk agents, housekeeping) is unparalleled as is their desire to assure all needs are being fulfilled. We were given the exact room we requested which was ready, and immaculate, upon our arrival prior to the 4 p.m. check-in.  For five star comfort and service, as well as beach/ocean access, there is no finer resort in Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for being such a loyal guest! We are happy to hear your recent stay was fabulous and cannot wait to provide you with another flawless stay in the future. We hope you will visit us as often as you can! We hope to see you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Me, my wife and 3 teenagers stayed here in July. We had an amazing time. Breakfast was excellent especially the bread less eggs Benedict. Service was outstanding. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was the furniture was slightly outdated. Adds to the charm though.

We recently enjoyed a long weekend here. The room was ready on time and was clean, neat and in good repair. There was a wedding scheduled on the Friday we checked in so the hotel/etc. was busy. However, all of the employees were attentive and friendly. The beach chairs/umbrellas set up was good but because it's a public beach, people who aren't guests of the hotel can get chairs/umbrellas reserved for guests...which results in a shortage for the paying guests. There should be some method (e.g., wristband) that identifies guests so the beach employees can reserve them. We chose not to eat in the hotel because the area has so many great place to dine. However, my one complaint involves the room's air conditioning OR LACK THEREOF. I was paying over $700/night for this room and

The architecture and decor effortlessly reflect the color and feel of the surf and the the sand. Third stay here, so prepared for the hot nights (no air conditioning) and the loud boom of the surf at night. Pricier than previous stays without nay noticeable improvement in amenities or service. Splashes is always a treat. The resort was quite crowded and the pool area is particularly tight to move around in. All the rooms have full ocean view, though the tower is the best - floor 5 upwards!

Cons- To start off our stay,I checked in at the front desk to find that they had given our room away - and only had one king bed between the four of us.  I was not amused after a horrible drive from LA üò´. We got to our room to find that only four rooms in the hotel actually have air-conditioning -ours was not one of them-did I mention it was hot as  hell üî•.  I immediately  opened the sliding doors (which were completely rusted and didn't even lock)-to find a breeze on the balcony which did not come into the room.  There was also wooden shutters in front of the sliding glass doors-the hardware was completely rusted the kept falling off the rail.  They were also very warped and a lot of light came in ,in the morning.  Pros-  The people at the hotel were very friendly - cleaning
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   The poor condition of some of the items in your guest room is unacceptable. I am very sorry you experienced this. Additionally, I apologize for the lack of AC. I do encourage you to visit us in the off season, when the hotel is much quieter and the rooms are much cooler.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This place is amazing, the service is outstanding and the views are incredible!  The upstairs bar is amazing, the best server EVER works their Aaron, he is so kind and will do anything for you also Splashes the restaurant and bar are amazing (food and drinks very good) Not a bad view at this hotel and the pool is so fun! I would stay here again anytime!

We stayed in the Surfside King room, which was private, comfy, and the most amazing view of the ocean.  The restaurant, Splashes has very tasty food and the service is above and beyond.  We made reservations for dinner with a view and upon arrival we were seating quickly and the view did not disappoint.  I would highly recommend anyone looking for a relaxing vacation, a family trip, or romantic getaway, Surf and Sand Resort is amazing!

Summary Heading: Nice place but could use some maintenance
Summary: This is a nice hotel. The Beach view is awesome. The restaurant at the hotel has very good food. The staff is also very friendly. I just have two concerns. The first is valet parking at the hotel. It costs  $30 a night to park your car.  Valet is the only parking available. plus the valet attendants want a tip every time you pick up or drop off your car. When I asked the valet attendant they claim that they received none of the $30 parking charge and when I asked inside the hotel they claimed the attendants  did receive the $30 parking charge. The second concern is the maintenance  of the room. The shower door would hit the toilet every time you open and close the shower door. I felt lucky that it did not knock the toilet off the floor.  The minibar and refrigerator are locked
Manager Response: Dear JakeBBailey,  Thank you so much for the review! On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for the maintenance concerns in your guest room. We appreciated you alerting us of the concerns so we can address them right away. Additionally, I apologize for your disappointment in our parking options. In Laguna Beach, parking is very limited which is why we only offer valet parking. The alternative would be street parking.   I am happy to read that you did enjoy your stay overall. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for just one night, but it was a fantastic experience. We tried for an early check in, but nothing was available. Misty at the front desk was kind and welcoming. She took my number so that they could text us as soon as a room was ready, We left our luggage with the porter and proceeded to the beach. In less than an hour we received a call saying the room was available. Long before the posted check in time. The porter brought our luggage up to our room and was also welcoming and we actually had a bit of a conversation. We were there primarily for the Pageant of the Masters show and he told us of the free shuttle that services Laguna. What a pleasure. When we came up to our room later there was an unexpected welcoming cheese platter with Pelegrino on ice.

This boutique property sits directly on the beach.   We were in the tower and the waves sounded like they might  crash right in our room!  Lovely d√©cor and attentive staff.  The pool was smaller than I anticipated and crowded so we stayed on the beach.

Our room was filled with light, the beach directly below and just sitting at the in-room desk writing in my journal, I hear the sounds of whales just outside.  When I gazed up, there they were directly in front of me.  It was a pure delight.  But the whole experience was just that a delight.  Comfortable yet elegant.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, great location, slightly pricey but worth it
Summary: Our family of four (kids aged 10 and 12 stayed here) stayed for four nights in mid July. It was busy as you would expect at this time of year however this did not affect our enjoyment.   This is a lovely "resort", compact but with everything you need on site. We did head out in the evenings for dinner based on good recommendations from the excellent concierge, though breakfast at the hotel's Splashes Restaurant was a lovely start to each day.   The location of the hotel is superb - at the quieter southern end of Laguna Beach but with easy access to the "centre" of town by taking one of the free trolley bus shuttles from the stop very close to the hotel.   The room - ours was in the "Tower" building- was lovely. I might have been less enthusiastic if we had a room immediately

We stayed at the Surf and Sand with our 3-month old baby during the weekend. We arrived late Friday night and got accompanied to our room. I was disappointed with their "Sea view" King bed, as all we could see (and hear!!) was the pool (so ask for upper floor!). When I called reception, they said that "sea view" was the name of the building, and didn't mean the room had a sea view (are you kidding?!).  That night, they were kids in the pool until 11pm, and then 3 drunk ladies again in the pool by 1 am who were part of the wedding. The next morning, I asked to change room and was offered a room on a higher floor. The service offered by the bellman Nich was incredible, as well as the beach staff. They work hard to set you up with chairs and umbrella, and always with a smile.  When
Manager Response: Dear Sophieetjulien,  On behalf of Surf & Sand, we apologize profusely for the mix up with your room rate. That must have been very frustrating and also caused a delay in your departure. Please know that this error was not done with ill intentions. We will use this as a training tool to ensure this does not happen again. Additionally, we apologize for the disappointment in the location of your first room. We are happy to read that you were able to move to a higher floor the following day.  Thank you so much for the kind words about the bell and beach team. Their successes will be celebrated!  If you do visit us again, feel free to reach out to the executive offices at 949-376-2761 for assistance.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Really?! I had actually visited SURF and Sand a couple times before. The first time was in April and the second time was in January. I didn't notice they didn't have AC those times because the weather was cool. For a hotel of this caliber to not have AC for the summer months was such a surprise! We liked the hotel and restaurant, but we're miserable in our room. In the mornings getting ready was sweaty. It was hard to blow dry our hair without dripping with sweat. In the evenings when the sun was streaming in it was very warm. At night you have to keep the sliding door open or you swelter. Crashing waves are great except when they are too loud to sleep. They were perfect with the door closed, but it was too hot until about 2:00 in the morning to do so. They were very nice to let
Manager Response: Dear Cindy H,   Thank you so much for your survey! We truly appreciate your repeat business. We apologize that the lack of AC made for an uncomfortable stay. We do hope you will visit us again in the cooler months so we can provide you with a flawless stay.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Our Wedding Anniversary to Celebrate Wedding July 31st 2013. We were married on our Balcony overlooking the Ocean in a Sunset Wedding... Gorgeous Views!!!! Most Beautiful Romantic Resort we have ever been to....loved it!!!!! üíñ We would recommend anyone to stay here for Couples get away or to get married here like we did! Loved the Beach & all the little surrounding bars & restaurants too!

After an exhausting year personally and professionally, my friend and I were looking for a perfect getaway that would be relaxing, close to home, and memorable.   We found it.  The Surf and Sand exceeded our expectations. Was it the sound of the crashing waves outside our door? Or the super comfortable bed with lots of pillows and fluffy comforter?  Calming ambiance?  From the guy who helped us with our umbrella at the beach to the kind, friendly check in, the Surf and Sand helped to accomplished our goal. We will return.

I only live 10 miles away and I stay at the Surf and Sand at least 3 times a year.  I love the whole layout of the resort.  I love that the pool has a jacuzzi.  I love how I can take breaks from the pool & go for a swim in the ocean.  All the rooms are amazing no matter where they place us.  The food is always top notch.  The spa is incredible.  Everytime I go, I think I should just sell my house & move in here.  Total paradise!  Can't wait til next time.

Summary Heading: Great Stay - Just what we needed
Summary: only a quick one night stay whilst in town after conference, our room was right over the pacific ocean, we left our balcony door open all night and had the best night sleep ever listening to the ocean and plenty of fresh air. the food in the restaurant was delicious, our room was great and my daughter who was 12 had a blast in the ocean surf

The moment we pulled up to valet to the moment we left, every single staff member is amazing, very helpful and the place is always in pristine condition, I want to thank Kaleena at the front desk for going above and beyond her duties and making our stay the best ever, every single request I made was done promptly and efficiently, people like her makes us keep coming back.. What an incredible vacation.. Till next year.. Will never stay anywhere else in Laguna except Surf and Sand, I'm so glad we made it a tradition to find a way to get there every year..
Manager Response: Dear RKast,  Thank you for this amazing review! We look forward to seeing you each and every time you need a place to stay in Laguna.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: My wife and I went here for our anniversary for the first time and will make this a annual visit. The food was delicious, the views were breathtaking , and the service was phenomenal. Thank you Laguna Surf and Sand for such a memorable anniversary, especially Stephanie M at the front desk. She was incredibly sweet and made sure our anniversary trip was one to remember!
Manager Response: We are so happy you enjoyed your time here! We will see you next year, if not before.

Summary: The location is great. Right on the sand, you can hear the waves crashing.  We were able to take walks on the beach that were lovely. The hotel is slightly tired; metal around windows had rust , but is otherwise nicely furnished and appointed. The restaurant food was very good and the setting again overlooked the beach.  We would return to the restaurant for dinner. Overall, a star or two down from the Montage, but excellent value for the money.

The best hotel in Laguna Beach! Location is the best, service is great, splashes has GREAT food. Thanks Kimmy at splashes. No need to leave the hotel because it's all right there. Beach, pool, view and great food!

I really had a wonderful stay overall but I didn't feel like the price was equivalent to the experience. They try really hard to create a beautiful upscale experience but the layout of the hotel feels crampt.  I think they certainly do a great job of trying to fight against it though and I mean that in the best way possible.  Here are my thoughts: I really liked the staff. They make you feel special.  Except for when I didn't get much of a late check out when I asked for one (on a Monday morning).   The rooms are pretty.   They are small but pretty.  View of the ocean rooms is incredible but not private because the beach is packed with people very close to the rooms.  They don't have air conditioning.   The bathrooms are just OK. The shower/tub was very small and was designed
Manager Response: Dear Tanyamemme,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter, cooler and we have the ability to offer more economical rates.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We were recommended this resort hotel as the best place to stay in Laguna Beach - however, from our arrival for 3 nights until our departure, we were left hugely disappointed. The hotel was very busy, and only one of our rooms was ready on arrival - we were directed to the restaurant for somewhere to wait, only to be told they were "in transition", so instead were shown to an overcrowded bar where disinterested  to staff told us to wait. The main hotel route to the beach was through the restaurant, where soggy sandy bathers mixed with people trying to have their relaxing meal. When our rooms were finally ready, one was on the ground floor next to kitchen staff serving up for a function outside the room - the other room still had left over food on the balcony. We asked to be
Manager Response: Dear 435stephenj,  On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize profusely for your negative experiences. In reading your survey, I became very disheartened. It is embarrassing to read that so many things went wrong during your stay. I truly cannot apologize enough for all of this. Please know that your experiences are out of the ordinary. We pride ourselves in the personal services we provide for our guests, but it is clear we failed to do this during your stay.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter, cooler and we have the ability to offer more economical rates. I can assure you, we can provide you with a much more pleasant, and personalized stay in the future.   If you do opt to visit the area again, please do not hesitate to reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Very friendly staff and you can not beat the view. Great getaway for someone who live only 30 miles from the location makes you feel as if your in paradise for a second! I would definitely recommend this place to friends and family!! A+++
Manager Response: Dear Roberto P,  What a wonderful review! Thank you so much. We look forward to your next visit. We will provide you with an A++++ experience the next time!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I celebrated a friend's birthday at the Surf & Sand.  Stayed in the penthouse - fantastic white-water and sand ocean views, king-bed bedroom (with great ocean view), whirlpool bathroom, kitchen, dining area, second smaller bedroom, and main living room.  Great concierge service and excellent housekeeping service.  Dined on steak and birthday cake in the room - just to enjoy the beautiful sunset and ocean view.  Very private, well-appointed, and spacious for two people.  We had a splendid time!

We visited the hotel during a family vacation. The location is wonderful as you can easily walk to shopping and entrainment. The hotel sits on the beach so you only have to go downstairs to access the Pacific Ocean. There is a medium sized pool and a jacuzzi that was dominated by toddlers for some reason. But we easily found chairs there and more comfortably found some peace at the beach.   The view from our room was spectacular and I definitely suggest requesting an ocean view. We had a great terrace that we all used many times to watch the ocean, the sunrise and sunsets. Our only issue with the room was there is no AC so you need to keep the door to the outside open. Since the ocean is so close it was pretty loud after a while to hear the waves crashing. The ceiling fan helped
Manager Response: Dear 383ww,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your Surf & Sand experience. We appreciate your kind words and are pleased to know that you have enjoyed yourself with us.  At the same time, we are sorry to hear that Splashes restaurant came up short. We would love to hear more about it. At your convenience, please reach out to our Director of Food & Beverage, Ante Dapic at 949 376 2758 or adapic@jcresorts.com.  We truly appreciate your feedback as it provides us an opportunity for improvements in ensuring guest experience is consistently wonderful.  Kindly,   Ante Dapic  Director of Food & Beverage

Summary: S&S is really wonderful with small children. We rotated from the beach to the pool throughout the day. The staff are so friendly and helpful. They clean the room twice a day, and provided a crib for my baby. We ate on-site many times and the food was really good. Also within walking distance are places off-site. We had a wonderful time and will certainly return in the future.

This resort on the oceans edge is so unique. It's thrilling to hear the water in the midst of such ccomfort. I've traveled extensively and if you enjoy the ocean this is it   Laguna is a marvelous beach community and this is the perfect place to stay

The hotel is beautiful and the location is perfect for moving around Laguna.  However , we stayed over a holiday weekend and it was chaos.  Lounge chairs spoken for at the pool by 6 am, a wedding, trash flaring in the pool..  We were even kicked out of the bar for the wedding "after party".  Would definitely go there again but nit over a holiday weekend .
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. The summer months, especially holiday weekends, in Laguna Beach are very busy and the resort is fully committed. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, and quieter.  Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Perfect location awesome hotel and restaurant
Summary: One of the best hotels in California right on the beach in posh, artsy but laid back Laguna beach. The restaurant is wonderful everything is delicious and the setting ...wow ...right on the sandy beach with the pacific ocean at your toes.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review. We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Can't beat the location and charm of this hotel right on the beach where you literally hear the waves pond the beach!!!  The bar is cozy and a hide out!!!  The beds are comfortable and the bathrooms just right!  You cannot go wrong here, if your date doesn't like it maybe it is time to find a new one!!  If you can't deal the deal here something is wrong with you!!!!!!

Summary Heading: Beautiful location but the hotel doorm is dated
Summary: We stayed for 2 nights and ordered room service for one night.  Best room service food ever.  Caesar Chicken Salad was so good.  The room looked a little tired and the hotel bar also looked tired.  The main restaurant is well maintained and the breakfast lemon ricotta pancakes are die for.  The service is excellent.

Excellent stay, gorgeous room RIGHT on the water. The ocean literally came right up to the building. Staff were super friendly and helpful, room was upgraded and bell staff was very cheerful to store our bags while room was being prepared. We loved the pool and the views. Didn't want to leave!
Manager Response: Dear Ellianne,  Come back! You don't ever have to leave. We hope to see you again soon. THANK YOU for such a wonderful review.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Cannot say enough great things about the SnS! The hotel staff and location make it the best of the best. Great food. Rooms all have amazing views. Some rooms are on the smaller side, and prices can get steep, but It's just the best and sometimes worth it. The beach in front is amazing. We like to go during off times for less crowds.
Manager Response: Dear Ash,  We are so happy to hear that we are your favorite Laguna getaway! We look forward to your next visit.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We loved our stay-cation at the Surf and Sand.  We will definitely return again for another little get away. The staff was friendly, kind and helpful.   We enjoyed our room and the view so much that we ordered pizza in for dinner.  (Gina's Pizza)

My sister, her three young boys and I all stayed together in one room and it was fantastic.  We had a crib and the room was good-sized and the beds were big (queens, rather than fulls).  The room was laid out really great for all of us.  The balcony view from our room was amazing!!  We looked right out onto the beach/high tide.  All staff were helpful and friendly, including the staff out on the beach. We had a stroller and there aren't many easily-accessible ramps so we carried the stroller up and down stairs most of the time.  But that was our only inconvenience.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  Thank you for visiting with the family. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time here. We hope to see you again!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: It is unbelievable to us that a hotel portrayed as luxury at $700+ a night, in a warm/hot summer climate, has NO AIR CONDITIONING?!!  Worse yet, customers are not informed of this in advance.  After one miserable night's sleep in the oven of our room, our family of 5 said goodbye to S&S for a much more comfortable stay down the road at Montage resort.  For our troubles , we got a $50 early check-out fee added to our bill by S&S and not one question from the front desk staff about why we were leaving and going to Montage.  A room with an ocean view is lovely, but not if you can't relax & unwind in it or get a cool & comfortable nights sleep! Travelers be warned....The S&S should be called B&S -- "Bait & Switch".  üòí
Manager Response: Dear TNHens,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed.We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter, cooler and we have the ability to offer more economical rates.   Additionally, I cannot apologize enough about the early departure fee. When you have a moment, I would love the opportunity to make this right by you. I would need to know the first and last name on the reservation. Please give the hotel a call and ask to speak to the front office supervisor on duty so we can assist you.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: A wonderful place to enjoy the surf, sand, and ocean
Summary: We stayed at the Surf and Sand in Laguna Beach for two nights in June, 2016.  This is a first class hotel in every way.  We stayed in a ‚ÄúSurf Side‚Äù room on the lowest level, which was very much the right choice. The Surf and Sand has three basic categories of rooms ‚Äì ‚ÄúOcean View‚Äù, in which the ocean is viewed by looking over some intervening structures, ‚ÄúSurf Side‚Äù, which is right on the beach and approximately only 30 yards from the edge of the surf, and ‚ÄúTower‚Äù, which is also on the beach with larger rooms and generally higher over the ocean.  From our point-of-view, the Surf Side rooms are by far the best bargain, being priced just a little higher than the basic Ocean View rooms and priced much less than the Tower rooms.  The Surf Side rooms are in a single wing of the hotel,

We got a tower room directly overlooking the beach, and really felt like it was just us and the crashing waves.  The bed was luxurious; the decor was light and beachy.  The staff were all very friendly.  A great getaway spot.

Summary Heading: A bit aged but still graceful
Summary: The resort is literally on the beach with lovely ocean views. Room are spacious with comfortable beds and amenities in line with a 4-star hotel. There is no air conditioning in the property which is generally fine but I was a bit warm overnight in the room even with the fan on and window open. The "sound of the waves" worked for me but it may be disturbing to some so bring ear plugs.

Stayed here during Memorial Day Weekend for 1 night.. Excellent and friendly staff especially Kevin at the front desk. The views are spectacular and the service is always top notch. Will be back soon!

Summary Heading: Room was great, Bell service need to grow up.
Summary: Bell Service is a bit immature, but the rooms I rented two, one for my wife and I and one for my daughter and her boyfriend. walk out terrace was a plus. The beach area is awesome, if you want  a quit and secluded beach area this is the place.

In April we stayed at the resort and had a wonderful time with the exception of a few minor situations. Once the hotel found out about the minor issues they went out of their way to make it right for us. We came back and stayed with them again and again had a wonderful time. It is nice to see a resort stay so dedicated to the ultimate experience and not accept anything less than perfect.

The Surf and Sand is just an incredible resort. Our oceanfront room had amazing views and the room itself was pure luxury. We loved seeing a whale, dolphins, and pelicans from our balcony. We spent most of our time at the hotel because we wanted to enjoy this resort as much as possible.

We have been coming to the Surf and Sand for 29 years and we love it just as much now as we did when we first found it.  The staff is wonderful and welcoming and the hotel is always clean and beautiful.  We look forward to booking next year - our 30th year!

We are checking in today since 12 pm We requested a high floor room and we were told we would be given one when it is ready. We were texted after spending an hour in town that room was ready. When we came back we were told that manager had moved us to first floor instead! So here we are ,waiting again  No clear directions to hotel lay out either  No common courtesies about the snafu on check in Let's see how this goes but does not look promising so far
Manager Response: Dear Madhukar16,  We are incredibly sorry about the mix up in your room location request. We do also apologize for the delay in arrival. Many days throughout the summer, it will be very challenging to check in early. When you did finally receive that room, it should have been as requested. We do apologize! I hope the stay ended up wonderful. We hope to see you again!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I've stayed here a few times and really love this property. This time, our room really showed its age. The window sliding door really didn't slide much anymore (my wife was unable to open it), the outdoor furniture was rusty, and the concrete/stucco of the balcony was falling apart, exposing rebar. I understand that the marine exposure can be deleterious to any dwelling, but when you're spending $800/night, you expect maintenance to be on point!  The room decor was dated, the carpets dated too.  On the positive side, the pool and beach are still amazing, the pool service and new towels were much appreciated.  Oh also, why charge a $15 resort charge and then tack on a $30 parking charge? Just ludicrous, honestly, when paying such a premium for lodging!
Manager Response: Dear Deredye,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. You are right, being an ocean front property does take its toll but there is no reason the room should not be spectacular for your arrival! It is very evident that some maintenance must be done in the room you stayed in. I apologize for your experience. I do hope you will visit us again so we can provide you with a flawless stay, which is what you have come to expect from Surf & Sand. Please feel free to reach out to our executive offices directly for any future bookings. They can be reached at 949-376-2761 .  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The view and location can't be beat.  But the place was packed and unable to handle the crowd well - it took 20 minutes just to get my car to the valet guy.  Had to take my own bags to the room.  My room was supposed to have been changed to a lesser priced room but they had no record of such a phone conversation because it was done via a call to the front desk rather than through reservations where calls are recorded so I spent way too much on a room in the newer/nicer tower that had paint peeling off the walls and doors and no air conditioning.  The food at splashes was great. Beach service was awesome - they set you up with chairs and umbrellas and you can even order food down there. Stay away from the pool - packed and dirty. I was afraid to touch the curtains that close off
Manager Response: Dear Marcie S,   On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for your negative experiences. I would love the opportunity to discuss them with you personally. If you have a moment, please call me directly at 949-376-2778.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I was here for a company function having won a weekend as a sales prize. My prize was a second story room overlooking the noisy restaurant in a room dinged up and aged, small, with only a shower. No view.
Manager Response: Dear Susan R,  On behalf of Surf & Sand, I am very sorry for your negative experience. We pride ourselves in the quality products and services we provide for our guests. It is very disappointing to know that we did not exceed your expectations. Please know that we do have three buildings with guest rooms in them. The two that are ocean front are called our Surfside and our Towers building. If you ever want to guarantee an ocean front view, please be sure to book one of these rooms. Again, I apologize for your disappointment. I do hope you will visit us again so we can provide you with a flawless stay!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I would just like people to know that most rooms in the hotel do not have air conditioning. I was not made aware of this by the person that I made a phone reservation with. Regarding the general hotel: I think it is extremely overpriced for what they offer. With these rates there should be AC in every room and better, cleaner rooms and grounds. The pool is pretty small and not very nice. Their marketing team seems to make the hotel much more appealing than it actually is in reality.
Manager Response: Dear Issac B,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I have stayed at the Surf and Sand many times over the past ten years or so, and recommend it highly.  The location cannot be beat---right on the ocean, right on the beach.  Walk out the door of your room, turn the corner, a few steps and you are on the beach.  The rooms themselves are exceedingly comfortable.  The staff is uniformly friendly and helpful.  The Concierage service is first rate.  The food is good---I think the main restaurant is a bit over priced, but that's not a major complaint.  They will set up umbrellas and chairs for you on the beach, and come by so you can order food and drinks.  I really can't recommend this highly enough if what you want is to relax on the beach in very comfortable surroundings, and attentive staff.

We stayed here for my 50th birthday and had a wonderful time! The weekend we were there was exceptionally hot, and it was nice to be able to sleep with the sliding glass doors open to the waves crashing below. We spent the evening in the bar and the bartender was so nice. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for a special place to stay in Laguna Beach.

I had driven by this hotel a few times over the years and never even really gave it a second glance. But recently I had to stay here because I was in town for a conference - and I have to say it's not a place I will soon forget!   The views are stunning. The location is perfect - not tucked away, but in the middle of everything Laguna has to offer, yet once you're on the property, you feel like you're in a different world. My room was not ready till later in the day, which by the time I did get my room, I only had a moment to drop off my stuff and get ready for dinner. The minute I opened the door to the room, I was floored - the sounds of the crashing waves, the view of the water - were mesmerizing. The room was spacious and nicely appointed - it felt like the whole room was

Summary Heading: Amazing View & Great Stay....With Some Caveats
Summary: This place is hands down the most impressive location as far as proximity to the beach as you can get....the waves are so loud they put in earplugs and I could see why. But man, if you want the ocean front experience this is the place and you will love Laguna if you haven't been there!  Our room was nice. It was a little dated but we were perched on the top floor of the newer tower and overall it was very cozy. Balcony was awesome with outdoor furniture so you could enjoy the views for miles. Very comfortable bed, too! You will sleep like a baby.   Here are some additional thoughts and experiences:  For longer stays, there is no microwave and the fridge is cluttered with pay-for snacks, so don't plan on storing too much if you are there for 6 days like we were. We knew that

I stayed here for two nights for a business meeting. My room was comfortable and the staff was very friendly. The views and sounds of the ocean were amazing!! Be sure to get an ocean view room! If you're a surfer, the waves are huge right in front of the hotel. The meals I had here were delicious!

The view from our balcony was stunning! It seemed like the room was over the ocean! We had a corner room on an upper floor which was very private. The food was excellent! We went in March so the lack of AC didn't bother us at all. Would definitely go again!

Had a great time. Great view. Got upgraded for by birthday to a room right on the ocean with amazing view and balcony. Had great Sunday breakfast of pancakes and breakfast burritos looking at the ocean. Would come again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Happy Belated Birthday! Thank you for spending it with us.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This hotel was just beautiful.  The staff was amazing. Every sine one that we seen made contact with us, asked how we were doing, if we needed anything and then told us to have a great day. Very impressive
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you so much for the review! We are happy to serve our guests and welcome you back to the property any time. Thank you for staying with us!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Great restaurant, beautiful views, heated pool. Come when its cool as there is no AC, service a little weird
Summary: At first I felt iffy when we first arrived at the resort. Check in time was at 4 pm, but check in was busy having to fend off disgruntled guests as the rooms were still not ready. When asked why check in was not ready when it stated 4 pm, the response was its not guaranteed. Really? So if I check out an hour after check out time because its not guaranteed do I still get charged? I felt sorry for the guy infront of me that had just flown a transcontinental flight and was pleading about how tired he was. However we did get free drink and food coupons to make up for our wait.  The room was clean and nice. I would definitely recommend a room on a higher floor. The restaurant and bar was delicious and it was very relaxing being able to be indoors yet enjoy the setting sun and the

I moved to this resort after my disappointment with another hotel close by.  Same pricing and the difference was night and day.  Absolute perfection from the staff to the cleanliness of the rooms.  Quality all around!

Summary Heading: Gorgeous room with breathtaking ocean view!
Summary: It isn't often that you can stay in such a beautiful room that feels large, private, and directly overlooking the ocean. It is just heavenly!  We were the only ones at the spa while we were there which was very nice, as well!

We live in Southern California and just wanted to get away for a few days... we mistakenly mixed up our dates and were a day late checking in. Originally we were told our room had been given to another guest and they would not be able to accommodate us or give us any refund...Feeling frustrated we talked with a manager and they were able to give us a King bed room instead of the 2 queen beds we had reserved and a rollaway for the first night and then moved us to the 2 queen room the next night. Also they refunded us the night we didn't show up. My husband and I were both so appreciative and surprised at their excellent customer service. We were not expecting them to be so understanding, especially since it was our mistake. Everyone we encountered were so helpful and nice! I was
Manager Response: Dear Paul & Sally,  Thank you so much for this incredible review. We are happy you were able to enjoy your staycation with the kids. We look forward to seeing you again!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We spent three nights here in April, weather was kind so we could keep the sliding balcony doors open overnight to hear the ocean. We really enjoyed our second stay here, the first in 2011.The hotel seemed to have had a make over as it seemed much brighter than we remembered. Spent our time walking on the beach and strolling into Laguna town centre.

A family friendly hotel located on Laguna Beach. Hotel,provides direct access to the beach and is walking distance from restaurants, bars and shops.  Great ocean views and a nice heated pool. Service was a little indifferent through out the hotel. Room service was prompt and good for breakfast in bed!

I arrived the day after Labor Day, and my room wasn't ready at 4:30 (4:00 check-in.) I was given vouchers for a free cocktail and a free appetizer in the bar, about a $40 value. I was impressed. They texted me when my room was ready. I couldn't figure out how to use my room key and waited about 10 minutes to flag someone down. It's a new thing (to me) where you run your card over a sensor! Housekeeping brought 2 bottles of water. The honor bar was in 2 parts: the fridge on the bottom, and the liquor on a shelf literally 7 feet off the ground. I'm 5'2" and had to stand on a chair.  The hotel has been there forever; I've stayed there before, but not in many years. The bathrooms are upgraded with dual sinks, but still a shower-over-tub. The rooms was relatively small. I had a

Summary Heading: More like poor service and bland
Summary: Stayed here for two nights - sounds a great place but $800 is not great value when you consider items such as rooms not ready when checking in at 5pm.  So a free drink in the bar was the "payoff" - really? Having then said they would text me to inform me when it would be ready and then didn't, I eventually got into a room at 11 pm because I had to go out for a business meeting which having flown long haul from Europe and then not able to shower etc was embarrassing for me and my host. I will go back to Laguna but this hotel?  Needs to improve big style!
Manager Response: Dear Duane W,  On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for your frustrations with your recent stay. It certainly is not ideal to have your room become ready so late in the day. To not receive the promised text when it was ready is completely unacceptable. I truly cannot apologize enough for this!   I do hope you will give us another opportunity to show you how flawless your stay can be. If you do visit the Laguna Beach area again, please feel free to reach out to the executive offices directly at 949-376-2761 so we can assist you and ensure perfection.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I stayed at this beautiful resort to celebrate my birthday with a friend.  When we checked in they upgraded us to the 2 bedroom penthouse suite and asked if we wanted white, red or champagne delivered complimentary to the room.  What a wonderful birthday surprise!  And the suite was gorgeous - very tastefully decorated with sweeping ocean views and nice amenities. Our spa visit was so relaxing and refreshing, we both had facials and massages.  Sandra was excellent with my facial and Maddie did a great massage.  They both also wished me happy birthday and offered more free champagne to us!  We had lunch at Splashes Bar and met another friendly hotel employee Marissa who made killer cocktails and enjoyable conversation.  Other hotel staff who were extremely welcoming and friendly
Manager Response: Dear Erika,  We are so happy Surf & Sand was such a big part of your Best Birthday Ever. We look forward to recreating it next year!   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Everything about this resort is perfect!  The staff are very friendly, the service is great, the pool is beautiful, the rooms are amazing, and the views are unbeatable!!! We had an oceanfront room and the balcony is literally over the ocean!  We slept with our door open and the sound of the waves all night was incredible!

Cute boutique-feel hotel right on the beach. No streets to cross, just walk downstairs and you're there! Watch out for high tide when walking along the beach - it reaches the base of the hotel and can catch you by surprise.   The pool was a bit dirty - we found some empty beer cups floating around in the morning.  Other than that, service was good and location was great!

We stayed here the night of our Wedding (which was in San Clemente) before driving home to Northern California the next day. Our room and the view was amazing! The staff was so nice and accommodating. I forgot stuff in the car that the Valet had parked upon our arrival and had to have them retrieve it a couple times between check-in and check-out. The Valet was very quick and pleasant about it. We enjoyed the hot tub but wished there was a view of the ocean from it. We didn't eat at the restaurant but it smelt amazing. We ordered room service for breakfast. It was delicious and the server was so nice!   We loved staying here and didn't want to leave!

My wife and I visited this hotel for a weekend break with our 16 year old daughter. We requested a Surf Side King room with a roll away which with tax was over $800 per night.  When we arrived at the hotel with our car the Valet did not offer to help with any of our bags so we loaded them onto a trolley ourselves. We were then had to find our room, which was as far away from the Lobby as possible. Further complicated by a pre wedding ceremony which meant we had to climb several sets of stairs and pass through a labyrinth of corridors before finally arriving at the room.   The room was configured in such a way that it was almost impossible to fit a rollaway into the room without taking some of the furniture out of the room. In the end we asked for a different room, but as it was
Manager Response: Dear Mark M,  On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for the disappointment with your stay. Your arrival experience certainly left much to be desired. It is completely unacceptable for us to fail to help you with your luggage and escort you to your room. Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us. This will be addressed. I also apologize profusely for the frustrations with breakfast and the layout of the room.  I do hope your travel plans will bring you to the Laguna Beach area again. Please feel free to reach out to me directly if you would like to visit us again.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This was an overnight get-away for my husband's birthday. We started with a couples massage at the Spa, where Ally & April made sure we had everything needed for a relaxing experience. The room was very clean, and the view was gorgeous! We ordered breakfast from room service, and it was the best breakfast I've had in awhile. As we were leaving, Sean noticed some water had dripped on our car in the garage, and had the parking fee waved as compensation. Overall, a first class experience and I can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: I came and stays this place with my partner. This place is like a beach heaven. The food are very good. The staffs are super friendly and very helpful. The room is great! I just wish I could stay there a little more longer but the price of staying there could be very expensive, depend on what kind of room you would like to get. Overall, I would recommend people, who want to experience one of the best hotels in Laguna Beach is this place.  Thank you Neil and Peter for your extended assists!

We stayed here in a gorgeous room for our anniversary, and our balcony was basically over the ocean which led to truly incredible sights and sounds. The resort itself is a bit dated, but the location and overall vibe was great.

Summary Heading: A slice of heaven in OC
Summary: Hands down my favorite hotel on the west coast of US. The service and especially the concierges are the best, wow - they really know how to take care of and pamper their guests!! The location is breathtaking just ON the ocean and offers one of the most incredible sunsets there is! Great room service, restaurant and spa too. Just love it so much and can't wait to get back!!!
Manager Response: Dear Magnus,   Thank you so much for the review. We are incredibly happy to read that we are your FAVORITE hotel on the west coast. We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Absolutely worth it!!! I highly recommend this place, especially if you are looking for a romantic getaway or just need time away by yourself. The views were absolutely amazing and being able to hear the waves crash all day and all night long is just so soothing. We kept our balcony door open each night so we could hear the surf. Walks on the beach were nice and the sunset was absolutely gorgeous both nights we were here. Pool is great and the pool side service was good with the exception of one pool boy who seemed to be clueless. Staff was very kind and accommodating. Great trip.

Surf & Sand Resort is a beautiful boutique hotel situated in a prime location in Laguna. It is close to galleries, retail and restaurants within easy walking distance. The hotel is designed with a simple yet elegant coastal style - lots of white, beiges and light blues.  I have always found the staff to be warm, accommodating and with prompt, responsive service.  The rooms are spacious in size with outstanding views of the Pacific.  You cannot get any closer.  The sunsets are divine from the balcony.  The amenities such as the pool is easily accessed no matter where your room is located.  The access to the beach is superior.  Splashes Restaurant is a much better experience than most traditional hotel dining.  Again, the views cannot be beat.  I have enjoyed the truffled tater
Manager Response: Dear KauffeyNYC,  Thank you so much for this fabulous review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Excellent !!! I was fortunate to be assigned a beach front room with a balcony overlooking the ocean.  The experience was very soothing.  My group was required to traverse steps/stairs for all activities.  I presume; however, that ADA accommodations were available upon request.

Highly recommended. Outstanding service, great food and one of the best views of any hotel you'll ever find. Front desk clerks remembered our name every time we walked by. Nice coffee and gift shop as well.

We were there on a business trip and will return just for fun. All the rooms have an ocean view. It was great to be able to walk on the beach after a meeting. Lots of quaint shops near by for browsing and shopping.

Stayed at the hotel in April, in a suite, one of only a few rooms without a direct view of the water.  Food and service were very good.  Enjoyed the pool although was crowded and difficult to find a lounge chair.  Impressed with young but professional staff.  However, was not on par with other five star hotels in my opinion.  The suite was nice but no view and windows didn't open.

I have gushing praise for Surf and Sand!  Beautiful location, rooms, pool and the service is always friendly and prompt.  If you want to get away to a beautiful location you must go!  My only complaint is it's hard to leave such a beautiful room and spot to explore Laguna!!!
Manager Response: Dear Heathergwil,  We wish you never had to leave! Come back and visit us again soon.  Kindly, Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Love this hotel. Service is impeccable and extremely accommodating. Rooms are nice and right on the ocean. Always have a happy hour at the outside patio area, 1555. It's in a great location and convenient (walking) to the downtown area if you don't have a car. The restaurant has great food and I highly suggest it for breakfast.   If you are in for a laid back, luxury experience, this is the place for you.   Can't wait to go back.

Summary Heading: The Surf and Sand is the only place to stay
Summary: You will not want to leave the service and the joy of being RIGHT ON THE BEACH is amazing.   My daughter and I were there for a Birthday and Mothers day trip.  We had a ball.  I have stayed there so many times and would never stay any where else.
Manager Response: Dear Pennyp429,  Thank you so much for the review. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with your daughter. I am thrilled to hear you would never stay anywhere else. It makes us extremely proud to be your home away from home when visiting Laguna Beach. See you soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights and it was amazing!  The bar restaurant's food where really great.  Except when I got home, I have discovered that my designers clothes gone missing, someone has gone through my suitcase and helped themselves. NOT GOOD!
Manager Response: Dear Louisa M,  I am so sorry to hear some of your items cannot be located. This is very serious. When you have a moment, please contact the resort at 949 497 4477 and ask to speak to our security department. I hope that your items have been turned into our lost and found department. Also, feel free to send me a private message with your contact information and I can reach out to you directly for more details. We will get to the bottom of this.  Kindly,  Misty L.  Director of Front Office

Summary: Spent 4 nights, business and pleasure. Rooms require a refresh and do not reflect the image nor the value for this self described  5 star property.  All rooms  hanging OVER the water and the sound of the waves truly relaxing...  Spa also small and tired..albeit the attendants first rate. The location on  beautiful Laguna Beach is Fantastic. Very close to town center.   If you  value the ocean view....at any price...this is for you.
Manager Response: Dear JC/GC,  On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for your disappointment in our resort. We strive to exceed our guests' expectations and it is disheartening to hear that your stay was not perfect. We appreciate your feedback and will share it with the entire management team so we can seek ways of improvement.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The view was amazing, the room was well kept, the grounds were clean.  You just better not mind the noise or heat.  AC not available in ocean front rooms, so you either listen to the waves, which are very loud in the room at night, or you close the door and sweat your butt off.  Also, watch the prices.  I booked 5 days prior to staying, then 2 days before arriving when I couldn't cancel, I found the same room, for the same day, over $100 less.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   On behalf of Surf & Sand I apologize for your disappointment with our lack of AC. With the coastal breezes, AC is not necessary the majority of the year. I do understand that when we have extremely warm weather, the rooms can heat up quickly if the slider doors are not open. I truly cannot apologize enough for your disappointment. I do hope you can visit the resort during a cooler time, so we can provide you with a flawless stay.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We live in nearby Irvine but spend a lot of time in Laguna. I've stayed here before buy my wife hasn't so I decided to surprise her with a short staycation for our first Anniversary.  Our hobby is staying at boutique hotels in LA and Hollywood so we are familiar with staying in this type of establishment.  Let me summarize the stay: AWESOME! I booked an ocean view room.....upon hearing it was our first anniversary they upgraded us to a corner suite, complete with complimentary champagne.....The restaurant, Splashes, not only has amazing food, but a million dollar view......You're literally on the sand.....Honestly we could not have had a better experience!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for selecting our resort to celebrate your first anniversary! This review means the world to us. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay and look forward to providing you with another awesome stay in the future!   We hope to see you for your second anniversary, if not before!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Amazing hotel!  The staff was phenomenal from the minute I pulled into valet and continued on at Check In, housekeeping, pool staff.  Every point of service was great.  Can't wait go back and unwind and watch the beautiful ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you BevReese! We are glad you enjoyed your stay.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: the Surf and Sand sits right on the pacific ocean and is so close the guests  recieve ear plugs in case the wave noise is a bit much. For me its perfect. Every time I come I see lots of dolphins and shore birds but saw a migrating whale this time.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for the review! The whales have been very active the past month or so and have certainly been putting on an awesome show for our guests! We are happy you got to enjoy it.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but a little more staff training will get this to 5 stars
Summary: This is a nice hotel in Laguna Beach, close to shops and galleries.  The rooms overlooking the water have an amazing view, and are right over the beach - so much so that you'll hear the waves crashing at night. The rooms are clean and nice, and the bar and restaurant are fantastic.  My reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is due to our experience at check in.  Check in time is listed as 4pm, which is late (check out is noon).  We arrived at noon and the staff told us our room wasn't ready which we understood since it was early.  The staff held our bags and we had a nice lunch at the hotel restaurant.  After lunch, we were told that the room had been vacated but just not serviced yet from housekeeping.  I do realize that since check-in time is not until 4pm we shouldn't expect to get
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for this review. I thank you for highlighting some training opportunities that will certainly be addressed. We strive for five star service but clearly missed the mark during your stay. Again, thank you for the feedback.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Nice hotel right at the beach
Summary: medium sized hotel right on thr beach. Very good restaurant! If you want a quieter room book one not above the hotel swimming pool. Chairs an umbrellas at the beach. I din¬¥t like having to pay for internet and parking.

Summary Heading: Taking Oceanfront to a new level
Summary: I was on the bottom floor of the North side of the property (for the second time) for a short business trip in Late April.  Ocean sounds and feels close enough to jump in from the balcony!  Left my doors wide open all night and loved the sound of the crashing surf.  Besides a spacious, clean room with great balcony, the overall property is outstanding.  The meeting rooms, catered meals on the roof, and the Pool area were all outstanding.  The location is also optimal with a nice walk down the beach (depending on tide) or a short walk to downtown Laguna Beach.  I plan to take my wife here for an extended stay one of these days!
Manager Response: Dear Michael B,  Thank you for the review! We look forward to seeing you again, and meeting your wife, in the future. We would be happy to welcome her to the Surf & Sand family and show her all of the beauty that Laguna Beach has to offer.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights on the 9th floor. The views from the balcony were amazing. We spent several evenings, sitting on our balcony, watching whales and dolphins swim past. Our room was very clean and comfortable. All the staff seemed friendly and comfortable. We arrived 4 hours before check-in (because of flight times) and our room wasn't ready but they very accommodating. I would definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Dylan500,  Thank you for the recommendation! We are happy you had a great time at the resort.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Great Place for Relaxation and Romance
Summary: Stayed at the Catalina Junior Suite.  It was lovely.  Though it had limited views of the beach, you could still see the ocean above the beach-front building and watch the beautiful sunset.  Furniture, sheets, and towels were very comfortable.  The amenities were great.  The spa was pretty good.  The buildings require using flights of steps, so not very sure how those with mobility issues would cope.  The rooms are also not very sound-proof.  Excellent for hearing the waves, but not too great when you can hear people just walking in the room above you.  No wonder they leave complimentary ear plugs at your bedside.  Service is very attentive, even a bit over-eager.  So remember to use the do not disturb sign if you don't want the turn down service or room service coming in to

A very nice hotel , with large rooms , nicely decorated  and inpeccable ocean views !  The coffee machine did not work but we were brought to cups of coffee and I don't believe you need to bother with splashes restaurant .

If you think about the perfect venue for a romantic weekend with the love of your life then the Surf and Sand fills that vision. It is the perfect location right on the beach with rooms straight out of a dream and views that go on forever. When you think Romance, think Surf and Sand.
Manager Response: Dear Thom,  Thank you so much for this wonderful review! It is so perfectly titled as we have a package called A Night to Remember which includes your room, parking, resort fee, and breakfast for two!   Thank you again for staying with us. We look forward to providing many more romantic stays for you!  Kindly,  Misty L.  Director of Front Office

Summary: This was the perfect spot for a romantic weekend. The hotel had everything a traveler could want - plentiful dining options and room service, pool, spa, and gym, and was literally on the beach. The toughest choice I had to make was whether I wanted to hang out by the pool or on the beach. Also - very walkable to nearby restaurants if the on-site dining isn't what you're in the mood for. Would highly recommend.

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel right on the beach!
Summary: I stayed at the hotel for a girls' weekend with my mom and sisters. We had a fabulous stay...our room was right on the beach so we woke up and went to sleep at night to the sound of the waves. The pool and views are very nice and the private beach is amazing too!  My only negatives were that the service at the pool and beach were good, but no one went out of their way to really provide A+ service. The hotel rooms also don't have air conditioning so it can get stuffy and hot at night. Overall, I highly recommend it!

From the moment we walking in to the day of departure, everything at Surf and Sand was superb.  The staff, the room, the view, the food, the location......the BEST of Laguna Beach.  In contrast to other properties that tout more and charge more, our experience here surpassed them in quality, service, and affordability.  Special shout out to Ante, Manny, and Ryan.  We visit Laguna twice a year and Surf and Sand will be the only place we stay.
Manager Response: Dear Joan G,  Thank you so much for this incredible review! We will be sure to celebrate the success of the teammates you mentioned with the entire resort. We truly appreciate the shout out.   We look forward to continuing to provide the BEST of Laguna Beach for you and all of our guests. Thank you again for staying with us.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Greg in reservations went above and beyond to ensure our time at the Surf and Sand hotel was perfect. He booked us into the perfect room and even held the room for me until I was certain. We had such a wonderful time we went back a week later and stayed for 8 days!  I wish every hotel had a "Greg!"

Surf & Sand is awesome!  Beautiful property with amazing ocean views. I actually saw a whale right in front of the hotel. The staff is awesome and the rooms are beautiful. I highly recommend this place to stay. üòÄüòÄ

For a romantic, upscale getaway, The Surf and Sand is the hotel in Laguna Beach to go to!  Just far enough from the center of town to enjoy the peace and quite the hotel's beach access has to offer. If you prefer the pool, they have a beautiful one to relax in.  The service, food, and view are gorgeous!  Very friendly, helpful staff that make your feel welcome, taken care of, and appreciated as a guest.

Perfect place for a sunny vacation.  Great facility, view, amenities, staff, experience.  It's rare to find a place...at most any price...that clicks on all cylinders.  We were very impressed (not easily done), and loved the entire experience here.

I had a wonderful time with my boyfriend here. Laguna beach is the most beautiful beach I've ever seen. The hotel sits in the perfect location with several beach access points and a restaurant that also overlooks the beach. It's really hard to find this. The staff was incredible. Very welcoming and helpful. The room was everything k could've asked for. Yes it's a little pricey but you get what you pay for. A view and a room overlooking the beach. I can't wait to go back!

Overall excellent experience. We took advantage of a lot of the services the resort had to offer (from the Splashes restaurant to pool side bar, in room dining, beach service, the spa, valet, concierge and the live music). Everything was wonderful. The staff even pulled together Easter Baskets for the kids and delivered them to the rooms at 7.30am. My daughter was delighted! The rooms were very nice and amply stocked with towels, and the accessories. We had turn down service every night and staff were very responsive to any additional needs we had. We had a great view of the pool and ocean from our balcony. It's not right in the heart of Laguna Beach but it was an easy walk down to the shopping/gallery center with lots of restaurant options along the way. Would definitely return!

We had a wonderful weekend staying at the Surf & Sand Resort in Laguna Beach.  The property is beautiful, and staff very friendly.  We had a fun family weekend, and highly recommend this property.  We stayed in an oceanfront room above the pool, which was amazing.  Our kids had a fantastic time at the pool as well.
