There is no A/C in some rooms, but we were kept  the balcony doors open all night and enjoyed the ocean breeze.  Great visit and we will definitely stay here again.  Thank you Surf & Sand!

Amazing hotel. Staff are extremely professional polite and just overall amazing people all the way from valet to the room service to the consiege and front desk. The ocean views are breathtaking and sleeping and waking up to sound of the waves is soothing to the soul. 100% recommend. Can't wait to come back!

I cannot say enough about my stay. I had heard amazing things about the resort and wanted somewhere special to propose to my girlfriend. Choosing Surf and Sand was the absolute best choice I could have made. In the weeks building up to my our stay I was in contact with Celia (sorry if I spelled your name wrong!) from concierge and she was so amazing! So helpful! I also spoke with numerous Front Desk Agents who honestly could not have been any better. Everyone was so genuinely kind and wanted to help in any way possible to make the proposal as special as could be. I would name people but I don't want to leave anyone out! Honestly, everyone at the Front Desk who assisted us was exceptional. Due to everyone's help the proposal went even better than I could have hoped! Thank you

Excellent room, beautiful view, great service from all the staff. We certainly would highly recommend The Surf and Sand to all our friends.  Laguna has the most beautiful beaches in California in our opinion.  This weekend was spent honoring my husband on his 81'st Birthday.  The staff joined in with me and treated him as a highly special Birthday guest.  Many of our kids came in just for the day to help us party.  Walks along the surf in the sand enjoying the tide pools and beautiful cliff homes above us thrilled all of us.   We enjoyed the dog friendly atmosphere at the Hotel and along the beach.  What fun to set out on our room balcony and watch all the dog lovers playing with their special fur babies along the sandy beach. Another highlight was a wedding taking place in
Manager Response: Dear Karen M,  Thank you so much for selecting our resort to celebrate such a special occasion. We are happy we got to be such a big part of the birthday! We look forward to celebrating with you again in the future.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Five Star Location with One Star Service
Summary: Location is everything, which is why this hotel gets away with charging the prices it does.  It offers a rare direct oceanfront location at Laguna that is walking distance to the main shopping area.  Rooms are nice, bathrooms (esp showers) are on the small side.  However, for these prices, you expect service to match the price and location - and you won't find it here.  For the same price you can stay at nearby five star hotels that offer far better service if not quite the same location, and that's what we will do next time - in fact the Best Western across the street likely has better customer service.  We waited almost six hours for a room at check in.  Yes, we arrived a little early, but the property clearly has too little housekeeping staff and a number of deferred
Manager Response: Dear MEE280,  On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for the negative experience you had while visiting our resort. It certainly is not who we are. I cannot apologize enough for all of the frustrations you encountered. We would love the opportunity to make this right by you. If you have a moment, please call the resort at 949 497 4477 and ask to speak to the Front Office Manager on Duty. We would love to discuss this further.  Again, I apologize profusely for all of this. We pride ourselves in the quality service and products we provide for our guest. We clearly failed to exceed your expectations.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Excellent resort in Laguna Beach, CA. Hotel is right on the water with amazing views! Valet staff is awesome - ask for TOM - he knows everything about the area, restaurants, entertainment and he even will give you surfing tips! We recommend Surf & Sand. Keep expectations real, for a 5-STAR property there are areas they can improve, however, their location is second to none. We've stayed at the Montage in Laguna, but it is not located right on the beach like Surf & Sand.

Summary Heading: A luxurious getaway at one of the best resorts I've ever stayed at!
Summary: I can't say enough wonderful things about the Surf & Sand Resort! From the moment we checked in, Stephanie at the front desk made us feel like royalty. She upgraded our accommodations to a spectacular ocean front tower room at no extra charge. It was truly the most beautiful room we'd ever stayed in! She also sent up a complimentary bottle of champagne & chocolates to help make my momentous birthday celebration extra special. The view of the ocean & the Laguna coastline was spectacular!  Absolutely loved the Surf & Sand! Looking forward to our next visit!

Our family had been coming to the Surf and Sand for over 30 years. It is difficult to describe the happiness you feel during your stay. From the sound of the ocean at night while you sleep to the attentiveness and friendliness of the staff, to the sheer beauty of the property, it is always a magical experience.
Manager Response: Dear Thomas E,  What an amazing survey! THANK YOU for continuing to be part of the Surf & Sand family over the last 30 years. We look forward to providing many more years of magical experiences for you!  Kindly,  Misty L.  Director of Front Office

Summary: From the moment I made reservations to the day we checked out, we received friendly and courteous service. We were catered to our needs, the hotel room was clean and the view from the room was breathtaking. We ate all our meals at the hotel and food was delicious. The pool was warm and the kids loved it. The beach was very clean, beach chairs and umbrellas we're provided. We will definitely be back because we were treated like royalty and the location of the hotel is a piece of heaven on earth.

Try to get a room over the sand! Our balcony had a comfortable sitting chair with cushions and an ottoman plus two regular sitting chairs so it was large enough for us to sit there and enjoy the sunset or have coffee in the morning.  The chairs are not made for lounging/laying on since they are upright chairs.  The receptionist was so friendly and accommodating that it really started our little getaway on the right step.  She upgraded us to this room where we initially purchased the room on Orbitz for an average of 250 for each night, and would have been in a room above the pool.  There is a keurig in the room and a refrigerator with room for us to store our own beverages and food.  They also offered us complimentary bottles of water in the room.  The earplugs that they provide

Summary Heading: Amazing views from our room! Oustanding service from
Summary: We have stayed here several times.  I love the resort EXCEPT for in the summer. There is no air conditioning and I am miserable.  Our last visit the check in was exceptional. Jim make sure we were comfortable and made to feel special. I had lost some things and he took the time to send some chocolates and for that I give him 10++ stars.  I liked the chocolates so much that when my son arrived to visit the next day, I asked the front desk ladies where I could find the chocolates.  They looked at me like I was crazy and said they wish they had chocolates and smiled at me....so I walked away feeling awkward.  These were hotel chocolates, so I don't know what the deal was... The service has been 9 out of 10 friendly...there is always that one person that makes you feel awkward.  I

Fantastic resort with exceptional staff.  Kaeleena at the front desk was very friendly and accommodating.  The view was amazing and the room was exceptionally clean.  Decided to eat at Splashes on Friday Night.  The Halibut special was delicious as well as the Hot Chocolate desert with Marshmallow ice cream.  Our server Kyle was very knowledgeable and prompt with his service.  I was impressed that the restaurant GM personally went to each table to ask how their meal was.  The overachieving staff and great accommodations will be a key reason why I will be back again and again.  Thank you Surf and Sand for the wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Buckdew,  Thank you so much for the five star review. Kaeleena wanted to pass on her personal thanks for the review! We truly appreciate it and look forward to your return.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Incredible rooms at Surf and Sand for my family during our trip to Southern California.  The Hotel and accommodations were beautiful.  The staff was professional, knowledgeable and very friendly. Every opportunity we had to enjoy the hotel was taken.  To sit at the bar and enjoy a glass of wine, feet from the beach and Ocean, was the most relaxing part of the trip. An experience that will not be forgotten.

This was a lovely place to stay with a spacious comfortable room, pleasant and helpful staff, and ocean view to die for. From our balcony we could drop a coin onto the sand! It was nice that the room came with ear plugs because all through the night the waves crashed onto the rocks and the high tide was so close to the balcony that the roar could keep you awake!! Because we didn't realize we needed a reservation to their restaurant, we ate our Easter dinner in our room but with that view it was special anyway!! Happy to have stayed there!

Beautiful room and resort on the water. We loved the view of the ocean from our room. The room was spacious with doors that opened to a balcony to sit and enjoy the view. If you visit Laguna you should stay here.

My experience making my upcoming reservation for our Spring Break stay at the Surf and Sand was simply easy! I like to talk to someone personally in case I have questions.  Yesterday I spoke with Lisa who helped me choice my room and length of stay. She was friendly and very helpful. She made notes on everything we talked about. Today I true for reaching her to confirm and she had today off.  I was a bit worried. Kayla assured me my reservation I had made with Lisa would be honored. She also helped me extend our stay as well. Perfect!! We love this resort and try to stay at least once a year!  We are looking forward to an unforgettable 2016 stay! Thanks Ladies for all your help!!

This hotel is one of our favorite places to come for sunset drinks or dinner, but as we live close we don't stay in the hotel. We needed a get away weekend and decided to try it out. The main hotel building is single loaded so all of the rooms face the ocean and have great views and nice decks. I think the hotel has a newer separate building and all of those rooms may not have ocean views.  We choose a corner room so it had extra windows and increased the rooms brightness considerably. It was a small up charge but I think it was worth it.  The furnishings were beachy, the bed and linens were great, nothing too special about the bathroom.  Service, starting with the valet, front desk and bellhop were all 5 star. The property has a great beach and a pool and a great restaurant and

Summary Heading: Incredible view, Impeccable Service - Anniversary stay with 2 kids
Summary: Delightful surprises: 1. THE VIEW from our room.   2. Valet charged our car overnight (we didn't even know they had chargers).  3. I opened the door at 7am to grab breakfast and found the EASTER BUNNY had left 2 baskets of goodies! My kids were so surprised and grinning from ear to ear during breakfast. My daughter even asked the server at Splashes if she had seen the Easter bunny...very cute. 4. Text messages for any resort requests with VERY QUICK responses.  Needless to say, the service was stellar from top to bottom at Surf & Sand. Every staff encounter was pleasant; it was obvious each person was well trained, professional, and enjoyed being there.   Our two night stay was in an oceanfront room, first floor - the waves were only a few feet from our balcony. It was a picture

Summary Heading: Amazing location and views but reservation system needs improvement
Summary: This neat, older hotel is in a prime location and offers fantastic views and a great southern california experience. I liked the casual yet upscale vibe with open-air hallways and pretty rooms. No, its not a brand new luxury resort, but its a unique experience in a spectacular setting. I stayed on the tower 2nd level and the 5th level and views were great on both. I am sure all the views are similar with maybe the exception of those rooms right above the pool. The service overall is excellent and the employees work hard dealing with a demanding clientele. I overheard plenty of special requests...everyone is asking for early/late checkout and I am sure they struggle to balance it all when the hotel is fully booked. Unfortunately, my reservation confirmation did not match their

My husband and I have stayed at this site many times.  This time, because we booked through Expedia, they didn't remember us and we got a terrible room.  The room overlooked the pool on the bottom floor.  This was our get away from the kids that we do once every six months or so.  It was very loud. When asked to move, Misty, the front desk manager, said that because we booked through Expedia there was nothing she could do.  We have stayed at least 7 or 8  times and have always had an oceanfront room.  While in the shower the water went from warm to freezing cold and then it started to shake and warmed back up.  It shook as though there was an earthquake.  We barely got any sleep because it was extremely loud and felt like there were elephants on top of our heads.  I Highly doubt
Manager Response: Dear Sue S,   On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for the disappointment in your room type and location. We do encourage you to book directly through the resort so we can be sure to book you into the proper ocean front room that you prefer. The resort has been very busy during Spring Break so we were unable to accommodate a room move for you during your recent stay. I apologize profusely for this. If you do visit Laguna Beach again, please do not hesitate to contact the executive offices directly at 949-376-2761. It would be our pleasure to oversee your future accommodations to ensure perfection.  Kindly,  Kevin Chan Surf & Sand Resort

Summary Heading: Always a favorite but just a few issues....
Summary: This is our 3rd time at this resort and I always end up back here due to it's superb location.   Every time we have gone, check-in has been a nightmare.  I know check-in often isn't until 3:00, but not being able to get into my room until after 4 really annoys me.  On our most recent visit, as I was in the check-in line, there was a couple ahead of me looking for walk-in availability.   I overheard the rate they were quoted and my jaw dropped---it was HALF of what I paid online (at their website) months earlier AND they were given a key instantly.  Yes, I complained.  But that's something that left a very bad taste in my mouth that MAY lean me to look elsewhere when in Laguna next time (dang Montage is just so much more $$$).    Overall, I love Surf and Sand for it's unbeatable

Summary Heading: Best hotel I've ever stayed at!!!
Summary: I LOVED this resort!  Customer service was exceptional, property was clean and beautiful and our family of four enjoyed every thing about it!  Thank you Surf and Sand!  You are on our list to visit every time we come!  Hopefully for longer next time!

As soon as we entered our room, we began to relax and "wonder" at the incredible view of the Ocean! The beautifully appointed room was sooo comfortable‚Ä¶and we felt so welcomed by all the staff‚Ä¶they were always so helpful! And of course Splashes Bar was a real treat with a bonus this time! We witnessed a school of Dolphins putting on a little show just for us! Can't wait to come back! T. La Rue

My husband and I stayed for 2 nights and had a wonderful experience. We originally planned to stay at the St. Regis, but quickly cancelled our reservation due to massive construction ongoing there. As we were leaving, we were told about Surf & Sand and called to make reservations. We were bummed about not getting to stay at The St. Regis, BUT that quickly changed when we arrived at Surf & Sand! The vibe was perfect and the staff were so accommodating and efficient. Our vacation ended up being fabulous. And, we are so grateful that we found this gem of a hotel ON THE BEACH that gave us a boutique feel, great amenities, a friendly staff, great vibes, and the perfect location to enjoy all the local spots in Laguna. We will be back!!!

We LOVed this hotel so very much. The food, the view, the staff. Can't say enough wonderful things about this place. Thank you to the entire staff at surf and sand.  You guys made it the best trip ever!

This was our first opportunity to stay and Surf and Sand and I will tell you it was an amazing vacation.  The staff is so accomodating and the property is beautiful.  We had a room in the Tower and this oceanfront accomodations are super.  I don't think there is a bad view from any room from what I could see.  We will definitely return to this property again.  Only down side which is not a big deal - they are further out of town than the other places we've stayed in Laguna.  It's only about a mile walk, and worth it to be able to stay at the Surf and Sand!

The rooms are spacious, comfortable and clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The resort is so pretty and right on the beach.  We stayed in a room overlooking the beach with a great view. I would recommend this place for both family and as a romantic getaway.  Great location too!

We are currently staying in oceanfront room and so far this is been a very unpleasant experience. I am a frequent traveler and have stayed in many hotels all over the world. I booked this hotel  because of its positive trip advisor reviews. Currently staying in an oceanfront from with 4 yr old. There have been nothing but problems since we've arrived. First,   Even though we requested an early check-in in advance, we arrived at noon to be told that our room would not be ready for at least two hours. The left our bags outside unattenelded bags and said they would text us when the room is ready. Ist was 530 before we texted them about the room (5 hrs later) and were told our room is finally ready. Later after we checked in, the room key didn't work and because the room was so far

We (Family of 4) spent two nights here and it was fantastic. Mid-March the weather was great (ocean a little chilly for adults but kids got in - no problem). The service at this hotel was great. Super nice reception desk, valet, beach/pool, and housekeeping services. We were in a tower that looked directly at the ocean. There are other rooms that are above the pool that also look directly at ocean but if you have kids that nap it may be too loud in the afternoon from the pool chatter.

Summary Heading: Stunning views, wonderful guest rooms, top notch staff
Summary: I was at the hotel for a wedding. The rooms are luxuriously appointed with incredible views. Every staff person I interacted with was professional and friendly. Easy access to the beach, beautiful pool.

Booked through Booking.com, an hour later the rate dropped. The next morning the rate dropped again, noticing this I requested a price match from the resort which was denied. A lot of back and fourth with the resort and Booking.com. Long wait times and hang ups when asking to speak with a manager. Didn't seem like the resort and Booking.com were in synq. Even though I booked the deal with a room with double beds I requested a king bed if possible and the staff said my request would be fufilled...we ended up with double beds. I was trying to supprise my guest and the hotel almost ruined the suprise...decided to stay an additional night and we had to switch rooms and it was like pulling teeth to get the manager to price match what was advertised on Booking.com...there were just

We stayed at the Surf and Sand for a wedding for 3 nights and couldn't have been more pleased. The staff was courteous, from the front desk to the valet they were helpful and always had a smile on their face. The valet always offered water and directions upon departure. The pool was nice, but get there early for seating as its not a large area, which adds to the "boutique" feel. As long as your not obnoxious and loud about it, they didn't seem to mind me and my group drinking our own beers by the pool. I ordered 3 loaded Corona's (Corona with a shot of Bacardi Lemon in the neck) and it was $53, expected at such a nice place.  I stayed in Laguna before at The Montage, which was much larger, so it didn't have the quaint feel the Surf and Sand did. And was more expensive. Surf and

Summary Heading: NO AIR CONDITION but not bad
Summary: I wish I knew they didn't have a/c. It wasn't a problem as we stayed after a cold front and by opening the balcony door we were able to cool down the room quickly. It was also relaxing falling asleep to crashing waves. However, I can't imagine what it would be like during the summer time without a/c or a good breeze.   Check in time is 4 p.m. but when we arrived our room was still being finished and when we went into it there was this damp smell and some guy with a huge machine was leaving. We were placed in front of the elevators on the lobby floor which could have been a noise problem if not for the crashing waves.  The good: great massage from Dan; everyone at reception was pleasant, welcoming, and helpful; the valets were nice and swift as can be and would offer us
Manager Response: Dear Peg C,   On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for your disappointment in regards to the lack of AC and for the delay in receiving your guest room. I was happy to read that your visit to the spa was a highlight of your trip and that the service you experienced from the staff throughout the resort was excellent.   I do hope you will visit us again so we can provide you with a flawless stay. Please do not hesitate to contact me directly should you need anything in the future.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Laguna Beach is a very great place in itself and staying at the same time at Surf & Sand - then your stay become outstanding. This hotel is just on the beach and had a atmosphere that's just right for the location. Rooms are great, service and restaurants great as well. A really nice hotel and location.

All the people were very nice and went out of their way.  The view and location is excellent.  The room was large and very comfortable.   It's pricy  as was the restaurant  especially for room service portions were big and good.  But I can't complain. Very romantic

Unbelievable place and great staff!! Will definitely stay again! Food was very good, nachos were soso.  Can't express enough how great the staff was, always improves the overall experience. I can't wait until next time!

My husband and I have been to the surf and sand on 2 occasions and it is one of the best hotels we have ever been to. The hotel is so clean and the location is perfect!!! The spa is amazing! I highly recommend it and I can't wait to get back!!

If you want something right on the beach for lunch, this is it. Take a bunch of starters to share with a glass of wine and kick back and enjoy the view of the pacific. A great place for sunset sips before dinner too.... A great place to get off the grid and enjoy the surroundings.

Great hotel exceeded my expectations in every way.  Front desk check in was really easy and the hotel employees went out of their way to get me my room on a busy Friday afternoon.    The room decor and views were fantastic.  I used the spa to work out and unwind, great facilities, very clean and well maintained.  Good massage and well thought area to relax beforehand.  Overall a really great experience.

Summary Heading: Wish I could have stayed Longer
Summary: I traveled to the Surf and Sand Resort on business alone and the whole time I was there I wished I could have shared this place with my family or friends.  The views from the rooms were amazing and you can walk down the PCH and find all kinds of shops and restaurants as well.  There is a beach (I didn't get to play, unfortunately) and a nice pool (again, didn't get to use, but looked lovely).  I hope I can bring some loved ones back with me again to enjoy!

WOW! This is a beautiful resort! We came here with my husband who attended a New York Life work event! Everything was perfect! From the moment we stepped in until we left! A top notch! Great, friendly staff! Great food! Ordered room service for breakfast twice as we had a toddler with us! The red velvet pancakes are to die for!!! Great location, 30 min walk to Laguna beach, very safe to be on your own with a toddler while hubby is in a meeting! We uber' to/from LAX, 60 min drive and about 40 min to Disney! My little one loved the beach!

My daughter and I stayed here two nights over Presidents Day weekend.  I booked with the hotel directly and they were very nice and accommodating.  Their rate was as good as the "discount" booking sites.  We were allowed to check in early to our wonderful room with a balcony overlooking the ocean.  We loved that the hotel is so close to the ocean because you can hear the waves.  We got a great massage at the spa and enjoyed the pool. The location of Surf and Sand is so convenient because we were able to walk to shops and restaurants, never moving our car.  The staff was very friendly and willing to work with us on a late check out.  We would definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: New York Life Top Producers Meeting
Summary: Great place to have meetings... awesome weather, service, and facilities right on the beach!....awesome restaurants and roof top bars within walking distance! Close to John Wayne Airport in Orange County!

Summary Heading: Great location, nice people, dated property
Summary: I stay at this place every two years for a conference. This year 2016 the shower (in a different room) was exactly like 2 years ago - constant temperature only after running it after 10 minutes. Beds well made and very clean

Summary Heading: Unique boutique hotel in Laguna centrally located
Summary: Went to this hotel w/ my husband. He was on business for 2 days and we stayed 2 extra days to relax & unwind. I prefer unique boutique hotels over large hotels. This one had it all... We stayed in the rooms behind the office to the left of the pool. Large size rooms, 2nd floor and well equipped w/ everything you would need. Most rooms are located on the water and our room was just up from the crashing waves. There is no air conditioning and was fine for us. We kept the doors open w/ the shutters open & it was nice. 1st night we did sleep w/ the doors open to listen to the waves :-)  Pool was awesome right on the water. Workout room was well equipped and felt like a nice spa. We did not go to the restaurant but looked very nice and a lot of ppl recommended it. Easy to walk to

My wife and I just spent the last 3 days at this resort.  This was our second trip here , we first visited in October 2015.  Aside from the stunning beauty of the surroundings and how meticulously clean all areas are kept I must say we were blown away by the exceptional customer service that we received.  Our first point of contact last year was Stephanie Mason, a wonderfully charming and very knowledgable front desk associate. What an asset she is to this resort! Pleasant and cheerful personality with a "can do" attitude.  What a refreshing change it is to feel welcomed and not a burden.  When we returned again two days ago we were pleased to see Stephanie again and she was as helpful as ever.  We were also introduced to the Front Office Supervisor Brendan Turner.  He knocked
Manager Response: Dear Cokidog,  Thank you so much for this fabulous review! Brendan and Stephanie's success will be celebrating. Thank you for being such a loyal guest and taking the time to write a review. It is truly appreciated.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: For business or pleasure this is the most beautiful relaxing laid back hotel on the coast if you want old lagung charm, comfy beds, and waves crashing in front of your room, they provide ear plugs as well, Love this place! Been coming here for thirty years!

this hotel is beautiful.  Staff so friendly and helpful.  I asked to change rooms and they gave me an even better room.  The ocean front rooms are right on the water and the balcony is great and the view is breathtaking!

Beautiful beach-side resort located in Laguna, California. Was invited out for a business meeting and very much enjoyed the brief one night stay. The accommodations are five star. The food is great. And the views.....we'll speak for themselves.  Highly recommend for those not on a budget and looking for a nice, relaxing time with the spouse.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, could easily be a five circle rated
Summary: The only reason this hotel isn't the highest rating is lack of a/c in rooms.  I'm not 100% convinced you need it, but, any perfect hotel rating should have a/c.   My room looked right over the beach. It was neat, clean and updated sufficiently.   I'll certainly be back.

Surf & Sand has been on my radar for some time, I could not have been happier with our choice to stay here. After reading some reviews post booking I had some hesitation as to how well the stay would be. I understand that you are at the mercy of the weather, as they do not have AC in any rooms. Our weather was great, in the 60s so sleeping with the waves crashing outside was just devine. I do feel if it was warmer out we would have been struggling a bit. The staff was superb, very hospitable and professional. Highly recommend you have lunch at Splashes Restauaunt, it was great. Views were gorgeous and being right on the beach was super convenient. I would definitely stay here in the future, as long as it is not in the summer heat!

This was my second time to the resort and both times staying have been in sunny February.   We went to the restaurant both times for breakfast and dinner- fantastic appetizers and Benedicts. Very personalized service.   The room is gorgeous- the first time we never left the balcony as we sat all day sipping bubbles and enjoying the view.   This time we went to the pool and used the hotel amenities.   Tip- use the new concierge text message system!!! Great new amenity that is still personalized.  Here is our view from the room.

Even before we arrived, Brennan was on the phone listening to all of our requests. He not only met, but very much exceeded our expectations. We were traveling with our 3 grandchildren and planned on staying in the hotel for a full week. The location of our rooms was perfect for our needs. They were spacious, modern and provided magnificent view of the Pacific Ocean and the beach. The entire staff, during our stay including Brennan, the reception desk, the concierge and the very friendly and helpful valets really made for a pleasant and enjoyable vacation. We look forward to booking another stay at Surf and Sand through Brennan.

So before I start , never in almost 40 yrs have written a review traveled all around the U.S. And abroad. I really wanted to love it here , beautiful location and view. My husband and I always stay at the Ritz and per a recommend stayed here. 1st no air conditioning in the entire place . 2nd bags took 2 hrs to get to room . Third , for almost 1k for 2 nights do I need to see trash and cleaning supplies outside my room? Lastly the front desk tried to accommodate with an upgraded room and were lovely but still for the price and 4 stars  is not worth it . Ritz or Monarch worth the extra $....
Manager Response: Dead Hcatalano,  I truly cannot apologize enough for your experience. I truly appreciate you sharing your feedback so we can address these items. The pictures you posted are alarming. This is not how Surf & Sand Resort should be represented. Again, thank you for your feedback and please know that it will be addressed.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I cannot say enough good things about this location but the absolute best part was the customer service I received from Brendan and Alberto. First of all, Brendan can fix anything that goes wrong. I truly believe that somehow our room was left off the housekeeping list. Also, I had ordered something special for my daughter at bedtime that was forgotten. As I am in customer service, I have learned not to get mad but just to ask. Unfortunately for Brendan, I had to ask him numerous things at different times (yes, sadly, he knows my face now!).  While it is obvious that none of this was his fault, he took complete responsibility and, better yet, fixed it. And when I needed a favor on the day we were to check out (sick daughter), he didn't hesitate to accommodate me beyond my

Very kind, attentive,and helpful front desk agents. My boyfriend and I stay here quite frequently and we always look forward to seeing both Ashley and Brendan. Our stays wouldn't be the same without their great customer service and smiles! Beautiful clean rooms, luxury life! Thank you! -Hailey and Ford

Everything was so wonderful and perfect. The best Laguna has to offer! Everywhere you go you have a great view of the ocean. There are plenty of great places to eat around the area too so it makes it very convienent.

First time staying at the Surf and Sand and it was a very enjoyable, convenient and nicely serviced property.  Excellent location right on the beach as well as comfortable walking distance to a number of dining establishments or a very short ride to the city center.  Its definitely a bit quirky in terms of it's lay-out to the property dining establishment and pool from one side of the hotel but not a big issue.  Small but adequate fitness center if one so required.

Excellent 5 Star Hotel with an Incredible Staff & 5 Star Service! My husband Jeffrey & I had lunch & dinner @ Splashes several times & loved it & so we then checked into the hotel with Brendan, the front office supervisor. From the moment we met Brendan, we were treated as if we had been guests of the hotel forever! 5 Star treatment! We loved our experience @ Surf & Sand Resort & will return there as soon as possible! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Thank you Surf And Sand Resort & A Special Thank you to Brendan!!!! Angela & Jeffrey Florence

Summary Heading: Hospitality, Beautiful rooms, and great amenities!
Summary: We needed a room short notice, and the registration people were wonderful.  From the minute we walked into the lobby until we checked out four days later, it was a great experience.  Splashes restaurant was great!

Summary Heading: Great location and views, service was lacking
Summary: The property is beautiful with amazing views.  This was our second stay and it was for Valentines Day weekend.  Unfortunately, the service was lacking with non delivery of items, charging us for food that was part of our package and forgetting our orders (we ordered champagne for Valentines Day morning, it never came, yet we got charged for it).  Last visit the services was much better (2 years ago), so I don't understand why everything was so much different.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. We pride ourselves in the quality services and products we supply for our guests. When we fail to meet your expectations, we do not take it lightly. It saddens me to read that your Valentine's Day weekend was not perfect!  I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance. We look forward to having you back with us.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: The good- the staff!! The beach!! The pool!! The bad- rooms were very dated with stained furniture, room was in a hallway with trash and service entry, the restaurant was very poor quality.  We travel often , at very nice 5 star resorts. If you look at my other reviews , I am honest and always give 4-5 stars as that's what most resorts of this caliber deserve but I unfortunately wouldn't return here- and this was on my bucket list of hotels (yes I have a bucket list of hotels) .  I am just really disappointed, I wanted this hotel to be just like the pictures and unfortunately it isn't.
Manager Response: Dear Caligirllove,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: My wife and I have been coming to the Surf and Sand since the 1970's. The quality of service, the beauty of the grounds (including the ocean that's right at your feet) and the room accommodations get better with every visit. This last visit was the best so far and we can't wait to see what is in store for us on our next visit.

Hi checked in last night . First the front desk was awesome. Alyssa checked us in early and even came on the resort looking for us to hand deliver the key. A+ costumer service ! The rooms are just ok for the price but You pay for the on the beach location . The view rocks from the beachfront rooms. Then there's the outside dine. Disappointed ! So we ordered the fish tacos and waited an hour for the waiter to come around . Once he did he arrogantly announced it was last call. After we ate, they took our wine glasses (full of wine) and never returned. Irritated to say the least for an expensive place. Well, Alyssa came to the rescue yet again and compensated us nicely for the troubles. We sat by the pool today and Patrick was working hard making sure every need was met to the

After arriving from LA we were checked in and shown to our room.  Although we had limited time in the area as we were just passing through on our way to San Diego we found this hotel to be exactly what we wanted . The staff was more than friendly and the atmosphere was beautiful right over the beach.  We had a king surf room #421 which you could hear the waves.  We slept with the door open and it was wonderful.  The place is pricy however that follows the trend of Laguna in general.  Overall we would return in the future and had a great time.

Wow Wow Wow!!!!!   We left this morning only to talking about how we are going back. Staying a week next time. Location amazing. Accommodations amazing. People amazing. Food amazing. For this Lafayette, Louisiana family of 5 (kids age 17,15,12) it's a definite do-over. P.S. Did I mention the amazing weather?!?  Y'all gotta go!!

This is one of my favorite hotels! The rooms are basic and usually have a couch and table but the views are amazing!!!!  I love sleeping with the doors open listening to the ocean!!! The bathrooms are small, usually in the back with a small shower and a separate bathtub but you don't come here for the bathroom.  There is a coffee shop on property that is amazing and a restaurant, Splashes that has not disappointing.    The best thing they do is light up the ocean at night...here is a photo of that

We arrived for one evening that happened to be one of the nicest of the year.  The hotel did a great job to accommodate the quick increase in occupancy as a result of the weather and we did not experience any waits at check in or out.  Stephanie greeted us at the reception area and was wonderful to work with for some special requests.  The concierge also worked with us for some special requests since it was our anniversary after being engaged at the hotel several years ago.  We have stayed several times at the hotel and enjoy the corner tower rooms.  The views and extra natural light are worth the increased rate.

My girlfriend and I had recently stayed at Surf and Sand Resort this past weekend. This was our first time staying here for the both of us. My first impression of the resort was "WOW"! It is the most beautiful place I have ever stayed at out of all the places I have traveled. We were accommodated by the front desk associate by the name of Stephanie. She was very friendly and very helpful and really made us feel welcomed. She provided us with 5 star service, and definitely made our stay a memorable one. My girlfriend had booked our stay and had surprised me with a decorated room which Stephanie had gone the extra mile to help my girlfriend. The view was amazing and we fell in love with the hotel immediately. We definitely will be coming back again soon for a longer stay to enjoy

My husband and I travel all over the world with our family and this was the worst hotel experience.  We  had two rooms booked for our family for winter vacation.  The rooms were in a basement across from where the trash was kept.  The hallways and stairways were dirty.  One room had leftover smelly meat and used water bottles in the fridge.  Often, large trash bins were left on the stair landings so we would have to manually move them ourselves to get to the next flight of stairs.  Although the staff was on the whole very nice, one restaurant host refused to seat us at a table because we just wanted apps, yet the restaurant was empty.  But here's the kicker....we were over charged almost 3000 dollars, which I discovered upon arriving home and after getting my credit card
Manager Response: Dear Beth J,  On behalf of Surf & Sand Resort, I would like to apologize for the concerns you experienced throughout your stay. We pride ourselves in the quality products and services we provide for our guests. When we fail to meet your expectations, we do not take it lightly.   I understand your frustrations. I do hope that we are granted the opportunity to host your stay again in the future so we can provide you with an absolutely flawless stay. If you do opt to visit us again, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. It would be my pleasure to oversee your accommodations to ensure perfection.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director Front Office 949 497 4477

Summary: If I had to dream of such a beautiful place to getaway this would be it!!!! From the moment I arrived they treated me like I was  their most important guest. Service was outstanding! I have to say Stephanie was AMAZING!!! She is the reason why I fell in love with this place and I will be back again because of her. She treated me as if she knew me forever and made me feel like I was home. I know it wasn't her job but she went above and beyond to make my stay fantastic and if it wasn't for her I couldn't have pulled off my perfect early valentines surprise for my loved one. Thank you Stephanie you are truly amazing host! If you are every looking for a place to stay and want to get treated like royalty this is the place to go. Also if Stephanie's working I promise you that you feel
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for this perfect review! We will be sure to celebrate Stephanie's success with the entire team. We are very glad your Valentine Surprise went smoothly. See you soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: The BEST hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: My wife and I try to stay at Surf and Sand at least once if not twice a year. We live in Anaheim Hills so this "stay-cation" is less than an hours drive away. The sunsets are "to die for" and falling asleep to the gentle cadence of waves breaking right under your balcony is so awesome. We'll be back again and again and again.

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to relax and refresh
Summary: My wife and I come here to relax and refresh. It's always been a pleasant experience. Right on the water, great rooms, great food and the staff always makes you feel special. I would highly recommend the Surf and Sand to anyone who wants to get away and relax.

Summary Heading: Perfectly Romantic Getaway in Laguna Paradise
Summary: This hotel was nothing short of perfect. The room views were incredible and the constant sound of the waves was a true reminder of being in paradise. The setup was lovely and we enjoyed how close we were to the beach itself. In addition, the location in Laguna is ideal - just outside of downtown Laguna that makes it feel removed, but still very easy to get to everything. Only a 15 minute walk to downtown which was perfect for going out at night and experiencing the abundant restaurants and nightlife. Would definitely come back if the opportunity arises.

Summary Heading: A Special Place on the Planet-Splashes, Surf and Sand Resort
Summary: What an incredible dinner we had with 6 of our good friends, with the surf crashing just outside, and you can see the illuminated waves coming into the shore.  Surf and Sand is aptly named, even gets sandy on the floors in the hallways, as people move around.  Parking is valet, and reservations are a MUST!  We dined on Saturday night, and Laguna was gridlocked.  Plan accordingly.  But when you arrive, they have ample numbers of highly professional wait staff to make every wish their command.  Wine list is impressive, and the chef was able to accommodate some rather challenging requests (vegan, gluten free, vegetarian, mushroom allergy, etc.).  Many fresh fish options, the lobster bisque is an ample portion with a taste of elegance, cannot really describe it, you must taste it.

The best hotel and view in Laguna Beach. Room was beautiful. Staff are very friendly and helpful. The hotel is pricey but worth it. I would highly recommend it to anyone that wants a high end hotel and a wonderful view of the ocean.

Wonderful View! Comfortable bed. Staff was great. We had an ocean front room right on the beach. We sat on the patio and watched the sunset. Woke up to the ocean view directly from our bed! Had coffee on the patio. So very relaxing. Great way to "recharge and renew! "We will be definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! Come recharge and renew with us any time. It is always our pleasure to host your stay.  Kindly,  Misty L.  Director of Front Office

Summary: Surf and Sand is an older hotel but has so much to do you practically never need to leave the property. If you do leave there are tons of places to explore that are within walking distance. Pool and spa are great, along with the fun restaurant and bar. Not to mention it's right on a very picturesque beach. We only left the grounds once all weekend.

I've stayed here numerous times for business and for vacation with the entire family.  They cater to both personas impeccably.  The rooms all face the surf which you can hear crashing on the sand as you fall asleep.  The property has been around forever but have done a good job keeping it current without loosing its soul.   The staff are very accommodating and the food (both at Splashes and the beach bar) is fantastic.  The location is ideal as you can walk to all the shops on PCH easily.    I highly recommend this place.

We stayed two nights at the Surf and Sand for our anniversary. We were upgraded to the 9th floor surf side room (room 294). It was a nice room with an incredible view of the ocean.  The only negative was that it was right across a room where they had a party at night and exercise classes in the morning which got pretty loud.  Other than that, the room was wonderful and felt as if we were far away because of how close to the water we were. I would like to add that housekeeping needs to do a better job though.  There were no slippers and I had to request it.  They also never refilled the in room coffee bar. They never took away our dirty mugs or glasses until I had to call and ask.  Also, the guy who made the sofa bed for my daughter told me he would come back with a blanket but

Summary Heading: A little piece of heaven on earth.
Summary: I had only dreamed of such a beautiful place. From the moment we arrived they treated us like we were their most important guest. Service was outstanding! My husband's first comment when we walked into our room was "Why weren't we here sooner?!" He is already wanting to go back. From our balcony suite we watched the ocean waves crash below and saw the whales and seals playing. The room was decorated beautifully and so comfortable. We dined at Splashes and highly recommend the food and drinks, along with great service. To have the ocean as the back drop made the meal even more romantic. My experience at the hotel spa was outstanding also.  The area of Laguna Beach is extraordinary, with shops and neat little eating establishments. If you are from the midwest and want to
Manager Response: Good Afternoon,  Thank you so much for this review! We are glad your experience at the resort matched what you had been dreaming of! We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We booked the Catalina suite due to a last minute change in vacation plans. The suite was beautiful and we woke up to the calming sounds of ocean waves every morning. Sunset from our patio was amazing. The perfect relaxing getaway after 4 days at Disneyland. A 20 minute walk to the main areas in Laguna beach - but one filled with quaint art and coffee shops. Would definitely recommend to anyone that needs R & R.

The location is stellar and the service is friendly and most efficient.  The room furnishings are dreamy and the sound of the ocean outside your patio is like sleeping on the beach....only you are in a comfy bed with a cozy robe with room service.   Little thoughtful details throughout the room create delightful surprises.  Don't miss a drink at Splashes, and it's great for breakfast too.

My wife and booked this hotel on the spur of the moment and we couldn't be happier that we did.  This playfully sophisticated ocean front resort brings the sand and the sea inside to every element of the hotel's design.  The rooms are beautifully decorated and the quality of the bedding is delightful.  The Splashes bar and restaurant overlook the Pacific and offer a terrific menu for every meal.  I highly recommend this resort if you're coming to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Bob G,  Thank you for the review! We are happy you had a wonderful stay and we look forward to your next visit.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: We came to Tofino to learn how to cold water surf and this spot was perfect! Tofino is awesome- surfer artsy town with some unusual and striking temperate rainforests. Our one downfall at this quaint spot was the Internet. It was definitely unreliable - so if you need regular wifi for work come with a plan b. Also the kitchenette is great but if you can go into town and go get the chicken at Kuma- highly recommend it. It's no fancy frills - but great place for family - kids and those who want great surf!

We have been coming to the Surf & Sand for years-- it has a magic and charm that few resorts in California can match. The food is always exceptional, the views forever stunning and stellar 5 Star Service. Every employee there seemingly wants to make your stay as special as possible, truly.   I must also give special credit to Brad, one of the resort managers, who gives each guest personal attention, always with an easy laugh and smile. Love seeing him around the property. Cheers to all the wonderful things at Surf & Sand that make you feel like family each trip.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the excellent review! I will be sure to share your kind comments with Brad. We hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Great Destination Hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: Traveled to this hotel from San Diego right before Christmas. We were given a balcony room overlooking the ocean. Fantastic view of the King's Tides that were happening. The hotel is a classic California hotel, very old school beachy type of hotel. Rooms were not cheap, but the service was exceptional. Very friendly attentive staff. Valet only parking so prepare for that. My one complaint though is the entrance to the hotel.  The driveway is set so low that you WILL scrape your car's front bumper. There is NO getting around it. I tried going extremely slow making a left hand drive into the the driveway across PCH traffic. My car scraped its underside bumper, you will as well. You cannot go slow enough to avoid it. This is going to be a $200 repair at the very least for me. As

We stayed in the ocean view room, can't get any better. Staff is very pleasant and the room service is surprisingly good. Close walking distance to downtown Laguna Beach with restaurants, bars, beach access, etc. The hotel gym had enough to get a quick morning workout in. The hotel bar/restaurant is very small and becomes crowded for happy hour due to the views, go early. Waves are pretty noisy, but that is the price to pay for the view- use the ear plugs to sleep :)

This a lovely resort close to the local restaurants and bars in Laguna beach and beachfront rooms with fantastic views over the ocean. It's perhaps a little more expensive than some of the other beachfront hotels but in my view certainly worth paying a little extra for. The staff at this resort are so friendly and really do their best to make your stay extra special. We will most certainly return to this excellent resort.

Make sure to get an oceanfront balcony room.  The sunsets are amazing. While a bit dated, the service at this property is amazing.  The views incredible.  And the food very good.  Definitely one of the top places to stay in Laguna Beach.

Stayed here for 3 nights over Christmas. Absolutely outstanding accomodations, and what a superb staff. In spite of dealing with an overflow crowd, valets to concierges were fabulous. Can't recommend highly enough. Beautiful pool, beach, terraces, and great food to boot in various venues. The lower level bar is spectacular.

Loved this hotel. Gorgeous location, comfy beds and beautiful view of ocean from room.   Fantastic service.  Cannot wait to go back!!!! I miss the sound of the waves as I fall asleep and wake up in morning!!!!!

Went with my husband and his company, there were probably just under 100 of us. The room was spacious, well appointed, and cozy - we had the doors open most of the time. All of the rooms at this resort face the beach, as in you look down from your balcony and it's sand. We even saw a whale one day with our binoculars from our balcony!! The food was fantastic. The only weird thing was walking through the fairly fancy hotel restaurant in order to get to the pool - nothing like walking through someone's baby shower in your pool wear! It rained a lot when we were there, but the hotel provides umbrellas at the front door to take with you when you head out. Concierge service was amazing. It is a pretty quiet hotel, and the carpets seemed to roll up quite earlier. But they have a

Nolan set us up with a reservation and Marscella (might be spelled differently) checked us in and out. Nolan was super awesome and made it easy for us, he helped with the bags and setting the room up to best fit our style. Marscella made sure that we knew if we needed anything they would get it for us. She had the best attitude and wanted to make sure we were happy no matter what. It was absolutely gorgeous! Great clean rooms and great service all around. Bell hop, house keeping, valet and front desk. The view is insane from all over the hotel from the beach to the pool.

As I read the other reviews how wonderful this place is I am reminded that everyone has an opinion and if you are used to living in dirt maybe dirt doesn't bother you.  There are several things that stick out about this hotel that just don't make sense when giving it 4 or stars as a rating.  1) Tile grout is supposed to be beige and it's BLACK.  I've got pictures where I used a white towel that was wet and just went over the grout five or six times and it was black coming off the beige grout.  2) I inquired why they held $1800 on my card when my bill was prepaid.  I never got a response except they usually do $200 per day.  That's fine and dandy, but I wasn't staying there nine days.  I was booked for five.  3) When we got to the hotel at 9 pm we were informed that the room we
Manager Response: Dear Brian B.  On behalf of Surf & Sand, I would like to apologize that we failed to exceed your expectations. We truly appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your feedback. If you ever find yourself in the area and reconsidering our offer for a return one night stay, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. I can be reached by calling the resort's main number, 949-497-4477, and asking for Misty Lindo. Again, I apologize for the frustrations of your recent stay. If given the opportunity, I am positive we could provide you with a flawless stay.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Staff was very friendly.  Room was tidy.  We could have used a/c but they supplied us with two fans for the room.  Kids loved being literally right on the beach.  Can't beat this location.  Went out on the ocean with kayaks and paddle boards and hung out with the sea lions.  It's something the kids will never forget.  We had a baby sea lion stay with us most of the day.  An awesome experience!  Great shopping at the Fashion Island in Newport. Fun time at Disney Adventure.  An overall great trip!  Would book this hotel again!

The surf and sand is a local legend for quality and pricing value in a super expensive market. It is Laguna so nothing is cheap but the surf and sand offers the most for a high end Laguna property. Make sure to close the door at night or you will wake up with sea gulls in your room.

This beautiful facility is located right on the Pacific Ocean with access to the beach. There is A view of the ocean from everywhere including the pool and restaurants. It is very clean and attractive and the staff is first rate! We will definitely return and will recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the five star review! We enjoyed having you as our guest and look forward to seeing you again.  Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary: We were here for work. Everyone on staff was pleasant.  Our view was of the water and we were very close to the water and heard the surf as we slept. There are some rooms overlooking the pool and others that are behind other parts of the hotel and these have a balcony that's by the sidewalks.  If you don't arrive early, you will get one of these.

Summary Heading: Experience a little bit of heaven on earth at the Surf and Sand
Summary: The Surf and Sand is our favorite place to go when we have an event to celebrate or when we need to push the pause button. The spa services at Aquaterra are excellent, the food at Splashes is exceptional, and then there's the ocean!

The room was gorgeous (the sound of the surf pounding below), food amazing, and every staff person we encountered professional and friendly. Splashes restaurant served up some of the best food we have had in awhile. This was the perfect way to celebrate our 30th anniversary.

Summary Heading: My favorite hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: There is something about the waves crashing right outside your sliding glass door that really provides the Laguna Beach/Southern California experience.  Though the Surf and Sand is only an hour from our house it feels like we are on a grand vacation whenever we stay.  We walk into town on the street side and then walk back on the beach after the tide has gone out.  Couldn't be better.

My husband and I were celebrating our wedding anniversary at Surf and Sand.  We were treated to champagne and chocolate covered strawberries in our room.  We received our favored location with the most gorgeous view of the ocean.  We kept our slider door open during the night to listen to the waves.  Surf and Sand is our favorite hotel/resort to celebrate a special occasion.  The staff is warm and welcoming and we love Splashes bar and restaurant.

First time I've been back to stay here in several years. As a hotel guest, I found it impossible to buy a drink in their bar. The place is jammed, and what is really frustrating, they have a beautiful outdoor lounge on the entry level with blazing fire pits even a fireplace, with very comfortable seating, but no bar service! Over three nights, I failed to buy a drink! When I individually asked both the restaurant maitre d' and the hotel concierge, I was told I can stand and wait for a seat to become available, and since  the restaurant was reorganized its been frustrating for lots of guests.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   On behalf of Surf & Sand, I apologize for the frustrations you experienced in our bar. Please know that your comments will be shared with our entire team so we can seek ways of improvement.   I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance. We look forward to having you back with us.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Fantastic relaxing resort overlooking the Pacific Ocean
Summary: We had a wonderful two nights at this resort.  Especially notable are the amazing staff - extremely accommodating, friendly, and accommodating!  Brendan was terrific - ensuring that our stay was terrific! -large spacious room with very comfortable beds  -overlooked Pacific Ocean -balcony Knowing that we were celebrating our 50th anniversary, wine and chocolate strawberries  were sent to our room!  What a surprise!  - very highly recommend!

I get so excited when I talk about this Hotel, seriously!!!! I cannot say enough good things about it!!!! First and foremost let me give some praise to some of the staff!  Lisa L in reservations, you are the best ever and I appreciate you more than you will ever know!  Thanks for all your help!!!!!!  Brendan, you, made me feel so special and welcome as well as Allyssa, Steph, Marcella and Jeff!!! You people at the front desk are awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Can I say, we stayed here on an online special and when we drove up in our Ford Taurus and saw Bentley's, Mercedes, BMW's, and Range Rovers, I felt a little inferior, but from the moment we were greeted, I felt as important as any guest on the premises, honestly!!!!  The location of this hotel is literally right at the tip of the
Manager Response: Dear Barbara,   What an incredible review! This means the world to us and we are VERY happy you enjoyed your stay. You comments will be celebrated with out team. Thank you for sharing your feedback. We look forward to seeing you soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel a couple of times now and always think of it when I am looking for a relaxing, beautiful place to get away for a night or two.  The hotel is situated right on the water so you have an ocean view from every room and you can hear the waves crashing the entire night.  It literally lulls me to sleep every time!  If you are a sensitive sleeper then ask for a room on the top floor (and they provide ear plugs but why you would want to use them I have never understood).  I make sure to stop at the bar when I stay at this hotel as they have the BEST cheese platter and a good wine list too.  It also sits right on the water so the view is fabulous and the atmosphere is casual and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review! We are happy you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: awesome place great location friendly staff clean rooms good food definitely will stay here again close to shops bars and restaurants right on the beach views of catalina cant beat a so. cal laguna stay

There was no seating at the beach or pool. We tried to sit at the restaurant and the hostess would not allow us to be seated.. We had to return to our room and left the next morning . Front desk staff was very disappointing and basically did nothing to make us fell more comfortable.   This is the fourth time at this property.  Totally disappointing!
Manager Response: Dear Marsha,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. September in Laguna Beach is a very busy time and the resort is typically fully committed. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter and cooler.     I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance. We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: The best hotel I've ever been at!
Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at Surf And Sand inLaguna beach and I simply blown away. The location itself is stunning! We had a room on The 9th floor facing the ocean ! for as beautiful as the property is ,it's true star is the staff, who are welcoming, friendly, and helpful ! They welcomed us with a bottle of wine complementary ,chocolate and even a treat for my dog :)) The concierge team were beyond helpful specially Kathleen who took care of my dog and arranged this amazing spa for her. The Spalshes restaurant in the hotel was absolutely amazing! The food was great and the service was super perfect!! The room was beyond beautiful , clean and welcoming We truly felt at home, and this is just a perfect location and way to vacation. The property itself is one of a kind in

Wonderful long weekend with excellent customer service in a beautiful setting! The breakfast the restaurant was delicious and dinner at Splashes was extra special.  Very friendly, and professional staff!

Everything you want in a luxury hotel. The service is top notch, with everything you need at your fingertips. The rooms are literally on the beach.  The hotel is located within walking distance to restaurants, Bars, and shopping. The beach is just steps away.

This was a great hotel and you cannot believe you are right on the sand and water. SO close in fact, that the Hotel supplies earplugs if you don't want to hear the crashing waves.  Staff and accommodations were great as well as a convenient walking distance to most everything in the area.

The hotel was beautiful but what really topped it off was the restaurant. The food was amazing!! All of the dishes that were served were outstanding, from the appetizer to the dessert. The lobster doughnut with the shishito peppers was my favorite dish of the night; however everything that I had, had so much flavor and was delicious. Me being a foodie, I would recommend this restaurant to everyone. Also the service was excellent in the hotel and in the restaurant.  I will definitely come back.

Our oceanfront room in the main building was all about the ocean. At high tide the waterways actually under our balcony and at low tide the beautiful beach was there. The room was nicely furnished and in very good condition. The sound of the ocean, views and proximity to town make the S and S an excellent choice.

Stay at this hotel. You will not be disappointed. Food, rooms, service all over the top.  But the view is unreal. Right on the beach. The water actually hits the hotel at night. Splashes restaurant is also right on the water and great food.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review! We are happy you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Great ocenfront hotel with very nice facilities (restaurant, bar) but limited beach
Summary: Stayed in a tower king, overlooking the ocean.  comfortable room and very usable balcony.  Enjoyed the sea breezes in Splashes bar and dinner overlooking the water from the al fresco dinning.  very close to PCH and might hear some road noise because room open onto an outside corridor and the doors are not sealed.

Summary Heading: For every lover of the Sea!
Summary: A place not to be missed if you love the sight, sound, smell and feel of the sea!  I have traveled a fair bit and I am not one to go overboard with reviews (unless I have been blown away) and that is what this beautiful place did to me.  You will never get a room with a better view of the sea (or closer to it) unless you are on a cruise ship!  What started out as a girls night turned into another visit (solo) for me (a few days later) just to spend the whole time at the resort savoring my room with the beautiful view and the pleasures of the property.  Being lulled to sleep at night by the sound of the sea ... incredible!  (For those of you who find that sound may be too much after awhile, no worries.  The Resort provides earplugs for you.)  I cannot even imagine using them and
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing review. We are happy to hear you love the sea as much as we do. Our back yard is truly incredible!  We hope to see you again soon!  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Surf and Sand - Best hotel in Laguna Beach
Summary: I just had my birthday celebration at the Surf and Sand and it was the best birthday yet. The service is incredible. Misty, Michael and Brandon were amazing and so helpful. Not only is the view breathtaking but I had the best sleep of my life. The hotel is great for couples, families and just friends getting together. It is perfect and an experience you will never forget. This is a special place. I will definitely be back very soon!

When we first pulled in to the hotel we were not impressed with the service-valet did not greet us. But the rest of the staff was amazing! The room was outdated and smelled when we first walked in. i expected a higher end room for the price-it was right on the ocean which was beautiful but I rather have a nice room. One night was enough I could not have stayed another night in room.
Manager Response: Dear Jesspete,   On behalf of the Surf & Sand, I apologize for any displeasure during your recent stay. We pride ourselves in the quality services and products we provide for our guests. When we fail to exceed your expectations, we do not take it lightly. Please know that these items will be addressed.   Thank you for your feedback and for staying with us! If you do visit the area again, please feel free to reach out to the executive offices directly at 949-376-2761 to assist with accommodations.   Kindly,  Misty L.  Director of Front Office

Summary: This is my second stay and it did not disappoint. The oceanfront tower room is literally over the sand and the tide brings the water all the way up to the hotel. I sleep with the sliding glass door open so I can hear the ocean waves - its amazing. This boutique hotel has all the needed amenities. Staff were friendly and accommodating. Very clean - love the white linens.

Summary Heading: So, this is how the other half lives!
Summary: Totally iconic SoCal resort! The staff is incredible and their attention to detail is flawless. They anticipate your needs before you do. Enjoyed several meals on the property, unique and very good. Of course, an oceanfront balcony over the crashing surf is the icing on the cake! Well done, Surf and Sand!

Summary Heading: Lovely Property with Dog Friendly Enviornment
Summary: We had a great evening stay.  The rooms are well appointment and very cozy (not cozy small cozy good).  We overlooked the water.  Lovely view.  The location is dog friendly which Is great.  For the dog I would have loved it had they supplied bowls and a bed like Westins do.  The property is great.  Have dined at their restaurant before and food is consistent.  Grounds are pretty and right on the water.  Sadly, mother nature has done a number on the beach and a lot of it is rock.  Would highly recommend.

The room we stayed in was really nice and clean. The grounds were also clean. Friendly, knowledgeable staff. It was paradise from the moment we stepped into the hotel. The rooms are right over the beach. Everyone was deserves an escape like this. It was something I will never forget. We will be back yearly!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review Anita! See you next year!

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort right on the beach
Summary: This hotel was excellent my room overlooked the ocean slept with door wall open all night. The food was excellent and there is a great patio with patio fire pits for a nice nap cap. The hotel is looked in the center of many shops and restaurants you can walk every where. Other colleagues of mine were on the lower level and complained about the noice level of the ocean I recommend a floor a few levels up from the beach and you will find the sound of the ocean very soothing

We stayed one night in March on our way down to LaJolla. I was told by a couple people who knew the Laguna Beach area that Surf & Sand was all that, and the place to stay. So despite a crazy price of $650 for one night, I booked it. The property seems elegant when you pull into the paver entry but it is soon apparent there is no charm here. No gardens or grounds to speak of. Ocean views are only in the rooms or restaurant/bar. The room was in the lower building, and the view when walking into the room was wonderful through the plantation shutters and door wall. As it was a lower level room however, we were looking at the restaurant and pool area which is not a wonderful view. The room was on the smallish side and showed age and wear. Bathroom smallish also but nicely appointed.

Pretentious.  Laguna has changed so much, and so has the Surf and Sand.  Our little jewel/artist colony has become little "Irvine by the sea." Staying here this time felt like having an exclusive key to a place you aren't invited.  We got married here 15 years ago, before the spa addition and the upgrades to facilities and it was a different experience.  We live in West LA and South Bay and fell in love with the hotel's casual elegance, rooms over the crashing waves, and great staff & service.  We were so happy to come here after experiencing the snootiness of places like Shutters on the Beach in Santa Monica. After our beautiful wedding and getting on with life and kids, working , & traveling the world we came back to Laguna every so often.  We always thought the

Upon our arrival, we were already smitten. Seeing our suite absolutely sealed it for us and our kids. We had a two bedroom suite with a fireplace that just took a regular exercise ending in to a romantic beach getaway. My husband and I plan on returning for our next milestone annuversary. Beautiful plaxe,beautiful people and they really treat you like family.

I had not been to this property since I was a kid actually, but my wife and I decided to stay there for a couple nights this week and all I can say is we loved it. I really can't think of a better hotel to stay at in Laguna beach. The property is right on the sand, they have really nice pool, and the rooms are nicely decorated. When checking in they upgraded us for free to the tower building and our view was amazing. The one thing that I will miss is hearing those waves crashing all night, felt like I was sleeping on the beach itself. We had lunch at the restaurant twice and both times we really enjoyed our meals. We would have had dinner there also but we figured we needed to venture out at some point. Overall this hotel gets a high rating for us because it checked all the
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for visiting us again! We hope you'll visit soon so you can enjoy dinner in Splashes :) We promise to make your stay just as perfect as the last!  Kindly,   Misty L.  Director of Front Office

Summary: This is the first time I have ever reviewed here. I felt compelled to because our stay here was so magnificent!    The staff at the hotel goes out of their way to make sure you are completely happy. The room we had was beautiful and clean. The bed was very comfortable and the view was beyond comprehension!  The water came up under us at high tide and then exposed the sand and coastline as it withdrew outward. The pounding waves were beautiful to watch. I don't need to go to Hawaii to feel like I was away on vacation!   I will be back and will bring my family next time. This time I brought my girlfriend and we had a romantic getaway!....Absolutely PERFECT!!! I highly highly recommend. Bailey set my reservation up and took the time I needed to make everything just as I would have

Summary Heading: Excellent weather, beautiful hotel and terrific staff made our stay outstanding!
Summary: You can't ask for much more when you want a hotel near the beach with stunning views like the Surf and Sand Hotel provides. The hotel team lead by Brad Gibbs was at every step of the way. The entire team helped in every facet of my visit from the attendant who helped me unload my vehicle to Oscar Alvarado who helped me set our conference room to Michele Frank who checked on us regularly to make sure everything went well. Ohhh and I can't forget Frank Maciel who helped make dinner a perfect culmination to the event. I am very appreciative of all the efforts of the Surf and Sand team for making our stay memorable. The weather also complied with a very warm day to do some work by the pool. Try the burger if you had your workout. Make sure you try the workout room where it has
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for this review. We will ensure it is shared and celebrated with our entire team. We hope to see you again soon and thank you for staying with us.  Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: Our organization booked a conference at the Sand and Surf for the second year in a row. It is a beautiful hotel on the beach. Staff is friendly and helpful. The conference facilities were very good. Our buffets both evenings were filled with variety and delicious choices. Lovely place to stay.

This hotel is okay but my experience upon check in was so very concerning. I was given a room that required going down stairs and a long hallway. I went back to the front desk to explain I had knee problems and couldn't go up and down stairs. They were veryunhelpful and kept saying "we don't have anymore rooms". And even the manager didn't offer to help in anyway!!!  It's amazing to me that they can even have rooms that don't have elevator access. The whole experience really put me off this hotel - be warned!! The rooms are just okay - small and not that special for the price you are paying.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   I cannot apologize enough for your experience at the resort. We pride ourselves in the quality services and products we provide for our guests. When we fail to meet your expectations, we do not take it lightly. I do hope you will visit us again in the future so we can provide you with a flawless stay. Please feel free to reach out to the executive offices at 949-376-2761 for any future needs.
