We do have plenty of rooms with direct elevator access that we would be happy to reserve for you with advanced notice. Again, I apologize profusely for the disappointment in your recent stay.   Kindly,   Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: I stay at the this resort on business most times and it never disappoints.  The rooms are comfortable and view unrivaled. The food is good and restaurant is on the sand. Nice place to just relax and have a nice lunch.  The pool area is perfect  -- comfortable lounge chairs and great bar service.  Tip:  bring down your beer if want, order a water and tip the servers  - that will score you some points and they won't hassle you about outside beverages.  The restaurants around the hotel are amazing too.  Walking distance for pretty much anything if you want to explore other options. The beach just steps down from the pool is nice and quiet.  Feels like your own beach .

Fantastic service, fantastic staff, lovely room, spectacular view, delightful stay. This hotel has  a perfect location. Beautiful white linens, the room was very clean and beautiful. The restaurant was very beautiful and lovely. Pool area was sparkling clean and the service was wonderful I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review! We look forward to your return visit.   Kindly,  Misty L. Director of Front Office

Summary: This was our 3rd (maybe 4th?) time staying at the Surf and Sand.  Laguna is a yearly tradition for us and we stayed at the Ritz multiple times when we first started going, but we haven't gone back after trying S&S.  The location of S&S is just amazing.  You are literally on the beach with the waves crashing outside your room, the hotel bar and the restaurant, Splashes.  The only complaint we had before was the (very) tiny bathrooms and rooms in the regular surfside rooms, but we stayed in the tower this time and the room and bathroom were wonderful.  The bar is outstanding and has the best location I've ever seen for a a bar.  Splashes is beautiful and the breakfasts are outstanding.  My husband and I basically don't even leave the resort other than to venture out for lunch.

Two days here is like a week in paradise. Relax. On the beach. Get away from it all. Thursday's Art Walk in town is awesome; great people watching; excellent beach combing; and gorgeous property. The rooms are clean, comfortable and beautiful.

The hotel was very clean and comfortable. We attended a wedding at this facility and was extremely pleased with all the party activities attended. The food was delicious as well as the  staff were very attentive and pleasant. We would defiantly return to this hotel again.

This was the 4th time I've stayed here, every trip has been for business. I've always been in the main tower until this trip. The rooms in the main tower are very spacious, and they are right on the beach. Beautiful view of the water and coastline. This trip when I checked in I was grumpy from traveling 7 out of the past 10 days and I was pretty set on having a room on a top floor so nobody would be above me. I'd just come from a hotel in LA where I had to listen to what sounded like a bowling alley above me for two nights. There were no top floor rooms in the main tower, so I was in the process of grudgingly taking a 7th floor room when one of the front desk employees, Connor, stepped in. He told me he found a top floor ocean front room, and had the person checking me in move

Gracious and beautiful from the moment we arrived......We chose a place to celebrate our wedding anniversary that was on the beach.  Surf and Sand did not disappoint.  We arrived significantly later than we expected and the front desk staff was extremely nice and helpful.  We were upgraded to a Catalina jr. Suite and the room was beautiful.  (Thank you!)  This was a perfect way to celebrate our 10 yr. anniversary.  In the morning the view was incredible and the hotel, you are literally on the beach.  We spent the morning relaxing on our very large patio, sipping coffee and then we went to have the most delicious breakfast at the hotel.  Our server was Scott, he could not have been more pleasant.  He offered suggestions, treated us kindly and was very thoughtful.  He was truly
Manager Response: Dear welovetravelsf,  Thank you for your wonderful review. I am extremely happy to hear that we were able to make your 10 year anniversary one to remember! Your kind comments will be passed along to our staff. We look forward to your next visit. Happy anniversary again!  Sincerely,  Kevin Chan Surf and Sand Resort

Summary: The story starts off with my wife and I celebrating our 20th wedding anniversary in Laguna Beach at another hotel for 3 days. When we arrived late in the day at the other hotel we were less than impressed to say the least. We had no idea what to do but knew we had to leave. Frustrated and not knowing where to go we said a prayer and happened to pull into the Surf & Sand resort and that‚Äôs when our unforgettable experience began. I went into the hotel to the smiling faces of Misty, Stephanie, and Kay where I was greeted warmly. I told them our situation and they booked us into a DREAM room worthy of a 20 year anniversary, at a fraction of the price that was as close to the ocean a room could be.   When we checked in, Misty told us that they were overbooked for the additional 2
Manager Response: Dear Steve,  Thanks so much for the review! Our team had a blast celebrating your anniversary. We truly look forward to celebrating many more with you and your beautiful wife! We are so happy you stumbled upon our property.   We hope to see you soon!  Kindly,  Misty L.

Summary Heading: A Must Place for a Beach Vacation
Summary: The "Surf and Sand Resort" is a must stay for a beach vacation in Southern California. Hotel rooms are beautifully appointed, the beach view is gorgeous, the water is blue and the sand is white. The staff is genuinely friendly and helpful. We loved the location - nice walk to Laguna central area or take the trolly everywhere.  We drove from Arizona, parked our car at the hotel, and didn't need to get back in it until we left.  Excellent restaurants and nice pool.  A great place for couples, friends, and family.  We are going back!
Manager Response: Hi Vicky,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. I am extremely happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! I will be sure to pass along your kind words to our staff and management. We look forward to your next stay with us.  Sincerely,  Kevin Chan Surf and Sand Resort

Summary: We live in OC and decided to sneak away for one night.  Checked in early, checked out late and had a great time.  Perfect weekend getaway.  No complaints.  The Laguna Beach trolley took us into town.  Wait time is less than 10 minutes and travel time was 8 minutes.  Great time.

We have stayed here on three separate occasions over the past few years.  The location is stunning, right on the beach and the rooms are beautiful, as is the restaurant and bar.  We have generally stayed 5-7 nights previously.  It's our favourite place in California.

Like other reviewers, the lack of air conditioning ruined the stay. A portable fan was supplied but didn't help. The room overlooked the pool and bar/restaurant. Unfortunately there was quite a bit of noise coming from the pool area and with the need to leave the balcony doors open, it made an unpleasant situation worse.     The staff couldn't have been nicer.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   The cooler months are now upon us and the resort is much cooler and quieter. We do hope you will visit us again at this time to experience how truly wonderful the resort can be.  Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office  directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Not Bad, Just Not Great Compared to Other Properties in the Area
Summary: Not awful... just very disappointing at this price point. Ritz, Montage and St. Regis all offer better experience, nicer amenities, finer dining and for the love of God... air conditioning... that could've made all the difference. We checked out early because the room was so miserably hot, it was impossible to enjoy. Our experience was totally soured by the 90+ degree room... even with the doors open and fans blowing all night... it felt more like a two star property in Rosarita than a 5-star property in Laguna.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay. On behalf of Surf & Sand,  I extend our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. I understand the room was very warm during your visit making for an uncomfortable stay. As the days are finally beginning to cool down, we would love for you to visit us during the off season. I can assure you the resort will be much quieter and cooler. If you do opt to visit us again, please contact our executive offices at 949-376-2761 for assistance.  Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Exactly as advertised. Actually, even better
Summary: This place is beautiful.  Wonderful hotel, great pool & beach.  The room was perfect - comfy bed, gorgeous balcony with unbeatable view.  win-win.  The restaurant is quite fancy, so if traveling with kids - It's nice that there are other restaurants in the area.  If you were not traveling with kids, this would be a gorgeous and wonderful retreat.  The no air conditioning is weird. If you're a hot body, it might bother you.  We had 2 fans running and were fine. It was unusually hot for October.  The ocean sounds are just a great way to drift off though!  I would definitely return and recommend.

Summary Heading: Do not stay here during a heatwave!  Their A/C does not work on the ocean view rooms.
Summary: This used to be one of our favorite staycation destinations in Sourthern California.  My husband's work had a conference there last week.  It was 80 plus degrees in Laguna beach and the hotel air conditioning was not working.  We could not sleep all night.  The unit was on the eighth floor where the heat rises.  It was like trying to sleep in a toaster oven.   It took us two more days at home to recover the sleep we lost from one night's stay.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for sharing your  positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Your comments are very important to us and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.   This October has been extremely warm! I cannot apologize enough for any discomfort you experienced. As the cooler months are approaching, we would love the opportunity to have you as our guest when the resort is much cooler and quieter.   Please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary: We stayed here for our anniversary. This wasn't our first visit and it won't be our last--this is an amazing property right on the water. You won't want to leave your deck. Splashes bar is right on the water...
Manager Response: Happy Belated Anniversary! Thank you for staying with us and thank you for such a great review! We hope to see you next year.... if not before.  Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Overall stay disappointing and not worth the price
Summary: My fianc√© and I were very excited for our stay at the Surf and Sand, but were disappointed with our overall visit.  While I understand the hotel is on the beach and there is an ocean breeze, I was very surprised that there was no air-conditioning.  This is supposed to be a luxury hotel and I would expect air conditioning (I've certainly been to warmer climates/beach hotels and all of them had air conditioning).  The room itself was nicely decorated and the view was beautiful.  We were in an ocean king suite which is located on the 2nd floor and overlooks the ocean.  HOWEVER, it was very hot and humid in our room and as I said there was no air conditioning.  We had to keep our balcony doors open all day and night.  As a result, our room was damp and the carpeting was sticky.  It
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared  with our entire management team to address improvements.   The concerns you mentioned are plentiful and embarrassing. I apologize profusely for such a disappointing stay. Please know that we strive to exceed all of our guests expectations. When we fail to do so, we do not take it lightly.  If any of your future plans bring you to the Laguna Beach area, please feel free to reach out to me directly at 949-376-2778. It would be my pleasure to oversee any future accommodations to ensure perfection.  Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary: The uniqueness of this location makes one the most beautiful places on the planet. The service her is exemplary, and rooms are well appointed. I stayed here twice in the last 12 months, and had great experiences. The restaurant, and bar are very convenient to guests of the hotel. The pool is centrally located and has the most important destination in the hotel, "the Bar". The beach service is phenomenal, the crews provide umbrellas and chairs to hundreds of guest in an instance. The valet crew is super happy and even take your car to a car wash.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Laguna!
Summary: The number one best resort to stay in Laguna Beach! Hear the ocean waves crash on shore from your room.  Walking distance to restaurants and shops.  Perfect romantic getaway or trip with friends.  Drinks at sunset at Splashes Bar a must!

Summary Heading: Subjected to 95 degrees in our room! No AC!!!
Summary: They subject their guests to rooms that are too warm for an upscale resort. They are not upfront or forthright at the time of reserving a room that it might be an issue for their guests. Our room was 95 degrees upon arrival and never cooled down. We canceled the rest of our stay after one night. Though we found another upscale hotel to stay in, we were surprised that even the least expensive hotels in the area had AC. So, not having AC is not a common practice for coastline hotels as Surf and Sand might suggest.

Summary Heading: No air conditioning and hot enough for Hades...
Summary: I could weave a bunch of words together about how pretty the lobby was, or that the room was nicely appointed, but one thing really stood out the most: there's no AC in the rooms. Picture a blistering 93 degree day. And no AC. For $600 a night. (I produced my hotel confirmation at checkout, as there seemed to be some disbelief at the $600 per night we paid when I relayed my overall experience.) When the bellman took us to 433 and opened the door to reveal a sauna of a room, I thought that this had to be some horrible mistake. It was like stepping into a cauldron. I called the front desk and asked if they had ANY rooms with AC. Nope. At 3:30 in the morning, I was shuffling a heavy ottoman closer to the open doors in hopes of propping a fan to get some air in the room. Open doors
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Q,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   I understand the extreme heat we've been experiencing lately paired with the lack of AC in your guest room made for an uncomfortable stay. I cannot apologize enough for this! As the cooler months are approaching us, the resort is quieting down. We'd love the opportunity to host another visit for you during the cooler months. I have faith we can provide you with a flawless stay!  If you do opt to stay with us again, please contact me directly. It would be my pleasure to oversee any future needs.   Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office  949 497 2778

Summary: Simply amazing hotel. The ocean view rooms are breathtaking. The staff is always extremely helpful and eager to help. Food was delicious, cocktails as well. Swimming pool area can get a bit busy over the weekends. It is a bid expensive but it is worth it

Compared to the other luxury properties in the area (Montage, St. Regis, Ritz), the Surf and Sand is a good choice for a more financially conservative traveler.  There's no magic here, though, and you get what you pay for.    At the Surf and Sand, it's all about the prime oceanfront location.  All of the rooms offer jaw-dropping views of the pacific and well-equipped, large rooms.  Unfortunately, the other amenities leave much to be desired.  The pool area was so overcrowded that it was almost impossible to even get into the pool/spa. Forget about having a lounge chair near the pool, those were 100% taken at 7am. The service at the bar and restaurant was astonishingly bad.    If you want to be on the beach (in Laguna) with a decent room and an on-site restaurant (albeit with bad
Manager Response: Dear Kerri,   Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay. On behalf of Surf & Sand, I extend our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.     As we are approaching the off season, the resort is quieting down. We would love to have you visit us during this time so we can provide you with a flawless stay and some space by the pool. If you do opt to stay with us again, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. It would be my pleasure to oversee any future accommodations personally to ensure perfection.  Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office  949.497.2778

Summary Heading: Location, Location, Location (and that's about it)
Summary: My husband took me here for a birthday stay-cation. We've been experiencing a serious heat wave in Southern California and even the coastal cities are baking! We live near the coast in Newport Beach and like most homes in the area, we don't have A/C, so when I heard we were staying at the Surf & Sand for a one night getaway, the first thing I thought was "Air conditioning!!!" Much to my surprise, the resort doesn't have A/C... I'm sorry, what? When we walked into our room, it literally felt like a blistering sauna with no way to cool it off other than a couple of dirty floor fans. :( I would guess it was 99 degrees in our room.  The resort itself is located on the sand, literally beautiful, however the hotel is so rundown. It's truly a shame that they have 5 star location with
Manager Response: Dear Dana M,   Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay. On behalf of the Surf & Sand, I extend our sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.   I understand the extreme heat we've been experiencing made for an uncomfortable stay. I cannot apologize enough for this! Please know that all of your feedback will be reviewed with the entire management team so we can seek ways of improvement.   We would enjoy having you as our guest when this heat wave has passed! Please feel free to reach out to the executive offices at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,   Misty L

Summary: We LOVED our stay here. Being right on the water was incredible. We stayed in a suite and it was total luxury. Staff was very friendly and attentive. Breakfast in the Slashes restaurant was included in our package and very tasty. About a mile to the heart of Laguna and easy to walk there.

Summary Heading: Surf and Sand Resort is my favorite escape
Summary: This resort is small yet elegant and has the best view in Laguna Beach of the ocean.  It is not far from where I live, yet it feels like another world. I cannot wait to return.  It is so serene and beautiful and the restaurant, Splashes is excellent and the bar downstairs is great.

The hotel is beautifully appointed, everything done with great taste. The personnel was exceptionally professional and pleasant. A special compliment to the three women at the front desk; Jade, Kaye and Marcella. When they found out it was a birthday celebration, they went out of their way to accommodate us and together with the rest of the staff from room service to valet made our stay memorable. We definitely recommend the Surf and Sand Resort and we will return.

The room had a great view of the ocean but there was no air conditioning, when we entered the room it was like 100 degrees, they had all the door shut with the sun beaming in.  For the price it is not worth the stay without air conditioning.  Maids walked in on us for turn down service without even knocking and it was very unprofessional.  No one even warned us when we checked in that there would be a turn down service.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. I am so sorry the extreme heat we've been experiencing lately paired with the lack of AC available in your room made for an uncomfortable stay.   I welcome you to visit us during the off season when the area is much cooler with pleasant coastal breezes. If you do opt to visit us again, please do not hesitate to contact the executive offices at 949-376-2761, so we can handle your booking personally.  Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary: Myself and my newly engaged fianc√© stayed at the Surf & Sands after 10 days travelling around Los Angeles, San Francisco and Vegas..  We chose the Surf and Sands resort as a means of relaxation for the final two nights of our holiday.    The Hotel Staff were very attentive, The hotel was beautiful and our SurfSide King room was AMAZING! - Falling asleep and waking up to the waves crashing under your room was near enough perfect.    The Breakfast, especially the French Toast was amazing -  It must have been for my fianc√© to have it two days running.    The only down side to our stay were two large wedding parties being held at the hotel; one on the Friday night and one on the Saturday.  This meant the pool was out of bounds at 5pm. This wasn't a major problem as our balcony had

Beautiful view and directly on the beach. You can hear the waves crashing in your room, it is awesome. The restaurant in the resort had great dinning options. This is one of those hotels you recommend to your friends like, " You have to stay here".
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for the five star review. We truly appreciate it!  Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary: If u don't want to fly to Hawaii the Surf and Sand is great but pricey. Great beach, food and location. The gym is not to hot however. The food and service at Splashes is excellent. Try the Hearts of Palm salad. My wife and I had it twice with chicken added. Fantastic. The pool and pool bar looked very nice but we chose to hang out at the beautiful clean beach right below the hotel property. If your looking for a get together spot with a few friends this is a great one. Bring some money
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for the review. The Hearts of Palm salad is my favorite! I am glad you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you soon.  Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary Heading: Awful Stay for Us in Warm Weather
Summary: First a bit of background:  I've stayed at the Surf and Sand before and enjoyed the location and sound of the surf crashing against the shore at night in the room.  Also, I typically do not mind hot weather and keep my thermostat generally no lower than 79 degrees.  While the room itself was fine and the location great, our most recent stay was the first time that I realized that our room has no air conditioning.  We had the door to the ocean open and the fan going, but it did nothing to alleviate the stifling conditions that lasted all night.  As I lay in a pool of my own sweat at what must have been 3 am, I could not believe that a hotel that purports to be a luxury destination lacks an amenity that you can find at most Motel 6's.  A cold shower was my only in-room

Do not come here expecting a peaceful romantic getaway by the beach. The rooms by the pool are so noisy, there aren't enough beds round the pool to sit everyone. The rooms are lovely as are the staff. The cocktails are poor. For the amount you are paying and it's a lot it simply isn't good enough. Go elsewhere
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you so much for sharing your  positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Your comments are very important to us and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.   I apologize for the disappointment of your stay. The summer months are very busy in Laguna Beach which does lead to a very busy resort. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter, cooler and we have the ability to offer more economical rates.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary: My future Son-In-Law hosted their engagement dinner here and the restaurant and Manager, Sam Chehayeb, scored a perfect ten!  We had a great selection of meals to choose from and everyone was pleased with their selections.  I was even able to drop off 6 bottles of Champagne earlier in the day to be chilled.  The service could not have been better.  Sam and his staff were always there to make sure that the night was an success.  When we are in Laguna Beach next time this will definitely be on our dining list again.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Good Day David B,  I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time in Splashes. What a special time for you and your family. We are happy to be a part of it.   Congratulations on the expansion of your family!  Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary: Checked in to this dump on an 85 degree day - no AC!  Also the room had a solid cockroach in it, and the hotel allows the locals to party at the pool, so expect a lot of tattooed low lifes hanging out getting drunk if you are hoping to relax.  Also we got the room late on a Friday night, and they charged us $380 and said "this was the best rate we could give you", gave us a ground floor (no view) room, and once we discovered the cockroaches they moved us up to an available ocean view room.  What a dump.
Manager Response: Dear Marc T,   On behalf of the entire team at Surf & Sand Resort, I'd like to apologize for your negative experience at the resort. We pride ourselves in the quality products and services we provide for our guests. When we fail to exceed your expectations, we do not take it lightly. If you have a moment, I'd love to discuss your stay in more details. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at 949-376-2778.   Kindly,  Misty L Director of Front Office

Summary: We had a beautiful view of the ocean and when the tide was high it was right under our balcony.  The room was nice and clean.  They do not have air conditioning so it can be hot in the summer months.  We were not hot overnight with the ceiling fan and the additional fan that the hotel provides, however it was quite hot as we were getting ready to go out the next day.  The staff was fabulous and the grounds are beautiful.

Summary Heading: No a/c but beautiful room and view
Summary: We loved the hotel but be aware that there is no a/c in the tower building.  The grounds and staff were very nice.  The room is large with a sleeper sofa and relaxing d√©cor.  Thank goodness for the ceiling fan and portable fans!!

Summary Heading: No Air Conditioning and Thunderous Crashing Waves
Summary: What a tremendous disappointment.  Despite a beachfront location and a very friendly staff, my overall experience was unpleasant.    All of the rooms are west facing with beautiful ocean views.  Sounds nice, but two horrible problems.  First, the rooms do not have air conditioning.  The afternoon sun is oppressive and the temperature in my room easily exceeded 90.  The singular ceiling fan and portable fan provided did not cool the room down.  I was advised to keep my door open to facilitate a cross ventilation and that didn't help much.  The second problem was the thunderous crashing waves.  The waves are very loud, which is why the hotel provides ear plugs on your bedside table.  This is compounded by the fact that I had to keep my patio door ooen to try to cool down the room.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.    We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, and cooler.    I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Misty Lindo Director of Front Office Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: We booked this hotel as a 5 day easy escape for our anniversary.    We arrived on an 87 degree day to enter an extremely HOT room with no AC.  Never a mention of no AC on the web, when I called or on American Express Travel. The room was literally unbearable.  Even Mexico and Hawaii hotels have air conditioning.  If we showered for dinner prior to sunset we were drenched in sweat before we were dressed.   STRIKE ONE.   We booked a month in advance yet our room was next to the dining terrace where they hold events.  If the tide and surf had not been exceptionally high we would have heard nothing but the MC.  As it was we heard it, but the sound of the surf helped to drown it out.  Was this location due to booking through American Express Platinum travel points?  If so, even
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.  Please know that we do not displace any reservations who book through American Express Platinum travel as we value our partnership greatly. I do apologize that the location of the room left much to be desired. The housekeeping concerns are unacceptable and will be addressed.   We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded and cooler.    I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Misty Lindo Director of Front Office Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: Great resort, right on the beach with a superb staff in all resort areas and a restaurant, Splashes, with 5 star food.  The property was very clean and in great condition for a beach facility.  We will definitely be back.

Summary Heading: Great location! Not so great hotel.
Summary: We've stayed here twice and both times we felt disappointed. The location is amazing and the staff is equally amazing. It's the rooms. There is no AC at all so the only way to cool off is to open the balcony door. But the SS lets people party it up all night at the pool and hot tub and during our stay they allowed a guy with two poodles to bark all night while he got drunk. So open the door and cool off but listen to the noise or shut the door and fry because the rooms all face west and they get hot! Plus NEVER allow them to book you in the center bldg over looking the pool. You will not be happy. We've tried the place twice now and we won't be back there are other options in Laguna for the price you pay.   But I will say again, very well trained and courteous staff best I've
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared  with our entire management team to address improvements.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter, and cooler.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office  directly 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.    Kindly,  Misty Lindo Director of Front Office Surf & Sand Resort

Summary Heading: Charming and helpful Brit team Concierge staff
Summary: This is wonderful place to stay! It's right on the ocean with all of the amenities. We especially enjoyed Diane and Sandra, the charming and helpful Brit team Concierge staff. They gave knowledgeable recommendations and made our stay easy, breezy. We were lulled to sleep by the ocean waves. Our boys enjoyed the beach and the pool. We would highly recommend staying here.

We enjoyed the Surf & Sand hotel.  Have stayed there a few times and always enjoy the ocean front venue.  It is not a typical hotel but rather unique, upscale beachy.  The pool was very relaxing during the week but got a little crowded on the weekend.  We watched the sunset each evening from our balcony, very romantic with a glass of wine.

Summary Heading: Was the best weekend all summer!!
Summary: Everything from start to finish was perfect at this hotel. Was the best weekend we had all summer! We love the location, the food, the room, and the service!               I can't wait to come again as soon as possible!!

The way, general manager Joanna Bear, handles the hotel, gives us more confidence to come back. Everything we have, was with great quality, restaurant manager and people at the kitchen new what they were doing, pleased to visit this romantic place

This hotel has amazing views  nice size room great pool but NO A/C? I  COULD NOT BELIVE IT. I never thought to ask the question "DO YOU HAVE A/C?" If I had known there was no A/C I would not have stayed here. We were not told that there was no A/C until I called the front desk to let them know the A/C was not working and then I was told. The front desk gave us another fan but it was horribly HOT.....  VERY UNFORTUNATE     Whenever I stay at any hotel before I leave I strip the beds and to my surprise the under sheets was DIRTY STAINED....... When checking out I let the front desk know and they apologized and  stated they would tell housekeeping.  So although this hotel is in a perfect place great views, great balconies, great pool be aware there is NO A/C AND CHECK THE SHEETS
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.  Please know that your concerns will be addressed as having stained linen is unacceptable.   We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, and cooler.    I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Misty Lindo Director of Front Office Surf & Sand Resort

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at the Surf and Sand
Summary: This is a first class resort in every respect. Go the spa for a facial or massage. They are excellent. Everyone one working there is friendly and tries hard to please the guest. The rooms are great with views of the ocean from your balcony. The beds are good.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Surf and Sand Resort.  I had been there for dinner many years ago and we planned a fast getaway for my Husband's Birthday.  I made the reservation by phone and was very happy with the results.  The property is gorgeous, our room had a wonderful view and we had a wonderful mini vacation. The only thing I could say was an issue, it was pretty hot in the room and we didn't see the fan until later that would have helped cool it down.

Summary Heading: The crashing of the waves at night are simply amazing!
Summary: I have stayed and had my parents have a weekend getaway get a way there on numerous occasions.  One was my wedding nightI. Almost 9 years ago, but I wouldn't haven't any otherway!  For one of their anniversaries I sent them here as well.  My mom so enjoyed it,between th Krispy sheets and duvet, to the waking up to see the crashing waves at nighttime and during the day, to the great breakfast to being treated like a queen by the staff, what's not to like?  My wedding night was not as gre as her weekend because they were remodeling the restaurant and it was in another room.  But oh well, we had to hurry to get on our flight to our honeymoon!  Overall, I Love the surf and Sand resort!

This was our third stay at The Surf and Sand and it was wonderful, as usual. Our room was very comfortable and tastefully decorated. Very comfortable king size bed. Bathroom was luxurious and cleaned every day. Splashes restaurant was great with a great beach atmosphere. The bar was just as fun. We love being right on the beach and enjoyed morning walks, looking at the interesting beach homes. One snag was the smoke alarm going off at 4:30 in the morning due to a low battery. Aren't hard-wired alarms standard now?

Summary Heading: Lovely Hotel and Amenities, Amazing Surf and Sand Experience
Summary: The weather was outstanding - 90 degrees, clear blue skies, and warm ocean waters - and this lovely hotel is literally right on the beach.  The waves pound the sand and you can sit on your balcony and look over the water.  The restaurant is gourmet and the bar has ocean views and serves excellent cocktails and more casual food.  We swam in the ocean every day, took an Uber to the Pageant of the Masters and Laguna Art Festival - which was also amazing.  If you love to swim in the ocean and spend time on the beach  - this is the place for you!  The room was also well appointed, but had a ceiling fan in lieu of air conditioning.  To ensure we were cool enough at night we left the sliding door open and window shutters closed but with the slat open to let in the breeze.  There is

Excellent location and service.  We stayed her in August for a quick anniversary getaway.  Great rooms and love the pounding sound of the ocean.  Not the best place to stay if you want to spend much time at the beach as the tide was high most of the trip.  Splashes - the restaurant - is excellent and the bar is a great place to watch the waves and have a drink.  We felt like we were alone in the hotel - even though it was semi-crowded, which is exactly what we wanted.

Summary Heading: Great service overshadowed by no air conditioning; shabby rundown  hotel.
Summary: If I had been asked "how was your stay" upon check out, I would have complained. But I was not asked. I was with my 70-year-old mother for a night away and attend the Pageant of the Masters. I had heard such great things about the Surf & Sand I wanted to experience it for myself. I was so disappointed. First- the lack of air conditioning is something that really should be promoted more prominently. I understand the hotel is at the beach, but at night our room was stifling. Even opening the windows did nothing- and the fan was useless. Also, the hotel needs a refresh. It feels rundown and tired- very dated. For $800 a night I would expect much more. I will say the service was the stand out- the staff were friendly and knowledgeable. It's a shame the state of the hotel does not
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.   We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, cooler, and more economical rates are available.    I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Misty Lindo Director of Front Office Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: From start to finish a stay at the Surf and Sand is perfection. We live and work in Las Vegas. That being said, we are highly aware of whet quality service looks like. Surf and Sand will not disappoint. If you are a frequent traveller, as I am, you can appreciate the little things. They miss nothing. Genuine smiles from EVERY team member of this hotel is is just the tip off the ice berg of service. If you're considering a visit to Laguna you have to stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for sharing your  positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Your comments are very important to us and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.   I am so pleased that you enjoyed the location, service and accommodations of the resort. We strive to provide all of our guests the attention they expect and deserve to ensure a pleasant stay and lasting memories.  Please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance. When your travel plans include Laguna Beach, we would enjoy having you as our guests once again.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear Resort Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: I am not sure where to begin because I wanted to like this hotel so much better.  I have been coming to Laguna for years and have walked past on the beach and thought it looked lovely.  My girlfriend and I came down in late August for a girls weekend and splurged (almost $800 per night).  Check in not until 4 which seems a little mean.  The main problem, no air conditioning.  It was a very hot weekend and the temperature inside the room was unbearable.  There is a ceiling  fan with one speed (slow).  They provided a couple of portable fans which still did not do the job.  It was almost impossible to sleep.  Other small points, two elevators, only one working, we had to request housekeeping at 4:30p and they seemed surprised that we wanted our room made up.  Nowhere to rinse off
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations from our housekeeping team, pool maintenance, to the unusual heat temperatures experienced. Please be assured that your comments are appreciated, taken very seriously, and are shared with our entire management team to address improvements.   Hopefully, your future travel plans will include Laguna Beach. I invite you to please reach out to our  Executive Office directly 949-376-2761 for another opportunity to have you as our guest.    Sincerely,  Joanna Bear  Resort Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: Had a very nice getaway night (with Spa package) here in early August. The property is in good shape, especially for being so integrated with the beach. The room very well done (although more accessible outlets would be nice to recharge electronics). The staff were great throughout, although interestingly the front desk staff were the least friendly and somewhat dismissive. The biggest downside is the price, which doesn't come as a surprise (everything is disclosed upfront) but still is a little hard to swallow (My 3 star rating factors in price; on quality alone I'd say 4).
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  I am pleased that you enjoyed our property and room accommodations.  Please be assured that your comments are very much appreciated and are shared with our entire management team.  I am disappointed to hear that our Front Desk did not provide you with the service we pride ourselves on and will be a training opportunity for us to prioritize.  Please let us know when we may offer our assistance in the future by contacting our Executive Office directly at 949-376-2761.  It is our pleasure to offer our services once again.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear Resort Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: News flash Surf & Sand, being on the beach does not mean air conditioning is optional.  We just returned from a stay and it was uncomfortably hot in our room, making it very difficult to sleep at night.  Leaving the sliding doors open does not cool the room down sufficiently - but rather, now you have to try and fall asleep in a hot room with the deafening roar of the ocean making sleep even less likely.  There are earplugs and fans in the room, good luck.    The location on the beach is great.  The pool is small, and there are a lot of kids and families in it so not really for adults.  Lots of chairs around the pool and good bar service.  There are fitness classes on the beach every morning, which I really enjoyed.    I always take the stairs, never the elevator, and the stairs
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations with our housekeeping service, room temperatures and quality of our stairs.   Thank you also for sharing the areas recommended for improvement.  Your comments are very important to us.  The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter, cooler, and we have the ability to offer more economical rates.  I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance. We look very forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear Resort Manager  Surf & Sand Resort

Summary Heading: Surf and Sand is hot and sandy
Summary: For $850 a night and no AC, no place to wash your feet when leaving the beach. As a result there is sand tracked in the hall, on the stairs. Our room and our friends next door both had ceiling fans that had loose blades that made them unusable. That was addressed pretty quickly (but in two rooms at the same time?) At  9 o'clock one morning we went to the beach and were unable to get back into the hotel because our key card would not open the gate. We finally gained access and found that our key worked just fine in our room lock. *2 degrees in our room. The only way to get ventilation was to leave the door to the hall open. You may not want to do that all night.  The staff was nice. Crowded parking and overworked valet service. Stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.  Please be assured that your comments are taken very seriously and are shared with our entire management team for improvements.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter and cooler.     I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear Resort Manager  Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: If you want a hotel on the beach then head to the Surf & Sand Resort.  We stayed in the tower building and the ocean was washing up on the sand right below our balcony. We loved it as well as the sound of the ocean, which is loud, but for me so soothing. Our sliding door stayed open always since the room is not air conditioned. The ceiling fan helps though. Unlike other Laguna Beach hotels you can go from your room to the beach in under a minute! How can you beat that!?  The rooms and bathrooms are roomy and well appointed.  Dining options at the hotel are limited but luckily you can hop on the free shuttle to the many restaurants in Laguna Beach. Getting a table during prime dining hours can be extremely challenging at the hotel. The rates are on the high side but fair given
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for sharing your  positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  Your comments are taken very seriously and are appreciated.  I am so pleased that you enjoy the location, service and accommodations of the resort. We strive to provide all of our guests the attention they expect and deserve to ensure a pleasant stay and lasting memories.  Please keep in mind that our rates do fluctuate during the year. Summer in Laguna is our very high demand period, which rates reflect.    Please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear Resort Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: That was my first get away weekend since the birth of my first child... So a much deserved "me time". The rooms with balcony right on the ocean are amazing, you feel privileged. You still have to know how to sleep at night with loud wave noise but that's a good problem to have. The staff is adorable, the property well maintained. The spa is also great. I will return for sure
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for sharing your  positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  As our very valued guests, I am so pleased that you enjoyed the accommodations of the resort;  our associates and Spa.     We certainly look forward to your return to stay with us.  Please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear Resort Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary Heading: should be called SURF AND SAND FAMILY RESORT
Summary: Make no mistake about this place it IS A FAMILY RESORT. I have a family too, but don't want to be climbing over them all the time. The beach and pool are so riddle with kids that there is barely any room for anything else. The pool is so packed with kids you can't even move it in. All would be good if they would just change the name to SURF AND SAND FAMILY RESORT.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed.  We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter and cooler.     I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear Resort Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary Heading: High end of our budget, but so relaxing
Summary: We had suffered illness in the family so needed a break away from all stress. This worked out to be the perfect spot. A lovely spacious room on the sixth floor of the Tower. A balcony with three arm chairs looking over the sea. We simply threw open the windows and let the sea breezes in which with the ceiling fan was perfect. We knew it was going to be expensive but we came away feeling it was worth it.

Randomly found this place this last weekend and had a great time in the beach side bar and lounge.  I had actually made a reservation for the restaurant but once we got seated in the bar we ditched the dinner reservation and ate a great meal in the bar.  The food was great, service was terrific and the views were breathtaking especially at sunset.  After 2+ hours in the bar we walked the property and found our way up on the pool deck and views from there are worthy of a day or two stay.  Although we didn't have a room I will definitely give this place another try!

Be warned....rooms average size, have NO A/C's (don't go during hot times), amenitites nice (but not what you'd expect for price being paid).  Many other luxury resorts in area for same price or cheaper which far exceed this place!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.   The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed.  We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is more relaxing, quieter, cooler and we have the ability to offer more economical rates.   I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.   We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear Resort Manager  Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: This property is right on the beach and has a loyal following.  But... for the high price they charge it definitely falls short.  The physical plant is dated and a bit tired. No AC in the rooms. Hotel amenities are small and always crowded.  The staff have to work like dogs to keep up with the demands of trying to run a "luxury hotel" in a budget box.

We did not stay the night so I can not vouch for the rooms though I'm sure they are amazing. We did visit the spa and tour the grounds and what an amazing place. There was a wedding going on and it was beautiful. The spa was great although a little pricey very nice and relaxing. They have a great pool and hot tub overlooking the beach with stairs right down to the sand so you can get warmed up then cool off in the ocean! Great place I recommend it to anyone that can afford it.

Summary Heading: A special day at a special place
Summary: We celebrated our "magna" anniversary this weekend.  The special day was made even more special by the location of this great property and the special treatment of their staff.  The view from our veranda was competitive with the coast of Italy.  The sound of the waves was a constant reminder that we were right on the beach. A swim in the Pacific was just a short elevator ride away.  A wonderful sunset was complemented with a bottle of Champagne on the balcony.  Then it was a short walk across the street where we had a truly superb dinner with arrangements made by the friendly and effective concierge staff.  We recommend the Surf and Sand if you want a grade 10 experience.

I have stayed at this property many times and this has by far been the most disappointing. I choose this location due to its higher standards and accommodations. I typically stay to get away and clear my head, however I could not wait to get home.   The bed was extremely uncomfortable; I was up very late trying to get some sleep. Due to the lack of sleep and lethargy in the morning, I called in the morning to get a later checkout and I was offered a 30 minute extension. We attempted to enjoy the afternoon and have lunch at the resorts restaurant and it was an absolute disappointment. The service was great, however every part of the meal was subpar. The restaurant staff were very helpful and courteous; the daytime hotel staff were rude.   It was a very short trip, however I am
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations.   As our loyal guest, please be assured that we take your comments very seriously and they will be shared with our entire management team for improvements in each area.    We would certainly enjoy the opportunity of having you return to Surf & Sand in the future.  I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 so we are able to accommodate the details of your stay personally and ensure you receive the service and exceptional stay you expect and deserve.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear  Resort Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: The staff was so accomodating.  We arrived late that night, they gave us a really late checkout so we could sleep in and get some beach time.  They also waived our parking just to be nice.  It's the little things that mean a lot and we were super impressed with this staff all around.  The ocean/beach here is also world class.

Summary Heading: Late check in, No AC, and loud noise
Summary: Our most miserable experience ever. It's unacceptable for the rates that they charge to not warn guests there's no air conditioning in rooms.  Our room was not ready until after 5pm. And the noise of the waves were unbearable. They provide earbuds by your bedside. We were told to sleep with the sliding doors open to let in the breeze (which is hot breeze in August) and to sleep with earplugs to block out the noises from the crashing waves.  NEVER ever again would we stay or recommend this place to our worst enemies. For the rates they charge... Invest into some air conditioning!

An excellent hotel on the beach and when lying in bed, it feels that you are on the Pacific Ocean on board a ship. Superb views of the sea and delightful restaurant with pan Pacific food. The location and pool service are wonderful.

I did not stay at this property but I had a great spa experience there!  The spa facility is great, separate women's and men's areas with outdoor jacuzzi, steam room, showers and beautiful meditation area.  My massage therapist was incredible.  What a phenomenal experience.    There was an issue with the scheduling of the appointment and the person at the guest reception was wonderful.  Settled everything while I was there.

Excellent hotel, with all the style and grace you would expect from a awesome resort, and better yet is  located right on the beach in Laguna.  Large spacious rooms with ocean views and all the amenities you expect in a first rate hotel robes (a must) excellent mini bar and wi fi.  the bar is located on the beach with spectacular views lunch and appetizers are wonderful.   The property is located close to many fine restaurant's and activities. A definite must if you want first class service, friendly  knowledgeable staff  and a wonderful experience.

Came with my family of 5 for some sun and summer beach fun.  The pool/beach/service/ location are 5 star The lack of Air conditioning make for noisy restless nights. You have to leave the balcony door open to get some air and the very loud crashing waves do not let you sleep.  This place is way overpriced and I would not recommend it, unless your not bothered by heat and noise when trying to sleep.  We had fun as a family, but the nights were restless and hot.  We cut our stay short and moved to another hotel that had Ac and no noise.  Very disappointed overall and would not recommend staying at the surf and sand.

I e stayed in several nice hotel in Laguna, but this is definitely my favorite. I had a suite overlooking the beach and it was glorious to wake up to the sounds of the waves crashing against the shore. The staff was very kind and friendly and the rooms were well kept and full of amenities.

Summary Heading: A great stay at the Surf and Sand Resort!
Summary: We booked our room on a third party site and got a decent rate.  The hotel is in the HIP District of Laguna Beach and about a 20 minute walk from most of the hotels/restaurants.  We enjoyed the location as the beach is somewhat secluded on both ends and it feels very secure.  We were placed in the SeaView Room which overlooks the pool but since we were on the first floor, we didn't have much of a view. We asked for a quieter room as we were celebrating my 50th birthday and had requested a room in the Ocean view Towers but no luck.  We made the best of it and enjoyed our stay just the same.  Coffee/tea at the Pacific Perk was a mere $2 each and a nice break from the other high prices at the resort.  We stayed on a Thursday and Friday night and they had a family night movie on the

No happy with this place, no ac, bathroom cabinets seemed water damaged, pocket doors did not lock and seemed in poor condition with many layers of paint indicating years of misuse. We seemed to find mold on the ceiling. Having to sleep with doors open because of no AC meant for a very LOUD night of very LOUD waves crashing, and not the romantic sounds of the ocean. Also felt a bit underserved (we're people of color) as compared to the guests who were ahead of us in line (who were white). Not worth the $700+/night rate.

Summary Heading: Great staycation that started as soon as I walked in the door!
Summary: I live locally in Laguna Beach and for my 50th birthday all I wanted to do was spend the weekend at Surf & Sand! I've traveled my entire life and manage a local spa so Customer Service is a huge deal to me...and man was I impressed! The check-in receptionist was so cheerful and interested in my visit to the resort. When she found out it was my birthday she, Alana Z., sent chocolate covered strawberries to my room as a gift! I was so pleasantly surprised and knew right then that I made the perfect choice of venue for my birthday! I can definitely say that she and the other staff made my stay absolutely prefect!! I love my pool buddie Matt as well! as my daughter says- He's a real "homie"! I can't wait to go back next year.

Summary Heading: Wonderful during the week but on the weekend....
Summary: We had a lovely stay here but the weekend brought an extremely young and somewhat rowdy crowd in.  The pool filled to capacity and they could not keep the area clean (why not have someone dedicated to doing that).  The music was club like (techno pop) and very loud.  No one was listening to it and one speaker continued to go off and on even though I mentioned the problem earlier in the week.  The music during the week at he pool was From the 70s and 80/s and the same music played all during the week.  The hotel itself was lovely.   The beach small but great (it was quieter down there). The rooms are nice but no air conditioning.  The hotel is in a great location, easy to get to downtown Laguna by foot or trolley.

Beautiful resort yet not SO big you get lost! Could NOT be closer to the ocean. The restaurant is delish, the outdoor fire pit patios are amazing, and the spa is just great! Now that Laguna offers the trolley to town, USE IT! So nice to have that back and forth accommodation!

If I could live here I would. You cannot beat the location, it is RIGHT on the water you can't get any closer. It's great for the kids because they can go to the ocean, run back up to the pool and order a smoothie while they sit in the hot tub! I've been several times.   Here's my tips: Rooms : in the main building (where you check in) all rooms are directly overlooking the sand and water, nothing else, if the tide is up it's like being on a boat.  Corner rooms have a nice side window. Don't get a room on the first floor because all the restaurant traffic walks by to the elevators and the hallways are quite echoey. The rooms in the building over looking the pool are noisier. The penthouse suites on the fifth floor are amazing but they do get that noise travelling up from the

Loved this seaside resort for a quick escape from the hustle and bustle. Pool is a bit small but we spend all our time right on the ocean. Great location. Service is excellent. Ocean view rooms are the best!

The surf and sand is one of my favorite hotels anywhere. It's amazing location right on the sand in Laguna beach and all ocean view rooms makes for a magnificent stay. While not the most elegant hotel, it makes up for it with lovely rooms and comfortable beds. Besides, who can complain when you can sleep with the sliding door open and fall asleep to the sound of crashing waves.   Can't wait to come back

Summary Heading: Lovely resort, rooms a little dated
Summary: OK this is an expensive resort so be prepared to pay top dollar.  That said you do get what you pay for.  The service throughout the hotel is excellent, very friendly and attentive.  I haven't checked my bill yet but I guess that "charge it to the room" is a dangerous phrase to overuse.  Would definitely recommend but try and get a room that has been refurbished, I believe some were done last year (not sure on that though).

We have been coming to Surf and Sand for over thirty years everything about this hotel is amazing. Starting of course with the location.  All rooms have breathtaking views of the Pacfic Ocean .  The hotel staff make you feel like family , they have five  staff amenities , great food, spa is second to none . I will say like many other ....can't wait till I return .
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for the compliments of our property, associates and amenities! As our long time, repeat guests, we value your opinion very much and appreciate you sharing your positive experience at Surf & Sand.   Please contact the Executive Office directly in the future for any needed assistance. We look very forward to having you as our guests once again.  Sincerely, Joanna Bear Resort Manager

Summary: We stayed in an Oceanfront Towers Corner room which had fantastic views. Unfortunately, the weather was cloudy and cool in early July, so we weren't able to enjoy the beach or the pool. On check in at 4:30 pm, we were told our room was not ready and weren't offered much of an apology at all. Wasn't impressed with the front desk staff at all upon check in or check out, but everyone else we encountered from the Valet, to the waiters, room service etc., were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Dinners and breakfast at the hotel were superb, and I'm sure we would have enjoyed it more, had the weather been cooperating. Perhaps striving to ensure rooms are ready on time and that guests receive a warm welcome at check-in would make us want to come back, but doubt we would return again.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. My sincere apologies that our Front Desk agents did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that your comments are taken very seriously and will be addressed for improvements.  Thank you also for the compliments and kind words of those you mentioned, which are appreciated and shared.  I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance, and we hope you choose to visit us again in the future.  Sincerely, Joanna Bear Resort Manager

Summary: Although the hotel has great location with ocean views and very nice rooms, we paid almost 600 USD per night to get a room with NO A/C !!!!! Rooms are extremely hot !!!!! No air !!!! We suffocated !!!!! Only a fan in the ceiling that does no effect at all !!!!  And plus, for smokers, you're not allowed anywhere in the premises of the hotel !! Only on the street outside.
Manager Response: Dear Maria,  I appreciate and value your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. Thank you for the compliments of our rooms and location. Most of the time along the coast, air conditioning is not needed; however, on occasion the temperature is high and uncomfortable. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during the cooler season when you are able to fully appreciate our oceanfront location.  We strive to provide all of our guests the attention they expect and deserve to ensure a pleasant stay and lasting memories. Please contact the Executive Office directly at 949-376-2761 so that all of your needs are met in the future.  Sincerely, Joanna Bear Resort Manager

Summary: Location is amazing.  Right on the beach in the middle of Laguna Beach.  However, overall our stay was very disappointing especially given the room rates.   Our tower room was nicely appointed and had a comfortable bed but we were shocked to find out there was NO AIR CONDITIONING!  The room had a ceiling fan and an extra fan in the closet but the air circulation was very limited.  That meant sleeping with the sliding doors open listening to extremely loud crashing waves.  Hence the reason they also supply ear plugs.   The room had a Keurig coffee maker but they did not replace the k-cups or the bottled water from the fridge. The hotel layout is awkward and lacks signage to help you get around. We had to walk through the restaurant to get to the pool and beach and friends of ours

We loved our stay at the Surf and Sand.  Great proximity to the water, rooms were beautiful and clean.  Nice pool area, great service.  Food/drinks are expensive.  You can't beat the location on the water and the sound of the waves while you are sleeping.

Summary Heading: Great hotel but NO AIR CONDITIONING.
Summary: Loved the view and overall property and staff were great. However, we were very warm and uncomfortable with no air. The room was very stuffy. This was surprising to me at such a nice resort that charges over 600 a night. I loved that it was right on the beach and the rooms were clean and had quality linens and nice furnishings.

Summary Heading: Surf and Sand stars are not bright!
Summary: This hotel I have stayed at 10x.  This was the worst experience and the hotel is run so poorly. The training and professionalism of most the staff is nonexistent. They lack customer service.  I would not recommend this hotel to anyone after my last stay.
Manager Response: On behalf of our staff here at Surf & Sand Resort, I apologize that we did not meet your expectations in service during your recent stay. We pride ourselves on putting guests first and treating each and every one with respect and gratitude, and I'm disappointed that your stay did not reflect these values. If you'd like to discuss the details of your stay, please feel free to contact our executive office at 949-376-2761 or phopkins@jcresorts.com. Thank you for your feedback and your past patronage at Surf & Sand. I hope we have a chance to earn back your good faith!

Summary Heading: The perfect place to relax and be pampered.
Summary: Spacious, well appointed rooms. Pleasant and responsive staff. Excellent food and service. Beautiful beach and pool. What more could one want. They were as helpful to me and my family of 5 as they were to the clearly high roller patrons. We felt like we were special. It was truly a treat.

The check in time is at 4:00 pm, our  room was not ready until 7:30 pm, so they mentioned they will make sure that we will be able to check out late, to be able to have the room for whole day! Next day they called me and insisted i leave the room by 11. i had to cancel my appt to drive back and pick up my stuff. they claimed there was a "miscommunication". they should try better training.     - great location, but MANY other better choices      - no a/c At all

Summary Heading: Lovely beach hotel could use AC and some updating
Summary: The staff are friendly and helpful. The hotel is close to the free trolley which helps because there is a lot of traffic in town and parking is tough. The room decor is California beach and pretty, tan and white. We were upgraded to ocean front and loved loved the view. It felt like we were on the beach all the time. The crashing waves were great but made it hard to sleep. We had to have the door open and they provide a nice shutter to keep out the birds, but it's loud and it was hot and hard to sleep. The hotel does not have air conditioning. I'm sure in the winter it's great, but in the summer it's hot. The bathrooms all over the hotel need some attention to the baseboards. My only real complaint might be the swimming pool. It's small and chairs are at a premium. Anyone off

Summary Heading: Nice experience, would try elsewhere on return though
Summary: I was going to a meeting in newport, and brought wife and daughters 10 and 12 along for some beach time. We had not been to laguna before. We had tickets to the pageant of the masters which was fantastic by the way.   So, the hotel. Good location, able to take trolley around town. Staff at hotel from front desk, concierge, valet, housekeeping and restaurant staff were superior.   We were in an ocean view tower room. There is a block of 90 of them, and they are the best rooms I think. The room was clean, well appointed, although not very tech friendly from an outlet standpoint. No outlets by beds and had to unplug lamps to charge devices. WiFi was strong though. As one can gather, there is no AC at this hotel. Yes there is a ceiling fan, but I could not get it to provide any

This hotel boasts an amazing location in Laguna beach - the waves crashing literally below your balcony. This means beach access is brilliant.  The hotel itself is really tired and dated. Needs a major overhaul.  Staff are friendly and helpful and breakfast and poolside lunches delicious.  If location is what's important, this is a great hotel. If it's style you want, it's not for you!

Summary Heading: Vacation in Paradise Awaits you at the Surf and Sand Resort
Summary: If you are interested in an amazing vacation, the Surf and Sand Resort in Laguna Beach won't disappoint! The Surf and Sand, located directly on the beach, with gorgeous views from every room makes for a breathtaking and magical experience.  Make certain to allow time to sit on your balcony with a beverage and listen to the sounds of the waves crashing while snacking on some of the marvelous choices from the in room dining menu. The rooms are gorgeously decorated and pleasing to the eye; the beds are so comfortable and situated so you can view the ocean waves! You must go to Splashes Restaurant and Bar where the food and drinks are spectacular. The menu offers a wide selection of delicious food and drink; you will again experience an amazing view of the ocean. When you travel

Beautiful hotel in the heart of Laguna ....sitting on top of the waves ..... 1 minute down to the beach.   Chairs and umbrellas free of charge. Immediate service at your beckon call.  Food great....concierge staff excellent....Beats Hawaii....best beach vacation.

Summary Heading: Always a good experience...one of my favorite hotels!
Summary: If you want to be right on the beach, in a beautiful ocean view room, I can't think of another hotel in Southern California that delivers what you find at Surf & Sand.  This was our 4th stay there and once again, I was not disappointed.  We were on the 3rd floor overlooking the pool and the beach and it was lovely.  We have also stayed on both of the side buildings that don't overlook the pool, and those are a bit quieter if that is what you're looking for.  One of my favorite things about this hotel is the size of the rooms and balconies and the very tasteful, understated d√©cor.  The rooms are very spacious and the balconies are actually large enough to sit on and enjoy the view.  At night, we left our sliding door open so that we could go to sleep listening to the ocean.
Manager Response: Dear Marti,  Thank you so much for sharing your  positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. As one of our very valued, repeat guests, I am so pleased that you enjoy the location, service and accommodations of the resort. We strive to provide all of our guests the attention they expect and deserve to ensure a pleasant stay and lasting memories.  Please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance. We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely, Joanna Bear Resort Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: Awesome views from every room and nice big balconies. Can't get any closer to the water. Very clean and beautiful environment. No need to even leave the property. Food, swimming pool, easy beach access with chairs towels and unbrellas and close to downtown!
Manager Response: Dear Diane,  Thank you so much for sharing your  positive feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand. As one of our very valued guests, I am so pleased that you enjoyed the accommodations of the resort;  the beach, dining, pool and close proximity to lovely downtown Laguna Beach. We strive to provide all of our guests the attention they expect and deserve to ensure a pleasant stay and lasting memories.  Please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance. We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear Resort Manager  Surf & Sand Resort

Summary Heading: Not the respite we'd hopef for - NOISY!
Summary: Within 5 minutes of getting to our room, we were looking for another place to stay.  This place has great views,  but the the rooms are so close to the beach that you hear every.sound.possible - kids and adults screaming in the beach, thumping bass from somebody's radio on tbe beach, the hallways are cavernous so you hear EVERY sound that echos down the hall.  Plus, there is NO air conditioning in the rooms, so if you're hot-natured, you might be uncomfortable, especially  if you close your balcony door to avoid the noise that filters up.  We were really looking forward to some peace and quiet after a jam-packed business trip and were disappointed that for so much money it wasn't the escape  from noise and crowds that we were looking for.
Manager Response: Dear Michele,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at Surf & Sand.  My sincere apologies that we did not meet your expectations. The summer months in Laguna Beach are a very busy time and the resort is fully committed. We would enjoy the opportunity of having you as our guests during our off season when it is a bit less crowded, more relaxing, quieter and cooler.  I invite you to please reach out to the Executive Office directly in the future at 949-376-2761 for any needed assistance.  We look forward to having you back with us.   Sincerely,  Joanna Bear  Resort Manager Surf & Sand Resort

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this property for two nights in July 2015.  I found the property to be average but nothing special and did not justify the price.  We got an okay deal on hotels.com and because of this were given the worst room on the property, basement level overlooking the pool.  Don't believe every room has an ocean view because ours did not.  The no AC didn't really bother us as it was cool at night but it made blocking out the pool noise difficult as people were in the water late at night as we were going to bed.    The indoor staircase we had to use to get to our room smelled horribly of mildew.  The reviews suggesting the property needs updated are accurate.   The pool area was very nice (albeit smaller than it looked in photos) overlooking the ocean and the

Party around every night... not in your room but seems to be in your room! Loud music, screams, and even fight! Start again 5 mn after security... This not the place to go if you want to rest. Looks like a perpetual spring break! But not the price.

Summary Heading: Good Stay would have been great if the rooms had air conditioning
Summary: I stayed here for a vacation and the hotel was very nice.  However, when we got to the room and found it warm we attempted to adjust the thermostat and did not find the room cooling off.  When I called the front desk, I was told that there is no ac in the ocean front facing rooms and I could use the box fan in the closet and open the door to the balcony.
